Chapter 1412
Just like that, Ye Xuan had succeeded in leaving behind the seal.
And with the existence of this seal, the current Ye Xuan could be said to not be afraid of Dao Realm powerhouses at all!
After subduing the seal, Ye Xuan looked up. There were two more levels after the 34th level.
There were a total of 36 levels!
What would the last two levels contain?
Meanwhile, Venerated Mi seemed to have read Ye Xuan's mind, and he said abruptly, "Daoist Master, the spirit tablets of our Daoting Ancestors are all within the 35 levels, and it's also their resting place. There's nothing else.
As for the 36 levels, there's a super formation within them. It's our Daoting Sect's protective formation, and it'll only be activated when the Daoting Sect is in danger. "
Ye Xuan looked at Venerated Mi, "There aren't any other treasures?"
Venerated Mi laughed bitterly, "There really isn't!"
Ye Xuan nodded slightly, "Then forget it!"
With that, he turned around and left.
Meanwhile, Venerated Mi suddenly said, "Daoist Master, aren't you going to be Daoting?"
Ye Xuan glanced at them and smiled, "How about this? I won't be the Daoting Master, and all of you can make the Daoting Decisions yourselves. What do you think?"
Everyone was stunned when they heard that.
Venerated Mi hurriedly said, "Absolutely not. Since the Ancestor made you the Daoist Master, then you are the Daoist Master. No one can change that!"
Daoting Ancestor? What kind of person was that?
Since she made Ye Xuan the Daoting Master, then there was definitely a deeper meaning behind it.
Moreover, after interacting with Ye Xuan, they realized that Ye Xuan really wasn't simple!
If Ye Xuan didn't become the Daoting Master now, then the Daoting Sect would be without a leader, and its future would be worrying!
Ye Xuan thought for a moment and said, "All of you will listen to what I say, right?"
Venerable Mi quickly nodded. "Of course!"
Ye Xuan looked at Venerable Mi. "I want to rebuild the order of Heaven and Earth, but Daoting all of us have to make changes!"
Venerable Mi hesitated and said, "That's a good thing, but …"
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Venerable Mi, do you know why my sister, Lord Qing, is so powerful?"
Venerable Mi looked at Ye Xuan. "Why?"
Ye Xuan walked in front of Venerable Mi and said softly, "Because she has not forgotten her original intention. Venerable Mi, you are also a guardian of the Great Dao, but do you know that your path has gone astray? If I'm not wrong, you have not been in contact with the God's Seal in your body for many years?"
Venerable Mi was silent.
The God's Seal did not leave, but it had been dormant for many years.
However, he did not care about it. With his current strength, he basically did not need to use the God's Seal.
Ye Xuan looked at Venerable Mi. "Senior, do you know why those in the past were able to reach Dao Realization, but you all were stuck at Dao Realization, unable to advance?"
Venerable Mi slowly clenched his fists. "It's a matter of faith!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "When Lord Qing came out, he said something that Senior should remember. That is, 'In the end, things have changed'.
Senior should know the meaning of this, right? "
Venerable Mi was silent.
Of course he knew!
This meant that the Daoting of today was no longer the Daoting of the past!
Ye Xuan looked at Venerable Mi. "Rebuild order, let the Three Thousand Daos shine again, let the world have order again. Senior, if Lord Qing and the others could do it, why can't we?"
He knew that if he wanted to truly control Daoting, he needed the support of Venerable Mi and the other two!
This was because the three of them were Dao Attainment Realm cultivators from the Dao Court!
With their support, anything he wanted to do would be simple.
Venerable Mi was silent for a long time. Then he said, "I understand Dao Master's meaning!
Whatever Dao Master wants to do, do it.
The three of us will support you with all our strength! "
Ye Xuan nodded. "That's good!"
Saying so, he looked around. "Senior, what do you think of the Fifth Dimension?"
Venerable Mi said solemnly, "Very good!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "I want to start with the Fifth Dimension!
To establish a relatively fair order in the Fifth Dimension, what do you think? "
Venerable Mi thought about it. "That's not a problem. However, to re-establish order, I'm afraid it'll be a bit difficult!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "It's not difficult!
As long as we work together, it's not difficult at all. "
Venerable Mi wanted to say something but stopped.
Ye Xuan smiled. "Does Senior want to say that it might affect some people's interests?"
Venerable Mi nodded.
Currently, the Dao Court was fighting for themselves. If they were to establish order now, it would be equivalent to fighting for others. Moreover, they would definitely have to give up some things. Many people would definitely be unwilling to do so.
Ye Xuan looked at Venerable Mi. "If they're not like-minded, then ask them to leave!"
Hearing this, Venerable Mi's heart trembled. He nodded. "Understood!"
Ye Xuan glanced at everyone present, and then he said, "Everyone, head to the Fifth Dimension!"
At the side, White Robe suddenly said. "Heaven Abyss …"
Ye Xuan looked at White Robe. "No!"
White Robe was stunned.
Ye Xuan turned and left. "In the future, I will give you salaries. Everyone's salaries will be doubled."
Everyone was stunned when they heard this.
Double the increase?
Is this true?
Everyone looked at each other.
Just like that, all the Daoting powerhouses headed to the Fifth Dimension. In the Fifth Dimension, Ye Xuan asked Guan Yin to build a Dao City!
This Dao City was filled with Daoting powerhouses.
As for Heaven Abyss, the Daoting completely withdrew and gave Heaven Abyss to the Dao Tomb. This caused the Dao Tomb to be slightly stunned.
What was Ye Xuan doing?
...
After returning to the Fifth Dimension, Ye Xuan immediately called San Sheng, Guan Yin, and Venerable Mi.
Ye Xuan looked at San Sheng. "San Sheng, are you willing to return to the Underworld?"
San Sheng was stunned. Then, he shook his head. "This place is quite fun!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "If you don't want to go back, then forget it!"
Saying this, he looked at Venerable Mi. "Venerable Mi, who do you think should guard the Underworld?"
To rebuild order, the Underworld was crucial.
Venerable Mi thought about it. "To rebuild the Underworld, we need a trustworthy person. Moreover, this person's ability must be outstanding."
Ye Xuan looked at Guan Yin. In fact, Guan Yin's ability was good, but she was not suitable. Her strength was still lacking. Moreover, this side needed Guan Yin. If Guan Yin left, this side would be in chaos.
Venerable Mi suddenly said. "I have a candidate, but I'm afraid you …"
Ye Xuan asked, "Who?"
Venerable Mi said in a deep voice, "Bai Dizi!"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan was stunned.
He had almost forgotten about this old man!
Damn, this old man was definitely capable. However, he did not have a good impression of this old man.
Venerable Mi said, "As the head of the Celestial Lords, Bai Dizi has been helping the previous Dao Ancestor manage the Daoting. If he were to manage the Underworld, it would be a piece of cake for him!"
Ye Xuan thought about it. Then, he said, "Choose someone else."
Venerable Mi was stunned. He looked at Ye Xuan and did not speak.
Ye Xuan smiled. "With his talent, it is a waste of his talent to manage the Underworld!"
Hearing this, Venerable Mi heaved a sigh of relief.
He thought that Ye Xuan wanted to kill Bai Dizi!
Venerable Mi said, "Then let Sir God Yin Ming go to the Underworld!
He was once the liaison between the Daoting and the Underworld, so he is familiar with the Underworld. Moreover, he is strong enough! "
Ye Xuan nodded. "Alright!"
As he spoke, he looked at San Sheng. "San Sheng, the Spirit of the Underworld is following you, right?"
San Sheng's expression changed slightly. She hurriedly shook her head. "No, no!"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Really?"
San Sheng said softly, "Can you let her go?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "I won't kill her!
I need her help! "
San Sheng blinked. "What help?"
Ye Xuan said, "Let her return to the Underworld. If there is no Spirit of the Underworld, will it still be called the Underworld?"
San Sheng hesitated for a moment. "I don't know if she will go back!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "She will definitely go back!
Because the Underworld is her home! "
San Sheng nodded. "I'll talk to her!
But if she doesn't want to go back, you can't force her! "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Great!"
San Sheng turned and left.
At this moment, Ye Xuan asked again, "Venerable Mi, do you know where Bai Dizi is?"
Venerable Mi nodded. "I do!"
Ye Xuan said, "How about this? Tell him to do something for me!"
Venerable Mi asked, "What is it?"
Ye Xuan said, "Ask him to help find those with the God's Seal. Find them and bring them back. As long as they are willing to return, they will receive a monthly salary."
Venerable Mi smiled. "That won't be a problem. He's in charge of the Daoting. He's the best when it comes to these messy matters."
Ye Xuan nodded. "Go do what you need to do!"
Venerable Mi bowed slightly and turned to leave.
Only Ye Xuan and Guan Yin were left in the hall.
Guan Yin said in a deep voice, "You really want to establish order?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Guan Yin was puzzled. "Why?"
Ye Xuan said softly, "The current Fifth Dimension is so harmonious because of me. But what if I'm not there?"
Guan Yin was silent.
Without Ye Xuan, the Fifth Dimension would be in chaos!
Because no one could suppress it!
Ye Xuan said softly, "I want to establish order. An order that everyone follows. Even without me, the Fifth Dimension will not be in chaos … At least not for a certain period of time!
Of course, there's nothing wrong with a new order!
At least, this world will become a better place! "
If it was in the past, he would definitely not do this.
But now, he was willing to do it.
Because the Fifth Dimension was the universe that Sister Nian was protecting!
He, Ye Xuan, wanted to protect the Fifth Dimension. Protecting the Fifth Dimension was equivalent to protecting Sister Nian!
He had promised Sister Nian!
....
Ancient God Abyss.
After Su Ke returned to the Ancient God Abyss, at the top of a pyramid, Su Zhe looked at Su Ke. "You're saying that the people from the Dark Abyss want to kill Ye Xuan?"
Su Ke nodded. "Yes.
Young Master Ye not only has the Dao Scripture, but he's also related to Situ Tingyun from the Sword Sect. And the Dark Abyss has a blood feud with Situ Tingyun, so … "
Su Zhe suddenly laughed. "The Dark Abyss … This Old Man is dying from laughter … No, let's take a break … haha …"
Su Ke: "…"
.....








Chapter 1413
In the Fifth Dimension.
In the Sword Hall, Ye Xuan sat cross-legged on the ground.
Stabilizing his realm!
He had reached the Dao Controlling Realm during the battle, but his realm was still unstable. What he needed to do now was to stabilize his realm and familiarize himself with the Dao Controlling Realm!
After reaching the Dao Controlling Realm, he felt that the greatest improvement was in his body.
This was something he had not expected!
He was now at the Dao Controlling Realm and his body was also at the Dao Controlling Realm. It could be said that he could fight Dao Attainment Realm experts without using any external items!
With the addition of that strange Dao seal, he now had the ability to kill a Dao Attainment Realm expert!
In the hall, as Ye Xuan stabilized his realm, his aura became more and more stable. In the end, his aura disappeared and he seemed to have merged with heaven and earth.
...
After the Daoting entered the Fifth Dimension, the Fifth Dimension was unprecedentedly powerful.
In addition, the Spirit Qi in the entire Fifth Dimension was getting denser.
This was because the Fifth Dimension didn't just have the Spirit Qi of Heaven and Earth. There were also the super mineral veins that Ye Xuan brought from the Dark World!
These super mineral veins were not only used to produce fortune crystals but also contained extremely pure Spirit Qi. With these mineral veins, the Spirit Qi in the Fifth Dimension became even denser.
Of course, there was another reason why the Spirit Qi in the Fifth Dimension was so dense. It was because the experts of the Fifth Dimension were protecting it!
In the Fifth Dimension, destroying Spirit Qi and origin was a serious crime!
In short, the Fifth Dimension was better than ever!
...
In the Dao Tomb, the Lord and the others gathered.
The Lord glanced at Luo Hou and the others and said with a smile, "Ye Xuan has taken over the Dao Court completely. He also asked the people of the Dao Court to withdraw from the Celestial Abyss. Now, the Celestial Abyss is in our hands!"
Bitter King said solemnly, "This is a good thing!"
The Lord smiled. "It is indeed a good thing!"
At this moment, Qing Yaoyao suddenly said, "Can Ye Xuan really establish order?"
The Lord looked at Qing Yaoyao and smiled. "What do you think?"
Qing Yaoyao said solemnly, "I think so!"
The Lord asked, "How so?"
Qing Yaoyao said softly, "Because he is strong enough!
And his backer is very strong! "
Backer!
The surroundings suddenly fell silent when they heard this.
Now, not only did Ye Xuan have the support of the people behind him, but he also had the support of the Daoting Ancestors!
Meanwhile, Chi Yaoyao continued, "If he attains the Dao Formation Realm, then I think that very few in the Dao Formation Realm would be a match for him!"
Luo Hou frowned slightly. "He just reached the Dao Defense Realm!"
Qian Yaoyao shook her head. "In this world, some people can't be judged by common sense!"
Luo Hou was silent.
Just as Yan Yaoyao had said, some people couldn't be judged by common sense. For example, Ye Xuan's life was like cheating!
Comparing oneself to others would really anger one to death!
Chi Yaoyao continued, "What we have to think about now is if Ye Xuan really establishes order. At that time, should we obey his order?"
At the side, Bitter King frowned slightly. "He's building his own. What does that have to do with us?"
Yao Yao smiled and didn't say anything.
Luo Hou spoke solemnly, "At that time, I'm afraid it won't be up to us!"
Meanwhile, the Lord suddenly smiled and said, "Actually, establishing a completely new order isn't a bad thing. Of course, it might not be very difficult for him to establish a completely new order. However, he has to deal with two things first!"
Yan Yaoyao spoke solemnly, "The Dark Abyss and the Whirling World!"
The Lord nodded. "The Dark Abyss saved the Dao Ancestors. Obviously, they've chosen to interfere.
As for the Whirling World, I believe that they'll definitely not give up on this scripture.
They would definitely not give up on this scripture. After all, Ye Xuan already had six scrolls with him. If they could get Ye Xuan's six scrolls, they would have seven scrolls in total.
So, if I'm not wrong, the Whirling World has probably sent someone over. "
Luo Hou gazed at the Lord, "What about us?
What should we do now? "
The Lord smiled and said, "Nothing!
We'll just wait and see!
So long as we wait and see, then no matter if it's Ye Xuan, the Whirling World, or the Dark Abyss, none of them will come looking for trouble with us! "
At this point, he smiled faintly, "Of course, we can provide some help to Ye Xuan!"
Luo Hou looked at the Lord, "The Lord is still optimistic about Ye Xuan!"
The Lord smiled, "Why not?
Do you think it's just luck that a person with the Calamity Seed could survive until now? "
Luo Hou was silent.
The Lord smiled, "Don't forget one person!
Mu Niannian! "
Mu Niannian!
The expressions of everyone here changed when they heard this.
They almost forgot about this woman!
This woman had been reborn. Although she had lost her memories and strength, what if she regained her memories?
After all, the Fifth Dimension no longer needed her to suppress it!
Once she regained her memories, she would have all her strength!
In that state, how many people in the world could be a match for Mu Niannian?
Luo Hou said softly, "So, the Dark Abyss and the Whirling World won't give Ye Xuan too much time!"
The Lord suddenly stood up, "This is not something we should worry about. I want to take a stroll in the Fifth Dimension. Are you interested?"
Luo Hou hesitated, "Then let's go!"
The Lord smiled, "Let's go!"
At this point, he left with everyone else.
...
In a certain part of the starry sky, the originally calm starry sky suddenly trembled. It didn't take long for the space there to split open, and then an old man and a woman in a green dress walked out from within.
Both of their faces were slightly pale.
The old man looked around and said softly, "It really wasn't easy to come to this place!"
The woman in green slowly closed her eyes. Her aura was very unstable because traveling through the starry sky had consumed too much of her mind and strength!
After a while, the woman in green returned to normal.
The old man smiled, "How do you feel?"
The woman in green's expression was cold, "Good!"
The old man nodded, looked into the distance, and said softly, "I haven't been to this universe for many years!"
The woman in green said, "Elder, can you feel the aura of Ye Xuan?"
The old man slowly closed his eyes. After a while, he looked to the right, "He is in the Fifth Dimension!"
The woman in green said, "Then let's go!"
The old man shook his head.
The woman in green looked at the old man, and the old man said in a deep voice, "Girl, don't look down on this person. Although we haven't had any dealings with him, he is definitely not an ordinary person since he has five Dao scriptures!"
The woman in green was expressionless, "I am not looking down on him, but I feel that he is not qualified for me to pay attention to him!"
The old man shook his head, "Girl, there is always someone better than you. Be careful in everything you do!"
The woman in green did not speak.
The old man sighed, feeling helpless. The woman in front of him was one of the three great evildoers of the Saha World. She indeed had the qualifications to be arrogant.
However, this Ye Xuan was able to collect five Dao scriptures, so he was definitely not an ordinary person!
The reason he could live until now, besides his own strength, was also because of his cautiousness!
Be careful in everything!
At this time, the woman in green suddenly said, "Elder, let's go meet that Ye Xuan!"
The elder nodded, "Let's go meet him!"
He was also a little curious about this Ye Xuan!
He was actually able to collect two Dao scriptures!
Soon, the two disappeared into the starry sky.
...
In the Fifth Dimension.
The door to Ye Xuan's room was tightly shut.
During this period of time, he had been cultivating in seclusion, and no one came to disturb him.
It was worth mentioning that more and more people in the Fifth Dimension had broken through to the Dao Validation Realm!
Because this time, he had the help of the Daoting!
As one of the top forces, the Daoting could not be compared to the current Fifth Dimension in terms of nurturing people.
This was because the Daoting had inheritance!
In the Fifth Dimension, there was nothing. If it was not for Ye Xuan's wealth, even An Lanxiu and the others could not reach the Dao Validation Realm, let alone others!
And the most evildoer, Xiao Qi, had already begun to break through to the Dao Defense Realm …
As for Xiao Qi's talent, even experts like the Daoting were very shocked!
It was too terrifying!
It could be said that Xiao Qi's talent was not inferior to Ye Xuan's at all!
In a hall somewhere, Venerable Mi, who was resting with his eyes closed, suddenly opened his eyes. The next moment, he disappeared on the spot, and when he reappeared, he was already in the starry sky.
In front of him stood an old man and a woman in green!
Seeing Venerable Mi, the old man smiled, "You are?"
Venerable Mi asked, "The two of you are?"
The old man smiled, "The two of us are from the Whirling World. This time, we came to meet Young Master Ye!"
The Whirling World!
Venerable Mi's heart sank. He knew that this force would appear sooner or later, but he did not expect it to appear so soon!
The old man smiled, "Is that okay?"
Venerable Mi glanced at the two of them, and then said, "I'll go ask the Dao Master!"
With that, he turned and left.
At this moment, the old man suddenly said, "Dao Master?"
Venerable Mi glanced at the old man, "He is now the Dao Master of my Daoting!"
With that, he turned and disappeared in the starry sky.
The Dao Master!
The old man frowned slightly, "Ye Xuan has actually become the Master of the Daoting …. Didn't the information we gathered say that Ye Xuan and the Daoting are mortal enemies?"
The woman in green looked down and remained silent. No one knew what she was thinking.
Meanwhile, Venerable Mi appeared once more in the starry sky, and he glanced at the two of them, "The Dao Master invites you in!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he gestured for them to enter.
The old man nodded slightly, "Please lead the way!"
Venerable Mi nodded, and then he turned around and left.
The two of them followed Venerable Mi.
Under Venerable Mi's lead, the two of them arrived at Sword Hall, and only Ye Xuan was there.
Looking at the two old men, Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Please take a seat."
The old man smiled, "Young Master Ye, I've heard a lot about you!"
Ye Xuan grinned, "You must be joking!"
The old man continued, "Old Man, let's get straight to the point!
I heard that Young Master Ye has five Daoist scriptures! "
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes!"
The old man smiled, "Young Master Ye, those Daoist scriptures belong to my Whirling Sect. I wonder if Young Master Ye can return them?"
They belong to the Whirling Sect!
Ye Xuan blinked, "Are you sure?"
The old man said seriously, "They do indeed belong to my Whirling Sect!
Young Master Ye, please return them! "
Ye Xuan sighed softly, "You're too late!"
The old man frowned, "What do you mean?"
Ye Xuan said seriously, "The five Daoist scriptures have been taken by the Dark World!"
Venerable Mi, "…"
..








Chapter 1414
The Dark World has taken it!
In the hall, the old man frowned at Ye Xuan's words. "Really?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Really.
If you check, you'll find out that the former Dao Ancestor has joined forces with the Dark World.
They have many Dao Scriptures now. If you want them, you can go to the Dark World! "
The old man fell silent.
The woman spoke abruptly, "I heard you're the number one genius in this universe?"
Ye Xuan looked at her and smiled, "You must be joking!"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan, "Shall we spar?"
Ye Xuan hurriedly shook his head, "No, no!"
The woman frowned, "Why?"
Ye Xuan laughed bitterly, "How can a place like this compare to the Whirling World?
The number one genius here is probably a joke in the eyes of the Whirling World! "
He paused for a moment and continued, "Moreover, your aura is thick. I'm afraid you've attained the Dao Realm, right?"
The woman glanced at Ye Xuan and nodded slightly.
Ye Xuan's expression instantly turned solemn, and he cupped his fists, "It's truly rare to see someone who has attained the Dao Realm at such a young age."
The woman's expression was calm, "Even though there aren't many young Dao Realm cultivators in the Whirling World, there are quite a few!"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment and said, "May I know when you attained the Dao?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan, "I attained the Dao Imperial Realm at the age of 16, attained the Dao at the age of 18, and I'm 20 now!"
Ye Xuan was stunned, and then he said with astonishment, "Attained the Dao at the age of 18?"
The woman nodded, "Yes!
Why do you look so shocked? "
Ye Xuan laughed bitterly, "Miss, I didn't even attain the Dao at the age of 18.
There's always someone better out there! "
The woman glanced at Ye Xuan, "Don't be discouraged, you're not bad yourself!"
Ye Xuan shook his head repeatedly. "In this universe, I might be considered good, but if I were to be placed in your world, I'm afraid I'm nothing!
Sigh … "
The green-robed woman's lips moved, but she didn't know what to say.
She was really not good at comforting people!
At the side, the old man glanced at Ye Xuan. No one knew what he was thinking.
Venerable Mi also glanced at Ye Xuan with an odd expression.
At this time, Ye Xuan looked at the green-robed woman, "May I know your name?"
The woman hesitated for a moment before she said, "Xuan Chu!"
Ye Xuan cupped his fists and said, "Miss Xuan Chu, if you don't mind, I would like to ask you some questions about the Martial Dao!"
Xuan Chu looked at the old man. The old man smiled and said, "Young master Ye, since the Dao Scripture is not in your hands, then we will have to leave!
If there's a chance in the future, the two of you can discuss it! "
Ye Xuan sighed softly with a downcast expression.
Xuan Chu glanced at Ye Xuan and was about to speak when the old man suddenly said, "Young master Ye, we will be leaving now!"
With that, he turned around and left with Xuan Chu.
At this moment, Ye Xuan hurriedly said, "Miss, please wait!"
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan walked quickly to Xuan Chu, and he hesitated for a moment before he said, "Miss Xuan Chu, will you be coming back?"
Xuan Chu, "…"
Venerable Mi, "…"
At the side, the old man glanced at Ye Xuan with a slightly unsightly expression.
Dammit, this kid has ulterior motives!
Xuan Chu was about to speak when the old man suddenly said, "Young master Ye, we won't be coming back!"
His tone was very flat and carried a trace of coldness.
Ye Xuan was stunned, and then he looked at Xuan Chu. He was about to speak when the old man suddenly said, "Young master Ye, we have matters to attend to. Farewell!"
With that, he left with Xuan Chu.
Ye Xuan still wanted to say something, but the old man disappeared with Xuan Chu.
Ye Xuan was stunned, and a moment later, he turned to look at Venerable Mi. "Am I very scary?"
Venerable Mi hesitated. "A little!"
At this moment, he was quite emotional. No wonder Bai Dizi couldn't defeat this fellow!
This fellow was really shameless!
In fact, he was quite impressed with Ye Xuan because Ye Xuan had resolved this crisis with just a few words!
At least it was temporarily resolved!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly left the hall.
Outside the hall, Nian Nian appeared beside Ye Xuan. Nian Nian turned to look at Ye Xuan and giggled. "Where are we going to play today?"
Ye Xuan laughed. "You decide!"
Nian Nian blinked. "Roast fish first!"
Hearing that, Ye Xuan instantly burst into laughter.
Roast fish!
In next to no time, Ye Xuan took Nian Nian's hand and vanished into the distance.
...
Xuan Chu and the old man looked down from the starry sky, and no one knew what they were thinking.
The old man suddenly said, "Xuan Chu, do you believe that scripture is in the hands of the Dark World?"
Xuan Chu spoke softly, "It should be true!"
The old man was quite puzzled. "Why?"
Xuan Chu looked down and said, "He doesn't seem like someone who would lie!"
The old man was speechless.
Xuan Chu continued, "Should we go to the Dark World?"
The old man shook his head. "The Dark World isn't like the Fifth Dimension. It isn't that simple."
Xuan Chu gazed at the old man. "Wait?"
The old man thought for a moment and said, "Wait for me to investigate and understand the ins and outs of the matter!"
Xuan Chu nodded. "Alright!"
The old man glanced at Xuan Chu, hesitated for a moment, and said, "Little Girl, what do you think of Ye Xuan?"
Xuan Chu gazed at the old man. "Elder, why do you ask?"
The old man replied, "I'm just asking!"
Xuan Chu fell silent for a moment before he said, "He's a good person!"
The old man's face fell. "Little Girl, in my opinion, Ye Xuan might not be a good person. Moreover, he's quite flashy, so you have to be careful!"
Xuan Chu's expression was calm. "Elder, what are you trying to say?"
The old man hesitated for a moment before he said, "Little Girl, you're the most monstrous genius of my Whirling Sect, and you're the next Sect Master …. Of course, this doesn't mean that you have to be heartless. However, the person you choose must be a genius favored by the heavens. But this Ye Xuan …."
As he spoke, he shook his head. "Even though this Ye Xuan isn't particularly bad, he isn't worthy of you!"
Xuan Chu gazed at the old man. "Elder, aren't you overthinking things?"
The old man sighed in a low voice. "I'm not overthinking things. It's just that this Ye Xuan is clearly a playboy … No matter what, Xuan Chu should avoid interacting with him!"
Xuan Chu gazed down with a calm expression. "Elder, someone who was able to become a Daolord and manage the Fifth Dimension so well can't be too bad!"
As she spoke, she gazed at the old man. "Elder, don't judge a person from a one-sided perspective."
The old man laughed bitterly. "Little Girl, I'm not looking down on him. It's just that he's flashy, and he's … intentionally trying to curry favor with you. I think …."
Xuan Chu shook her head. "Elder, in your opinion, he's trying to curry favor with me. But in my opinion, he's a humble and low-profile person."
The old man was speechless.
Xuan Chu continued. "Elder, don't forget that he's a Swordsman!"
A Swordsman!
The old man fell silent.
Needless to say, this Swordsman wasn't quite like the Swordsman he'd imagined!
Right at this moment, a figure suddenly appeared in front of the old man and Xuan Chu.
It was Dark World's Lian Zun!
Lian Zun cupped his fists and smiled. "You two should be from the Whirling World, right?"
The old man looked at Lian Zun. "Dark World?"
Lian Zun smiled. "Yes!"
The old man was expressionless. "What's the matter?"
Lian Zun nodded. "Your Excellency, why don't we cooperate?"
The old man frowned. "Cooperate?"
Lian Zun smiled. "That Ye Xuan isn't simple. Not only does he have a mysterious expert behind him, but he also has a relationship with the Ancient God Abyss. Most importantly …"
The old man suddenly interrupted Lian Zun. "Isn't the Dao Scripture in your Dark World's hands?"
Lian Zun was stunned. "Who said that?"
The old man said. "Ye Xuan!"
Ye Xuan!
Lian Zun: "…"
The old man continued. "Why, isn't it in your Daoting hands?"
Lian Zun said in a deep voice. "To tell you the truth, my Dark World has two Dao Scriptures, and that Ye Xuan has six!"
The old man frowned. "He said you took them all!"
Lian Zun shook his head. "He's bullsh * tting!"
The old man's face darkened.
Ye Xuan was lying?
Xuan Chu suddenly said. "You're saying he has six Dao Scriptures?"
Lian Zun nodded. "Yes!"
Xuan Chu looked at Lian Zun. "Why didn't you take them?"
The old man looked at Xuan Chu. "Girl, this isn't the point. The point is that Ye Xuan is lying to us!"
Xuan Chu looked at the old man. "Why isn't Dark World lying to us?"
Old man: "…"
Lian Zun suddenly smiled. "Looks like you don't know much about this Ye Xuan. He's a famous liar. If you get to know him better, you'll know who's real and who's fake!"
Xuan Chu looked at Lian Zun. "If he has six Dao Scriptures, why didn't Dark World take them?"
Lian Zun smiled. "I told you!
This Ye Xuan isn't simple! "
Xuan Chu asked again. "You want to join forces with us to fight for the Dao Scriptures?"
Lian Zun nodded. "Yes!"
Xuan Chu asked. "What happens after we get the Dao Scriptures?"
Lian Zun smiled. "Why don't we talk about this after we get the Dao Scriptures?"
Xuan Chu didn't speak anymore. He looked at the old man.
The old man said after a moment of silence, "Sir, I don't know who is telling the truth between you and Ye Xuan. We'll look into it. As for the cooperation, let's not talk about it for now!"
With that, he left with Xuan Chu.
In the starry sky, Lian Zun was silent for a moment. He said softly, "Ye Xuan, can you be more shameless?
When did Dark World snatch your Dao Scriptures? "
....
Ancient God Abyss.
At the top of a pyramid, Su Zhe suddenly said, "Dark World might be up to something big recently!"
Beside Su Zhe, Su Ke asked in a low voice, "What do you mean?"
Su Zhe turned around and said, "Many powerful auras are coming out from Dark Abyss!"
Hearing this, Su Ke's face darkened. "Should we stop them?"
Su Zhe shook his head. "What for?"
Su Ke was puzzled. "Don't stop them?"
Su Zhe slowly closed his eyes. "Don't stop them!
Let them continue, the more they do, the better … "
Su Ke was speechless.

I just want to say that you've underestimated me!

Chapter 1415
Suke said solemnly, "You want to use the plain-dressed woman to destroy the Dark Abyss?"
Hearing this, Su Zhe opened his eyes. After a long moment of silence, he said softly, "We've been at a stalemate with the Dark Abyss for hundreds of thousands of years!
How many people have we lost in these hundreds of thousands of years? "
Su Ke was silent.
Su Zhe continued, "For the past hundreds of thousands of years, neither of us has been able to defeat the other. But now, it's time to end this long war!"
Suke asked solemnly, "Can that senior really destroy the Dark Abyss?"
Su Zhe looked up into the starry sky. "Forget about destroying the Dark Abyss, even if the Ancient God Abyss and the Dark Abyss were to join forces, we would still be no match for her!"
Su Ke's expression was grave. "Is he really that strong?"
Su Zhe's eyes were clouded with confusion, "You've never faced her before, you don't know how we feel when we face her!
This is despair, true despair! "
The strength of the plainly dressed woman caused him to feel despair!
At this time, Su Zhe suddenly laughed, "I never imagined that An Yuan would want to kill Ye Xuan. It seems like the heavens want An Yuan dead!"
Saying that, he looked at Su Ke. "You can contact that Young Master Ye and give him some help."
Su Ke nodded. "Understood!"
As if he'd thought of something, Su Ke said, "According to my knowledge, Lian Zun is investigating that woman in a plain dress!"
Su Zhe laughed, "Let him investigate!
They won't be able to find anything anyway! "
Currently, only the people from the Ancient God Abyss knew how strong the lady in the plain dress was. However, would the Ancient God Abyss tell An Yuan about it?
Of course not!
Suke continued, "And the Whirling World …"
Hearing this, Su Zhe fell silent.
Even the Ancient God Abyss had to take the Whirling World seriously!
After a while, Su Zhe said, "If Young Master Ye is in danger, protect him at all costs!"
Su Ke looked at Su Zhe, "At all costs?"
Su Zhe nodded. "At all costs!"
Su Ke was silent.
Su Zhe said, "This friend of Young Master Ye, my Ancient God Abyss is definitely going to befriend him!"
Su Ke: "…"
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, Lian Zun sat cross-legged in the starry sky. His entire being seemed to be one with the starry sky.
Next to him was a former Daofather.
At that moment, the Dao Ancestor had already recovered his body.
At this time, Lian Zun opened his eyes. He looked down at the Fifth Dimension and smiled. "Dao Ancestor, how do you feel now?"
The Dao Ancestor was expressionless and did not say anything.
Now that the Daoting had settled in the Fifth Dimension, how could he feel?
With the support of the Daoting Ancestor, no one in the Daoting World would recognize him as the Dao Ancestor anymore!
Lian Zun suddenly said, "Dao Ancestor, Daoting, you've investigated Ye Xuan before this. Do you know who that woman in a plain dress behind him is?"
The Dao Ancestor shook his head. "I don't know!"
Lian Zun frowned, "You don't know?"
The Dao Ancestor nodded. "This person is too mysterious. I only know that she usually only uses one sword to kill!"
One strike!
Lian Zun chuckled, "Interesting!"
The Dao Ancestor shook his head. "This woman's strength is most likely above Dao Attainment!"
Lian Zun said softly, "Above Dao Attainment … Can you be sure?"
The Dao Ancestor shook his head. "I'm not sure because I've never come into contact with this person before!"
After a moment of silence, Lian Zun said, "How do we find this person?"
The Dao Ancestor looked at Lian Zun. "You want to find her!"
Lian Zun stood up and looked down. "This person is Ye Xuan's Dao Protector. Naturally, I have to figure out her background and true strength. Otherwise, she will be like a thorn in my throat!"
Saying this, he looked at the Dao Ancestor. "How about it? Are you interested in meeting this person?"
The Dao Ancestor frowned. "Me?"
Lian Zun smiled. "Yes."
The Dao Ancestor was silent.
Lian Zun smiled. "With your strength, even if you can't defeat the opponent, it shouldn't be a problem for you to escape unscathed!
Of course, if you're afraid, it doesn't matter. I'll send someone else! "
The Dao Ancestor said calmly, "There's no need for someone else. I'll go myself!
I also want to see how strong this person is.
However, I don't know where this person is! "
Lian Zun said, "Didn't someone find her before you Daoting?"
The Dao Ancestor said in a deep voice, "That's because of their talent!
Now, both of them are dead! "
Lian Zun thought about it and said, "That's simple!"
As soon as he finished speaking, an old man suddenly appeared behind him.
The old man's attire was a little gaudy. His body was covered in copper coins. In his left hand, he held a long wooden staff and in his right hand, he held a tortoise shell.
Lian Zun smiled and said, "Master, thank you!"
The old man nodded slightly and slowly closed his eyes. Soon, the copper coins on his body began to tremble violently.
Seeing that, the Dao Ancestor frowned. "Is this a divination technique?"
Lian Zun smiled and said, "Yes!
However, it's not an ordinary divination technique. It's a divination technique from the Dark Sutra. "
Just as the Dao Ancestor was about to speak, the old man suddenly opened his eyes. He looked into the depths of the starry sky and frowned.
Lian Zun asked, "What's wrong?"
The former master said hoarsely, "It's in a very, very far place!"
The Dao Ancestor frowned slightly. "How far?"
The former master said in a low voice, "Extremely far!"
The Dao Ancestor looked at Lian Zun. Lian Zun said softly, "Very far … Isn't he Ye Xuan's Dao Protector?
Why is he so far away?
Or does the other party have a motive? "
The Dao Ancestor said in a low voice, "He might have a motive!"
As he spoke, he looked at the former master. "Can you catch up to this person?"
After a moment of silence, the former master said, "I can try!"
As he spoke, he opened his palm and a black copper coin appeared in his palm. He handed the copper coin to the Dao Ancestor. "This item will guide you!"
The Dao Ancestor nodded and took the copper coin. At that moment, Lian Zun suddenly said, "Dao Ancestor, the main purpose of finding this woman this time is to test her. If you can't defeat her, don't become enemies with her. Protecting yourself is the most important!"
The Dao Ancestor put away the copper coin and said calmly, "Don't worry. As long as I see this person, I'll know his strength!"
As he spoke, he paused for a moment and continued, "Even if I'm not her match, if I want to escape, she can't do anything to me. I still have that much confidence."
Lian Zun nodded. "No matter what, it's better to be careful!"
The Dao Ancestor nodded and did not say anything else. He turned around and left. Soon, he disappeared into the vast starry sky.
After the Dao Ancestor left, Lian Zun suddenly looked at the former master. "Is this trip ominous or auspicious?"
The former master was silent.
Lian Zun frowned slightly. "I don't know or can't say?"
The former master shook his head. "I don't know!"
As he spoke, he sighed softly. "I'm afraid this woman isn't that simple!"
Lian Zun asked. "What do you mean?"
The former master shook his head slightly. "When I was calculating this person, I always had a feeling of unease in my heart. I've never seen such a scene before!"
As he spoke, he raised his head and looked into the depths of the starry sky. There was a trace of worry in his eyes. "I'm afraid he'll be in trouble this time!"
He was in trouble!
Lian Zun raised his head and looked into the depths of the starry sky. He smiled and said, "I'm a little curious about how strong she is."
As he spoke, he seemed to have thought of something and shook his head with a smile. "Killing with only one sword … It sounds very powerful …"
With that, he turned around and left.
...
In the Five-Dimensional Universe.
In the Dao City, Ye Xuan was strolling leisurely on the streets with Nian Nian. In her left hand, she was holding a roasted fish and in her right hand, she was holding a stick of candied hawthorn!
Along the way, Nian Nian kept looking around curiously.
Ye Xuan looked at Nian Nian beside him and smiled. Actually, he didn't miss Nian to recover her memory so quickly because Nian Nian didn't have so many burdens now. She was very happy!
Of course, it would be a good thing if she could recover her memory!
At this moment, Nian Nian suddenly pulled Ye Xuan's hand and pointed to the noodle shop not far away.
Ye Xuan laughed. "Let's go!
Let's eat some noodles! "
Nian Nian quickly nodded.
After the two of them found a place to sit down, Ye Xuan looked at the boss in the distance and said with a smile, "Two bowls of noodles!"
In the distance, the boss smiled and said, "Alright!"
Soon, the waiter placed two bowls of noodles in front of the two of them.
Ye Xuan looked at the two bowls of noodles in front of him in silence.
At this moment, he thought of Ye Ling!
Ling 'er!
Where was she now?
At this moment, Nian Nian suddenly said, "What's wrong?"
Ye Xuan retracted his thoughts and said with a smile, "Nothing!
Let's eat some noodles! "
Nian Nian was about to speak when a woman suddenly walked to the side of the two of them.
It was Xuan Chu!
Xuan Chu directly sat next to Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan was stunned for a moment and then said with a smile, "Miss Xuan Chu!
We meet again! "
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan. "The Dao Scripture is in your hands, right?"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "It seems that Miss Xuan Chu has already come into contact with the Dark World!"
Xuan Chu was expressionless. "Why did you lie?"
Ye Xuan was silent.
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan and asked again, "Why did you lie to me!?"
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly. "Miss Xuan Chu, if you were me, what would you do?"
Xuan Chu's expression was cold and she did not speak.
Ye Xuan said again, "You are so strong. If I did not use this method, would you and your elder let me go?
Definitely not! "
Xuan Chu said, "That Dao Scripture belongs to the Whirling Sect …"
Ye Xuan's lips curled up. "Are you sure?"
Xuan Chu frowned. "What do you mean?"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "As far as I know, this Dao Scripture came from the Whirling World. However, it does not belong to the Whirling Sect, right?"
Xuan Chu shook her head. "You should know that it will only bring you endless trouble if you have it."
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Did you cooperate with the Dark World?"
Xuan Chu shook her head. "No!
However, the elder is very likely to cooperate with them. "
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Xuan Chu, why don't we cooperate?"
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan. "We cooperate?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "We cooperate and deal with the Dark World together!"
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan. "The elder will not cooperate with you!"
Ye Xuan was confused. "Why?"
Xuan Chu said, "Because you are weaker than the Dark World!"
Ye Xuan: "…"
Xuan Chu said again, "Moreover, you have more Dao Scriptures than the Dark World!"
Then, she paused and said, "Can I have a look at those Dao Scriptures?"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Of course you can!"
After saying that, he waved his right hand and six Dao Scriptures appeared in front of Xuan Chu.
Xuan Chu was stunned. She just let him see it?
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan. "Why do you trust me so much?"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "I treat you as a friend!
Moreover, as the super monster of the Whirling World, you will not do such a despicable thing, right?
Of course, if you snatch it, then I, Ye Xuan, am blind. I will admit defeat! "
Xuan Chu was silent.
.....








Chapter 1416
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan. "Are you trying to play tricks with me?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Miss Xuan Chu, are the Dao scriptures in front of you fake?"
Xuan Chu looked at the six Dao scriptures. After a while, she said softly, "They are real!"
Ye Xuan asked, "Then can you show me the Dao scriptures from the Whirling World?
Even if you're playing tricks! "
After a moment of silence, Xuan Chu lowered her head and said softly, "I'm sorry, I can't show them to you!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "It doesn't matter!
You can look at mine first! "
Xuan Chu hesitated and shook her head. She placed the six Dao scriptures back in front of Ye Xuan. "I'm not looking at them!"
With that, she stood up and left.
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Why aren't you looking at them?"
Xuan Chu stopped and looked at Ye Xuan. "The Whirling World's Dao scriptures are the sect's most precious treasures. Without the sect leader's permission, I can't show them to others!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Because you can't show them to me, you won't look at mine?"
Xuan Chu nodded.
Ye Xuan thought for a moment and said, "Aren't you curious about these Dao scriptures?"
Xuan Chu's expression was calm. "I'm curious, but I don't want to owe you anything!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "How about this? I'll show you these Dao scriptures, and then I'll ask you some questions.
Xuan Chu fell silent.
Ye Xuan smiled. "Don't worry, it won't be anything difficult for you!"
Xuan Chu nodded. "Sure!"
With that, she sat opposite Ye Xuan.
As if noticing something, she suddenly looked at Nian Nian. Nian Nian was holding a bowl and drinking soup. When she saw Xuan Chu looking at her, she hurriedly put down the bowl and grinned.
Xuan Chu hesitated for a moment and nodded slightly.
She knew Nian Nian's identity because she had investigated Ye Xuan and the Five-Dimensional Universe before coming here.
Nian Nian giggled. "Sister, do you want to eat noodles too?"
Xuan Chu shook her head. "No, you eat!"
Nian Nian nodded and continued eating her noodles.
Ye Xuan looked at Nian Nian and shook his head with a smile.
He realized that Nian Nian was a foodie!
Now, not only did she like to eat fish, but she also liked to eat tanghulu and all kinds of delicious food …
Xuan Chu picked up the Dao Scripture in front of Ye Xuan and read it. After some time, she looked at Ye Xuan. "Do you know the secret of the Dao Scripture?"
Ye Xuan felt a chill in his heart. Could it be that she knew about Dao scriptures and martial arts?
At this moment, Xuan Chu wanted to say something but hesitated.
Ye Xuan asked softly, "What are you trying to say?"
Xuan Chu thought for a moment and said, "Fine, I'll take it as returning the favor.
Every Dao scripture contained a Dao scripture martial art and Dao scripture mental cultivation method!
These martial arts and mental cultivation methods are currently the highest level of martial arts and mental cultivation methods known to us! "
Mental cultivation method!
Ye Xuan's expression turned cold.
He knew about Dao scriptures and martial arts, but he didn't know about this mental cultivation method.
At this moment, Ye Zhiming's voice suddenly sounded. "I don't know either!"
Ye Xuan nodded and said in his heart, "Of course I believe you, Zhiming!
It seems that this Dao scripture is not as simple as we thought! "
Xuan Chu placed the Dao scripture in front of Ye Xuan. "I've memorized the mental cultivation method and martial arts of these Dao scriptures …"
Then, she paused and said, "Two of the martial arts are very suitable for you. One is the Taoist fist and the Taoist body."
Ye Xuan was silent.
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan. "You're very calm …"
Speaking of this, she narrowed her eyes slightly. "You've learned it!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "To tell you the truth, I've learned it."
Xuan Chu was silent.
Ye Xuan smiled. "Xuan Chu, you said that every Dao scripture has a mental cultivation method … I only know about Dao scriptures and martial arts, but I don't know about the mental cultivation method. Can you tell me?"
Xuan Chu was silent.
Ye Xuan was speechless. This guy, he was always silent.
Xuan Chu suddenly said, "Sure!"
Then, she pointed at Ye Xuan. A ray of white light entered between Ye Xuan's eyebrows. Soon, countless information flowed into Ye Xuan's mind.
The mental cultivation method of every Dao scripture!
Gradually, Ye Xuan's expression changed!
After learning about these mental cultivation methods, Ye Xuan realized that he was wrong!
Very wrong!
These Dao scriptures and martial arts were very powerful. However, without the help of mental cultivation methods, their power was only average. But with the help of mental cultivation methods, their power could truly destroy the world!
Just like his Taoist fist, if it had the help of mental cultivation methods, its power could at least be several times stronger!
At this moment, he realized how terrifying these Dao scriptures and mental cultivation methods were!
The mental cultivation method was the key!
And his Taoist body also had mental cultivation methods. If it was combined with mental cultivation methods …
At this moment, Ye Xuan was very excited!
Xuan Chu suddenly said, "Are you willing to give up these six Dao scriptures?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Why do you ask this?"
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan and said, "If you are willing to give up these six Dao scriptures, I can bring you to the Whirling Sect. With your talent, you will definitely be valued.
The stage there is bigger, and the cultivation resources here cannot be compared.
In addition, if you are willing to join the Whirling Sect, you can look at the last Dao scripture. "
Ye Xuan shook his head.
Xuan Chu said, "You refuse?"
Ye Xuan nodded and said with a smile, "Miss Xuan Chu, I want to protect this Fifth Dimension!"
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan and said, "On the path of martial arts, there are too many obstacles. It is not a good thing!"
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Xuan Chu, do you have any friends?"
Xuan Chu was stunned and then shook her head. "No!"
Ye Xuan asked again, "What about your relatives?"
Xuan Chu said, "Only Master."
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I feel that there are more important things in this world than the Martial Dao and the Sword Dao. That is friends and relatives!"
As he said this, he looked around and said with a smile, "This is the Fifth Dimension. This is my home."
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan and said, "If you do not give up on these Dao scriptures, not only you, but the entire universe will be in danger!
This is because my Whirling Sect is not the only Whirling Sect in the Whirling World. There are other powerful forces.
If I am not wrong, these forces should already know that you have so many Dao scriptures. Before long, more and more experts from the Whirling World will come to this universe.
Moreover, you still have the Dark World as your enemy. Your situation will become worse and worse! "
Ye Xuan shook his head and smiled. "My situation has always been very bad!"
Xuan Chu was about to speak when Ye Xuan suddenly looked at Nian Nian and said with a smile, "Are you done eating?"
Nian Nian nodded and patted her stomach. She grinned and said, "I am so full!"
Ye Xuan laughed and said, "Let's go, I will take you to play!"
As he said this, he stretched out his hand. Nian Nian quickly grabbed his hand.
Ye Xuan looked at Xuan Chu and said with a smile, "Miss Xuan Chu, let's talk another day!"
Xuan Chu nodded slightly.
Ye Xuan pulled Nian Nian away.
After Ye Xuan and Nian Nian left, an old man appeared in front of Xuan Chu.
It was the old man from the Whirling World.
The old man said, "He is not willing to give up?"
Xuan Chu nodded.
The old man shook his head, "Those Dao scriptures are a disaster for him. This youth does not know how to choose!"
Xuan Chu said softly, "We have underestimated him!"
The old man looked at Xuan Chu, "What do you mean?"
Xuan Chu looked at the old man, "Elder, why does the Dark World want to ally with us?"
The old man frowned, "You are saying that the Dark World is afraid of Ye Xuan!"
Xuan Chu nodded, "The Dark World wants to ally with us because they want to use us!"
The old man said in a deep voice, "Indeed!"
Xuan Chu suddenly said, "Let's wait and see!"
The old man said in a deep voice, "Wait?"
Xuan Chu nodded, "We can only wait!
All he had to do was wait quietly!
We do not have any deep hatred with Ye Xuan. If we are not anxious, the other forces from the Whirling World and Dark World will be even more anxious. They will make the first move! "
The old man nodded slightly, "Alright!"
Speaking of this, he seemed to have thought of something and said, "Girl, Ye Xuan is a person with deep schemes. He showed you the Dao scriptures just now, that is definitely a trap!
You must not have any other thoughts! "
Xuan Chu looked at the old man, "What other thoughts?"
The old man smiled, "You know what I mean!"
Xuan Chu said softly, "What I see is a person who values friendship and righteousness!"
With that, he stood up and left.
In the same place, the old man's expression was extremely ugly. A moment later, he slammed his palm on the table. "Damn Ye Xuan!
Shameless! "
Boom!
The table shattered.
...
After returning to the Sword Hall, Ye Xuan was about to study the Dao scripture when Venerable Mi appeared beside him.

Ye Xuan was struck dumb. Then he said, "You are back?"

He brought over 30 Great Dao Guardians!

The Whirling World is different. There are many forces there, each with their own ideas. We can form an alliance with some of the forces there.
In short, we have to delay until Miss Nian Nian recovers her memory and strength! "
Delay!
Ye Xuan was silent.
He really needed time now!
The more time, the better it was for him and the Fifth Dimension.

For now, the Daoting and the Fifth Dimension together might not be able to defeat the Dark Abyss. "

After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan said softly, "I understand!"
At this time, Venerable Mi said, "Also, he made a decision on his own!"

Ye Xuan, "…"
...








Chapter 1417

Mu Niannian!

Arrogant?

The first teacher shook his head, "There's no movement!"
