Chapter 1439
In the hall, Bai Dizi glanced at Ye Xuan with a complicated expression. "Alliance Leader Ye, don't think that our crisis has been resolved. In fact, according to my understanding and investigation of you, this matter is definitely not over!"
Ye Xuan said softly, "The cause of calamity?"
Bai Dizi nodded.
Ye Xuan was silent.
Bai Dizi continued, "For now, your top priority is to improve your strength. It would be best if you could attain Dao or even Unification."
Ye Xuan nodded. "I understand!"
Bai Dizi continued, "Do you still have the Dao Cause and God's Seal that the ancestor gave you?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Of course!"
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "I will make arrangements. Now, you are the spiritual belief of our entire Five-Dimensional Universe. This belief must be materialized. I will get people to build statues of you all over the world so that people will believe in you. Then, you will be able to obtain the Power of Faith continuously!"
Ye Xuan frowned. "Brainwashing?"
Bai Dizi shook his head. "It's not brainwashing. The entire universe treats you as their spiritual belief. You are the one who gave the Five-Dimensional Universe everything!
They are willing to believe in you. However, I want to materialize this Power of Faith for you to use. "
Ye Xuan thought about it and nodded. "Alright!"
Bai Dizi continued, "There is one more thing. I have already recalled many of the former Dao Guardians. They also need the Power of Faith. Of course, if they want the Power of Faith, they will have to fight for it themselves. Of course, I will take care of it and not let them act recklessly for the sake of fighting for the Power of Faith.
In addition, I will reintegrate the Five-Dimensional Universe, the Dao World, the Six-Dimensional Universe, and the Daoting. I will try my best to integrate everyone into one. There will be no division between the Five-Dimensional and the Six-Dimensional Universe. "
Ye Xuan nodded. "This is very necessary!"
Bai Dizi nodded. "What I'm most afraid of is them forming small groups. If that happens, it will be very troublesome to manage them."
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi. "I'll leave these matters to you!"
Bai Dizi nodded. "I will take care of the matters of the Five-Dimensional Universe. As for you, you must increase your strength as soon as possible. Also, if possible, help Miss Nian Nian recover her memories. If she does, our universe will be safer!"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "I can't do anything about that!"
Bai Dizi said in a low voice, "Did Miss Nian deliberately lose her memory?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "It's highly possible!"
Bai Dizi frowned. "Why would she deliberately choose to lose her memory?
Is it because of the Disaster Seed on you? "
Ye Xuan whispered, "Maybe it's because of this!"
Why didn't the white-robed Qing'er stay?
Because of the Cause of Calamity!
The Cause of Calamity had already affected her, so she chose to leave immediately!
In other words, the stronger the person by her side, especially the kind of person who could change the trajectory of her fate, the more likely she would be targeted by the Cause of Calamity!
And now, Nian Nian was not targeted by the Cause of Calamity!
Because she did not have the strength!
Was that the reason?
Ye Xuan did not know!
But he knew that Nian Nian definitely had her reasons for doing this!
Bai Dizi sighed softly. Her expression was complicated. "Then let's not talk about Miss Nian Nian!
Let's talk about you!
You should have gathered all nine Dao Scriptures by now, right? "
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes!"
Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan. "Many people are paying attention to you!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "You want me to share them?"
Bai Dizi nodded.
Ye Xuan smiled. "Then do you think I should share them?"
Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan. "It depends on whether you want to or not!
If you don't want to, no one can force you! "
Ye Xuan said softly. "I promised them that I would share them!"
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice. "Even if you want to share them, you can't just casually share them. Some people's cultivation is not enough to comprehend this Dao Scripture. Do you understand what I mean?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Bai Dizi said. "You deal with these things yourself!"
With that, he left.
Inside the hall. Ye Xuan sat cross-legged on the ground. He opened his palm. The nine Dao Scriptures appeared in front of him.
At this moment, Ye Zhiming appeared beside him.
Ye Xuan looked at Ye Zhiming. "I never thought that I would really gather all nine Dao Scriptures!
I just don't know if it's a blessing or a curse! "
Ye Zhiming said. "If it's a blessing, it's not a curse. If it's a curse, it can't be avoided!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "That's true!"
With that, he looked at the last three Dao Scriptures!
Two of the scrolls were obtained from An Yuan. These two scrolls were: Dao and Law.
Ye Xuan frowned. "Dao?
Law? "
Ye Zhiming opened the Dao Scripture. After looking at it for a moment, she looked at Ye Xuan. "This Dao Scripture can allow one to reach Dao Imperial and Dao Attainment. It describes these two realms, which is suitable for you now.
As for Law … "
Ye Xuan asked. "Return to one?"
Ye Zhiming nodded. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice. "The Dao Ancestor and the rest have not reached Return to one!"
Ye Zhiming looked at Ye Xuan. "What about Zhao Zhiqing's generation?"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan understood.
Although the Dao Ancestor has not reached Return to one, Zhao Zhiqing has definitely reached Return to one.
Obviously, it's not because of the Dao Scripture, but because of the Dao Ancestor's generation!
Ye Zhiming said in a deep voice. "This Dao Scripture is too profound. I can't understand it!"
Ye Xuan was a little surprised. "Even you can't understand it?"
Ye Zhiming nodded. "My realm is not high enough to understand it!
For example, this sentence: Humans follow Earth, Earth follows Heaven, Heaven follows Dao, Dao follows nature … It's easy to understand from the words, but what is the true meaning of this sentence? "
Ye Xuan was silent.
Ye Zhiming said in a deep voice. "This Dao Scripture has tens of thousands of words, and there are hundreds of Dao Scriptures.
In this world, there is not only Dao, but also Law … "
Saying this, she looked at Ye Xuan. "This senior who created the Dao Scripture is really an amazing person."
Ye Xuan nodded.
In this world, there are two kinds of experts, those within the Dao Scripture and those outside.
It could be said that the senior who created this scripture was absolutely terrifying. This was because he had created a complete cultivation system, and this cultivation system was the origin of all martial arts that were currently known to exist.
Ye Zhiming said in a deep voice, "We can study this Dao Scripture. If we can understand the Dao Scripture, it will definitely benefit you greatly in terms of cultivation.
As for the Dao Scripture, Martial Arts, and Heart Sutras, I can't understand them at the moment. "
Ye Xuan nodded. "Take your time!"
As if thinking of something, he looked at the last Dao Scripture. There were no words on it.
Wordless Dao Scripture?
Ye Zhiming opened the Dao Scripture, and when she opened it, she was instantly stunned.
Because there was nothing inside!
It was empty. Wordless Dao Scripture!
Ye Xuan and Ye Zhiming exchanged glances. Their eyes were filled with confusion.
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. "Could it be that the Whirling Sect gave us a fake one?"
Ye Zhiming shook her head. "I don't think so!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I don't think it's possible either!"
Ye Zhiming suddenly said, "It seems like Miss Xuan Chu hasn't returned to the Whirling Sect yet. Why don't we invite her over?"
Ye Xuan put the Dao Scripture away and disappeared from the hall with Ye Zhiming.
A while later, Ye Xuan found Xuan Chu, who was eating noodles in a small noodle shop in the city!
Xuan Chu was stunned when she saw Ye Xuan. She put down her chopsticks and looked at Ye Xuan. "What's up?"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Miss Xuan Chu, I have something to ask!"
Xuan Chu nodded. "Speak!"
Ye Xuan took out the last Dao Scripture and placed it in front of Xuan Chu.
Xuan Chu glanced at Ye Xuan. "Did the Sect Master give it to you?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Xuan Chu fell silent.
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "I've collected all nine Dao Scriptures. I promised the Whirling Sect's Sect Master that I'm willing to share them with your sect!"
Xuan Chu nodded. She opened the Dao Scripture. When she saw the Dao Scripture, she was slightly stunned.
Ye Xuan frowned. "What's the matter?"
Xuan Chu said with a deep voice, "I've never seen a Dao Scripture before because Master taught me verbally."
Ye Xuan fell silent.
At this moment, a voice came from behind Ye Xuan, "Alliance Master Ye, do you need help?"
Ye Xuan turned around and saw a woman standing not far from him.
It was Venerable Yue!
Venerable Yue smiled. "Young master Ye, are you wondering why there are no words in this Dao Scripture?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes."
Venerable Yue smiled. "Young master Ye, there are no words in this Dao Scripture!"
Ye Xuan frowned. "Why?"
Venerable Yue looked at the Dao Scripture and said softly, "Young master Ye, what is the Great Dao?
The true Great Dao? "
Ye Xuan fell silent.
Venerable Yue looked at Ye Xuan. "Dao is not only the Dao of the universe, but also the Dao of nature!
The 'Dao' is in the matter, and the matter is in the 'Dao'. All things lead to the same destination, and they all lead to the 'Dao'.
Everyone is pursuing Dao, but they don't know that Dao is right beside them. Dao is you, and you are Dao! "
Ye Xuan fell silent.
Venerable Yue smiled. "You don't understand, do you?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Venerable Yue smiled. "On the surface, it's easy to understand.
But it's not so easy to understand the concept!
Just like what people say, a mountain is not a mountain, a mountain is still a mountain, and a mountain is not a mountain … This is a concept of life. Those who haven't experienced it won't understand it no matter what you tell them. "
As she spoke, she looked at Ye Xuan and added, "Tao" was not just a tangible "substance," a thoughtful "spirit," or a rational "law." Instead, it was the invisible, ethereal, and spiritual root of the universe that created all of this.
"Matter", "spirit", and "law" were all derivatives of "Dao".
'Dao' is the Innate Qi, the Primordial Chaos. 'Dao' is the ancestor of nature, the origin of all things in the universe … Mister Ye, this last Dao scripture is broad and profound. Even my Whirling Sect has only comprehended a little bit of it, and this little bit is like a drop in the ocean for this Dao scripture. "
When she spoke up to here, she looked at the Daoist scripture with a complicated expression. "The ancestor of my Whirling Sect once said that the knowledge of this Daoist scripture is boundless. Even if he spent his entire life studying it, he wasn't able to study it completely. Not to mention studying it completely, he didn't even study a tenth of it!"
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan asked, "Senior, where did the owner of this Dao Scripture go?"
Venerable Yue looked at Ye Xuan. "It's said that he died!"
Ye Xuan was stunned. "Died?"
Venerable Yue nodded.
Ye Xuan frowned. "How is that possible?"
Venerable Yue shook her head. "Nothing is impossible!"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Did he die naturally or was he killed?"
Venerable Yue said softly, "I don't know!
However, it shouldn't be a natural death. This kind of expert can study Dao so thoroughly, so how could he die naturally?
But if he was killed … "
Saying that, she didn't continue.
.....








Chapter 1440
Killed?
Ye Xuan fell silent.
If the owner of this Dao Scripture was killed, then what does that mean?
Ye Xuan didn't dare to think about it.
At this moment, Venerable Yue suddenly smiled, "Don't think about that!
Young Master Ye, you already have nine Dao Scriptures, and all of them contain Dao Scriptures, martial arts, and mental cultivation techniques. Moreover, I can see that you've already learned the Dao Fist and Dao Body. Since that's the case, then you might as well learn the remaining three Dao Scriptures, martial arts, and mental cultivation techniques! "
Ye Xuan looked at Venerable Yue, "Senior, please guide me!"
Venerable Yue blinked, "Young Master Ye, if I guide you, then you'll have to let me read the Dao Scriptures!"
Ye Xuan smiled, "I've already said that I want to share the Dao Scriptures with your Whirling Sect. Venerable Yue wouldn't think that I'm joking, right?"
Venerable Yue laughed, "How could I?
Since that's the case, then I'll thank Young Master Ye on behalf of the Whirling Sect! "
Ye Xuan nodded, "Let's begin!"
Just as Bai Dizi said, his top priority now was to improve his strength.
This Dao Scripture was the best way for him to improve his strength.
As for the Dao Scriptures, his understanding wasn't as thorough as the Whirling Sect. If he had the Whirling Sect's help, then he would be able to comprehend these Dao Scriptures much faster!
At this moment, Venerable Yue smiled, "Young Master Ye, I didn't come alone this time. I've brought a few elders from my Whirling Sect. They've been studying the Dao Scriptures in my Whirling Sect all year round, and their understanding of the Dao Scriptures far surpasses ordinary people. With their help, Young Master Ye will be able to comprehend these Dao Scriptures better!"
As soon as she finished speaking, four old men suddenly appeared behind her.
The four of them bowed slightly to Ye Xuan, "Greetings, Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan smiled, "Then let's begin!"
Venerable Yue smiled, "Let's go somewhere else?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
In next to no time, everyone arrived at the Sword Hall that Ye Xuan resided in. Ye Xuan called Aro, An Lanxiu, A 'Jiu, and the others to the hall!
At times like this, they naturally had to be there!
This was because their study of the Dao Scriptures would be of great help to them!
Inside the hall, Ye Xuan took out all the Daoist scriptures!
The Nine Scrolls of Dao Scriptures!
Yue Zun had a complicated expression as he looked at the nine Dao Scriptures.
She did not expect Ye Xuan to have gathered all nine volumes of the Taoist Scripture!
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Let's start with the first volume!"
"The first volume?"
Yue Zun looked at Ye Xuan, "We're not going to start from the last three volumes?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I'll take the first volume!"
Yue Zun glanced at the women, and she understood!
Yue Zun looked at the four elders behind him, "We will start from the first scroll!
Be more specific! "
The four elders nodded.
Soon, the four elders began to explain the first volume of the Dao Scriptures, while Ye Xuan asked Guan Yin to record it down.
Ye Xuan was also listening attentively!
This was because the four elders were very detailed, and there were many points of knowledge that he and Guan Yin did not discover.
It was worth mentioning that Nian Nian was also at the side.
She was also listening.
No one noticed that when the four elders were explaining the Dao Scriptures, she would shake her head from time to time … as if saying that this was not right …
...
Ancient God Abyss.
At the moment when the Dark Abyss was destroyed, the happiest was naturally the Ancient God Abyss.
They had fought with the Dark Abyss for many years, and now, the Dark Abyss was finally destroyed!
In their Star Sector, the Ancient God Abyss could be said to be the strongest.
At the top of a pyramid, Su Zhe stood quietly. In front of him was a white-haired elder. This person was his Master, and also the current leader of the Ancient God Abyss!
The white-haired elder said softly, "I heard that Young Master Ye has gathered all nine Dao Scriptures?"
Su Zhe glanced at the white-haired elder and nodded.
The white-haired elder chuckled. "In the current Fifth Dimension, there must be many places that need manpower. How about this!
Let us personally go to the Fifth Dimension and see if Young Master Ye needs any help! "
Su Zhe had a strange expression.
Was he going to help?
He wanted to read the Dao Scriptures!
Of course, there was nothing wrong with that.
For the Dao Scriptures, especially those like his Master, the temptation was huge.
Soon, the two left the Ancient God Abyss and headed to the Fifth Dimension.
...
In the Dao Tomb.
Inside the hall, the Lord looked at Luo Hou and the others and smiled. "Don't you have anything to say?"
Luo Hou hesitated, then said, "I've been quite free recently. Why don't we find a place to walk and relax?"
Ah Ku nodded. "Indeed!
Why don't we choose the Fifth Dimension!
The scenery there is quite good! "
The Lord laughed. "Then what are we waiting for?
Let's go! "
With that, they got up and left for the Fifth Dimension.
...
Nine Dao Scriptures!
By now, who did not know that Ye Xuan had gathered all nine Dao Scriptures?
Everyone was envious of him!
However, basically no one dared to have any evil thoughts. One had to know that even someone as strong as An Yuan had disappeared without a trace overnight!
However, there were always exceptions.
...
In the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension, an old man stood quietly. Beside him, there was a young man.
The old man looked down and said softly, "I never thought that someone would actually gather all the Dao Scriptures … Interesting!"
The young man looked down at the Fifth Dimension. "Snatch it?"
The old man glanced at the young man. "Snatch it?
What are you going to use to snatch it?
There are at least a dozen Consolidation Realm experts down there!
Do you think the two of us can fight them? "
The young man coldly looked down at the Fifth Dimension. "Just a dozen!"
The old man shook his head. "A dozen Consolidation Realm experts is naturally not scary. The scary thing is this Young Master Ye!
What kind of existence is An Yuan?
It was once a force created by Second Brother Dao. However, it disappeared without a trace in one night … And the Whirling World, the major forces of the Whirling World have all submitted to this Young Master Ye … You can imagine how terrifying the two women who went to the Whirling World are! "
The young man said softly, "But Grandfather will not give up, right?"
The old man smiled. "Of course!
Who doesn't want to see the complete version of the Dao Scriptures?
However, we can change the method, such as cooperation!
In any case, this Young Master Ye is also sharing the Dao Scriptures. In that case, sharing one more should not be a problem for him. However, we will have to pay a price. "
The young man was silent.
The old man said again, "As a person, you must be able to judge the situation.
My Nanyue clan has been able to survive for so many years because of one word: caution.
Many families and forces perished because they were too arrogant, too arrogant! "
As he spoke, he looked down at the Fifth Dimension and said softly, "Although our Nanyue clan has a deep foundation, we cannot afford to be reckless!"
The young man looked down, "I heard that Ye Xuan is the number one among the younger generation. I want to meet him!"
The old man smiled. "We can exchange pointers, but there is no need to become enemies. Do you understand?"
The young man nodded. "Of course!"
The old man smiled. "Then let us pay a visit to this Young Master Ye!"
The two disappeared from the scene.
....
Below, in a certain hall, Bai Dizi looked at the old man and young man in front of him, "You two are from the Nanyue clan?"
The old man smiled. "Yes!"
Bai Dizi cupped his fists. "Forgive me for being ignorant, but I have never heard of this Nanyue clan!"
The old man smiled. "Nanyue clan is quite far from here. It is normal that you have never heard of it."
Bai Dizi smiled. "How far?"
The old man looked at Bai Dizi. "You know about Whirling World and Ancient God Abyss. Do you know about Xuan City?"
Bai Dizi frowned. "Xuan City?"
The old man nodded.
Bai Dizi shook his head. "I don't know!"
The old man smiled. "We are not from Xuan City. However, we are quite far from it."
Bai Dizi looked at the old man. "You are here for the Dao scripture?"
The old man nodded. "Yes!
My Nanyue clan also wants to look at the Dao scripture. Of course, we will not look for it for free. We can cooperate with Young Master Ye. "
Bai Dizi smiled. "You are welcome!
However, Alliance Leader Ye is busy now. I wonder if you can wait for a moment? "
The young man frowned. He was a little displeased.
The old man smiled. "Of course!"
Bai Dizi smiled. "It is not that I am neglecting you two. Young Master Ye has instructed that no one is to disturb him … So, I hope you two can understand!"
The old man smiled. "It doesn't matter. Go do what you need to do!"
Bai Dizi cupped his fists and retreated.
Inside the hall, the young man said coldly, "What arrogance!"
The old man smiled. "We are the ones begging him now!"
As he said that, he glanced at the young man. "Qing'er, you must correct your attitude!
Because from the looks of it, my Nanyue clan does not have any advantage when facing this Young Master Ye.
We have a deep foundation, but the power behind this Young Master Ye is even more unfathomable. "
The young man was silent.
The old man continued. "This time, we are here to seek cooperation, not to seek enmity.
Even if we can't cooperate, we must try our best not to be enemies with this Young Master Ye! "
As he said that, he looked at the young man. "Qing'er, if you want to become the clan's heir and inherit the clan, you must learn how to conduct yourself well!
Otherwise, no matter how talented you are or how strong you are, the clan will not let you be in power.
The person in power does not need to be too strong, but you must have a good head. Otherwise, if you are not careful, it will bring disaster to the clan. "
The young man was silent.
The old man continued. "Just cultivating is not enough.
To become the clan's heir, strength is part of it, but emotional intelligence and conduct are what we old fellows value more. "
The young man said softly, "I understand!"
The old man nodded. "This time, I brought you out as a test. As for what the test is, I won't tell you. Think about it yourself. If you pass the test, you still have hope of becoming the heir. If you fail, when we return, the clan will arrange for you to go to the trial grounds to cultivate. We will train you to be the clan's guardian and not the heir. Do you understand what I mean?"
The young man slowly clenched his right hand and lowered his head in silence.
The old man glanced at the young man. "Compared to the other heirs, your only advantage is that you are stronger than them, but …"
At this moment, a voice came from outside the door. "I wonder if Young Master Ye is here?"
The voice was very familiar!
The young man frowned.
The old man said in a deep voice, "He is here too!"
As he said that, he stood up and left.
Outside the hall, Bai Dizi was receiving a young man in a luxurious robe.
Nanyue Xiu!
He was also one of the young masters of the Nanyue clan!
Nanyue Xiu bowed slightly to Bai Dizi. "Senior, I am the seventh young master of the Nanyue clan. I am here to see Young Master Ye!"
Bai Dizi glanced at Nanyue Xiu. "I'm sorry, Young Master Ye is in seclusion!"
Nanyue Xiu smiled. "Alright, I will wait for him."
As he said that, he took out a storage ring and put it in Bai Dizi's hand. "Senior, this is a Dao Pill. If you are trying to reach the Dao Realm, with the help of this pill, your chances will increase by at least 50%!
Of course, with senior's talent and strength, reaching the Dao Realm is nothing to you … However, this is junior's gift. I hope senior will accept it. "
Hearing this, Bai Dizi's expression changed …
....
PS: In the book review section, there is a reader who keeps scolding me. His scolding is very unpleasant. He comes every day to greet me and my family.
To be honest, I really don't understand why he hates me so much. The insults between the lines are as if I am the murderer of his father.
Moreover, when he scolds you, you can't scold him or even ban him. If you ban him, he will go to the book group to scold you or change his account to scold you …
Just like before, a reader wrote an outline for me and asked me to write it according to his outline … I ignored him. Two days later, he messaged me and scolded me on QQ crazily. He said all kinds of nasty things like how my family deserved it and so on …
Sometimes, I couldn't help but reply, "Get lost," and he would say, "Heh, is this how an author is?
Is this all you have? "
I was speechless.
....
I, Luan, know my own limitations. This is my second book. I'm not a newbie, but I'm not an old man either. I have a lot of shortcomings, but I've been working hard, hoping to write better!
After all, this is my job.
If it's not good, you can criticize and deserve to be criticized. You can even scold me, but just scold me, there's no need to involve my family.
Actually, some readers don't know that some of their good suggestions in the book review section have been integrated into the book because I have to admit that some of the readers' ideas are really awesome.
In the end, many people are debating which of the three swords is the strongest … In your heart, who do you think is the strongest?
Also, Ye Xuan's true identity will slowly be revealed.








Chapter 1441
Dao Core!
He would be lying if he said he wasn't tempted!
After all, he, Bai Dizi, was now at Dao Controlling Realm. Achieving Dao Realm was his goal.
However, he didn't accept it!
Bai Dizi smiled. "Young Master, this gift is too expensive. This old man can't accept it!
As for meeting Alliance Leader Ye, you can wait with your clansmen for a while because Young Master Ye is about to come out! "
He cupped his fists and left.
Nan Yue Xiu's eyes flashed with surprise.
He didn't expect this old man to be able to refuse this temptation!
Bai Dizi naturally refused this temptation. Take people's hands and break them!
It could be said that in the Fifth Dimension, other than Ye Xuan, he had the greatest authority.
If he was corrupt, the impact wouldn't be bad.
Most importantly, if his subordinates followed his example, then wouldn't his original intention of establishing order be destroyed?
Why did he, Bai Dizi, submit to Ye Xuan?
Was it because of his future?
No!
He wanted to rebuild order!
Nan Yue Xiu put away the pill and looked at the old man and young man not far away. "So it's Elder Qi and Brother Qing!"
Nan Yue Xiu smiled. "Seventh Young Master is also here!"
Nan Yue Xiu nodded. "Gathering Dao Scriptures is such a big event. I naturally came to join in the fun!"
Nan Yue Qi said softly, "It seems that Xuan City and the other clans should also know!"
Nan Yue Xiu smiled. "That's for sure!
However, as far as I know, Xuan City's City Lord is currently doing his best to investigate this Young Master Ye. I wonder what their attitude is! "
Nan Yue Qi frowned. "Investigation?"
Nan Yue Xiu nodded. "I don't know what they are investigating this Young Master Ye, but it's definitely not simple!"
He looked at Nan Yue Qi and smiled. "Grand Elder, this is not a private matter, so I hope we can cooperate."
Nan Yue Qi said solemnly, "Of course!"
Internal strife was bound to happen in a big clan, but it definitely depended on the situation!
Infighting when there were external enemies was definitely a big taboo in the family.
The ancestor of Nanyue had once left behind his last words. The position of heir could be fought over, but they could not ally with outsiders to act against their own people. If someone did this, then anyone in the clan could summon the ancestor. He left behind a wisp of his soul to severely punish those who colluded with outsiders.
The reason why the Nanyue Clan was able to maintain its prosperity for so many years was largely related to the last words left behind by this ancestor!
Because no one dared to act recklessly!
Even if you become the clan leader, if you don't get the position right, once the ancestor's soul fragment appears, you'll still be doomed!
They could fight for it!
But it has to be healthy competition.
Nanyue Xiu looked around and smiled, "Elder Qi, when I came, I took a stroll around the cosmos. Did you notice something? This place isn't normal!"
Nan Yueqi asked, "What do you mean?"
Nanyue Xiu whispered: "If I'm not wrong, this Young Master Ye is very ambitious. He wants to rebuild the Daoting Order of the past"
Nan Yueqi was silent.
Nanyue Xiu continued: "Moreover, the people here believe in this Young Master Ye. In their hearts, Young Master Ye is God …"
At this point, he looked at Nan Yueqi, "If I'm not wrong, the power of faith is going to appear again."
Nan Yueqi whispered: "I'm afraid it won't be that easy!"
Nanyue Xiu smiled, "It really won't be that easy!
However, this Young Master Ye isn't that easy to bully. This time, let's see if those people dare to suppress him! "
Nan Yueqi said in a deep voice, "Wasn't the Daoting at its peak in the past?
Wasn't it suppressed to the point of extinction … If it wasn't for that Zhao Zhiqing, the Daoting would've been extinct.
But wasn't she exiled in the end? "
Nanyue Xiu shook his head, "It's different!
Very different! "
Nan Yueqi asked, "What's different?"
Nan Yueqi said with a smile, "I've investigated. Young Master Ye and the Daoting were rivals. However, when that Qing Zhu saw Ye Xuan, he immediately killed the Dao Ancestor's body and made Ye Xuan the Dao Lord. In other words, that Qing Zhu thinks highly of Young Master Ye!
And there must be something behind this. "
Nan Yueqi said in a deep voice, "The force behind Young Master Ye!"
Nan Yueqi nodded, "Three people have appeared before. The first one killed a Human Venerable from the Dark Abyss with a clone. We don't know how strong this person's force is.
We also don't know where this person came from.
The second person was the white-robed woman. She had destroyed An Yuan with a single punch, and her strength was definitely far beyond the Consolidation Realm. She might have even reached the legendary level, or even higher … Even Xuan City would have to be wary of such an expert!
There's also that Swordsman woman. She used to be the Sect Leader of the Sword Sect, Situ Tingyun. Although she doesn't fight much, she might not be weaker than that white-robed woman … "
She looked at Nan Yueqi, "These two are enough to intimidate Xuan City and that place."
Nan Yueqi said in a deep voice, "They can intimidate, but they might not be afraid."
Nan Yueqi smiled, "Yes!
Young Master Ye wants to rebuild order and restore faith energy. This is equivalent to touching someone's interests. Moreover, Young Master Ye has the complete version of the Dao Scripture. That place will definitely be tempted. They don't have a choice!
Once Young Master Ye rebuilds order, then does Daoting those who were exiled, like this Qing Zhu, mean that Ye Xuan will save them?
Once they come out … Do you think that place will let Ye Xuan save them? "
Nan Yueqi was silent.
Nan Yueqi said softly, "This place looks peaceful, but it's not. Danger lurks everywhere!
This time, it's also a challenge for our Nan Yueqi Clan. Following Young Master Ye, we can share the complete version of the Dao Scripture, but it might also bring trouble to ourselves. "
Nan Yueqi was silent.
Nan Yueqing suddenly said, "We can use something to exchange with Young Master Ye. After seeing the Dao Scripture, we will no longer have anything to do with him!"
Nan Yueqi shook his head.
Nan Yueqi looked at Nan Yueqing and smiled, "Ninth Brother, if this Young Master Ye is as simple as you, then it would be great!"
Nan Yueqing frowned, "What do you mean?"
Nan Yueqi smiled, "Ninth Brother, do you think our Nan Yueqi Clan has anything that can compare to this Dao Scripture?"
Nan Yueqing's lips moved, but he had nothing to say.
Because there isn't!
Nan Yueqi continued, "Do you think this Young Master Ye will let us enjoy his Dao Scripture for free?
Of course not!
Look at that old man, he's not simple. Do you think this Young Master Ye is a good person? "
Nan Yueqing was silent.
Nan Yueqi smiled, "If we want the Dao Scripture, we must pay a price, and it might be very big!"
Nan Yueqi said in a deep voice, "What does Patriarch think?"
Nan Yueqi shrugged, "Patriarch wants me to understand this Young Master Ye!"
Saying that, he looked at the sky, "Not only our Nan Yueqi Clan, Xuan City, Gu Clan, Chi Clan, and that place … they should have sent people to this universe.
I believe they are not only investigating Young Master Ye, but also the people behind him!
Where did these people come from? "
Nan Yueqi looked around, "My Nan Yueqi Clan has also investigated, but there is no news of these people, right?"
Nan Yueqi nodded, "Yes.
This is the scariest part!
These people behind him are so powerful, but not only there is no news of them in this universe, even our place has no news of them!
Then here comes the problem!
Where are these people now?
They can't be hiding and cultivating in secret, right? "
Nan Yueqi said softly, "Looks like I still underestimated this Young Master Ye!"
Nan Yueqi smiled, then looked at Nan Yueqing, "Little Brother Qing, I know you are very strong, but when you see this Young Master Ye, please be polite. Even if we can't cooperate with him, we must not become enemies with him."
Nan Yueqing was expressionless, "I don't need you to teach me this!"
Nan Yueqi laughed, "I'm just reminding you!"
At this moment, Bai Dizi appeared in front of the three. He looked at them, "The three of you, Alliance Master Ye invites you!"
Nan Yueqi cupped his fists, "Thank you!"
Under Bai Dizi's lead, the three of them came to a courtyard.
Ye Xuan didn't meet the three of them in the Sword Hall because Yue Zun and the others were still explaining the Dao Scripture!
Inside the courtyard, when he saw Ye Xuan, Nan Yueqi cupped his fists and said with a smile, "Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan also cupped his fists and said with a smile, "The three of you are from Nan Yueqi Clan?"
Nan Yueqi nodded, "That's right!"
Ye Xuan made an inviting gesture, "The three of you, please sit!"
Nan Yueqi and the other two sat around the stone table. Nan Yueqi looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Young Master Ye, I won't beat around the bush!
This time, I want to represent my Nan Yueqi Clan to cooperate with Young Master Ye! "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Dao Scripture?"
Nan Yueqi nodded.
Ye Xuan smiled slightly, "I wonder what Nan Yueqi Clan wants to use to exchange?"
Nan Yueqi was speechless and didn't know what to say.
What to use to exchange?
Nothing can be used to exchange for it!
At this time, Nan Yueqi suddenly said with a smile, "Young Master Ye, what Elder Qi said just now was just a joke!
Actually, the main reason we came here this time is to get to know Young Master Ye! "
Ye Xuan glanced at Nan Yueqi and said with a smile, "Is that so?"
Nan Yueqi laughed, "Of course!
We've long heard that Young Master Ye is a genius, the number one in the younger generation. This time, we came here to get to know Young Master Ye and see if we can be friends! "
Ye Xuan shook his head, "I don't deserve to be called the number one in the younger generation.
As for being friends, I, Ye Xuan, am willing to make friends! "
Nan Yueqi smiled, "Young Master Ye, I wonder how much do you know about the history of Daoting!"
Ye Xuan looked at Nan Yueqi, "It's limited to this generation!"
Nan Yueqi thought for a moment and said, "Dao Physique was once glorious!
Incomparably glorious!
Especially Lord Qing's generation!
At that time, Daoting's faith power made all the worlds fear it!
But later, Daoting suddenly declined … Lord Qing's generation went missing. Young Master Ye, do you know why? "
Ye Xuan shook his head, "I don't know!"
Nan Yueqi was about to speak when Ye Xuan suddenly smiled and said, "I don't want to know either!"
Nan Yueqi was stunned.
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "You three, I'm currently studying the nine scrolls of Dao Scripture with Whirling Sect's powerhouses, are you interested?"
Hearing this, Nan Yueqi was silent.
Nan Yueqi was also silent.
Nan Yueqing suddenly said, "We are interested, but will you let us see it?"
On the side, Nan Yueqi shook his head, this silly brother!
Nan Yueqi also shook his head.
Why should he let them see it?
.....








Chapter 1442
Ye Xuan looked at Nan Yueqing and said with a smile: "Then do you think I should show it to you?"
Nan Yueqing was about to speak but Ye Xuan got up and left.
He didn't know what kind of force this Nan Yueqing was, but he was sure that the other party wanted benefits but didn't want to put in too much effort.
Since that was the case, then there was no need to cooperate!
Although he, Ye Xuan, could share Dao Scriptures, it was only with those who helped him. These people in front of him had never helped him, so why should he share them?
He, Ye Xuan, was not a good person, nor was he a charity.
Moreover, he didn't share all Dao Scriptures.
For example, some Self Release Realm experts, he would only share the first and second volumes and not the last few volumes. Because doing so wouldn't bring any benefits to the other party and might even bring trouble to them!
As Bai Dizi said, Dao Scriptures could be shared but not recklessly.
After Ye Xuan left, inside the hall, Nan Yueqi looked at Nan Yuexiu. Nan Yuexiu said softly: "What he wants, the three of us can't decide!"
On the side, Nan Yueqing frowned, "What does he want?"
Hearing this, Nan Yueqi sighed softly.
At this time, he suddenly understood that Nan Yueqing was not suitable to be the clan's heir. Although he was the most talented among all the young masters, his strength was also the highest.
But his understanding of the world was the lowest among all the young masters.
This was also normal because Nan Yueqing spent most of his time cultivating in the clan and rarely dealt with outside matters. Therefore, in terms of understanding of the world, he was too lacking compared to the other young masters.
On the side, Nan Yuexiu said with a smile: "This Young Master Ye wants us to be together with him. In other words, he wants to tie our Nan Yueqing together with him!"
Nan Yueqing said solemnly: "Didn't you say that the force behind him is extremely powerful?
Then what's the problem with being tied to him? "
Nan Yuexiu said with a smile: "It's a big problem!
We all know that the force behind him is extremely powerful, but what about his enemies?
Currently, the known enemies are not people our Nan Yueqing clan can provoke!
But who knows if he has other enemies? "
Nanyue Qing was silent.
Nanyue Xiu continued: "Being bound to Young Master Ye has great benefits, but the danger is also great. Moreover, there are unknown dangers!"
Saying that, he shook his head and smiled. "You want benefits, but you don't want to put in any effort. It's human nature …"
Nanyue Qing suddenly said: "That Dao Scripture, must my Nanyue tribe obtain it?"
Nan Yue Xiu was silent.
Nan Yueqing said again, "If we don't have to, we don't have to get involved in this mess!"
Nanyue Xiu smiled: "Everyone understands this, but this Dao Canon is also an opportunity for our Nanyue Clan!
You know what?
Oftentimes, a single opportunity was enough to change an entire clan!
Although it might also cause the family to be consigned to eternal damnation!
But who doesn't want to give it a try? "
Nan Yueqing shook his head, "This Ye Xuan won't let us freeload!"
With that, he got up and left.
Inside the hall, Nanyue Xiu smiled, "It seems that this matter can only be decided by the Patriarch!"
This was a decision that concerned the rise and fall of the clan. It wasn't something that he or an elder could make a decision on their own.
Nan Yueqi nodded, "Let's go back first!"
With that, he and Nanyue Xiu got up and left.
Outside the hall, Nanyue Xiu smiled and said, "Elder Qi, you go back first!
I want to take a stroll in this universe! "
Nan Yueqi glanced at Nanyue Xiu and nodded, "Be careful!"
With that, he turned around and disappeared.
....
Sword Hall.
After Ye Xuan returned to Sword Hall, Yue Zun and the others were still studying Dao Scripture.
At first, it was research, but now it's a discussion!
Nian Nian was also quietly listening.
Ye Xuan walked to Nian Nian and sat down. Seeing Ye Xuan, Nian Nian suddenly showed a bright smile. Her right hand naturally hugged Ye Xuan's arm.
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Do you understand?"
Nian Nian blinked, "I understand!"
Ye Xuan was stunned.
Nian Nian looked at Yue Zun and the others in the distance, "They said something wrong!"
Everyone in the surroundings fell silent when they heard Nian Nian, and all of them looked at Nian Nian!
No one thought that Nian Nian was talking nonsense!
Who is this person?
She's a Fifth Dimension Tendo!
Ye Zhiming walked over to Nian Nian and smiled, "Where did we go wrong?"
Nian Nian blinked, and then looked at Ye Xuan, "I …"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "It's fine. Speak boldly!"
Nian Nian hesitated for a moment, and then pointed at a Dao Scripture, "This Dao Scripture doesn't teach people how to attain Dao, but how to understand Dao!
Because we are a part of Dao, but we just don't know it!
Dao is ourselves, but many people don't know this and still seek it everywhere … "
At this point, she glanced at everyone, and when she saw that everyone was looking at her, she hurriedly lowered her head.
At the side, an old man from Whirling Sect said in a trembling voice, "You … please continue …"
Nian Nian glanced at Ye Xuan, and Ye Xuan smiled lightly and encouraged her, "Continue!"
Nian Nian hesitated for a moment, and then she nodded, "This scroll only tells us what Dao is … and how to understand and recognize Dao. It doesn't teach you how to attain Dao, because you are a part of Dao, but you just don't know enough."
As she spoke, she glanced at everyone in the hall, "The direction of your research is wrong!"
The hall was silent.
Ye Xuan also fell silent.
The direction was wrong!
What is Dao?
Actually, we are a part of Dao!
We don't need to find how to attain Dao, but to find a way to understand ourselves. Understanding ourselves is to understand Dao!
After understanding Dao, is there still a need to attain Dao?
At this moment, Nian Nian pointed at the first Dao Scripture, "Escape … The escape mentioned in this scroll doesn't mean that you have to escape from the Dao, because even if you escape, you will still be within Dao!"
Ye Zhiming asked, "Why?"
Nian Nian looked at Ye Zhiming, "Because you are Dao, where can you escape to?"
Ye Zhiming frowned slightly, "Then what is Escape One referring to?"
Nian Nian smiled, "This Escape One refers to uncertainty."
"Uncertainty!"
Everyone looked at Nian Nian, and one of the old men said respectfully, "Your Excellency, what does uncertainty mean?"
Nian Nian grinned, "Uncertainty is fate, fate is also one of the Dao, but fate is uncertain!
For example, what family you were born in, what environment you were born in, these are uncertain, but you can change fate, control fate, in other words, Escape One.
Through hard work, you can change yourself, become that Escape One, but you are still within Dao, just that you already have the ability to control your own fate. "
Ye Zhiming said solemnly, "In other words, no matter what we do, we are still within Dao?"
Nian Nian nodded, "From this scroll, that's the case!
Because you are a part of Dao!
Speaking of this … "
At this point, she hesitated, then said, "But, if you are very, very strong, you can defy Dao!"
Ye Zhiming was a little confused, "Defy Dao?"
Nian Nian nodded, "Dao exists, but it can be defied, broken, and even destroyed …"
Ye Zhiming said solemnly, "How to defy?
How to break?
How to destroy? "
Nian Nian blinked, "I don't know!"
Ye Zhiming, "…"
Ye Xuan shook his head with a smile, "Then what do you know?"
Nian Nian giggled, "I only know this much!"
Ye Xuan, "…"
At this time, Venerable Yue suddenly said, "Why don't we let her help us?"
Ye Xuan looked at Venerable Yue, and Venerable Yue said solemnly, "Her understanding of these Dao Scriptures far surpasses ours!
With her help, we can better understand these Dao Scriptures, and then record them down. At that time, you can use the Dao Scriptures we have recorded to teach the experts of the Fifth Dimension, what do you think? "
Ye Xuan smiled, "Of course!"
As he spoke, he looked at Nian Nian, "Nian Nian, help them look at this Dao Scripture, okay?"
Nian Nian nodded, "Okay!"
Ye Xuan gently rubbed Nian Nian's little head. His intuition told him that Nian Nian was about to recover her memories!
Venerable Yue and the others continued to study the Dao Scriptures, while Ye Xuan came to a courtyard. He sat cross-legged on the ground and slowly closed his eyes.
Instant Kill Sword!
This was what Situ Tingyun had taught him before she left!
Previously, he had been busy and did not have the time to cultivate it. Now, he decided to cultivate this sword technique!
Like what Bai Dizi said, was the crisis really resolved?
No!
This might just be the beginning!
No matter what, like what Bai Dizi said, his top priority now was to increase his strength!
Only with great strength could he face everything!
Instant Kill Sword!
One Sword, One Kill!
After understanding this Instant Kill Sword, Ye Xuan's expression gradually became solemn … This sword technique's strength far surpassed his imagination!
It could be said that it was the most suitable sword technique for him to cultivate!
The Single Sword of Life and Death and Single Sword of Soul were taught to him by the plain-dressed woman. However, the strength of these two sword techniques depended on his sword dao cultivation and realm. Evidently, his current sword dao cultivation and realm were not enough to display the true power of these two sword techniques!
However, this Instant Kill Sword was different!
This sword technique was just right for him to cultivate!
After a while, Ye Xuan started to study this sword technique …
...
Xuan City.
In the city lord's mansion, an old man quickly walked to a side hall.
The old man bowed respectfully towards the side hall. "City lord, I have investigated!"
A woman's voice came from inside the hall. "Speak!"
The old man said in a deep voice, "The plain-dressed senior in my Xuan City is the Dao Protector of the Fifth Dimension's Young Master Ye!"
After a moment of silence, the woman's voice came again. "Are you sure?"
The old man said in a deep voice, "Absolutely sure!"
Creak!
The door suddenly opened and a woman walked out.
The old man hurriedly lowered his head, not daring to look at the woman.
The woman looked towards the sky and said softly, "His Dao Protector …"
At this time, the old man said again, "The Dao Sect's Second Brother sent someone to Xuan City, saying that he hopes that we can deal with Young Master Ye together. After the matter is done, he will share the Dao Scripture with us!"
The woman said softly, "Share the Dao Scripture … What a tempting condition!"
The old man said, "City lord, are you going to agree to the Dao Sect?"
The woman walked into the distance. "Prepare a big gift and send it over personally!
You will personally deliver it. You understand what I mean, right? "
The old man was stunned and then said, "To the Dao Sect?"
The woman stopped and turned to look at the old man. "Can you take that woman's sword?"
The old man was speechless.
The woman asked again, "Can my Xuan City take that woman's sword?"
The old man was speechless.
The woman blinked. "Since you can't, then why are you asking such a stupid question!
Of course, the gift is for Young Master Ye!
Remember, don't be stingy. Also, send some pills and whatnot. Let him feel the great kindness of our Xuan City, understand? "
The old man was speechless.
.....
...
PS: Can you let me feel your great kindness?
I'm looking forward to it!








Chapter 1443
The woman slowly walked to the front of a pool, and the old man stood respectfully behind her.
From the beginning until the end, the old man hadn't even raised his head to look at her!
It was out of respect, but it was also out of fear!
The woman wore a white robe with a violet ribbon tied around her waist, and she had a graceful and slender figure.
She sat on a rock by the side of the pool, and she gazed at the pool before her. A school of small fish had surrounded her.
The woman looked at the school of wandering fish, and her thoughts had already drifted away.
The woman in a plain dress!
At this moment, her mind was filled with that woman in a plain dress.
On that day, a woman in a plain dress had entered Xuan City and instantly killed 3 extraordinary experts of Xuan City right in front of her.
Those 3 extraordinary experts of Xuan City couldn't even withstand a single attack from that woman!
Terror!
She'd never felt terror in her entire life!
But on that day, she'd felt terror for the first time!
What was the greatest taboo on the path of the Martial Dao?
Naturally, it was fear!
She'd challenged the woman in a plain dress!
However, she hadn't been able to withstand a single attack from the woman!
After the woman attacked, it wasn't terror that she felt, it was despair!
At that instant, it was the first time she'd felt so weak.
However, the woman in a plain dress hadn't killed her!
The woman opened her palm, and there was a portrait there.
It was of Ye Xuan!
The woman had left it for her!
The woman gazed at the portrait and spoke softly, "The person in the portrait is in the Fifth Dimension?"
The old man nodded. "Yes!"
As he spoke, he hesitated for a moment before he continued, "According to my investigations, this Young Master Ye has gathered all 9 scrolls of the Dao Scriptures."
The Dao Scriptures!
The woman grinned. "Gathering the Dao Scriptures …. That's quite interesting."
The old man spoke in a low voice, "Moreover, this Young Master Ye has become the Lord of Daoting, and he was personally chosen by Lord Qing!"
The woman's beautiful brows knit together when she heard this.
The old man said, "Lord Qing's objective isn't simple at all!"
The woman said, "Who destroyed the Dark Abyss?"
The old man spoke in a low voice, "A woman in a white robe. She headed to the Dark Abyss and shattered it with a single punch …. Her origins and identity can't be found!"
The woman looked at the old man, "Even we can't find anything?"
The old man nodded. "Yes!"
The woman said softly, "From this, it can be seen that there is a huge force behind this Young Master Ye."
The old man nodded. "Yes!
Especially Young Master Ye's bloodline. His bloodline is extremely special, and its origin is untraceable. "
After a moment of silence, the woman asked softly, "Is there any movement from the Dao Sect and that place?"
The old man shook his head. "There's no movement!
However, they should already be investigating Ye Xuan. "
As he spoke, he hesitated for a moment before he said, "Will the Daoist Sect and that place let the matter rest?"
The woman shook her head. "I won't!"
The old man frowned slightly. "Do they still dare to target Young Master Ye?"
The woman looked at the pool in front of her and said softly, "Why not?
Just a white-robed woman and a Swordsman woman won't be able to scare them. As for the plain-dressed woman … I think they probably don't know her true strength! "
The old man hesitated for a moment before he said, "Should I remind the Gate of Dao and that place?"
The woman glanced at the old man. "Do you think they'll believe it?"
The old man was silent.
The woman chuckled. "Don't talk about them, even we won't believe it."
As she spoke, she raised her head to look at the horizon and said softly, "Because she's so strong that it's beyond our understanding."
The old man said, "If we become friends with Young Master Ye … I'm afraid the Gate of Dao and that place will …"
The woman recollected her thoughts, stood up, and walked into the distance. "We can provide some help and information to Young Master Ye. As long as we don't send experts to the Fifth Dimension to help him, whether it's the Gate of Dao or that place, they won't say anything."
The old man nodded. "Understood!"
The woman said again, "It's not convenient for me to go to the Fifth Dimension. I'll leave this matter to you."
The old man bowed slightly. "Don't worry, City Lord. This old servant will definitely take care of it!"
As he spoke, he seemed to have thought of something and said, "Some forces might not be that friendly towards Young Master Ye …"
The woman said, "That's their problem!"
As she spoke, she walked into the distance. "When you go, bring a big gift.
Of course, if there's anything he needs help with, try your best to satisfy him. After all, the Gate of Dao and that place haven't started fighting yet. You can help however you want! "
The old man nodded. "Understood!"
...
In the Fifth Dimension.
Inside the palace.
Ye Xuan had been meditating for three days. In these three days, he didn't even take a step out of his room.
He was studying that instant killing sword!
While Ye Xuan was meditating, some especially powerful auras appeared in the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension.
This made Bai Dizi quite worried.
He knew that some mysterious forces that even the Daoting had never heard of had appeared.
Just like the Nanyue family!
The complete version of the Dao scripture was too tempting!
Which force wouldn't be tempted!
More and more mysterious experts came to the Fifth Dimension. Fortunately, no one dared to act recklessly!
The current Five Dimensional Universe was still very intimidating!
After all, the Dark Abyss had just been destroyed and the Whirling World had surrendered.
Before figuring out Ye Xuan's background, no one dared to act rashly.
...
Inside the Sword Palace.
Yue Zun and the rest were still studying the Dao scripture. Unlike before, with the addition of Nian Nian, their progress was godly!
A total of seven Dao scriptures were annotated by them in detail. Not only that, the Dao scriptures, martial arts, and mental cultivation methods were also listed out for people to cultivate.
The difficulty of the last two Dao scriptures was higher. Even Nian Nian would fall into deep thought because of a single sentence. After all, she hadn't fully recovered her memories.
As for Ye Xuan, he was cultivating in seclusion.
Three days later, Ye Xuan suddenly left his room. He turned into a sword light and disappeared.
Not long later, Ye Xuan came to a certain starry sky. After confirming that there was no one around, Ye Xuan stopped. He opened his palm and the Executing Heaven Sword appeared in his hand.
Ye Xuan suddenly looked into the distance. The next moment, thousands of feet away, the space there was torn apart and a sword light appeared!
Instant killing sword!
A smile appeared on Ye Xuan's face when he saw this.
Instant killing a Swordsman wasn't difficult, but it wasn't easy to cultivate it to Situ Tingyun's level!
Speed!
This Instant Kill Sword was all about speed and the element of surprise!
It was simply too suitable for him!
In the following time, Ye Xuan started to cultivate Instant killing sword like crazy. He wanted to raise the speed of Instant killing sword to the limit!
Situ Tingyun could kill people two levels above her, so could he!
Moreover, he had the Dao Body and the Naga Dragon Clan's power, the Dao Law of Space, and the Sword Domain …
It could be said that he had a great innate advantage when cultivating Instant killing sword!
...
In the Fifth Dimension, a black-robed old man looked down from the sky.
At this moment, a middle-aged man suddenly appeared near the black-robed old man. The middle-aged man glanced at the black-robed old man and smiled. "Boundless Sacred Land!"
The black-robed old man glanced at the middle-aged man. "Dao Sect!"
The middle-aged man smiled. "Yes!"
The black-robed old man retracted his gaze and continued to look down. No one knew what he was thinking.
The middle-aged man smiled. "This Qing Zhu really has a good eye!
Changing masters with one move, bringing Daoting back to life! "
The black-robed old man was expressionless. "A deathbed struggle!"
The middle-aged man glanced at the black-robed old man and smiled. "That doesn't seem right.
Sir, this universe is going to have the power of faith again! "
The black-robed old man fell silent.
The middle-aged man said again, "Not only did Qing Zhu give the Dao Seal to Ye Xuan, but he also gave his Destiny God Seal to him … Sir, are you guys panicking?"
The black-robed old man glanced at the middle-aged man. "Your Dao Sect's precious Dao Scripture has fallen into someone else's hands. Don't you feel ashamed?"
The smile on the middle-aged man's face gradually disappeared.
The black-robed old man said again, "When An Yuan was destroyed, your ancestor didn't even dare to fart. If I were you, I would be too embarrassed to come out and embarrass myself!"
The middle-aged man laughed. "Didn't the Boundless Sacred Ground say that you guys will kill whoever dares to cultivate the power of faith?
Look, Ye Xuan is not only cultivating the power of faith, but he is also rebuilding the order and letting the three thousand Dao Guardians cultivate the power of faith. Go kill him now! "
The black-robed old man looked at the middle-aged man with killing intent in his eyes.
The middle-aged man smiled. "Sir, it's meaningless for us to fight against each other!
How about we talk about cooperation? "
The black-robed old man was expressionless. "What cooperation!"
The middle-aged man smiled. "Both of us want Ye Xuan dead, right?"
The black-robed old man kept silent.
The middle-aged man continued, "But, for now, we have to deal with the mysterious force behind Ye Xuan first!
Both Dao Sect and the Boundless Sacred Ground know nothing about the force behind him, right? "
The black-robed old man didn't say anything.
The middle-aged man continued, "Ye Xuan has obtained the Scripture of Dao. I believe it won't take long for him to understand the nine volumes of Scripture of Dao and summon the Spirit of Dao. Once the Spirit of Dao appears, it will be very difficult for us to kill him even if the person behind him doesn't show up!
What's more, Qing Zhu handed the Daoting to Ye Xuan. Once the order is built, those who were exiled by you guys might get the power of faith again … "
The black-robed old man's eyes turned gloomy.
The middle-aged man said, "Now, we have to admit that both Dao Sect and the Boundless Sacred Ground will not be able to deal with the person behind Ye Xuan alone!
But what if we join hands? "
The black-robed old man glanced at the middle-aged man. "You still don't understand the situation. We don't even know what the force behind him is. And the mysterious force that even you and we don't know … Do you know what it means?
It means the person behind him might come from a place that we don't even know. "
The middle-aged man smiled. "He said he is the Son of the Nine-Dimensional Plane!"
The black-robed old man sneered. "Do you think it's funny?"
The middle-aged man frowned. The black-robed old man said again, "How can you be so sure that what he said is false?
Just because we haven't been to the Nine-Dimensional Plane, we think there is no Nine-Dimensional Plane, right? "
As he said, he raised his head and looked deep into the starry sky. He said softly, "What if he is really the Son of the Nine-Dimensional Plane?"
The middle-aged man looked at the black-robed old man. "So, the Boundless Sacred Ground is going to give up?"
The black-robed old man glanced at the middle-aged man. "We just don't want to underestimate him. Of course, if the force behind him is too powerful, we have to give up."
After that, he turned around and left.
.....








Chapter 1444
In the starry sky, the middle-aged man was silent.
At this moment, a voice came from behind him, "They will not let Ye Xuan live!"
The middle-aged man turned around. When he saw who it was, he quickly bowed respectfully, "Court Head!"
Taoism was divided into Wuyuan Court and Wenyuan Court. The person in front of him was the Court Head of Wenyuan Court, Wen Tianyu.
Wen Tianyu nodded slightly, "No need to be so polite."
The middle-aged man hesitated and said, "Court Head Wen, the Boundless Sacred Land …"
Wen Tianyu smiled and said, "The Boundless Sacred Land cultivates the Power of Faith. The Power of Faith is their foundation. The Daoting also cultivates the Power of Faith. There is an irreconcilable conflict between them and the Daoting."
The middle-aged man asked softly, "Why?"
Wen Tianyu smiled and said, "The Daoting's Power of Faith is to establish order for all living beings, to create peace and make the world a better place!
The reason why the Daoting was so powerful was that their Power of Faith was very pure. Moreover, it was the voluntary belief of the people in the world.
But the Boundless Sacred Land is different. Their Power of Faith is based on brainwashing and slavery. The Boundless Sacred Land has hundreds of countries. Each country is their slave. Their Power of Faith is based on brainwashing and deception. "
Then, he shook his head and smiled, "The Boundless Sacred Land is afraid!"
Wen Tianyu said in a deep voice, "Why did the Daoting lose?"
Wen Tianyu smiled and said, "Because the Daoting has affected the interests of some people!"
The middle-aged man asked, "Who?"
Wen Tianyu smiled and said, "Us!"
The middle-aged man was stunned.
Wen Tianyu looked down and said softly, "They establish order with the Three Thousand Great Dao. The core of the Three Thousand Great Dao is the Dao Scripture and the Dao Spirit. They want to awaken the Dao Spirit … We Taoism will not let them awaken the Dao Spirit."
The middle-aged man hesitated and did not ask.
It was better not to know some secrets!
Wen Tianyu said softly, "It is not that we have to be enemies with Ye Xuan. But his rise will seriously threaten our interests and even overthrow us!
So, we have no choice. "
The middle-aged man said in a deep voice, "The force behind Ye Xuan …"
Wen Tianyu looked down and said softly, "If it's just those two women, it's actually not that big of a problem … I'm just afraid that there's someone even more powerful than those two women behind him. Although this possibility is very small … it's not impossible!
There was no hope!
Otherwise … "
At this point, he didn't continue.
...
On the other side, in the starry sky, Ye Xuan opened his palm, and the Executing Heaven Sword fell into his hand.
At this time, he had trained his Instant Kill Swordsman skill to the extreme!
Although he was only in the Dao Defense Realm, he was confident that he could kill a Consolidation Realm expert with a single strike. Of course, that was under the condition that he caught his opponent off guard. The key to this instant kill was to catch his opponent off guard!
As if a thought had crossed his mind, Ye Xuan opened his palm, revealing a Storage Ring in his hand.
This was given to him by the white-robed Qing'er before he left!
There was no treasure in the storage ring, but rather a map!
It was a map of an unknown place!
After looking at the map for a moment, Ye Xuan said softly, "Looks like I have to find some time to go there!"
Since this was left to him by the white-robed Qing'er, this place would definitely be of great help to him.
At this time, Bai Dizi suddenly appeared in front of Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan put away the map and looked at Bai Dizi. Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "People from Xuan City have come!"
Xuan City!
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "What kind of force is it?"
Bai Dizi shook his head, "I don't know!
However, I've already investigated. What I know is that not only Xuan City, but some mysterious forces have also come to our Fifth Dimension. Some people have already shown themselves, but there are still many people hiding in the dark! "
Ye Xuan said softly, "They should all be here for the Dao Scripture!"
Bai Dizi nodded, "I made a decision on my own!"
Ye Xuan asked with a smile, "What is it?"
Bai Dizi said, "I have already asked all the experts from the Dao Returning College, Xuanji Sect, Xiao Clan, and Xuanhuan Sect to come to the Fifth Dimension.
Currently, we have 46 Consolidation Realm experts, 760 Dao Attainment Realm experts, and thousands of Dao Controlling Realm experts! "
Ye Xuan asked, "All of them are here?"
Bai Dizi nodded, "Almost all of them are here!
After all, there is a complete version of the Dao Scripture here, who wouldn't want to come? "
At this point, he seemed to have thought of something and said, "There is one thing I have to tell you!"
Ye Xuan said, "Speak!"
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "The reason why the Daoting Qing Zhu and the others suddenly disappeared was not because they disappeared on their own, but because the Daoting encountered a strong enemy. However, the Daoting has no records of these past events, even I don't know much!
Now, we need to rebuild order, I am worried … "
Ye Xuan said softly, "You are worried that the forces that caused the Daoting experts to disappear will not accept us!"
Bai Dizi nodded, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "I think you can meet some hidden forces. If you can befriend them, it will be very beneficial for us!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "I understand!"
Bai Dizi was about to speak, at this moment, the space in front of him trembled, Bai Dizi looked up at Ye Xuan, "Miss Guan Yin said that the people of Xuan City are waiting for you!"
Xuan City!
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Come, let's go meet them!"
Bai Dizi nodded.
The two left.
...
Dao City, Sword Hall.
As soon as Ye Xuan entered the hall, an old man immediately stood up. The old man cupped his fists towards Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Young Master Ye, I am Xuan City's Zhao Yan, a butler of Xuan City's City Lord."
Butler!
Ye Xuan glanced at Zhao Yan, this Zhao Yan's strength was at least at the peak of Consolidation Realm.
This kind of expert was only a butler!
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Senior Zhao, please sit!"
Zhao Yan said with a smile, "Young Master Ye, please sit!"
Ye Xuan smiled, "Senior, please sit!"
Zhao Yan hurriedly shook his head, "Young Master Ye, please sit!"
Ye Xuan blinked and said with a smile, "Senior, then let's be casual!
What do you think? "
Zhao Yan said with a smile, "Just what I want!"
The two sat down.
Ye Xuan looked at Zhao Yan, "Senior, did you come to my Fifth Dimension for the Dao Scripture?"
Zhao Yan shook his head, "No, no, we came to the Fifth Dimension this time just to get to know Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan looked at Zhao Yan, "Not for the Dao Scripture?"
Zhao Yan said with a smile, "Indeed not for the Dao Scripture!
To be honest, my Xuan City's City Lord wanted to personally come here to get to know Young Master Ye, but now is a special time. If she comes to the Fifth Dimension, it might be a little disadvantageous to Young Master Ye, so she asked me to come see Young Master Ye.
To put it simply, my Xuan City wants to be friends with Young Master Ye! "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Senior, what you said makes me a little confused!
Can you be more frank? "
Zhao Yan hesitated for a moment, then said, "Young Master Ye, I have already been very frank!"
Ye Xuan looked at Zhao Yan, "Xuan City wants to be friends with me?"
Zhao Yan nodded.
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Has Qing 'er been to your place?"
"Qing 'er!"
Zhao Yan was stunned, "Who?"
Ye Xuan said, "A woman in a plain dress!"
Hearing this, Zhao Yan immediately stood up, he hesitated for a moment, then said, "So it's that senior …"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes."
Zhao Yan said with a bitter smile, "Young Master Ye guessed correctly, that senior has indeed been to our Xuan City!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
He didn't expect that his guess would really be correct.
Qing 'er has really been to Xuan City!
Needless to say, the reason these fellows came to the Fifth Dimension to be friends with me is definitely because of Qing 'er!
Ye Xuan withdrew his thoughts and looked at Zhao Yan, "Senior, did anything unpleasant happen between you and Qing 'er?"
Zhao Yan hurriedly said, "There was a little in the beginning, but it was a misunderstanding. We have already cleared up the misunderstanding!"
Ye Xuan, "…"
Zhao Yan suddenly took out a spatial ring and placed it in front of Ye Xuan, "Young Master Ye, this is a small token of my Xuan City, please accept it, Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan glanced at the spatial ring, and his expression changed!
There were a total of 50 million Divine Fortune Crystals in the spatial ring!
Not only that, there were also some medicinal pills, and there was no need to look at them to know that they were extremely precious!
Ye Xuan didn't accept the spatial ring, he looked at Zhao Yan, "Senior, there is no such thing as an undeserved reward. I cannot accept this gift."
Zhao Yan was stunned, he didn't expect that Ye Xuan would actually refuse!
Zhao Yan said, "Young Master Ye, this is a small token of my appreciation, Young Master Ye …"
Ye Xuan smiled, "Senior, this is not a small token of my appreciation, this is a very big gift.
Xuan City wants to be on good terms with me, Ye Xuan, and I am naturally more than happy to do so. As for this gift … please accept it, Senior!
Also, please tell your Castellan that I, Ye Xuan, will visit another day. "
Xuan City's goodwill was because of Qing 'er, he was very clear on this point.
He was naturally happy that Qing 'er helped him, but he wouldn't use Qing' er's power to do whatever he wanted.
Zhao Yan wanted to say something, but Ye Xuan suddenly looked at Bai Dizi, "Bai Di Xing Jun, help me get a copy of the Daoist scriptures and annotations copied by Zhiming and the others."
Bai Di Xing Jun glanced at Ye Xuan, then turned and left. Soon, he reappeared in the hall, holding an ancient scroll in his hand.
Ye Xuan took the scroll and handed it to Zhao Yan, smiling, "This is the contents and annotations of the first seven Daoist scriptures. Today, I will give them to Xuan City!
This is equivalent to making a good karma! "
Zhao Yan smiled bitterly, "Young Master Ye, you didn't accept my gift, but still gave me such a precious thing. This Old Man doesn't dare to accept it, I …"
Ye Xuan smiled, "Take it back to the Castellan of Xuan City, and tell her that I, Ye Xuan, have received her kindness.
Also, I am very willing to be friends with Xuan City! "
Zhao Yan hesitated, then said, "I will!"
Ye Xuan nodded.
After Zhao Yan left with the scroll, Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan, "I suddenly thought of something!"
Ye Xuan was a little curious, "What is it?"
Bai Dizi said, "I sent someone to kill the plain-dressed girl!"
As he spoke, he suddenly slapped himself. "I'm too f * cking stupid!"
Ye Xuan: "…"

Chapter 1445
Within the hall, Bai Dizi sighed softly, and he had extremely complicated feelings in his heart.
What sort of power was Dark City?
He didn't know!
But could a power that could casually take out tens of millions of Divine Fortune Crystals as a gift be a small power?
Moreover, such a formidable power had expressed goodwill to the Fifth Dimension just because of a woman in a plain dress. It could even be said to be slightly lowly!
There was no need to think about it to know that the woman in a plain dress was absolutely formidable to the point of causing Dark City to feel despair!
Moreover, he'd even sent people to kill her!
When he thought up to here, he couldn't help but want to slap himself a few more times!
How could I have been so stupid all those years ago?
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "The important matter at hand is to figure out how many powers we don't know about, and we must figure out the ins and outs of these powers!"
Bai Dizi nodded, "Yes."

Ye Xuan smiled, "He'll come back!"
