Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I'll go see how their study of the Daoist Scripture is going!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he left the hall.
...
Dark City.
Zhao Yan stood respectfully in a garden somewhere, and a woman was playing chess not too far away from him. She had no opponent and was playing by herself.
A short moment later, the woman spoke softly, "He didn't accept the gift and even gave you the contents of the Daoist Scripture?"
Zhao Yan nodded, "Yes."
The woman chuckled, "Interesting!"
Zhao Yan hesitated for a moment and asked, "What does he mean by that?"
The woman smiled, "He means that he doesn't want to bully us!"
Zhao Yan came to an understanding when he heard this.
To put it bluntly, they'd definitely made friends with Ye Xuan because of the woman in a plain dress, and it was the same for the gift.
Moreover, Ye Xuan's actions were telling them that he, Ye Xuan, wouldn't bully others.
When he thought up to here, Zhao Yan couldn't help but have a good impression of Ye Xuan.
The woman suddenly put down the chess piece in her hand. She stood up and said with a smile, "You go again. You don't need to bring any gifts!"
Zhao Yan said softly, "Just like that?"
The woman nodded. "What he needs the most right now isn't worldly possessions, but an understanding of the various forces!
Send him a copy of the detailed information of all the forces! "
Zhao Yan hesitated for a moment, and then he said, "Taoism and the Boundless Holy Land?"
The woman smiled and said, "Even if we don't send him off, he will find out soon enough!"
Zhao Yan nodded, "Understood!"
He paused for a moment before continuing, "Our people are still investigating the people behind Young Master Ye. Should we continue investigating?"
The woman shook her head. "No need!"
Zhao Yan bowed respectfully and was about to leave. Meanwhile, the woman said, "Young Master Ye is at the Dao Control Realm now?"
Zhao Yan nodded, "Yes!
However, his aura is thick and vigorous. His battle prowess probably far surpasses that of ordinary Dao Attainment realm cultivators! "
After a moment of silence, the woman suddenly said, "Although he has the Dao Scripture, I'm afraid he still has some problems on how to reach the Dao …"
Zhao Yan hurriedly said, "I understand!"
Obviously, the City Lord wanted to help Ye Xuan reach the Dao Attainment realm.
After a moment, Zhao Yan left.
In the garden, the woman slowly closed her eyes and chuckled, "This might be the best chance for my Xuan City to rise …"
Because besides her, there was no one outside right now.
She knew how powerful the woman in a plain dress was!
While everyone was thinking about how to scheme against Ye Xuan, Xuan City was secretly helping Ye Xuan and establishing a friendly relationship … She didn't ask for any other benefits. In the future, a single word of advice from the woman in a plain dress would be enough to change the fate of an expert of her level!
...
In the Five-Dimensional Universe.
In the Sword Hall.
Everyone was surrounding Nian Nian. Nian Nian was reading the eighth Dao Scripture. She was reading it very carefully and would think from time to time.
While she was thinking, no one dared to breathe loudly for fear of disturbing Nian Nian.
At this moment, Ye Zhiming suddenly walked to Ye Xuan's side. She glanced at Nian Nian who was thinking in the distance and said softly, "Is she going to recover her memory?"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "I don't know!"
Ye Zhiming said in a deep voice, "I feel that she is a little different from before!"
Ye Xuan nodded. He looked at Nian Nian in the distance seriously. The current Nian Nian was indeed a little different from before.
But his intuition told him that Nian Nian might not recover her memory so easily!
If she deliberately lost her memory, then there must be a deeper meaning.
At this moment, Ye Zhiming suddenly said, "We have recorded the first to seventh Dao Scripture martial arts and excitement in detail!"
As she said that, she opened her palm and a scroll appeared in front of Ye Xuan, "This is the seventh Dao Scripture martial arts and Dao Scripture mental cultivation method!"
Ye Xuan opened the scroll and three large words appeared in front of him: Fen Tian Jue.
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "Fen Tian Jue?"
Ye Zhiming nodded, "This is a palm technique. Its power is far above Dao Fist. One palm burning the heavens, if paired with this Dao Scripture mental cultivation method, its power can really destroy heaven and earth. Especially its power, it has a fatal restraining effect on the origin of the world."
As she said that, she looked at Ye Xuan, "This palm is very special, it is specially used to destroy the world. If you cultivate it, you must use it carefully!"
Ye Xuan opened the scroll and took a look. A moment later, his expression gradually became solemn.
The power of this Fen Tian Jue slightly exceeded his expectations!
Just as Ye Zhiming said, the lethality of this Dao Scripture martial arts was too terrifying!
If it was used in the Fifth Dimension, the Fifth Dimension might not be able to withstand it!
Because this Dao Scripture martial arts naturally countered the origin of the world. Once it was used, the origin of the Fifth Dimension would definitely die!
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan looked at Nian Nian and the others in the distance, "Have the eighth and ninth Dao Scripture martial arts come out?"
Ye Zhiming shook her head, "Not yet!
However, there is some progress on the eighth Dao Scripture martial arts! "
Ye Xuan softly said, "The eighth Dao Scripture martial arts is probably even more terrifying than the ninth Dao Scripture martial arts!"
Ye Zhiming nodded, "Yes!"
As she said that, she hesitated for a moment before continuing, "The Whirling Sect …"
Ye Xuan smiled, "Are you trying to say that the Whirling Sect knows everything about the Dao Scripture?"
Ye Zhiming nodded.
Ye Xuan lightly smiled, "They gave me the ninth Dao Scripture martial arts, I still have to give them this bit of benefit, otherwise, I would be too much of a scum!"
Ye Zhiming nodded, "Good!
One more thing, the Dao Scripture martial arts and Dao Scripture mental cultivation methods that we have recorded … Are we going to give them to the experts of the Fifth Dimension to cultivate? "
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes!
However, we can't give them to them casually!
Especially the Dao Scripture martial arts and mental cultivation methods, we can make them into a reward, so that everyone has a goal to pursue. If they get it too easily, they won't cherish it! "
Ye Zhiming smiled, "You are really too generous!"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "This is what I originally promised them!"
Ye Zhiming nodded, "Good!"
Ye Xuan glanced at Nian Nian and the others in the distance.
Then he said, "I will go and cultivate this Dao Scripture martial arts first!
If anything happens, call me at any time! "
After saying that, he turned around and left.
Not far away, Venerable Yue looked at the departing Ye Xuan in silence.
In fact, she was a little afraid!
Afraid that Ye Xuan wouldn't let the Whirling Sect study this Dao Scripture!
After all, the Dao Scripture martial arts and mental cultivation methods in this Dao Scripture were too precious!
However, she didn't expect that Ye Xuan still wouldn't let them leave!
It was very obvious that Ye Xuan was really willing to share all the Dao Scriptures with the Whirling Sect!
Thinking of this, Venerable Yue shook her head and smiled. At the beginning, she felt that giving the last Dao Scripture to Ye Xuan for free was not worth it.
However, now it seemed that this was simply too profitable!
The Whirling World only gave away one Dao Scripture, but they obtained eight Dao Scriptures!
At this moment, she suddenly felt that the Whirling World's forces and An Yuan were too stupid!
In fact, Ye Xuan didn't care too much about the Dao Scripture. If they wanted the Dao Scripture, they could totally cooperate with him!
After interacting with Ye Xuan, she realized that Ye Xuan was actually a very easy person to talk to!
If he was so easy to talk to, why did so many people still bully him?
Venerable Yue shook her head, she couldn't understand!
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, Ye Xuan scanned his surroundings. This was a dead star field without any signs of life. This place was the most suitable for cultivation.
Ye Xuan opened his palm and the seventh Dao Scripture martial art appeared in his hand.
Burning Heaven Extinction!
Ye Xuan took a deep breath and opened his palm. Soon, a mysterious force suddenly appeared around him!
The seventh Dao Scripture mental cultivation method!
Every Dao Scripture martial art had to be paired with a mental cultivation method in order to unleash its true power. Therefore, he first cultivated the seventh mental cultivation method!
Mental cultivation methods were easy to learn. In a short while, Ye Xuan had mastered the Dao Scripture mental cultivation method. Next, he began to cultivate Burning Heaven Extinction.
Ye Xuan sat cross-legged in the starry sky. The starry sky around him was dead silent.
After sitting quietly like this for an unknown period of time, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his right hand. His palm was like a piece of magma. It was dark red. Soon, a powerful force appeared around him and the starry sky around him began to tremble!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly stood up slowly. He frowned and his right hand trembled violently. At this moment, he felt that his right hand was like a volcano!
That force was too violent!
Not only that, he felt as if his right hand was burning!
Ye Xuan's expression became somewhat solemn!
He realized that he had underestimated this Burning Heaven Extinction!
From the beginning, he knew that this Burning Heaven Extinction's force was overbearing and ordinary people couldn't withstand it. However, he had a Dao Physique!
Moreover, it was an upgraded Dao Physique!
But at this moment, he realized that it was still not enough!
The seventh Dao Scripture martial art was too overbearing!
He had to suppress it!
Otherwise, this force would cripple him!
Ye Xuan began to use his own force to suppress it. However, he realized that it was useless!
Moreover, the more he suppressed it with his Sword Dao, the more powerful the violent force became!
Soon, Ye Xuan's right hand began to crack!
Seeing this scene, Ye Xuan's expression changed greatly. He didn't think too much and hurriedly activated his bloodline power. Soon, countless amounts of blood in his body converged towards his right hand. When the blood converged on his right hand.
Boom!
In his right hand, the overbearing force immediately quieted down!
It became obedient!
Ye Xuan: "…"

Chapter 1446
In the starry sky, Ye Xuan was stunned.
He really did not expect his bloodline power to be able to suppress this violent power!
It seemed that his bloodline had many functions!
Ye Xuan collected his thoughts and continued to cultivate Absolute Fen Tian.
Since he could use his bloodline to suppress it, it meant that he could control the power of Absolute Fen Tian. If that was the case, it would be much easier!
...
Boundless Sacred Land.
Boundless Sacred Land was located in Boundless Star Region. This star region was a bit special because it was different from other places. This place cultivated the power of faith!
In Boundless Sacred Land, there were hundreds of super empires. These hundreds of super empires were all subsidiary countries of the sacred land!
Faith in the sacred land!
What was different from Daoting was that the faith here was completely enslaved. From birth, people were instilled to believe in the sacred land and to go through fire and water for the sacred land …
Here, the sacred land was god!
An inviolable god!
On this day, a man came to Boundless Star Region.
This person was the head of the Daoist faction, Wen Tian Yu.
Just as Wen Tian Yu stepped into Boundless Star Region, a golden light suddenly appeared in front of him. The golden light dissipated and an old man wearing a golden robe appeared in front of Wen Tian Yu.
Wen Tian Yu smiled and said, "Master Bi Xiu, long time no see. How have you been?"
Master Bi Xiu slightly bowed, "Head Wen, long time no see. Compared to back then, you have become even stronger!"
Wen Tian Yu shook his head and smiled, "Master must be joking!"
Master Bi Xiu looked at Wen Tian Yu, "Are you here for the Fifth Dimension's Ye Xuan?"
Wen Tian Yu nodded.
Master Bi Xiu shook his head, "This matter is not something that you and I can decide!"
Wen Tian Yu smiled and said, "I represent the Daoist faction!"
Master Bi Xiu glanced at Wen Tian Yu, "The Daoist faction's Four Sages, do you represent four?"
Wen Tian Yu was silent.
Master Bi Xiu smiled and said, "It seems that Head Wen only represents the Daoist faction's Earth Gate!"
The Daoist faction's Four Sages had their own legacies. They were Heaven Gate, Earth Gate, Xuan Gate, and Human Gate.
Among them, Second Elder Dao was the Earth Gate's ancestor!
Wen Tianyu smiled. "Even if I only represent Earth's Gate, isn't that enough?"

Wen Tianyu shook his head and smiled, "Since that's the case, then the Holy Land can just wait!
Wait for the rise of this Young Master Ye! "

Surrender?
Haha … "
With that, he turned around and left.
The Master of Bisu was silent.
At this moment, a voice suddenly sounded above Wen Tianyu's head. "Where's Second Brother Dao?"
Hearing this, the Master of Cultivation's expression changed, and he hurriedly bowed respectfully.
This was because the person who spoke was the Holy Land's Holy Leader!
Wen Tianyu also bowed slightly. Towards this mysterious Holy Leader, he did not dare to show the slightest bit of disrespect.

Second Brother Dao!

Holy Leader!
Both of them had appeared!

Second Brother Dao nodded.
The Holy Leader asked, "What realm?"
Second Brother Dao shook his head. "I don't know!"

"I don't know?"
Second Brother Dao nodded.

If we don't kill them, the price will be even greater! "
The Holy Leader was expressionless. "If we don't kill them, what's the price?"

He has already obtained the nine scrolls of Dao scriptures. Once he comprehends the nine scrolls of Dao scriptures, his strength will undergo an earth-shattering change. Most importantly, it is very likely that he will awaken the Spirit of Dao and become the Master of our Dao Faction. "
As he spoke, he shook his head and smiled. "If he is personally chosen by Master, I have nothing to say. However, he is not. Moreover, the people behind him are all Dao Defiant cultivators. It is obvious that he is not on the same path as our Dao Faction!
Therefore, we will not let him become the Master of our Dao Faction. Moreover, we will not let him grasp the Spirit of Dao. "
The Holy Leader looked at Second Brother Dao. "You?
Two or three?
Or four? "
Second Brother Dao smiled. "Fourth Junior Brother and I have reached a consensus!

As for Eldest Senior Brother, he has become obsessed with that Dao Faction. He basically does not care about anything!
Therefore, Fourth Junior Brother and I are in charge of the Dao Faction now. "
The Holy Leader said softly, "Tell us about our Sacred Ground's loss!"
Second Brother Dao laughed. "Holy Leader, why do you ask when you already know the answer?"
The Holy Leader looked at Second Brother. "I want to hear it!"
Second Brother Dao looked straight at the Holy Leader. "He will subvert the Sacred Ground's Power of Faith!
Am I right? "
The Holy Leader was silent.
Second Brother Dao continued, "Moreover, he is the person chosen by Master Qing. Holy Leader, do you dare to let Master Qing and her Great Dao Guardians come out?
I think you definitely do not dare!
Back then, Master Qing almost subverted your Boundless Sacred Ground. Now, there is another Ye Xuan … "
The Holy Leader said softly, "Second Brother Dao, Ye Xuan is not like Master Qing. We will have to pay a huge price to deal with two women who are not in the same realm. Most importantly, we do not know how many people are behind him!"
Second Brother Dao said softly, "Currently, we know that the white-robed woman, Situ Tingyun, the Nether World Hall in the four-dimensional universe, and a woman in a plain dress who is his Dao Guardian!
These people had once appeared to help him! "
The Holy Leader said, "Who is the easiest to kill?"
Second Brother Dao said after a moment of silence, "It might be that woman in a plain dress!"
The Holy Leader asked, "Why do you think so?"
Second Brother Dao said, "I have investigated this person. Her true strength has always been a mystery. However, the Fifth Dimension's Tendo, Mu Niannian, said that she has a 50% chance of defeating the woman in a plain dress. Moreover, she said this more than once!"
The Holy Leader frowned. "50% chance?"
Second Brother Dao nodded. "The Fifth Dimension's Tendo has said more than once that she has a 50% chance of defeating the woman in a plain dress. An expert of her level should not speak carelessly.
Moreover, this time, when the Fifth Dimension and Ye Xuan are in danger, this woman in a plain dress did not appear. Why did she not appear?
There are two possibilities. The first is that she does not know that the Fifth Dimension and Ye Xuan are in danger. However, this possibility is extremely small.
The second possibility is that her strength is not enough to deal with the crisis of the Fifth Dimension and Ye Xuan. Therefore, she does not dare to come.
Based on this, among the people behind Ye Xuan, this woman in a plain dress is the easiest to kill! "
The Holy Leader was silent.
Second Brother Dao continued, "There is one more thing. Previously, I asked the Daoting Taoist Ancestor to search for this woman in a plain dress. Although the Taoist Ancestor is dead, before he died, he told me that the woman in a plain dress is not that strong!
In other words, it is very likely that he died after fighting with the woman in a plain dress.
If this is the case, then it is as he said. The woman in a plain dress is not that strong! "
The Holy Leader looked at Second Brother Dao. "You want to attack the woman in a plain dress first?"
Second Brother Dao nodded. "The best way to deal with these women is to kill them one by one!"
The Holy Leader frowned. "Kill them one by one?"
Second Brother Dao smiled. "If we gather the strength of my Dao Sect and your Holy Land, wouldn't it be much easier to kill one of them?"
The Holy Leader said softly, "That is possible!"
Dao Elder
Second Brother Dao said, "Then let's start with the weakest one. I have already sent someone to investigate the woman in a plain dress. If we find out where she is, we will deal with her first before killing the white-robed woman and Situ Tingyun!"
The Holy Leader glanced at Second Brother. "Don't forget about Ye Xuan. He is a genius and has mastered the nine Dao Scriptures. If he is given enough time …"
Second Brother Dao nodded. "Don't worry. I won't let him have it easy!"
As he spoke, he looked at the Holy Leader and smiled. "Do you know that Ye Xuan has a greatest weakness?"
The Holy Leader asked. "What weakness?"
Second Brother Dao smiled. "His younger sister, Ye Ling!"
The Holy Leader frowned. "His younger sister?"
Second Brother Dao nodded. "I have sent someone to Qingcheng to investigate. This person has a deep relationship with his younger sister, Ye Ling. It can be said that for Ye Ling, Ye Xuan will not hesitate to die!"
The Holy Leader narrowed his eyes. "You want to kill his younger sister!"
Second Brother Dao said, "I have already sent someone to look for Ye Ling. She has appeared in the Heavenly Oblivion Starfield. My people have already gone to the Heavenly Oblivion Starfield. They should be able to find her soon … If we can capture this person, even if we can't force Ye Xuan to die, we can force him to hand over all the Dao Scriptures."
The Holy Leader glanced at Second Brother. "I think you should investigate his younger sister. My intuition tells me that she is not a simple person!"
Second Brother Dao smiled. "Of course!
As a precaution, I have sent five Consolidation Realm experts!
Moreover, I have spoken to the Chi Tribe in the Heavenly Oblivion Starfield. They are willing to help and have sent six Consolidation Realm experts! "
The Holy Leader nodded slightly. "Then it should be foolproof!"
A moment later, Second Brother Dao left.
After the Second Dao Brother left, the Saint Master turned around and left. He came to a mountain, and in the depths of the mountain, there was a small bamboo house. In front of the bamboo house, there was a garden with all sorts of flowers. It was extremely beautiful.
Amidst the flowering shrubs, a woman was watering the flowers with a kettle.
The Holy Leader came to the side of the garden and bowed respectfully to the woman not far away. "Master!"
The woman put down the kettle. She gently sniffed a beautiful flower in front of her and then smiled. "Has the Taoist Faction started?"
The Holy Leader nodded. "Second Brother Dao wants to kill the woman in the plain dress and Sister Ye Xuan first!"
The woman stopped and turned to look at the Holy Leader. She blinked. "Kill the woman in the plain dress first?"
The Holy Leader nodded. "Yes, he speculated that the woman in the plain dress is the weakest!"
The woman suddenly shook her head and smiled.
The Holy Leader hesitated and then said, "Is that not the case?"
The woman gently plucked a flower and smiled. "Do you know who the woman in the plain dress is?"
The Holy Leader shook his head. "I don't!"
The woman looked up into the sky, and the smile on her face gradually vanished. "The woman in the plain dress is called Tian Ming. Over 100,000 years ago, she was already invincible in the world with her sword …. As for Ye Xuan's sister, the soul within her body is probably the soul of the Void Spirit Clan's Patriarch, Tian Xiu, from over 100,000 years ago. He was killed by Tian Ming all those years ago, but that man defied the heavens and changed his fate …. Even though she isn't at her peak right now, she isn't someone that just anyone can deal with."
As she spoke, she walked towards the small bamboo house in the distance. "The white robed woman that appeared earlier is called Butcher. She cultivates both the fist and the sword, and she's one of Tian Ming's clones. She's evenly matched against anyone with her 3 strikes of the sword!
As for Situ Tingyun, that little girl's growth is the fastest apart from that man …. Very few are a match for her with her 3 strikes of the sword!
Besides that, those women from the Netherworld …. "
When she spoke up to this point, she'd already walked over to the bamboo door. She pushed it open and smiled lightly. "If you want to kill Ye Xuan, you can't target the people behind him. Because every single one of them is stronger than the last, and they're strong to the point of despair!
If you want to kill him, you have to make use of the Disaster Cause he possesses!
So, you have to take it slow. "
....
PS: Tickets!








Chapter 1447
Ye Xuan stood silently amidst a deathly silent expanse of the starry sky. At this moment, his right hand was like a piece of burning red iron, and it was an extremely shocking sight.
Absolute Sky Fen!
A Palm Incinerates the Heavens!
Ye Xuan's body gradually started to tremble, and the formidable energy caused his body to be slightly unable to support it!
After an unknown period of time, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes, and then he suddenly slapped his palm forward!
As soon as his palm descended, the space before him started to be obliterated inch by inch, and it was extremely swift. In the blink of an eye, it had spread to a distance of 3km ….
In practically an instant, the starry sky around Ye Xuan had been completely obliterated!
On the other hand, Ye Xuan seemed as if he'd collapsed from exhaustion, and he almost collapsed to the ground.
Powerless!
At this moment, Ye Xuan felt as if all the strength in his body had been sucked out, and he was as weak as an old man. Moreover, his countenance was extremely pale.
Ye Xuan sat cross-legged in the starry sky for around an hour before his countenance gradually turned for the better, and his body slowly recovered as well!
After a long time, Ye Xuan took a deep breath and stood up. At this moment, his body was almost fully recovered.
Ye Xuan glanced at his right hand, grinned, and then turned around and left.
As soon as he returned to Dao City, Bai Dizi appeared before Ye Xuan.
Bai Dizi gazed at Ye Xuan. "Dark City's Zhao Yan is here again!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I'll go see him!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he arrived at Sword Hall.
As soon as he arrived, Zhao Yan hurriedly stood up and cupped his fists. "Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Senior, you wouldn't be here to give me a gift again, right?"
Zhao Yan spoke in a low voice. "Young Master Ye, according to what we know, the Dao Faction might be targeting Young Master Ye's younger sister!"
Ye Xuan was astounded. "Targeting my younger sister?
Ye Ling? "
Zhao Yan nodded.
Young Master Ye, your sister Ye Ling once appeared in the Sky Oblivion Planet Zone, which is the territory of the Chi Clan. The Chi Clan has a close relationship with the Dao Sect. Your sister … "
Ye Xuan suddenly interrupted Zhao Yan's words, "Senior, are you saying that the Dao Gate is going to make a move against me?
Why? "
Zhao Yan looked at Ye Xuan, "Young master Ye, could it be that you don't know that the first Abyss Master of the Dark Abyss was one of the Four Saints of the Daoist Sect?"
Ye Xuan said solemnly, "I really don't know!"
At this moment, he realized that he knew too little about the powers outside!
Zhao Yan smiled bitterly and said, "I was negligent!
Young Master Ye, this Dark Abyss was created by Second Elder Dao, and Second Elder Dao is one of the Four Saints of the Dao Sect. The Dao Scriptures in Young Master Ye's hands also originate from this Dao Sect. "
Ye Xuan said softly, "I see!
In other words, this Gate has already started to target me? "
Zhao Yan nodded, "Yes!
Young Master Ye, your sister … "
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "If they want to look for my sister, then let them!"
Zhao Yan said in shock, "Young Master Ye, they have sent several Consolidation Realm experts, you …"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "It's fine, let them go!"
Look for Ye Ling?
When he heard this news, he didn't panic at all, he even wanted to laugh!
What kind of existence was the senior in Ye Ling's body?
That was definitely not weaker than the White-robed Qing'Er!
Looking for Ling 'er, wasn't that the same as courting death?
Zhao Yan glanced at Ye Xuan, "Young Master Ye, aren't you worried?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I'm not worried!
Let them look for her!
The more people go, the better! "
Zhao Yan's expression became a little strange.
At this time, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Senior Zhao, I want to know about the forces outside. I wonder if Senior can help me with this!"
Zhao Yan smiled and said, "Of course!"
As if thinking of something, he said, "Young Master Ye, I wonder if you have any plans to break through to the Dao Realm?"
Ye Xuan blinked, "Can you help me?"
Zhao Yan smiled and said, "To be honest, I came here for this matter.
If Young Master Ye wants to break through to the Dao Realm, we can help Young Master Ye! "
Ye Xuan cupped his fists and said seriously, "Thank you!"
Right now, his greatest weakness was his realm!
His current realm was a little too low!
Zhao Yan looked outside, "Come in!"
As the voice fell, four old men walked into the hall, all four of them were at the peak of the Consolidation Realm!
Zhao Yan took out more than a hundred white jade bottles and placed them in front of Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan was a little puzzled, "These are?"
Zhao Yan said with a smile, "Medicinal pills!
These are my Profound City's top medicinal pills. In the outside world, any bottle can sell for at least several million Fortune Divine Crystals! "
Hearing this, Ye Xuan was dumbfounded.
A bottle can sell for several million Fortune Divine Crystals!
At this moment, he felt that poverty had limited his imagination!
He had many top-grade Fortune Ore veins that could produce tens of millions of Fortune Divine Crystals in a year. In his opinion, he, Ye Xuan, should be super rich!
But at this moment, he realized that he was still too poor in front of these ancient forces!
At this time, Zhao Yan said, "These medicinal pills can help people reach the Dao Realm. Every bottle contains extremely pure energy. Even if you want to buy them in the outside world, you basically can't buy them. Even if you sell them, they can be sold for sky-high prices!"
As he said this, he looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Young Master Ye, let's begin!"
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly, "I can't afford them!"
Zhao Yan was stunned, and then he smiled and said, "These medicinal pills are a gift from my Profound City to Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan was about to speak when Zhao Yan added, "The value of the scripture Young Master Ye gave me is far greater than these medicinal pills. Young Master Ye, there's no need to be courteous!
If you continue to be courteous, I wouldn't know what to do! "
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, and then he smiled, "Then I won't be unreasonable!"
Zhao Yan smiled, and then he passed a bottle of medicinal pills to Ye Xuan, "Young Master Ye, take this pill first!"
Ye Xuan nodded. He opened the jade bottle. There was an elixir the size of a thumb in the jade bottle. He poured the elixir into his mouth. As soon as the elixir entered his stomach, a wave of extremely pure energy spread from his body. At this moment, he felt warm all over and very comfortable.
At this moment, Zhao Yan suddenly said, "Young Master Ye, calm your Qi and focus. I'll help you break through to the Dao Control Realm later. During this period, Young Master Ye, please don't let your thoughts run wild!"
Ye Xuan nodded, and then he sat down cross-legged and calmed his Qi and focused.
He was currently at the Dao Control Realm, and if he reached the Dao Attainment Realm, he would be able to easily kill a Consolidation Realm expert without using the Insta-Kill Sword!
And if he used the Insta-Kill Sword …
Just thinking about it made him excited!
Just like that, Zhao Yan and the others began to help Ye Xuan break through to the Dao Attainment Realm!
...
In the Dao Tomb.
In a certain hall, the Lord looked at the scroll in his hand in silence.
The scroll in his hand contained the contents and annotations of the first seven scriptures, and it was very detailed!
As for the eighth and ninth scrolls, even Ye Xuan himself hadn't studied them, so no one knew the contents of the eighth and ninth scrolls.
Luo Hou suddenly said, "I never expected that he would really give them to us!"
The Lord looked at Luo Hou and smiled, "I feel like I'm dreaming as well!"
Qing Yaoyao smiled, "Actually, he doesn't care about the scriptures at all. It's us who care too much."
The Lord looked at Qing Yaoyao and smiled, "Indeed. Fortunately, we chose to stand on his side. Otherwise, the Dao Tomb would have probably vanished completely by now!"
Everyone fell silent.
With the white-robed woman's strength, she could probably destroy the Dao Tomb with just a sneeze!
Meanwhile, Bitter King suddenly said, "Don't we still have the eighth and ninth scrolls?"
Everyone looked at Bitter King. Bitter King was slightly puzzled, "What's wrong?"
The Lord smiled, "We can't be too greedy!
Even if he gives us the eighth and ninth scrolls, we wouldn't dare to take them. Because giving them to us is equivalent to asking us to die. Understand? "
Bitter King frowned, "Why?"
Chi Yaoyao suddenly said, "Because many powers are coveting these scriptures in secret!
The contents of these seven scrolls are enough for us to use for a few hundred years!
As for the later ones, even though we want to read them as well, we'll be killed the moment we read them.
Those powers don't dare to bully Ye Xuan now, but that doesn't mean they won't dare to bully us!
Understand? "
Bitter King was speechless.
Chi Yaoyao continued, "Seven scriptures are more than enough for us!
Any more and it won't be a blessing but a curse! "
The Lord nodded, "Yes!"
As he spoke, he stood up and smiled, "We've already earned a lot!
We should keep a low profile and develop ourselves. As for Young Master Ye, we can't help him even if we want to!
However, he doesn't need our help!
So, I hereby announce that all the disciples of the Dao Tomb outside are to return. "
Bitter King frowned, "All of you?"
The Lord smiled, "Yes!
You're not allowed to leave for a hundred years! "
As he spoke, he walked to the door and looked at the sky, "The world is about to change!
And we are too weak!
Developing ourselves is the way to go!
In a hundred years, the Dao Tomb will become a great power in the world. Of course, we have to survive!
Haha … "
....
Ancient God Abyss.
Su Zhe had also obtained the contents and annotations of the first to seventh Dao Scriptures from Ye Xuan!
Somewhere at the top of a pyramid, the white-haired elder in front of Su Zhe suddenly said, "Let all of us in the Fifth Dimension come back!"
Su Zhe hesitated, then said, "Master, what do you mean?"
The white-haired elder said softly, "Young Master Ye's matter is no longer something we can participate in!
Obtaining these seven Dao Scriptures is already a great blessing!
If we continue to get involved, we might have a greater opportunity, but it's also possible that we'll be doomed forever! "
Su Zhe nodded, "I understand."
The white-haired elder turned to look in the direction of the Fifth Dimension and said softly, "From today onwards, no one is allowed to leave the Ancient God Abyss!"
Su Zhe said in a low voice, "Master, the eighth and ninth Dao Scriptures …"
The white-haired elder glanced at Su Zhe, "Being too greedy will kill you!"
As he finished speaking, he turned and left.
...
Sky Oblivion Galaxy.
A woman was shuttling through the starry sky, emitting a faint glow around her!
Ye Ling!
Ye Ling's face was expressionless, her expression cold.
At this moment, behind her, a dozen powerful auras were closing in at an extremely fast speed.
Ye Ling stopped and turned to look. At this moment, twelve people appeared in front of her.
All of them were at the peak of the Consolidation Realm!
The elder who led the group looked at Ye Ling, "Miss Ye Ling, we would like to invite you to be a guest of the Dao Sect. Will you come with us, or should we 'invite' you?"
Ye Ling suddenly slapped out.
Boom!
The head of the elder who spoke flew into the air.
The rest of the people were stunned.
Ye Ling looked at the remaining people and slapped out again.
Boom!
One of the Consolidation Realm experts was directly turned into nothingness!
Seeing this scene, the rest of the people's expressions changed drastically!
Ye Ling walked towards the remaining people, her expression cold, "Bullying his sister again!
What does what he does have to do with his sister? "
Everyone: "…"
At this moment, Ye Ling suddenly said coldly, "I'm asking you a question!"
As she said this, she slapped out again.
Boom!
In the distance, another expert of the Consolidation Realm died on the spot …

Chapter 1448
In the starry sky, the remaining Consolidation Realm experts were shocked to the extreme at this moment!
How could Ye Xuan's sister be so strong?
Didn't they say that his sister was just average?
In the distance, Ye Ling slowly walked toward the Consolidation Realm experts, her expression cold. "Every day, you threaten him with his sister. Is that all you can do?"
One of the old men walked out and said with a trembling voice, "Sir, you …"
Ye Ling suddenly lashed out with another slap.
Boom!
The space where the old man was directly exploded, and the old man himself instantly turned into nothingness.
The remaining people looked at Ye Ling as if she was looking at a devil!
Since when did the Consolidation Realm experts become so weak?
Just one slap?
At this moment, the hearts of the remaining people were filled with fear!
What had they done?
How could such a devil come!
Was this the legendary "courting death"?
At this moment, Ye Ling suddenly blasted out a punch, and a glowing fist mark flashed out.
Boom!
The space in front of Ye Xuan was directly erased, along with the Consolidation Realm experts!
All the Consolidation Realm experts were instantly killed at this moment!
Ye Ling clapped her hands, turned around, and left.
At this moment, a voice sounded in Ye Ling's mind. "Master … I want to see my brother!"
The person who spoke was naturally the real Ye Ling.
Ye Ling continued to walk into the distance. "If you go back now, you will become his burden!"
Ye Ling fell silent.
Ye Ling said again, "Cultivate well with me, and you will be able to help him in the future, understand?"
After a while, Ye Ling said softly, "Understood!"
After a while, Ye Ling disappeared into the vast starry sky in the distance.
....
In an ancient city in the Heavenly Oblivion Starfield, an old man suddenly appeared on the city wall. He looked at the end of the distant starry sky, his eyes full of disbelief.
This person was the patriarch of the Tian Family in the Heavenly Oblivion Starfield, Chi Lin!
Just now, all the experts in the Heavenly Oblivion Starfield were killed!
Six Consolidation Realm experts had all fallen at the same time!
Ye Ling!
After a moment of silence, Chi Lin said softly, "Didn't they say that his sister is very weak?"
...
Dao Sect.
In a certain pavilion, the Second Elder Dao suddenly opened his eyes and frowned.
All the experts he had sent were gone!
After a long silence, the Second Brother said softly, "What a good Ye Xuan, what a good Ye Ling … I underestimated you!"
With that, he got up and left.
Outside the pavilion, there was a stretch of green mountains surrounded by flying cranes.
The Second Dao Brother looked into the distance with a hint of doubt in his eyes. "What kind of force is behind you …"
According to his investigation, there was a soul inside Ye Ling's body, but he never expected it to be so strong!
At the beginning, he thought that only the woman in a plain dress and a few others were behind Ye Xuan, but now he realized that it wasn't just them.
He was very puzzled.
What kind of force was behind Ye Xuan?
Could there really be a force stronger than the Dao Sect in this world?
Daoism!
At present, the Dao Sect was the number one force in the Myriad Worlds because the Dao Scripture originated from there.
If there were no other forces, it wouldn't have any impact on the Myriad Worlds. However, if there were no Dao Sect, the martial arts civilization of the Myriad Worlds would lag at least a million years behind!
Although the Dao Sect became weaker with the departure of the owner of the Dao Scripture, it was still not something that other forces could compare to!
Now, the force behind Ye Xuan made him feel pressured!
What kind of force was it?
At this moment, an old man suddenly appeared behind him. The old man bowed respectfully and said, "I've found it.
Green City, Ye Clan, ancestral temple.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent and no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as the Crown Prince will be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in a black robe.
Not far behind the old man stood a young man with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides were the elders of the Ye Clan.
"Why?!"
At this moment, a timid voice suddenly rang out in the ancestral temple.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This little girl was called Ye Ling, Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the Clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she rushed over despite her illness.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the ancestral temple and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is the Crown Prince. Why did you cripple him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked coldly at Ye Ling, "This is a matter of the Clan. What are you interrupting for?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was clearly a little fearful. She did not dare to look the Great Elder in the eye, but she did not leave. Instead, she mustered up her courage and walked into the ancestral hall. She bowed to the elders on both sides of the hall and said, "Elders, my brother is currently fighting with the Li family for the mining rights of the mine in Nanshan. He is now fighting for the family, and it is unknown whether he is alive or dead. However, the family has used a groundless excuse to remove his position as the Crown Prince. This is truly unfair.
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Whether he's stripped or not, it's not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away! "
At this time, the new Crown Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged 30 times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder coldly replied, "Then flog him 30 times!"
Very quickly, two Ye Clan guards rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists and said angrily, "This is unfair! My brother has risked his life for the Clan for so many years. Even now, he's fighting for the Clan. The Clan is unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Crown Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that his chance to shine had come.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the Crown Prince's position. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded. Ye Ling's right cheek instantly turned red and swollen. However, she didn't cry. She just clutched her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed, "This subordinate, Zhang Mu, greets the Crown Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Crown Prince, I'll need ten Personal Guards. From now on, you'll be my Personal Guard."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed. He hurriedly bowed deeply, "This subordinate is willing to go through fire and water for the Crown Prince!"
Ye Lang nodded, "Drag him away. This person is causing trouble in the Ancestral Hall. Do not hold back. Understood?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang. When he saw the killing intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this time, Zhang Mu seemed to have seen something and stopped.
Within the Ancestral Hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the Ancestral Hall, a young man was walking towards the Ancestral Hall. He was wearing a tight-fitting robe that was tattered and covered in blood.
This person was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from the Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's lips curled into a cold smile.
Within the Ancestral Hall, all the Elders were frowning.
The Great Elder squinted his eyes, his face dark and gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage. "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He quickly looked at Ye Lang and was about to speak. At this time, Ye Xuan was like a ferocious tiger leaping in front of him. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt his head spin, and he stumbled and fell.
Ye Lang did not stop there. He charged towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man. How dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly. Ye Xuan lifted his head to look at him, asking savagely, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stomped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's state, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being cut by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as Prince shall be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in black robes.
Not far behind the old man, there was a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides, there were the Elders of the Ye Clan.
"Why!?"
Right at this moment, a slightly timid voice suddenly resounded within the ancestral hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that Ye Xuan was to be replaced, she disregarded her illness and rushed over.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!?"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to everyone in the hall, as she asked timidly, "Great Elder, my brother, Ye Xuan, is the Prince. Why did you cripple him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a matter of the clan, what are you interrupting for?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was obviously afraid, not daring to look at the Great Elder, but she did not leave. Instead, she plucked up her courage and walked into the hall. Once again, she bowed to the Elders, "Dear Elders, my brother is fighting with the Li Clan over the mining rights at Nanshan. He is fighting for the clan, and it is unknown whether he is dead or alive. Yet, the clan is using a groundless excuse to strip him of his position. This is really unfair."
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Whether or not he is crippled, it is not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away! "
At this time, the new Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged 30 times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder replied coldly, "Then flog him 30 times!"
Very quickly, two Ye Clan guards rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists, and said angrily, "This is unfair! My brother has risked his life for the clan for so many years, and even now, he is fighting for the clan. The clan is unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that this was his chance to shine.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the position of Prince. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly swelled up. However, she did not cry, and only held her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed, "This subordinate, Zhang Mu, greets the Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You are very good. After I become the Prince, I will need ten guards. From now on, you will be my guard."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed, and hurriedly bowed deeply, "This subordinate is willing to go through fire and water for the Prince, even if it means death!"
Ye Lang nodded slightly, "Drag him away. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall, do not show mercy, understand?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang, and when he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu did not know what he saw, but he suddenly stopped.
In the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe, and the robe was tattered, and there was blood everywhere.
The young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's mouth curled into a cold smile.
In the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, and his expression was frighteningly gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his expression turned savage, "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his expression changed. He quickly looked at Ye Lang, and was about to speak, when Ye Xuan suddenly leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu's head spun, and he stumbled and fell.
Ye Lang did not stop there, and he rushed towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man, how dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's expression turned ugly, while Ye Xuan lifted his head to look at him, asking savagely, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stomped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's appearance, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!








Chapter 1449
Outside the bamboo house, Holy Lord's heart skipped a beat.
He didn't know how strong the plain-dressed woman was, but he knew the strength of the woman in the bamboo house.
In any case, he didn't have the confidence to take a single blow from the woman in the bamboo house!
However, he didn't expect that the woman in the bamboo house was so afraid of the plain-dressed woman!
Who was the plain-dressed woman?
How could she make the woman in the bamboo house so afraid!
Holy Lord was very curious!
At this time, the woman in the bamboo house suddenly said, "What are you waiting for?"
Holy Lord came back to his senses and quickly bowed respectfully, "I will send someone to stop the Taoism experts!"
Saying this, he turned around and left.
At this time, the woman's voice sounded again, "You go personally!"
Holy Lord was startled, then he nodded, "Yes!"
Saying this, he disappeared into the distance.
Inside the bamboo house, the woman poured herself a cup of tea. She took a sip and said softly, "The Cause of Calamity …"
...
Xuan City.
When Ye Xuan followed Zhao Yan and the others to Xuan City, Ye Xuan was stunned by the city in front of him.
The entire city stretched across the starry sky like a giant beast, causing people to involuntarily feel a sense of insignificance.
Ye Xuan chuckled, "Impressive!"
Zhao Yan grinned. "My Darkstar City has existed for 160,000 years. During these 160,000 years, we've experienced many things. However, we still exist!"
Proud!
One had to admit that Xuan City was qualified!
At present, even Dao City and Boundless Holy Land didn't dare to provoke Xuan City. Of course, Xuan City didn't dare to provoke these two forces!
Both sides had deep foundations. Once a war broke out, both sides would suffer!
Zhao Yan led Ye Xuan into the city. As soon as they entered the city, Ye Xuan felt countless powerful auras!
Ye Xuan's expression gradually became solemn.
One had to admit that Xuan City was indeed powerful. Although the Fifth Dimension had absorbed so many experts from the Whirling World, there was still a big gap between them and Xuan City.
After all, most of the Whirling World's experts had been killed by the white-robed Qing 'er.
Zhao Yan brought Ye Xuan to a large hall. He bowed slightly towards the hall, then looked at Ye Xuan, "Young master Ye, the City Lord requests your presence!"
Ye Xuan nodded and walked into the hall. The hall was empty except for a woman.
The woman wore a long purple dress, and her long hair draped over her shoulders. At this moment, she was looking at him with a smile.
It was a woman!
Ye Xuan was a little surprised. He never thought that the City Lord of Xuan City would be a woman!
The woman smiled and said, "Young master Ye seems to be a little surprised!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Indeed!"
The woman shook her head and smiled. She slowly walked in front of Ye Xuan and sized up Ye Xuan, then said, "Young master Ye's dao body has already reached the Dao Controlling Realm. Moreover, it was because he devoured the blood of the Naga Dragons that he reached the Dao Controlling Realm, right?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "That's right!"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan, "Young master Ye saved the Naga Dragons!"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "He only brought one of the Naga Dragons out!"
The woman was silent.
Ye Xuan asked, "What's the matter?"
The woman shook her head and smiled, "Young master Ye, do you know who imprisoned the Naga Dragons?"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "I don't know!"
The woman had a complicated expression, "To be honest, I'm afraid that only Young master Ye can bear such a huge karma."
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Miss, what do you know?"
The woman nodded and said with a smile, "The one who imprisoned the Naga Dragons was the Martial Emperor of the Ultimate Martial Realm. This person was almost invincible back then." Ye Xuan hesitated, "Is he still alive?"
The woman smiled and said, "Yes!
He's still alive! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The woman smiled slightly, "Let's not talk about the grudge between the Martial Emperor and the Naga Dragons!
Let's talk about your dao body! "
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "How should I address you, senior?"
Senior!
The woman glanced at Ye Xuan. Up until now, she had a good impression of Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan was neither servile nor overbearing, and he didn't have the slightest arrogance.
If Ye Xuan was overbearing because of the woman in the plain dress, then such a person wasn't worthy of Xuan City's goodwill!
The woman collected her thoughts and said with a smile, "You can be called Lan Ruo!"
Ye Xuan said, "Senior Lan Ruo!"
The woman glanced at Ye Xuan, "Miss is good!
The word 'senior' is too old! "
Ye Xuan smiled, "Alright, Miss Lan Ruo!"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "Let's talk about your dao body. If you want to improve your dao body further, you will need the help of external objects. Otherwise, you can only slowly stabilize your physical body over time. However, if that's the case, you won't be able to break through for at least a few hundred years!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "I know!
Therefore, I'm here to ask for help from Miss Lan Ruo! "
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "You've really found the right person!
For now, besides the dao sects, the only one who can help you improve is my Xuan City! "
Ye Xuan looked at Lan Ruo, "Miss Lan Ruo, according to what I know, the dao sects have already started to target me. Isn't Xuan City afraid of the dao sects for helping me?"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "We're not afraid, but we really don't want to be enemies with the dao sects."
As she said that, she glanced at Ye Xuan and smiled. "I'll also be honest with Young Master Ye. If you fight with the dao sects, we won't send anyone to help you. That's because the price we'll have to pay if we start a war with the dao sects!
However, in private, if we can help Young Master Ye, as long as it's within our capabilities, we'll do our best. "
Ye Xuan looked straight at Lan Ruo, "Just because of Qing 'er?"
Lan Ruo shook her head. "Not just because of that senior, but also because of Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan was a little surprised, "Me?"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "Before we met Young Master Ye, we just wanted to express our goodwill to you and form a good relationship with you. However, after meeting Young Master Ye, Young Master Ye's actions made me have a good impression of you. I think you're a good person, so we can get to know each other better!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Because of those Dao scriptures?"
Lan Ruo chuckled and said, "You can say that!"
Ye Xuan fell silent.
Actually, he knew very well that the reason why the other party was so friendly was mainly because of Qing 'er!
Without Qing 'er, no matter how good Ye Xuan was, Xuan City wouldn't offend the dao sects for him!
At the thought of this, Ye Xuan smiled and said, "If Miss Lan Ruo needs any help in the future, feel free to let me know. I'll do my best to help as long as it's within my capabilities!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan and smiled. "Really?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "I'd like to thank Young Master Ye in advance!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Miss Lan Ruo, you're too polite!
I might only be able to help Miss Lan Ruo in the future, but Miss Lan Ruo can help me now. I'm taking advantage of you! "
Lan Ruo shook her head and said, "Young Master Ye, you're a Swordsman and a straightforward person. I'll be frank with you. If we can get that senior to give us a few pointers, the value of that would be worth more than ten Xuan Cities."
As she said that, she looked at Ye Xuan and said, "If there's a chance in the future, I'd like to ask Young Master Ye to recommend me. Lan Ruo will be eternally grateful!"
Ye Xuan nodded and said, "If I see Qing 'er, I'll definitely recommend you!"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "Thank you!"
As she said that, she looked outside and said, "Young Master, please follow me!"
After that, she walked out of the hall.
Ye Xuan followed behind her.
Lan Ruo brought Ye Xuan to an underground palace. The underground palace was eerie and the wind was bone-chilling.
Ye Xuan looked around and asked, "This is?"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "A forbidden area of Xuan City!"
Ye Xuan nodded and continued to follow Lan Ruo. After a while, Lan Ruo brought Ye Xuan to an altar. A huge beast was lying on the altar!
The huge beast was shaped like a dragon and had four horns and six tails. Its entire body was covered in thick, pitch-black scales.
Ye Xuan was puzzled and asked, "What is this?"
Lan Ruo said softly, "An exotic beast, Winged Dragon!"
Ye Xuan looked at Lan Ruo and asked, "The Dragon Race?"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "You can say that!
However, it's different from the Naga Dragons!
The Dragon Race actually has many, many branches, such as the Naga Dragons, Winged Dragons, Ancient Dragons, True Dragons … After all, dragons are lascivious by nature and like to sow seeds everywhere. Therefore, the entire Dragon Race has many species! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The reason why the Dragon Race had so many branches was because they were lascivious by nature …
As if he had thought of something, Ye Xuan asked, "Then, among the Dragon Race, which is the strongest?"
Lan Ruo thought for a while and said, "It should be the Ancestral Dragon, the ancestor of all dragons. However, this dragon completely disappeared hundreds of thousands of years ago!"
As she said that, she looked at Ye Xuan and smiled. "If you can devour some of the Ancestral Dragon's blood, your physical body should be able to easily reach the Consolidation Realm. In fact, it might even be possible for you to go beyond that!
Unfortunately, the Ancestral Dragon's blood is extremely precious. Only the Dao Sects might have some of it. After all, the Ancestral Dragon followed that senior back then! "
Ye Xuan asked, "The Dao Scripture's owner?"
Lan Ruo nodded. "The Ancestral Dragon was his mount back then!
Therefore, the Dao Sects might have its blood. However, the Dao Sects will definitely not give it to Young Master Ye! "
Ye Xuan smiled and looked at Winged Dragon in the distance. "Is this Winged Dragon alive or …?"
Lan Ruo said softly, "It's dead!
It was killed by my ancestor back then! "
Ye Xuan nodded. "Understood!"
Lan Ruo looked at Winged Dragon. "This dragon's blood is still here. Young Master Ye can devour its blood later."
As she said that, she opened her palm and hundreds of white jade bottles appeared in front of Ye Xuan. "These are all supreme-grade pills that can strengthen one's physical body. After Young Master Ye devours its blood later, you can use these pills. That way, your chances of success will be much higher!"
Ye Xuan cupped his fists. "Thank you!"
With that, he put away the pills and walked up to Winged Dragon.
Just as he was about to make a move, Lan Ruo suddenly said, "Young Master Ye."
Ye Xuan turned to look at Lan Ruo. Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "Among the many types of dragons, Winged Dragon is one of the most lascivious. Its blood is extremely Yang and tyrannical. If you devour its blood, you might not be able to suppress the lascivious nature in its blood!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Don't worry, Miss Lan Ruo. This bloodline of mine will definitely be able to suppress that lascivious nature."
Lan Ruo nodded. "Then Young Master Ye, let's begin!"
She had some understanding of Ye Xuan's blood. If he could even devour the blood of the Nagas, then Winged Dragon's blood shouldn't be a problem!
On the altar, Ye Xuan swiped his right hand and Winged Dragon's corpse split open. The next moment, a stream of fresh blood spurted out.
Ye Xuan gently guided with his palm, and the blood directly entered his body.
Boom!
As soon as Winged Dragon's blood entered his body, Ye Xuan's eyes widened. His entire body felt unbearably hot!
Ye Xuan hurriedly activated the power of his bloodline. However, the moment he activated it, he discovered that his body had become even hotter!
What's going on?
Ye Xuan was stunned.
His body was getting hotter and hotter, and a certain part of his body was reacting strongly. Ye Xuan hurriedly tried to suppress it again. However, when he activated the power of his bloodline again, he discovered that his body was reacting even more strongly!
Ye Xuan was horrified. Holy shit, what the hell is this?
In the distance, Lan Ruo looked at the red Ye Xuan and frowned. She said softly, "Could it be that your bloodline is lascivious in nature as well?"
Ye Xuan, "…"
.....








Chapter 1450
On the altar, Ye Xuan's face was as red as burning iron!
Apart from that, all the blood in his body started to boil!
Ye Xuan's expression was extremely ugly!
This was because he realized that his blood could not suppress the Blood of Rainbringer at all!
On the contrary, it seemed to be taking the side of the evildoer.
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes. He began to calm down and concentrate.
To suppress the Blood of Rainbringer and the Demonic Madness Bloodline!
If he were to be controlled by his own bloodline while he was awake, wouldn't that be too useless?
In the distance, Lan Ruo did not leave either.
Although Ye Xuan was not in a good state, the current Ye Xuan was not a threat to her.
She was the City Lord of Mystic City, one of the strongest in the world.
Even if the Second Brother was here, he might not be able to do anything to her, let alone Ye Xuan!
Lan Ruo just watched. On the altar in the distance, Ye Xuan's expression gradually began to contort. It was obvious that Ye Xuan was in great pain.
If it was just the Blood of Rainbringer, it would be a piece of cake for him.
The problem was that his own bloodline was also causing trouble!
What he really wanted to suppress was actually his own bloodline!
He realized that this bloodline was a little beastly!
Just like that, time passed bit by bit …
Unknowingly, Zhao Yan appeared behind Lan Ruo. Zhao Yan bowed slightly and said respectfully, "City Lord, the Dao Sect has sent six Consolidation Realm experts to hunt down that senior!"
Lan Ruo turned to look at Zhao Yan. "Are you sure?"
Zhao Yan nodded. "Absolutely!"
Lan Ruo said softly, "What is the Second Brother trying to do … I don't really understand!"
Zhao Yan said solemnly, "Perhaps they think that the senior is very weak!"
Lan Ruo asked, "Why?"
Zhao Yan hesitated for a moment before saying, "When I was investigating Young Master Ye, I found out that the Tendo of the Fifth Dimension, Mu Niannian, had told Young Master Ye that she and the plain-dressed woman were evenly matched. Moreover, she had said this more than once!"
Lan Ruo blinked. "She really said that?"
Zhao Yan nodded.
Lan Ruo said softly, "This Fifth Dimension Tendo … She has really caused great harm to the Dao Sect!"
Zhao Yan spoke in a low voice, "That senior is about to enter the Beast Realm!"
Lan Ruo frowned. "Beast Realm?"
Zhao Yan nodded, "Yes."
There was a hint of doubt in Lan Ruo's eyes. "Could it be that she wants to go to the Beast Realm?
Or could it be that she's just passing through the Beast Realm? "
Zhao Yan said solemnly: "City Lord, this Beast Realm …"
Lan Ruo said softly, "You shouldn't be worried about her, but the Beast Realm!"
Zhao Yan: "…"
Lan Ruo asked again, "What about the Boundless Sacred Ground?"
Zhao Yan shook his head, "The people we planted in the Boundless Sacred Land are all dead!"
Lan Ruo said softly, "This place is even more mysterious than Daoism!"
Zhao Yan nodded, "Now I don't dare to send people to the Boundless Sacred Land, because once they go there, they will disappear without a trace."
After a moment of silence, Lan Ruo said, "Forget about them!
Continue to pay attention to the Dao Sect's movements and report to me at any time! "
Zhao Yan bowed slightly. "Yes!"
After saying that, he turned and left.
Lan Ruo turned to look at Ye Xuan on the altar in the distance and said softly, "Second Brother Dao … Young Master Ye is lucky to have an opponent like you!"
...
After an unknown period of time, Ye Xuan's expression gradually calmed down!
He had forcefully suppressed the power of his bloodline!
When he was in a frenzied state, he couldn't do anything to the power of his bloodline. However, when he was sober, he could still suppress the power of his bloodline.
At this moment, Lan Ruo walked in front of Ye Xuan. She took a look at Ye Xuan and said, "Can you continue to absorb the blood of the Winged Dragon?" Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes!"
Lan Ruo nodded slightly. "Then let's continue!
I will protect you. "
Ye Xuan said, "Thank you!"
As he spoke, he started to continue absorbing the blood of the Winged Dragon. At the same time, he started to consume the medicinal pills.
As more and more of the blood of the Winged Dragon was absorbed by Ye Xuan, his body started to tremble while strands of powerful aura emanated from within him. His body started to gradually change.
Lan Ruo gazed at Ye Xuan with a calm expression, but she was slightly shocked in her heart.
She wasn't shocked by Ye Xuan's Dao Physique, it was Ye Xuan's bloodline!
Because after the blood of the Winged Dragon entered Ye Xuan's body, it didn't affect Ye Xuan's bloodline at all!
There had been people in Dark City who had tried to absorb the blood of the Winged Dragon, but all of them had failed!
Because the blood of the Winged Dragon was truly too powerful!
The bloodline of humans couldn't endure the impact of the blood of the Winged Dragon at all!
However, the blood of the Winged Dragon hadn't affected Ye Xuan's bloodline at all. In other words, the power of Ye Xuan's bloodline was far superior to the blood of the Winged Dragon.
Exactly what sort of bloodline is this?
Lan Ruo's heart was filled with curiosity!
Right at this moment, Ye Xuan's body started to tremble!
Inside his body, there was a violent force that was attacking his body!
When she saw this, Lan Ruo suddenly placed her right hand lightly on top of Ye Xuan's head.
Boom!
A powerful aura enveloped Ye Xuan!
In an instant, the violent force within Ye Xuan's body was suppressed!
Lan Ruo said in a low voice, "Your Dao Physique is about to break through. Don't get distracted. The force within your body is the power of the Winged Dragon's bloodline. It's useless to you. Guide it slowly and then disperse it out of your body!"
Ye Xuan nodded, and he started to slowly draw the blood of the Winged Dragon out of his body!
Just like that, Ye Xuan's body gradually calmed down after around two days.
Meanwhile, Lan Ruo retreated to the side and glanced at the corpse of the Winged Dragon. At this moment, the blood of the Winged Dragon had been completely absorbed by Ye Xuan!
When she thought of this, she couldn't help but shake her head and laugh bitterly.
The blood of the Winged Dragon was a supreme-grade ingredient for refining elixirs!
Its value was unimaginable.
But now, Ye Xuan had benefited from it just like that!
But fortunately, it was worth it!
Based on her investigations, Ye Xuan wasn't someone who didn't know how to be grateful. Today, Xuan City had helped Ye Xuan and sowed good karma. Although there was no guarantee that there would be good results, she was willing to give it a try.
Apart from the plain-dressed lady, Ye Xuan was also partially willing.
After meeting Ye Xuan, she realized that Ye Xuan was even more of a monster than they had imagined.
Given time, Ye Xuan's achievements would definitely not be low.
Investing in such a monster would definitely be beneficial to Xuan City in the future.
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes and stood up. The moment he stood up, the space around him shook violently and cracked!
Ye Xuan was stunned.
At this moment, Lan Ruo suddenly smiled and said, "Congratulations, your Daoist Physique has reached the Dao Defense Realm!"
Dao Defense Realm!
Ye Xuan slowly clenched his right hand, and a powerful force gathered in his hand. This force was at least five times stronger than before!
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan tore off his clothes and looked at his body. At this moment, his body was at least emitting a faint glow!
Beside him, Lan Ruo smiled and said, "With your current physical body, ordinary Consolidation Realm experts can't do anything to you!"
As she spoke, she looked at Ye Xuan's body and said softly, "As expected of the number one Daoist Physique. It's indeed nature-defying!"
After putting on his clothes, Ye Xuan looked at Lan Ruo and cupped his fists. "Thank you, Miss Lan Ruo!"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "What do you plan to do next?"
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "Miss Lan Ruo, I want you to do something for me!" Lan Ruo said, "Speak!"
Ye Xuan said, "I want to auction the contents of the eighth Daoist scripture!"
Lan Ruo was stunned, then said, "You want to auction the contents of the eighth Daoist scripture?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Lan Ruo asked in a low voice, "Are you short of money?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I'm short of a lot!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "You want to nurture those people in the Fifth Dimension!"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Lan Ruo was silent for a moment, then said, "How about this!
Sell the contents of the eighth Daoist scripture to me! "
Ye Xuan shook his head.
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "The price I give you will not be low!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Miss Lan Ruo, you've misunderstood me!"
As he spoke, he took out a scroll and handed it to Lan Ruo. "This is the contents of the eighth Daoist scripture. I'm giving it to you!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "You're giving it to me?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "First, you helped me raise my cultivation base, and now you're helping me improve my physical body. If I were to sell you the eighth Daoist scripture, wouldn't I be too much of a good-for-nothing?
Miss Lan Ruo, I'm giving you the contents of the eighth Daoist scripture. However, I hope you won't spread it, because I'm still hoping to use this Daoist scripture to make a fortune! "
After a moment of silence, Lan Ruo took the scroll and said, "I'll accept the Daoist scripture!
However, I can't accept it for free! "
As she spoke, she took out a storage ring and handed it to Ye Xuan. "For you!"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "I've said it!
It's for you! "
Lan Ruo smiled. "You can take a look first!"
Ye Xuan took a look. His eyelids twitched, and his heart raced.
Lan Ruo smiled. "Take it!"
However, Ye Xuan shook his head. "I've said it!
It's for you! "
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "Are you serious?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "A drop of kindness should be returned with a spring of gratitude!"
Lan Ruo smiled. "Then I want the ninth scroll!"
Ye Xuan opened his palm, and a Daoist scripture appeared in his hand. He looked at Lan Ruo and said, "This is the ninth scroll!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan and didn't say anything.
Ye Xuan smiled. "Do you think I'm joking, Miss Lan Ruo?"
Lan Ruo shook her head and said softly, "Young Master Ye, I've realized that all of us have underestimated you!"
She turned around and left after she finished speaking.
She didn't take Ye Xuan's ninth Daoist scripture!
The value of the eighth Daoist scripture far exceeded what Xuan City had given Ye Xuan. If she took the ninth scroll as well, then this favor would be completely gone!
Not only that, but Xuan City would owe Ye Xuan a favor!
Moreover, greedy people usually didn't come to a good end!
Moreover, if Xuan City wanted to be friends with Ye Xuan, they had to know their limits. Ye Xuan always had a sense of propriety in his actions and words. Under such circumstances, Xuan City couldn't be greedy.
Inside the hall, Ye Xuan looked at the ninth Daoist scripture in front of him and shook his head with a smile.
He didn't expect Miss Lan Ruo to not take the ninth Daoist scripture!
Since the place had underestimated him, didn't he also underestimate Lan Ruo?
After a while, Ye Xuan left.
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, the Holy Master was running with a few people. They had already raised their speed to the maximum!
They had to stop the Taoists from searching for the plain-dressed woman!
After an unknown period of time, an old man beside him said in a deep voice, "Holy Master, I'm afraid we won't be able to catch up!"
The Holy Master stopped in his tracks. He looked at the end of the starry sky with an extremely gloomy expression. "Damn it, why are they running so fast? Are they rushing to reincarnate …?"
....。
