Chapter 1457
News of the Fourth Dao Brother being heavily injured by Ye Ling hadn't spread!
The Daoist Faction had sealed off the entire Dao Domain, so outsiders didn't know that the Fourth Dao Brother's body had been destroyed.
However, there was no such thing as an impenetrable wall.
...
The Boundless Hallowed Grounds.
The Hallowed Lord arrived before the bamboo house once more, and he bowed respectfully towards it, "Master, Ye Ling has gone to the Dao World, and the Fourth Dao Brother's body has been destroyed!"
The woman stopped reading, and she fell silent for a moment before she shook her head and smiled, "Why did the Daoist Faction offend her?
Aren't they courting death? "
The Hallowed Lord hesitated for a moment and said, "Master said that there's a formidable soul within Ye Ling's body. Master, how strong is that soul?"
The woman chuckled, "It's very strong. It's someone who once shocked an entire era."
Very strong!
The Hallowed Lord fell silent.
Meanwhile, an ancient scroll floated into the bamboo house.
The Hallowed Lord gazed at the bamboo house, "Master, what's this?"
The woman said, "Ye Xuan once saved the Jia Long Clan in the Dark Dimension. Even though that woman in a plain dress forcefully stopped that karma, but …."
When she spoke up to this point, she grinned, "I think that Martial Emperor won't let it go just like that!"
The Hallowed Lord spoke in a low voice, "Master, you intend to use that Martial Emperor to kill Ye Xuan?"
The woman shook her head and smiled, "That's not right. This enmity is between him and that Martial Emperor, so what does it have to do with us?
There's a mental cultivation technique within the scroll, and it can help Martial Emperors break through the final barrier. I believe that if he takes that final step, then he probably won't be so afraid of that woman! "
The Hallowed Lord hesitated for a moment and said, "Master, what are our chances of killing Ye Xuan if we make a move?"
The woman's gaze descended onto the scroll, and she grinned with confidence, "100%!"
100%!
The Hallowed Lord was stunned, and he was about to speak when the woman smiled, "So long as those three swords don't make a move, then I'm 100% confident in killing him!"
The Hallowed Lord asked, "Even if the white robed woman and Situ Tingyun are here?"
The Hallowed Lord turned around and smiled, "Do you think I'm bragging?"
The Saint Master hurriedly shook his head. "No!"
The woman picked up the ancient book and walked out of the bamboo house. Today, she was wearing a dark green dress with mountains and rivers painted on it. She looked very quiet and elegant.
The woman looked at the horizon and said with a light smile, "It's actually very simple to kill him!
However, what would happen after killing him?
Killing him was tantamount to poking a hornet's nest.
Not to mention anything else, that plain-dressed woman will definitely kill me at all costs … I really can't beat that woman! "
As she spoke, she shook her head helplessly.
The Hallowed Lord hesitated for a moment before he said, "Master, are you unable to resist that woman even with your strength?"
The woman retracted her gaze and walked in front of the Sacred Leader. The Sacred Leader hurriedly bowed, not daring to look at the woman directly.
The woman held the ancient book and gently patted the Holy Lord's head. "Remember, that woman is invincible!
As long as she didn't want to die, no one in this world could kill her.
The only way to defeat her was to start with Ye Xuan, because Ye Xuan was her only weakness.
Other than that, there was no other way to defeat her.
Even if everyone in this universe joined forces, we might not be able to block a single strike of her sword. "
As she spoke, she looked at the horizon and sighed. "Actually, I don't want to be her enemy either.
But there's no other way. I really want to kill this Ye Xuan! "
The Sacred Leader said in a low voice, "Master, there's something I don't understand. Since that plain-dressed woman is already so strong, then why is she still wandering aimlessly in space?
Is she doing this to temper Ye Xuan? "
The woman shook her head and smiled. "She isn't wandering aimlessly!
She's too weak to see that countless Causes of Karma have already coiled around her … She's looking for the source of the Cause of Misfortune, the person who controls Ye Xuan's fate. "
The Sacred Leader frowned slightly. "The person who controls Ye Xuan's fate?"
The woman nodded. "The Cause of Misfortune!
Everyone in the world doesn't really understand the Cause of Misfortune!
This world is divided into Yin and Yang, good and evil!
If there's a Cause of Misfortune, then there's a Cause of Misfortune!
And this Cause of Misfortune is the head of all Causes of Misfortune … A person with a Cause of Good is equivalent to having great luck. He's protected by Heaven and Earth, protected by Fate, and protected by the Great Dao.
This kind of person's life is like cheating, because whatever he does, there will be a Cause of Good.
On the contrary, a person with a Cause of Misfortune will have a rough life with all sorts of troubles. Like a malefic star, even if he does a good thing, there might be a Cause of Misfortune. Not only that, anyone who is related to him will not have a good ending. "
As she spoke to this point, she paused and said, "The reason why Ye Xuan is able to live until now is because of that woman and that man who changed his fate. Especially that plain-dressed woman, she forcefully shouldered countless Karma of Misfortune for Ye Xuan.
But she realized that these Karma seemed endless. No matter how she shouldered it, there would be countless Karma that would come to bother Ye Xuan. So, she decided to find the Cause of Misfortune. "
The Sacred Leader asked, "And after finding it?"
The woman smiled. "Of course, she'll kill it!"
The Sacred Leader: "…"
The woman suddenly said softly, "Actually, Ye Xuan is quite pitiful!
Don't think that he has many backers, if you look closely, you will realize that his enemies are not at his level at all. They are all several levels higher than him … No matter how hard he tries to become stronger, his enemies will always be stronger than him by at least a few levels! "
As she spoke to this point, she pointed at herself and smiled. "For example, me!"
The Sacred Leader: "…"
The woman continued, "Actually, I think the reason why he has a Cause of Misfortune might be related to his father and his sister!"
The Sacred Leader was a little confused. "His father and sister?"
The woman nodded. "A person cannot have a Cause of Misfortune for no reason!
He was born with a Cause of Misfortune. Apart from himself, there is another reason, and that is his family … "
The Sacred Leader frowned slightly. "His family?"
The woman looked up at the sky and said softly, "His sister is invincible in the world. No Karma can touch her. Even the Cause of Misfortune can't touch her!
As for his father, he also severed his past and present lives with one sword strike. No Karma can touch him … "
The Sacred Leader said softly, "So, this Cause of Misfortune has fallen on Ye Xuan?
But that shouldn't be the case!
Or could it be that his father and sister used to … "
The woman looked at the Sacred Leader and smiled. "The number of people that his sister used to kill is unimaginable!
As for his father … looking at Ye Xuan's bloodline, you should know that his father is not a good person!
Although his temper has changed a lot over the years, he used to be called a lunatic! "
As she spoke to this point, there was a trace of indescribable color in her eyes.
The Sacred Leader: "…
...”
The woman continued, "Of course, things are definitely not that simple!
There is something wrong with Ye Xuan himself … In short, this Cause of Misfortune is definitely related to his father and sister!
If we want to kill Ye Xuan, the best way is to make use of the Cause of Misfortune. Only then will we have a chance! "
As she spoke, she looked at the Sacred Leader. "Go to the Ultimate Martial Realm personally. Remember, don't let that Martial Emperor know that it was given to him by the Sacred Ground … Forget it!
I'll go personally!
With my strength, I'm afraid I won't be able to hide it from that Martial Emperor! "
As she spoke, she took the ancient scroll in the Sacred Leader's hand and disappeared on the spot.
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, Ye Xuan suddenly stopped and looked around. The starry sky was quiet and the stars were dim.
Lan Ruo looked around with a calm expression.
This place was not simple!
However, with her strength, there were not many in this world who could kill her!
Ye Xuan took out the map that the white-robed Qing 'er gave him and looked at it. Then, he looked around and said softly, "The map shows this Star Domain. However, there seems to be nothing here!"
Lan Ruo said, "Let me take a look!"
Ye Xuan passed the map to Lan Ruo. Lan Ruo looked at it. After a while, she looked to the right and opened her palm. A mysterious force rippled out and the starry sky around them started to tremble. After a while, a huge stone door appeared on their right!
Ye Xuan looked at the stone door. Behind the stone door was a long bluestone staircase that was tens of thousands of feet long. At the end of the staircase was a huge palace that floated in the starry sky.
Ye Xuan looked at Lan Ruo. Lan Ruo shook her head. "I've never seen it before!"
Ye Xuan said, "Let's go take a look!"
Lan Ruo nodded.
The two of them walked towards the stone door. When they reached it, Ye Xuan raised his head and looked at the stone door. The stone door was a little old. It was obvious that it had been here for some time.
The two of them continued walking along the stone stairs.
Along the way, Ye Xuan suddenly said softly, "Qing 'er must have been here before!"
Lan Ruo looked around and there was a hint of seriousness in her eyes. "This place is a world of its own. It's part of the starry sky, but it's outside of this starry sky … It looks like this place isn't as simple as it seems!"
Ye Xuan asked, "Is there any danger?"
Lan Ruo shook her head and smiled. "Not yet!
Since that senior allowed us to come here, it's obvious that there won't be any danger. However, we still have to be careful! "
Ye Xuan nodded.
He didn't dare to be careless when it came to unknown places like these!
Lan Ruo looked at the palace in the distance and secretly raised her guard.
Although she was powerful, it was important to know that there would always be someone better than her. It was always good to be careful!
Soon, the two of them arrived in front of the palace. Ye Xuan looked at the top of the palace. There were three big words on the top of the palace: Milky Way Sect.
Milky Way Sect?
Just as Ye Xuan was about to speak, Lan Ruo frowned slightly. At the same time, the sound of footsteps could be heard from within the palace.
Ye Xuan's heart skipped a beat. He looked into the palace and was stunned for a moment. Then, he exclaimed in shock, "Holy shit, it's!
It's actually … "
Lan Ruo was speechless.
....








Chapter 1458
The reason why Ye Xuan was so shocked and surprised was that he knew the person in front of him!
It was a woman in front of him!
And this woman was none other than Number Nine, who had been with him before!
The Number Nine who needed to be recharged!
There was no news of this woman after she left!
And now, she was actually here!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Number Nine was also a little surprised. She blinked and said, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan took a look at Number Nine and realized that she seemed to have become stronger!
How did this guy cultivate?
At this moment, Number Nine suddenly smiled and said, "Why are you here?"
It was obvious that she was also very happy to see Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "A friend asked me to come!
By the way, why is Number Nine here? "
Number Nine said, "This is our base!"
Ye Xuan blinked and said, "Base?"
Number Nine nodded and said, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan asked, "The Milky Way Sect … is from the Milky Way Realm?"
Number Nine smiled and said, "Yes."
Ye Xuan was silent.
He didn't expect Number Nine to be from the Milky Way Realm.
He didn't know much about the Milky Way Realm. He only knew that Erya and the little white guy seemed to have been to this place!
The former prophet had also been to this place!
Number Nine suddenly smiled and said, "Come with me, I'll give you a super treasure!"
With that, she took Ye Xuan's hand and walked toward the main hall.
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Lan Ruo looked at Number Nine with a serious expression.
Because this Number Nine made her feel a hint of danger!
Most importantly, this Number Nine's aura was completely absent, as if it didn't exist!
It was a little strange!
Number Nine brought Ye Xuan to the main hall. In the main hall, he saw many strange things that he had never seen before.
Lan Ruo was also looking around curiously. She had never seen these things before!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly stopped and pointed to a strange big thing on the right. "Number Nine, what is this?"
Number Nine took a look at that strangely shaped big thing and said with a smile, "This is a space-time starship. It can travel through space-time tunnels and perform space jumps. It is currently the fastest known flying mount!"
Lan Ruo suddenly asked, "The fastest?"
Number 9 nodded. "Yes!
Because the speed of this object has already surpassed the speed of light by two times! "
Ye Xuan blinked. "Light speed?"
Number 9 thought for a moment, and then he said, "Do you not know what the speed of light is?"
Ye Xuan asked, "Is this the speed of light?"
Number 9 nodded. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan was silent. He really had no concept of this!
Number Nine led Ye Xuan towards the depths of the main hall. Along the way, there were some strange things everywhere.
In next to no time, Number 9 led Ye Xuan to a secret chamber. A stone platform was placed within the secret chamber, and a sword was stabbed into the stone platform!
Sword!
The sword was four feet long, slightly longer than the average sword. One side of the sword was white, while the other side was black. It looked quite strange.
Ye Xuan looked at Number 9. "What's this?"
Number 9 smiled. "Unparalleled!"
Ye Xuan was a little puzzled. "Unparalleled sword?"
Number 9 nodded. "In our place, this sword is supreme and unsurpassed."
Ye Xuan blinked. "It's that powerful?"
Number 9 said seriously, "It's very powerful!
This sword is a combination of great dao and technology. It's very terrifying! "
Ye Xuan was a little puzzled. "Technology?"
Number 9 said, "A technological civilization!"
Ye Xuan was even more puzzled. "A technological civilization?"
Number 9 nodded. "Your civilization is a martial arts civilization, while ours is a technological civilization!
Some places have biological civilizations … and this sword is forged from the advantages of a martial arts civilization and a technological civilization!
Give it a try! "
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment, and then he asked, "Is a technological civilization powerful?"
Number 9 blinked. "Any civilization is powerful."
Lan Ruo suddenly asked, "What's the difference between a technological civilization and a martial arts civilization?"
Number 9 thought for a moment, and then he said, "Actually, there's no difference in essence!
The only difference is that your civilization cultivates itself, unearths its own potential, and allows itself to continuously grow and evolve. As for us, we create, constantly create … However, we're also learning from your civilization, because in many aspects, your martial arts civilization is even more terrifying than our technological civilization. "
Ye Xuan and Lan Ruo looked at each other, and there was a hint of astonishment in their eyes!
At this moment, Number 9 said, "Try this sword!"
Ye Xuan nodded. He opened his palm, and the sword flew into his hand. It was cold to the touch, and as light as a feather.
Ye Xuan looked at Number 9, and Number 9 smiled. "This sword has two modes. The first is a martial arts mode. If this mode is activated, this sword will amplify the owner's martial arts techniques by about 50%.
The second mode … "
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly interrupted Number 9. "30% to 50%?"
Number 9 nodded. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan said, "Can I try it?"
Number 9 smiled. "Of course!"
Ye Xuan held the sword in his hand while the profound energy within his body circulated. At the instant he circulated his profound energy, the sword trembled violently. In the next moment, he noticed that the speed at which his profound energy circulated had increased greatly, and it had increased by at least 50%!
Ye Xuan gazed at the sword in his hand with slight astonishment. A moment later, he opened his palm, and the sword suddenly flew out.
A strand of sword light suddenly tore through space and appeared in the starry sky 3km away from the hall!
Lan Ruo's eyes narrowed slightly, and a trace of seriousness flashed through the depths of her eyes!
This sword strike was able to threaten her!
Especially when it caught her off guard. This sword strike had a 30% chance of killing her!
What did that mean?
After all, she was more than 2 realms higher than Ye Xuan!
This sword strike was too terrifying!
Ye Xuan was quite shocked as well. Because he noticed that the might of his sword strike had really increased by at least 50%!
Its speed hadn't increased, but its might had increased!
This increase was quite terrifying!
Meanwhile, Number 9 spoke abruptly, "This sword technique hasn't been cultivated to its limits!"
Ye Xuan gazed at Number 9. Number 9 said, "If one cultivates this sword technique to its limits, then it won't be able to increase its strength. Because it can't increase the upper limit of a sword technique. The reason it can increase its strength is because it hasn't been cultivated to its limits!
Now, one can rely on this Swordsman to cultivate it to its limits. "
Ye Xuan spoke softly, "In that case, not only will one not rely on this sword, but one can even use it as a mirror to find out where one is lacking and cultivate from there?"
Number 9 nodded. "Yes!
That's the designer's original intention!
The designer didn't design this sword so that one could rely on it. Instead, he wanted one to use it to find out where one is lacking and change! "
Ye Xuan smiled, "That's a good sword!"
Number 9 smiled, "It's not just a sword technique. This sword can be used as a medium to execute any divine ability or martial technique!"
Ye Xuan gazed at Number 9 and said, "What's the second form?"
Number 9 gazed at the sword in Ye Xuan's hand and said, "Form change!"
The sword trembled slightly, and the space around it trembled slightly.
Number 9 gazed at Ye Xuan and said, "The second form is Technological Mode. There are two types of attributes in this mode. The first is strength, and the second is speed!"
Ye Xuan blinked and said, "Speed?"
Number 9 nodded and said, "It can increase one's speed to its limits!"
Ye Xuan opened his palm. In the next moment, a sword suddenly appeared in space 3km away from the hall. After the sword appeared for around a breath of time, the space behind the sword split apart ….
Ye Xuan remained silent within the secret chamber.
Extreme speed!
He had executed the Instakill Sword, and the speed of the Instakill Sword was at least twice as fast as his original speed!
Although the speed of this sword wasn't as fast as Situ Tingyun's Instakill, it was already quite close!
Not to mention the surprise attack, even a Consolidation Realm expert would not be able to withstand it even if it was executed openly.
Lan Ruo was silent.
At this moment, her expression was solemn.
If Ye Xuan's sword had caught her off guard, there was at least a 50% chance that it could kill her!
Of course, if she was prepared, it was basically impossible for this sword to kill her instantly!
However, this Instakill was a sneak attack!
Who would fight against it openly?
Ye Xuan wouldn't be so stupid as to shout, "Watch my Instakill Sword …" when he executed this sword technique.
If this sword skill was used stealthily, the threat it posed would be too great!
Ye Xuan looked at the sword in his hand and slowly closed his eyes. At this moment, he activated his physical strength!
The sword started to tremble!
The space around it started to crack!
Ye Xuan hurriedly stopped when he saw this.
No.9 said, "This sword can increase one's strength by at least two times. However, there's a flaw as well. Regardless of whether it's increasing speed or strength, there's a certain side effect. Because one doesn't possess such speed or strength, so increasing speed or strength is equivalent to overdrafting one's body. So, one might be extremely exhausted after executing it!"
Ye Xuan nodded. He'd felt slightly exhausted after executing Instakill just now. Because he'd relied on this sword to increase the speed of Instakill to the limits of what his body could endure!
Actually, the most terrifying aspect of this sword wasn't its ability to increase sword technique, speed, or strength, but its ability to tell one how much room for growth there was!
For example, this Instant Kill Sword. This sword was telling him that he could do even better!
That was the most terrifying aspect of it!
If Situ Tingyun were to use this sword to execute Instakill, then there probably wouldn't be much improvement because she'd already done it to the limit!
Meanwhile, No.9 smiled, "Do you like this sword?"
Ye Xuan looked at No.9, "Are you really going to give it to me?"
No.9 rolled his eyes at Ye Xuan, "Of course!"
Ye Xuan was slightly puzzled, "Why?"
No.9 blinked, "What do you mean why?"
Ye Xuan asked, "Why are you giving it to me?"
No.9 said, "We're on the same side!"
Ye Xuan was stunned, "We're on the same side?"
No.9 nodded, "Yes!
We're on the same side! "
Ye Xuan was slightly puzzled, "Why am I on the same side as you?"
No.9 said, "Because the Milky Way Sect is my home!"
My home?
Ye Xuan was dumbfounded. What the hell?
....
PS: I miss the times when I was single. I could update 5 or 6 chapters a day …. No matter if it's my writing speed or writing time, I was invincible!
Moreover, I even had time to go to a spa!








Chapter 1459
My family?
Needless to say, Ye Xuan was really confused!
He was sure that he had nothing to do with the Milky Way Realm!
He had never been to the Milky Way Realm!
And this Number 9 actually said that the Milky Way Sect was his family!
Not to mention Ye Xuan, even Lan Ruo was shocked!
This Milky Way Sect was not a simple force!
And this Young Master Ye was actually related to the Milky Way Realm?
Seeing how shocked Ye Xuan was, Number 9 was puzzled. "You don't know?"
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly. "Number 9, I don't know anything!
I've never been to the Milky Way Realm! "
Number 9 pondered for a moment, then said, "It doesn't matter. Anyway, your bloodline is the right one!"
Ye Xuan was puzzled. "Bloodline is the right one?"
Number 9 nodded. "Your bloodline!"
Ye Xuan had a strange expression. Could this Milky Way Sect have been founded by that cheapskate dad of his?
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Number 9, the first time I met you, you wanted to destroy humanity …"
Number 9 blinked. "There was a programming error, but it has been fixed!"
Ye Xuan was confused. "Programming error?"
Number 9 thought for a moment, then said, "Just like how you went insane!
Because I've been drifting in space for too long, plus I haven't been able to recharge, there's something wrong with my brain!
I've activated anti-human mode! "
Anti-human mode!
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Lan Ruo suddenly said, "Miss Number 9, what are you doing here?"
Ye Xuan looked at Number 9. He was very curious as well.
Number 9 said, "Waiting for someone!"
Lan Ruo glanced at Number 9. "Waiting for someone from the Milky Way Realm?"
Number 9 nodded. "Yes!
I need supplies! "
Lan Ruo hesitated for a moment, then said, "What are you doing here?"
Number 9 said, "Exploring!
Our duty is to explore the universe and explore higher civilizations.
Also, to find someone! "
Ye Xuan was curious. "Find someone?
Who? "
Number 9 nodded. "Find a man with the same bloodline as you!"
Ye Xuan blinked. "A man with the same blood as me?"
Number Nine nodded slightly. "This is my main mission. My secondary mission is to explore, to explore a higher level of martial arts civilization, and then learn from their civilization."
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Ninth, have you found that man?"
Number 9 shook his head. "No!
However, if it really doesn't work, I'll bring you back!
Your bloodline is the same anyway! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
At this moment, Lan Ruo said, "Ninth Lady, you don't participate in the disputes of this world, right?"
Number Nine nodded. "We basically don't care about the affairs of other universes. We just explore, but …"
She looked at Ye Xuan and said, "If you want to fight, I can help."
With that said, she waved her right hand, and a strange object appeared in her hand.
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "What is this?"
Number Nine blinked. "In the words of your world, this is a divine artifact!"
Lan Ruo: "…"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Number Nine smiled and said, "It's very fun!
I just need to press this little red button, and it will shatter a piece of space … "
With that said, she pointed at Lan Ruo and said, "It's equivalent to a full-powered attack from her!"
Lan Ruo looked at Number Nine and said, "You know how strong I am?"
Number Nine nodded. "I can feel it!
You should be considered a top-notch expert in this universe of yours! "
Lan Ruo was silent.
What kind of place was this Milky Way Realm?
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Number Nine, are you really willing to help me fight?
？”
Number Nine looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Of course!"
Ye Xuan was about to say something when Number Nine suddenly said, "Wait!
I'll contact Master! "
With that said, she turned around and waved her hand lightly. A huge light screen appeared in front of the three of them.
Gradually, the light screen started to tremble. Soon, a woman appeared in the screen!
When this woman appeared, Number Nine instantly stood up straight, no longer laughing and joking like before.
In the light screen, the woman was about to speak when she suddenly looked at Ye Xuan. When she saw Ye Xuan, she was stunned.
Ye Xuan looked at the woman and said, "Senior?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and said, "Where's your father?"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment and then said, "I don't know!"
The woman frowned slightly. "You don't know?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I've never seen him before!"
The woman's frown deepened. "You've never seen him before?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The woman was silent.
Ye Xuan looked at the woman and said, "Senior … you are?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "You should call me Auntie!"
Auntie!
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Lan Ruo's expression also became a little strange. Why was she acknowledging her as her relative?
At this moment, the woman said again, "I'm your biological aunt!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman and said, "Biological?"
The woman nodded and looked at Ye Xuan with a complicated expression. "Looks like they still haven't been able to resolve the Cause of Misfortune that you're carrying!"
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "Senior, you know about the Cause of Misfortune as well?"
The woman glared at Ye Xuan and said, "I'm your aunt!
Not your senior! "
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment and then said, "Senior, how can you prove that you're my aunt?"
The woman opened her palm and the blood vessels in her hand suddenly trembled. Gradually, a powerful force spread out from her body!
Crazy Demon Bloodline!
Although this Crazy Demon Bloodline was not quite the same as his, it was indeed the Crazy Demon Bloodline!
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and said, "My bloodline is not quite the same as yours. That's because your father raised the family bloodline to an unprecedented height. Therefore, your bloodline is not exactly the same as mine."
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "Are you really my aunt?"
The woman glared at Ye Xuan and said, "Child, do you think I would recognize someone else as my nephew for no reason?"
Ye Xuan fell silent.
The sudden appearance of an aunt was something he had not expected at all!
Moreover, this aunt was from the Milky Way Realm.
At this moment, the woman looked at Number 9 and said, "Still no news of him?"
Number 9 nodded and said, "Not yet!"
The woman fell silent.
At this moment, Number 9 suddenly said, "Can I bring him back?"
As she said that, she pointed at Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan was speechless.
On the screen, the woman looked at Ye Xuan and said, "Do you want to come?"
Ye Xuan shook his head and said, "I still have a lot of things to do!"
The woman nodded and said softly, "It's indeed not convenient for you to come now!"
As she said that, she paused and said, "Is there anything I can help you with?"
Ye Xuan blinked and said, "Can I help you with anything?"
The woman smiled and said, "You can tell me about it!"
Ye Xuan hesitated and said, "I have a lot of enemies … and they are all very strong …"
The woman nodded and said, "I understand!"
Ye Xuan blinked and said, "Understand?"
The woman looked at Number 9 and said, "Pass down the order, get all the Milky Way Sect disciples who are exploring the universe to rush to your universe and listen to his orders unconditionally!"
Number 9 nodded and said, "Understood!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
”
The woman looked at Ye Xuan with a complicated expression and said, "You must live well!"
As she said that, the screen gradually became illusory.
Ye Xuan looked at Number 9 and Number 9 said in a low voice, "My energy is running out!"
Ye Xuan nodded and said, "Miss Number 9, I still have a lot of things to deal with. Will you come with me?"
Number 9 smiled and said, "Not for now!
First, I need to replenish my energy. Second, I need to contact the Milky Way Sect disciples here. They will all be here!
I will go and look for you!
Is that okay? "
Ye Xuan nodded and said with a smile, "Alright!"
Number 9 said, "Then we'll meet again!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "See you again!"
After saying that, he turned and left with Lan Ruo.
After leaving the Milky Way Sect, Ye Xuan turned around and saw that the Milky Way Sect was hidden again!
Beside Ye Xuan, Lan Ruo said softly, "Young Master Ye, your background is not simple!"
Ye Xuan shook his head and smiled. "Miss Lan Ruo, if I told you that I don't even know my own background, would you believe me?"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan and said, "I would!"
Ye Xuan was stunned.
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "Young Master Ye has no reason to lie to me, right?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "That's true!
Let's go! "
After saying that, he paused and said, "I'm sorry to have made Miss Lan Ruo accompany me here for nothing!"
Lan Ruo shook her head. "My gains today are not small either!"
After saying that, she looked around and said, "Young Master Ye, let's go!"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The two of them left.
Along the way, Lan Ruo did not speak again.
At this moment, she was thinking about a problem.
Perhaps Xuan City could get closer to Ye Xuan. Although doing so might involve them in a whirlpool, there would definitely be benefits.
However, she was still a little hesitant!
They had to be careful about this matter. If they were not careful, Xuan City might be doomed!
Along the way, Ye Xuan kept looking at the sword in his hand.
Unparalleled!
Unparalleled!
With this sword, his battle prowess could be said to have increased by at least two levels!
Most importantly, this sword could help him improve himself and not make him rely on it!
The gains this time were huge!
Ye Xuan put away the sword and sped up!
...
Ultimate Martial Realm.
At the peak of a mountain, a middle-aged man sat cross-legged. His eyes were slightly closed while his hands were raised, and he seemed as if he was in a meditative state.
Wu Li!
A Martial Emperor!
One of the supreme experts in this universe. Not only was he a true God Realm expert, he was even at the peak of the God Realm!
However, he was still unable to take that step.
Right at this moment, Wu Li suddenly opened his eyes. He turned around and saw a woman in a dark green dress standing not far away!
Wu Li's eyes narrowed slightly because he hadn't noticed when this woman had appeared!
The woman's back was facing Wu Li as she smiled and said, "It's best that you don't attack because you can't do anything to me!"
Wu Li was expressionless. "Is that so?"
As he spoke, he blasted his fist forward!
Bang!
The surroundings instantly became illusory!
However, the woman didn't move at all and wasn't affected at all!
At this moment, there was a serious expression in Wu Li's eyes.
The woman opened her palm, and an ancient scroll descended before Wu Li. "It should be able to help you!"
Wu Li looked at the woman and was about to speak, but at this moment, the woman had already disappeared.
Wu Li frowned slightly. A moment later, he opened the scroll, and when he saw the contents, his pupils suddenly constricted …
.....








Chapter 1460
On the peak of the mountain, Wu Li put away the scroll, and he remained silent for a long time before he said softly, "Who exactly are you!?"
There was no response!
A moment later, Wu Li sat cross-legged on the ground.
Cultivate!
Previously, he was already a little lost in cultivation because he had already reached his limit!
Previously, it was as if he had no other way out!
But now, the contents of this ancient scroll had pointed out a path for him!
This time, he had a 90% chance of breaking through!
He seemed to have thought of something, and he opened his eyes and looked up into the sky. At this moment, he thought of that woman in a simple dress!
The woman who had threatened him!
That woman was so powerful that he didn't dare to make a move against her back then.
Because he wasn't confident!
He could only watch helplessly as the youth rescued Jia Lou from the Naga Dragon Tribe!
He could not take this lying down!
Wu Li slowly closed his eyes. "Woman, just you wait!"
As he spoke, he began to cultivate. Gradually, the aura around him grew stronger and stronger …
...
On the other side, the woman stood in the clouds and looked down. No one knew what she was thinking.
At this moment, the Holy Leader appeared beside the woman.
The Holy Master saluted respectfully, "Master, Ye Xuan went to an unknown starfield, but the Mysterious City's City Lord is following him. Our people don't dare to approach!"
The woman smiled. She looked in the direction of the Fifth Dimension and said softly, "If I'm not wrong, he should be about to awaken the Spirit of the Great Dao!
As long as he dared to awaken the spirit of the Great Dao, the Dao Sect would fight to the death!
In addition to Wu Li who was about to break through … What happened next should be very fun!
However, this is still not enough! "
The Sacred Leader was a little curious. "Other than us and the Dao Sect, does he have any other enemies?"
The woman smiled and said, "Yes!
And there were a lot of them!
Because of the Dao scripture! "
As she spoke, she glanced at the sky and said softly, "There are some mysterious powers. However, these powers have hidden themselves too deeply!
Ordinary people did not even know of their existence!
And these mysterious powers are very interested in the Dao Scripture! "
The Holy Master asked, "Why?"
The woman laughed, "Because they all want to reach the level of the Dao Scripture's owner!"
The Hallowed Lord hesitated for a moment and said, "Master, in your opinion, how strong is the owner of that scripture?"
The woman's smile gradually disappeared. "Very strong!"
The Sacred Lord fell silent.
Very strong!
To be able to gain the approval of the master in front of him, he was definitely not an ordinary person!
The woman continued, "How could someone who could create a martial arts system be an ordinary person?"
As soon as she finished speaking, she looked up into the sky and said with a smile, "I'm going to see that little fellow!"
After saying that, she disappeared directly.
...
In the Five-Dimensional Universe.
After Ye Xuan parted ways with Lan Ruo, he returned to the Fifth Dimension. As soon as he did so, Nian Nian appeared in front of him.
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "You knew I was coming back?"
Nian Nian shook her head. "It was Sister Yue who told me!"
Yue Zun!
Ye Xuan gently rubbed Nian Nian's little head. "It's been hard on you these days, hasn't it?"
Nian Nian shook her head again. "It wasn't hard!"
As she spoke, she raised her head and looked at Ye Xuan, "I've already finished reading those scriptures!"
Ye Xuan asked, "Are you done?"
Nian Nian nodded. "They're waiting for you!"
Ye Xuan held Nian Nian's hand. "Let's go!"
Nian Nian smiled sweetly and turned to leave with Ye Xuan.
At the moment they turned around, Ye Xuan did not notice that Nian Nian tilted her head slightly and glanced at the sky.
In the sky, in the clouds, a woman in a dark green dress smiled. "What a Fifth Dimension Tendo!"
This woman was the mysterious woman from the Holy Land.
The mysterious woman looked down.
Looking at the backs of Ye Xuan and Nian Nian below, she smiled and said, "It seems that I have to be careful of this Fifth Dimension Tendo …"
...
Inside the hall.
Ye Zhiming handed a scroll to Ye Xuan, "The contents and notes of the ninth volume, as well as mental cultivation methods and martial arts!"
As she spoke, she paused and said, "Only Nian Nian knows the contents!"
Ye Xuan looked at Yue Xi and Yue Zun who were not far away. Yue Xi smiled and said, "Young master Ye, the ninth volume of martial arts and mental cultivation methods, we …"
Ye Xuan pointed and the scroll in his hand flew to Yue Xi, "Sect Leader Yue, make a copy!"
Yue Xi was silent.
She also wanted the complete version of the ninth volume of martial arts and mental cultivation methods!
However, she was very clear that this was a bit greedy!
Moreover, most importantly, she wanted to bring the experts of Whirling Sect back to Whirling World.
It was too dangerous to continue staying here!
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Sect Leader Yue, this ninth volume originally belonged to Whirling Sect. Since you gave it to me, how could I keep it for myself?
Just accept this Dao scripture martial art and Dao scripture mental cultivation method! "
Yue Xi was silent.
Ye Xuan said again, "Sect Leader Yue and the others have been out for some time, they must be homesick, right?"
Yue Xi also looked homesick. Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I understand Sect Leader Yue's thoughts and also respect Sect Leader Yue's thoughts!"
Yue Xi's expression was complicated, "Young master Ye … I have to consider the whole sect, I'm sorry!"
After saying that, she turned and left.
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Sect Leader Yue Xi!"
Yue Xi stopped and turned to look at Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan took the scroll and walked to Yue Xi, "This is what your Whirling Sect deserves!
Also, your Whirling Sect does not owe me, Ye Xuan anything. On the contrary, I owe you a favor. "
After a moment of silence, Yue Xi said, "Young master Ye, take care!"
After saying that, she took the scroll and left.
Yue Zun looked at Ye Xuan, "Take care!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Take care!"
Yue Zun also left.
They left!
Ye Zhiming suddenly said, "With this, the Whirling Sect will take more than thirty Consolidation Realm experts with them!"
Ye Xuan said softly, "They have no obligation to stay and die with us!
Isn't that right? "
Ye Zhiming was silent.
At this time, Bai Dizi walked in.
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi, "How is the situation in the Fifth Dimension now?"
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "After the Whirling Sect leaves, we still have sixty-eight Consolidation Realm experts!
As for our Fifth Dimension … we still don't have any Consolidation Realm experts. However, Miss An Lanxiu and the others are already trying to break through to the Consolidation Realm. If nothing unexpected happens, Miss An Lanxiu and the others will reach the Consolidation Realm within a month! "
Ye Xuan nodded. An Lanxiu, Xiao Qi, Aro, Zhang Wenxiu, and the other girls had always been the focus of the Fifth Dimension's nurturing!
It could be said that all the resources were prioritized toward them!
Bai Dizi said again, "According to my people's investigation, the Dao Sect has already called for their disciples to return to the sect. In addition, they are also mobilizing some forces that are attached to them. They may be making a big move recently!"
A big move!
Ye Xuan was silent for a moment, then said, "What about the Boundless Sacred Ground?"
Bai Dizi shook his head, "There is no movement from this force."
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "No movement?"
Bai Dizi nodded.
Ye Xuan said softly, "Miss Lanruo told me that we must be careful of the Boundless Sacred Ground because the former Daoting is their mortal enemy. Moreover, Qing Zhu and the others are still exiled …"
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "This force will not let us grow!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "You shouldn't be able to find anything. I will ask Xuan City to help investigate this force!"
Bai Dizi nodded, "Alright!"
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi, "How's the Power of Faith?
Why don't I feel anything? "
Bai Dizi smiled, "You!
Try activating your God's Seal! "
Ye Xuan nodded, he activated the God's Seal. The next moment, his face changed instantly!
Endless Power of Faith surged out from the God's Seal and converged towards his body like a tide.
Gradually, Ye Xuan's face changed!
Because he found that after the Power of Faith entered his body, it completely merged with his body!
The White Emperor's son smiled and said, "This is the purest power of faith!
With the support of this Power of Faith, your combat strength will increase by at least two to three levels. If it's a little more, your strength will become even more terrifying! "
Power of Faith!
Ye Xuan spoke softly, "I finally understand why some people like to deceive others!"
Needless to say, the Power of Faith was really extraordinary. Moreover, one didn't need to cultivate. So long as others believed in one, one would be able to obtain an endless supply of Power of Faith!
It was simply like becoming stronger while lying down!
At this time, the White Emperor's Son said, "I invited the Ancient Clan, the Southern Yue Clan, and the Xuan City to discuss the Taoist scriptures. Among these forces, the Chi Clan of the Heavenly Oblivion Galaxy did not come. I'm afraid this force will become our enemy!
Ye Xuan asked, "What's the attitude of the ancient race and Southshine Clan?"
Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan, "They've already made it clear that they won't become enemies with us, and they won't interfere in the matter between us and the Dao Sect!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "In other words, our biggest enemy now is the Dao Sect."
Bai Dizi nodded, "We still don't know anything about the Dao Sect's strength, and it's extremely disadvantageous to us!
However, I believe they're definitely afraid of the white robed woman and Miss Tingyun!
Otherwise, with their strength, they would've made a move long ago! "
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes. With his current strength, killing a Consolidation Realm expert was basically no problem!
However, the Dao Sect didn't just have Consolidation Realm experts!
Moreover, as the birthplace of the Dao Scriptures, this place was definitely not that simple!
At this moment, Ye Zhiming suddenly said, "Should we awaken the Spirit of the Great Dao?"
Ye Xuan looked at Ye Zhiming, "Can we awaken it?"
Ye Zhiming nodded, "As long as we combine the nine Dao Scriptures!"
Just as Ye Xuan was about to speak, Nian Nian suddenly said, "No!"
Ye Xuan and the other two looked at Nian Nian. Nian Nian was stunned, then a little confused, "What's wrong?"
Ye Xuan looked at Nian Nian, "You just said no!"
Nian Nian looked at Ye Xuan, still a little confused, "Did I say that?"
Ye Xuan and Ye Zhiming looked at each other, and Ye Zhiming sent a voice transmission with Xuan Qi, "She's weird sometimes!"
Ye Xuan glanced at Nian Nian, he gently rubbed her little head, and said softly, "If we summon the Spirit of the Great Dao now, what do you think will happen?"
Bai Dizi said solemnly, "Not to mention anything else, the Dao Sect will definitely fight us to the death, and some of the forces that are still watching will probably take action to snatch the Dao Scriptures and the Spirit of the Great Dao …"
Ye Xuan squatted down, looked at Nian Nian, and smiled slightly, "I understand!"
Nian Nian held Ye Xuan's hand tightly.
A moment later, while Ye Xuan and the others were discussing matters, Nian Nian left the main hall.
After leaving the main hall, Nian Nian unknowingly came to a cloud. To be precise, she came to the woman in a dark green dress.
The woman looked at Nian Nian in front of her, smiling without saying a word.
Nian Nian looked at the woman, and a moment later, she suddenly smiled, "Isn't it good to be alive?"
The woman blinked, "I remember you saying before that no one can kill you without using three strikes, right?"
Nian Nian nodded, "I did!"
The woman's lips curled up, "I'm a little more arrogant than you. If I don't use three strikes, I can kill anyone I want!"

Chapter 1461
Three strikes!
Nian Nian looked at the woman in front of her. "How arrogant!"
The woman smiled and said, "Same to you!"
Nian Nian said, "Let's go?"
The woman nodded. "Alright!"
The two women strolled through the clouds.
Nian Nian said softly, "You're the first person to discover me!"
The woman smiled and said, "You're also the first person to discover me!"
Nian Nian turned her head and looked down. "The current Five-Dimensional Universe is the Five-Dimensional Universe in my heart!"
The woman nodded. "You didn't misjudge me!"
Nian Nian smiled and said, "Yes!"
She was quite proud!
The woman chuckled and said, "You shouldn't have gotten involved in his karma."
Nian Nian shrugged. "It's too late to retreat now.
Isn't that so? "
The woman glanced at Nian Nian and smiled. "You don't want to retreat!"
Nian Nian blinked. "I'm his Sister Nian!"
The woman looked up at the sky and said softly, "You deliberately lost your memory because you didn't want to be targeted by the calamity on him. You wanted to use another method to protect him!"
Nian Nian smiled and said, "You didn't dare to attack directly because of the woman in the plain dress!"
The woman nodded. "I can't beat her!"
Nian Nian said, "I can't beat her either!"
The two women looked at each other and smiled.
At this moment, the woman stopped. She looked down and said softly, "Do you know?
The moment I saw him, I almost gave up! "
Nian Nian was a little curious. "Why?"
The woman smiled and said, "I don't know why either!
I can't explain that feeling. "
Nian Nian asked, "What's his relationship with you?"
The woman smiled. "He can be considered family!"
Nian Nian blinked. "Considered family?"
The woman nodded. "Very close!"
Nian Nian smiled and said, "And you wanted to kill him!
It looks like there's a story! "
The woman smiled and said, "There's indeed a story!
However, it's all the grudges of the older generation. I don't want to talk about it! "
Nian Nian blinked. "I think there's someone responsible for every grievance. What do you think?"
The woman laughed. "I think you're right. However, if I kill him, he definitely deserves it."
Nian Nian was silent.
The woman stopped. She looked at the sky and said softly, "You won't dare to recover your memories in a short period of time, and you won't dare to forcefully interfere with his matters. Am I right?"
Nian Nian nodded. "Yes."
The woman said with a smile, "Then we shall meet again!"
After saying that, she walked into the distance.
Behind him, Nian Nian looked at the woman in silence.
At that moment, a man appeared behind Nian Nian.
It was Ye Xuan!
Ye Xuan looked at Nian Nian. "Nian Nian, who is she?"
Nian Nian was stunned. The calmness in her eyes turned into confusion. She looked up at Ye Xuan. "Who is it?"
Ye Xuan pointed at the woman who had already disappeared in the distance. "That woman!"
Nian Nian looked into the distance. A moment later, she said softly, "I don't know!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly.
There was something wrong with Nian Nian!
At this moment, Nian Nian grabbed Ye Xuan's hand. "Let's go!"
Ye Xuan looked at Nian Nian and asked softly, "Are you alright?"
Nian Nian shook her head slightly. "I'm fine!"
Ye Xuan squatted down and stared at Nian Nian. "Are you really alright?"
Nian Nian lowered her head slightly and said softly, "I … I don't know either. I've been having some strange dreams recently!"
Ye Xuan asked softly, "What dream?"
Nian Nian shook her head. "Just thinking about it gives me a headache!"
Ye Xuan hurriedly said.
"Then I won't think about it anymore!"
As he said that, he gently rubbed Nian Nian's little head. "Let's go back!"
Nian Nian nodded. "Alright!"
Ye Xuan turned his head and looked in the direction that the woman had disappeared in. Then, he pulled Nian Nian and left.
...
Dao Sect.
In a certain hall, the Fourth Dao Elder was sitting cross-legged on the ground. At that moment, his body had already condensed, but it was no longer a Dao Body!
His Dao Body had been shattered by that woman!
If he wanted to cultivate it again, it would be extremely difficult!
In front of the Fourth Dao Elder was a statue of a middle-aged man. The middle-aged man held an ancient scroll in his hand and looked very elegant and quiet.
This person was the Dao Sect's Patriarch!
The founder of the Dao Scripture!
At that moment, an old man walked in and bowed respectfully to the Fourth Dao Elder. "We received news that Ye Xuan seems to be looking for the white-robed woman and Situ Tingyun!"
The Fourth Dao Elder opened his eyes. "Have you found them?"
The old man shook his head. "I don't know!"
The Fourth Dao Elder was silent. After a moment, he said again, "Any news from the Second Master?"
The old man shook his head. "No news at all!"
The Fourth Dao Elder asked again, "What about the Holy Land?
What exactly is their attitude? "
The old man said in a deep voice, "The Holy Land … They're a little perfunctory!"
The Fourth Dao Elder frowned slightly. "What do you mean?"
The old man said, "What the Holy Land means is that they are also mortal enemies with Ye Xuan, but they have no intention of making a move!
I think they want us to fight Ye Xuan to the death first, and then they'll reap the benefits! "
The Fourth Dao Elder's face was expressionless. "Idiots!
They're still scheming against us even now. It's impossible for the Holy Land to achieve anything! "
The old man nodded. "Besides the Holy Land, Dark City, the Ancient Clan, and the Southshine Clan have expressed that they won't interfere in the matter between us and Ye Xuan!"
The Fourth Dao Elder looked at the old man. "Dark City has expressed its position as well?"
The old man nodded.
The Fourth Dao Elder fell silent.
The old man continued, "Our Dao Sect's disciples have basically all returned, and those who haven't are on their way back!
Besides that, some of our subordinate powers have sent their strongest experts to our Dao Sect as well. "
As he spoke, he looked at the Fourth Dao Elder. "Fourth Master, when do you think we should make a move?"
The Fourth Dao Elder shook his head. "Ye Xuan alone can kill him as easily as killing a chicken!
But what happens after he's killed?
The people behind him will definitely launch a frenzied revenge against our Dao Sect!
Moreover, if they continue to target our Dao Sect while hiding in the shadows, then our Dao Sect will be in an extremely bad situation!
So, if we want to kill Ye Xuan, we must first destroy the powers behind him, and we can use Ye Xuan to draw them out. "
The old man hesitated for a moment before he said, "Fourth Master's words make sense. However, we still don't understand the powers behind Ye Xuan …."
The Fourth Dao Elder spoke softly, "It doesn't matter. So long as Ye Xuan is here, they will show themselves!
This time, our Dao Sect will go all out. Let me see if the powers behind him can fight our Dao Sect! "
As he spoke, he gazed at the old man. "Use all the connections of our Dao Sect and invite all the experts we can. Moreover, tell them that our Dao Sect will share all the Dao Scriptures once we succeed!"
Share all the Dao Scriptures!
The old man nodded slightly. "Alright!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned around and left.
Within the hall, the Fourth Dao Elder slowly closed his eyes.
At this moment, he recalled what Ye Ling had said before he left.
Ye Xuan had a sister!
The woman in the plain dress!
Previously, the Dao Sect had sent people to look for the woman in the plain dress, but all of them had died!
However, this didn't mean anything because with his strength, it wouldn't be too difficult for him to kill ten Consolidation Realm experts!
Moreover, if the woman in the plain dress wasn't strong enough …
It was very likely that she had already been injured when she killed the ten Consolidation Realm experts of the Dao Sect.
If that was the case, then this woman in the plain dress would be the breakthrough point for the Dao Sect!
However, he was still a little worried!
He was worried that Ye Ling was lying to him!
However, the problem was that an expert of this level shouldn't be lying, right?
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, there was a city in this star field. This city wasn't big, it was just a small city.
Divine City.
This city was extremely special. Very few people in the world knew about it because there was a requirement to enter this city!
That was to be at least half a step into the Divine Realm!
It could be said that this city was a club, a club of top experts.
On this day, a middle-aged man came to the Divine City. This person was the Second Dao Elder!
After the Second Dao Elder entered the city, there was only a small tavern in the city.
The Taoist Second Brother arrived at the tavern. At this time, the tavern was a little deserted. There were only three people in the tavern: a tavern manager who was calculating with an abacus, a waiter who was cleaning the tables and chairs, and a swordsman who was drinking.
Seeing the Second Dao Elder, the tavern owner smiled slightly. "What do you need, sir?"
The Second Dao Elder walked in front of the tavern owner. "I'm looking for someone!"
The tavern owner shook his head. "Sir, this is a place to drink."
The Second Dao Elder looked at the tavern owner. He took out a storage ring and placed it in front of the tavern owner. The tavern owner glanced at it. There were a total of one billion Fortune Divine Crystals in the storage ring!
One billion!
This was a huge sum of money!
The tavern owner glanced at the Second Dao Elder. "Who are you looking for!"
The Second Dao Elder said in a deep voice, "The Third Young Lady!"
The tavern owner asked, "The Third Young Lady of the Dao Sect?"
The Second Dao Elder nodded.
The tavern owner put away the storage ring and pointed to a table in front of him. "Half a month ago, she drank here."
The Second Dao Elder frowned slightly. "Where is she now?"
The tavern owner said, "The Northern Wilderness!"
The Second Dao Elder was stunned.
The Northern Wilderness!
Not far away, the swordsman who was drinking suddenly stopped.
The tavern owner said with a smile, "It's not too late to chase after her now!"
The Second Dao Elder was silent.
The tavern owner said with a smile, "Would you like a cup of Spring Sword?"
The Second Dao Elder took out another storage ring and placed it in front of the tavern owner. "Ask about someone!"
The tavern owner put away the storage ring and said, "Who?"
The Second Dao Elder looked at the tavern owner. "Ye Xuan!"
Ye Xuan!
The tavern owner was stunned and asked, "The Five-Dimensional Universe?"
The Second Dao Elder nodded.
After a moment of silence, the tavern owner put the storage ring back in its original position and shook his head.
The Second Dao Elder frowned slightly. "Do you not know or do you not dare to say?"
The tavern owner said with a smile, "I know a little about Dao Yi, but I can't say!"
The Second Dao Elder stared at the tavern owner. "You can't say?"
The tavern owner nodded.
The Second Dao Elder was silent.
Who was this Ye Xuan?
Why were the people of this place so afraid of him?
One must know that the Dao sects did not dare to be arrogant in this place!
At this moment, the tavern owner suddenly said, "Dear customers, we are going to close!"
The Second Dao Elder glanced at the story and turned to leave.
Not far away, the swordsman put down his wine glass and got up to leave.
Not long after the two left, the tavern owner came to a room in the tavern and bowed slightly. "Master …"
Inside the room, a voice sounded. "Are you wondering why I didn't let you investigate that Ye Xuan?"
The tavern owner nodded. "This disciple is indeed puzzled!"
Inside the room, the voice was silent for a long time before saying, "The son of an old friend!"
The tavern owner: "…"
...








Chapter 1462
After Second Brother left the tavern, he went straight to the Northern Wilderness!
Along the way, Second Brother's expression was solemn.
He came to the Divine City for two purposes. One was to find the Third Young Lady, and the other was to inquire about Ye Xuan's background!
In his opinion, this tavern should know about Ye Xuan's background!
What he did not expect was that the tavern's people did not dare to say it!
It was not that they did not know, but they did not dare to say it!
This was thought-provoking!
In any case, Taoism had no way out now!
Second Brother sped up.
...
In the Five-Dimensional Universe.
On this day, Ye Xuan came to a hall. Inside the hall stood a middle-aged man!
The Ninth Master!
Ye Xuan walked to the Ninth Master and took out a scroll and handed it to him.
The Ninth Master glanced at the scroll. It was a Dao Scripture!
A complete version of Dao Scripture!
The Ninth Master looked at Ye Xuan and smiled. "You're giving it to me just like that?"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Are you touched?"
The Ninth Master shook his head and smiled. "A little, but … are you really giving it to me just like that?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "You've helped me a lot along the way."
The Ninth Master thought for a moment and said. "Actually, I'm afraid of the plain-dressed woman!"
Ye Xuan blinked. "Senior, I've heard you say that you can take two strikes from Qing 'er … This …"
The Ninth Master laughed. "Ye Xuan, you're not a good friend!
How dare you slap my face! "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Take it!"
The Ninth Master's expression was complicated. "To be honest, we've all underestimated her!"
As he said, he looked at Ye Xuan. "Back then, I was still very weak. In my opinion, she was only one or two levels higher than me. But now, it seems that my thoughts were too ridiculous."
Ye Xuan was silent.
Didn't he also underestimate Qing 'er's strength?
Meanwhile, the 9th House added, "Actually, we might be underestimating her as well!"
Ye Xuan looked at the ninth floor. "What do you mean?"
The Ninth Floor smiled, "Because we have been using our knowledge to measure her, but she has already surpassed our knowledge.
Just like a frog at the bottom of a well, it has always used its own thoughts to measure the sky outside. Even if it feels that the sky might be bigger than it imagined, how could it have imagined that the sky was not as big as it imagined? "
As he spoke, he looked at Ye Xuan. "It's not that your enemy is too stupid, it's that she's too strong!
It's so abnormal that it shouldn't even exist in this world! "
Ye Xuan was silent.
At this moment, he thought of Bai Dizi.
Bai Dizi had actually been paying attention to the plain-dressed lady all along. But in the end, he discovered that he had still underestimated her!
Including him, Ye Xuan!
Back in Green City, he had thought that Qing 'er was a sword deity … But now, it seemed that it was such a stupid idea!
The Ninth House said, "I'm telling you one thing. The Daoists aren't scary because they don't know the true strength of the plain-dressed lady!
What's scary?
He was the kind of person who knew the true strength of the plainly dressed woman, but still dared to make an enemy out of her!
This kind of person is a real threat to you. "
Ye Xuan nodded. "I understand what you mean!"
The Ninth House smiled. "At first, I thought you were just a prophet in the afterlife. But then I realized that things aren't that simple!"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "To be honest, I'm still very confused about many things!"
The Ninth House said, "Becoming stronger is the way to go!
However, I realized that no matter how hard you try to become stronger, your enemy will always be much stronger than you … What a tragedy! "
Ye Xuan was speechless. "You're taking pleasure in my misfortune!"
The Ninth House laughed. "By the way, I have to go too!"
Ye Xuan was puzzled. "Go?"
The Ninth House nodded. "I've been away for so long. Now that I've regained my freedom, I want to go back and have a look!"
Ye Xuan hesitated, then asked, "Will you come back?"
The Ninth House smiled. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan took out a Storage Ring and handed it to the Ninth House. "Take care!"
With that, he turned and left.
The Ninth House glanced at the Storage Ring and was stunned the next moment.
There were ten million Fortune Divine Crystals in the Storage Ring!
...
After parting ways with the Ninth House, Ye Xuan came to a silent starry sky. In his hand was the Supreme Sword!
He didn't immediately cultivate the Ninth Dao Scripture's cultivation method and martial arts because he hadn't even cultivated the Instant Kill Sword and the Burning Heaven Sword to their limits!
What he needed to do now was to use this sword to cultivate his Instant Kill Swordsman to his limits. Only then would he consider cultivating the Ninth Dao Scripture's martial arts!
While Ye Xuan was cultivating, a few new Half-Step Consolidation Realm experts appeared in the Fifth Dimension!
An Lanxiu!
When he learned that An Lanxiu had broken through, Bai Dizi was also shocked!
He knew that An Lanxiu and the other girls were talented, but he didn't expect that An Lanxiu would reach the Half-Step Consolidation Realm so quickly after obtaining cultivation resources!
Faster than White Robe and Zhen Wu!
Although it was only a half-step, it was still very terrifying!
Not long ago, An Lanxiu was only in the Dao Realm!
How long had it been to reach the Half-Step Consolidation Realm?
Of course, this was a very good thing for the current Fifth Dimension!
Currently, the Fifth Dimension was lacking in experts!
...
The Northern Wilderness.
The Northern Wilderness was a wasteland, and this wasteland was not simple. It could even be called a forbidden area.
Even a half-step Divine Realm expert would not dare to step into it!
The reason why this place became a forbidden area was because the Dao Sect's ancestor had set up a powerful enchantment here.
No one knew why the Dao Sect's ancestor set up a enchantment here, not even the people of the Dao Sect!
Although countless years had passed, the enchantment was still strong. Only half-step Divine Crystal Realm experts could barely get close to this wasteland.
The Second Dao Brother came to the top of a mountain. Below the mountain was a wasteland. At first glance, it was a blurry wasteland.
Enchantment!
The Second Dao Brother looked into the distance, his face a little gloomy.
He was already too late!
At this time, a man with a long blade suddenly appeared behind the Second Dao Brother.
The Second Dao Brother glanced at the man with the long blade. "You've been following me for so long, what's the matter?"
The man with the long blade was expressionless. "Do you need a thug?"
The Second Dao Brother narrowed his eyes slightly. "What do you want!"
The man with the long blade said, "As far as I know, your master once created a sword skill. No one in your Dao Sect can successfully cultivate this sword skill, right?"
The Second Dao Brother looked at the man. "You're Blade Addict!"
The man said, "Give me that scroll, I'll kill that Ye Xuan for you!"
The Second Dao Brother shook his head. "You can't kill him by yourself."
The man looked at the Second Dao Brother. "I can try!"
The Second Dao Brother said in a deep voice. "I can give you that scroll, but I have a condition. This condition is not for you to kill Ye Xuan, because you can't kill him by yourself!
What I want is for you to follow me to the Dao Sect. When I want you to attack, attack! "
After a moment of silence, the Blade Addict nodded. "Okay!"
The Second Dao Brother pointed his finger and an ancient scroll appeared in front of the man. "This is the first half.
It's the first half. I'll give you the second half after we kill Ye Xuan! "
The Blade Addict said, "Okay!"
The Second Dao Brother slowly clenched his right hand, a strange light flashed in his eyes.
He suddenly realized something!
That was because there were too many martial arts manuals in the Dao Sect. In addition to the Dao scriptures, there were many other martial arts, and these martial arts had a fatal temptation to the experts outside!
If the Dao Sect was willing, who knew how many experts would rush to the Dao Sect to help!
Thinking of this, the Second Dao Brother sneered. He turned around and left!
Back to the Dao Sect!
...
After returning to the Dao Sect, the Second Dao Brother immediately used the Dao Sect's resources to invite experts from all over the heavens to the Dao Sect!
Under the temptation of those martial arts manuals, more and more Consolidation Realm experts rushed to the Dao Sect!
Because there were not only martial arts manuals, but also Dao scriptures, martial arts, and some Dao techniques. These were things that countless people dreamed of!
Under such temptation, not many people could resist!
...
On this day, the Second Dao Brother personally came to the Sacred Land.
The Holy Temple.
The Second Dao Brother looked at the Holy Lord in front of him. "Holy Lord, this time, the Dao Sect will do its best to kill Ye Xuan!"
The Holy Lord was silent.
The Second Dao Brother smiled. "Holy Lord, you should have some understanding of the forces behind Ye Xuan. To be honest, if we cooperate sincerely, this time, Ye Xuan will definitely die!"
The Holy Lord looked at the Second Dao Brother. "What's your Senior Brother's attitude?"
Senior Brother!
The Second Dao Brother shook his head. "His attitude isn't important. What's important is that I represent the entire Dao Sect."
As he spoke, he looked at the Holy Lord. "Holy Lord, tell me if you want to join forces.
Of course, if the Sacred Land wants to see the Dao Sect and Ye Xuan fight to the death, it's not impossible. However, if the Dao Sect loses, I hope the Sacred Land will have a good ending! "
With that, he stood up and left.
The Holy Lord did not speak.
Just as the Second Dao Brother was about to leave the hall, the Holy Lord suddenly looked at him. "The Sacred Land is willing to help!"
The Second Dao Brother looked at the Holy Lord. The Holy Lord smiled. "How about this? If the white-robed woman and Situ Tingyun appear, the Sacred Land will help you deal with them. However, we won't care about anything else!"
After a moment of silence, the Second Dao Brother said, "Alright!"
The Holy Lord asked, "When do we act?"
The Second Dao Brother glanced at the Holy Lord. "Very soon!"
With that, he turned around and vanished.
After the Second Dao Brother left, the Holy Lord immediately went to the small bamboo house in the mountain behind the Sacred Land. At this moment, the mysterious woman was watering the flowers in the garden.
The Holy Lord looked at the mysterious woman. "Master, are we really going to act?"
The mysterious woman smiled. "What do we act?"
The Holy Lord was stunned. "Just now, Master asked me to agree to the Second Dao Brother's request …"
The mysterious woman smiled. "If we don't agree, do you think he would dare to start a war against the entire Fifth Dimension?
Even if he wants to, he wouldn't dare because he's afraid that someone else will take advantage of the situation!
He'll only be at ease if we agree to his request. After that, he'll go find Ye Xuan and fight to the death! "
The Holy Lord hesitated for a moment before he said, "Can he win?"
The mysterious woman said softly, "I'm not asking him to fight. I'm asking Ye Xuan to form an irreconcilable enmity with the Daoist Sect. As long as Ye Xuan forms an irreconcilable enmity with the Daoist Sect, it'll be equivalent to forming an irreconcilable enmity with the Daoist Sect's Ancestor … He obtained the nine Daoist scriptures, and it was originally a good karma. But now, this good karma is about to turn into a bad karma … How wonderful!"
As she spoke up to this point, she looked up at the sky and said softly, "That person from the Ultimate Martial Realm should be about to break through as well!"
....

Chapter 1463
In the Five-Dimensional Universe.
In the starry sky, Ye Xuan opened his palm. Thousands of feet away, a ray of sword light appeared and a certain space was torn apart!
Insta-kill Sword!
With the help of this unparalleled sword, his Insta-kill Sword had reached his limit!
The true limit!
This was because Insta-kill Sword could no longer increase his sword speed!
Although it could no longer increase his speed, it could increase his strength and the power of his sword techniques!
In other words, other than reaching the limit of his speed, there was still room for improvement in other areas!
At this moment, a lady suddenly appeared not far away from Ye Xuan.
It was Lan Ruo!
Ye Xuan looked at Lan Ruo, a little surprised. "Miss Lan Ruo?"
Lan Ruo walked to Ye Xuan with a serious expression. "I have bad news for you!"
Ye Xuan said, "Dao Faction is going to make a move?"
Lan Ruo nodded. "Not just Dao Faction!
They made use of Dao Faction's resources and connections to gather many experts to head to Dao Faction!
These people are not to be underestimated! "
Ye Xuan asked, "How many?"
Lan Ruo glanced at Ye Xuan. "Are you sure you want to know?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Of course!"
Lan Ruo said, "The Dao Sect itself has at least 460 Consolidation Realm experts. Now, including the experts from their vassal forces, as well as those who have been tempted by martial arts manuals, there are at least 600 Consolidation Realm experts in the Dao Sect now. Among them, there are many who have no lack of Consolidation Realm experts."
Ye Xuan was silent.
This lineup was enough to crush the entire Five-Dimensional Universe!
Lan Ruo continued, "In addition, Second Brother Dao has personally gone to the Holy Land. This means that the Holy Land should have agreed to make a move!
As for the strength of the Holy Land, we can't find anything! "
Can't find anything!
Ye Xuan said softly, "Seems like I should be more worried about the Holy Land!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "How are you going to deal with Dao Faction!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "We can only fight!"
Lan Ruo frowned. "Fight head-on?"
Ye Xuan said softly, "We definitely can't fight them head-on."
Lan Ruo asked, "Call for help?"
Ye Xuan shook his head.
Lan Ruo was a little puzzled. "Why didn't you call for help?"
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly. "Because I don't know where they are!"
Lan Ruo was stunned. "Are you sure?"
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly. "Miss Lanruo, do you think I need to lie to you?"
Lan Ruo said in a low voice, "Then you're in a rather bad situation now!"
Ye Xuan looked at Lan Ruo and smiled. "Miss Lan Ruo, thank you for reminding me."
Lan Ruo shook his head. "It's just a small matter!"
As she said that, she looked at Ye Xuan. "I don't know what strategy you have, but I want to tell you that if the person behind you doesn't make a move, that door is like a mountain to you, a mountain that you can't overcome!
Take care! "
After saying that, she turned around and disappeared.
Where he was, Ye Xuan looked at the Supreme Sword in his hand and chuckled. "It's time to taste blood!"
After saying that, he disappeared.
...
Dao Domain.
At this moment, the Dao Domain was unprecedentedly lively because countless Consolidation Realm experts were rushing over.
On this day, a man in black arrived at the Dao Domain.
This man in black was naturally Ye Xuan!
However, at this moment, he was dressed in black and looked completely different from before.
He wanted to see how the Dao Sect was going to deal with him!
The moment Ye Xuan entered the Dao Domain, the space in front of him suddenly trembled. The next moment, an old man appeared in front of Ye Xuan.
The old man looked at Ye Xuan. "May I know who you are?"
Ye Xuan was about to speak when a voice sounded from the horizon. "I didn't expect the Young Master Ye of the Fifth Dimension to personally come to my Dao Sect. What a surprise!"
After saying that, a middle-aged man appeared in front of Ye Xuan.
The person who came was Dao Brother Second!
And around him, countless experts appeared one after another!
All of them were at the Consolidation Realm!
In an instant, Ye Xuan was directly surrounded!
Ye Xuan was silent.
'I'm off to a bad start!'
However, he didn't understand how the other party found him.
In the sky, Dao Brother Second looked at Ye Xuan. "Ye Xuan, you underestimate my Dao Sect!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Indeed, I underestimated you!"
Dao Brother Second looked at Ye Xuan. "Everyone, kill this person, and my Dao Sect will fulfill its promise to you immediately!"
Hearing this, the hundreds of Consolidation Realm experts present all looked at Ye Xuan in unison.
Why did they come here?
Naturally, it was because they wanted to obtain some of the Dao Sect's martial arts manuals!
Especially the Dao scriptures of the Dao Sect!
At this moment, someone was about to make a move, but Ye Xuan suddenly laughed in the distance. "You don't really think that I came alone, do you?"
Hearing this, those who were about to make a move stopped.
They naturally knew about Ye Xuan.
Now, who didn't know that there was a mysterious force behind Ye Xuan?
In the sky, Dao Brother Second looked at Ye Xuan. "Are you trying to scare me?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Dao Brother Second, do you think I would come here to die for nothing?"
Dao Brother Second looked at Ye Xuan with a calm expression. "Then what are you doing here?"
Ye Xuan was silent.
In fact, he really wanted to directly draw his sword and kill this Dao Brother Second.
However, he wasn't completely confident!
First of all, Dao Brother Second was an expert who surpassed the Consolidation Realm. Secondly, Dao Brother Second had also cultivated a Dao Physique!
That Dao Physique was very likely to be able to block his sword strike!
At this moment, a middle-aged man not far away suddenly laughed. "I think that this Young Master Ye is here to die!"
Ye Xuan looked at the middle-aged man. The middle-aged man looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Ye Xuan, do you really think that the force behind you can fight against us?
You … "
At this moment, the middle-aged man's voice came to an abrupt halt. His eyes were wide open as he tightly clutched his throat. There was a sword mark on his throat, and blood kept flowing out, instantly dyeing his hands red!
At this moment, everyone present was dumbfounded!
He was killed?
Who killed him?
Soon, everyone looked at Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan glanced at the crowd and said with a smile, "Everyone, I'm here today to look for the Dao Sect. As for the others, please shut up!
Because I don't have time to argue with you! "
Everyone looked at Ye Xuan. At this moment, there was fear in their eyes.
Ye Xuan had just killed a Consolidation Realm expert!
Most importantly, they did not even see how Ye Xuan had wielded his sword!
The Second Elder was also a little shocked at this moment. He did not expect Ye Xuan to kill a Consolidation Realm expert with a single sword strike!
And it was so easy!
What kind of strength does this guy have?
At this time, Ye Xuan looked at the crowd and said with a smile, "Everyone, I know that Daoting uses some so-called martial arts.
The ancient books tempted you to come and kill me, Ye Xuan!
However, have you ever thought about why the Dao Sect would do that?
It's very simple, because the Dao Sect just wants you to be cannon fodder! "
Cannon fodder!
At this moment, an old man stood out. He looked at Ye Xuan and said, "Young Master Ye, do you know how many people we have here?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "A few hundred people!"
The old man said calmly, "Young Master Ye, as far as I know, there are not even a hundred Consolidation Realm experts in the Five-Dimensional Universe. What do you think?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "You're right!
In that case, you can make your move! "
The old man looked at Ye Xuan. He did not speak, nor did he make a move!
The Consolidation Realm experts present did not make a move either!
At this moment, they suddenly thought of something!
Why was Ye Xuan so fearless?
It was because of the force behind Ye Xuan!
Not to mention whether they could kill Ye Xuan, even if they did!
What would happen after they killed him?
Whoever killed Ye Xuan would definitely suffer the revenge of that mysterious force!
Not to mention, who could defeat the white-robed woman and Situ Tingyun?
If these two people took revenge, would they be able to survive?
Thinking of this, many people glanced at the Dao Sect in the distance. They could not stand out in this matter!
Seeing that no one made a move, Second Brother Dao slowly clenched his right hand. He knew that these people were all smart people. If he did not make a move, these people would definitely not stand out!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly raised his right hand and slapped it in front of him.
Fen Tianjue!
As the palm fell, a wave of flames slanted out from Ye Xuan's palm. In an instant, the entire starry sky was shattered!
Seeing Ye Xuan suddenly make a move, the experts present were shocked. No one had expected Ye Xuan to suddenly make a move. The few Consolidation Realm experts who were closer to Ye Xuan were directly blasted into nothingness by Ye Xuan's Fen Tianjue, and the other Consolidation Realm experts were also shaken to the point of retreating.
Right at this moment, Second Brother Dao's voice suddenly resounded. "Where do you think you're going!?"
As soon as he finished speaking, Second Brother Dao suddenly stretched his right hand towards the space before him, and then he made a grabbing motion. An enormous hand that could hold up the sky tore through the starry sky over 50,000km away, and then it grabbed fiercely towards Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan suddenly turned around and slashed with his sword!
The Dao Sword!
This strike was swift like a bolt of lightning!
Bang!
The enormous hand trembled violently before it cracked apart, and Ye Xuan was blasted over 100km away. However, in the next moment, his entire body transformed into a strand of light and vanished.
The Dao Domain.
Second Brother Dao's expression was slightly gloomy because he noticed that Ye Xuan had vanished!
At this moment, he suddenly realized that he had slightly underestimated Ye Xuan.
He had greatly underestimated Ye Xuan!
