Ye Xuan actually possessed the strength to instantly kill Consolidation Realm experts!
Moreover, he had also cultivated the Dao scripture martial arts of the Dao Sect to such an extent!
Without Second Brother Dao, the expressions of the Consolidation Realm experts present were extremely solemn. Ye Xuan's strength had greatly exceeded their expectations!
Was he really only at the Consolidation Realm?
In the field, it was so quiet that even a pin drop could be heard. Everyone's eyes were filled with fear.
At this moment, the surrounding hundreds of thousands of kilometers of starry sky had turned into a pitch-black spatial black hole. Not only that, but a powerful force was still constantly eroding the origin of the Dao Realm!
Second Brother Dao glanced around and was about to speak when his pupils suddenly shrank. He suddenly turned around, and as he did so, a ray of light from a sword arrived.
Second Brother Dao clenched his fists tightly, and at this moment, a sword directly pierced between his eyebrows …
...








Chapter 1464
Everyone in the field was shocked!
Ye Xuan turned around and attacked!
This was something no one had expected!
Even the Dao Second Brother did not expect this!
How dare Ye Xuan?
When Ye Xuan's sword pierced half an inch into the Dao Second Brother's eyebrows, it could no longer go in.
Dao Physique!
At this critical moment, the Dao Second Brother's Dao Physique played a life-saving role!
Seeing that he could no longer stab in, Ye Xuan stomped his right foot and rotated his right hand forward.
Boom!
The Dao Second Brother was instantly thrown thousands of feet away!
As for Ye Xuan, he turned around and disappeared into the end of the starry sky!
His attack failed, and he fled thousands of miles away!
In the starry sky, the Dao Second Brother slowly closed his eyes. The space between his eyebrows cracked into a spider web. Not only that, but his physical body had also suffered a certain degree of damage!
At this moment, the Dao Second Brother's expression was extremely ugly!
If it were not for his Dao Physique, he would have been killed by Ye Xuan's sword just now!
Even now, he still had lingering fear from that sword strike!
Because it was too fast!
It was so fast that even he could not react!
In the field, the expressions of the Consolidation Realm experts were extremely solemn. At this moment, their hearts were filled with fear!
At this moment, everyone could not help but ask themselves, if Ye Xuan's sword was aimed at them, would they be able to block it?
The answer was no!
Was Ye Xuan a killer or a Swordsman?
At this moment, the Dao Second Brother suddenly said, "Everyone, please take a rest."
After saying that, he turned around and left.
In the field, the Consolidation Realm experts looked at each other.
In fact, at this moment, some of them were already retreating because they realized that Ye Xuan did not look so easy to bully …
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, Ye Xuan stopped and slowly closed his eyes!
He had to say that it was a pity!
He could have killed the Dao Second Brother just now!
Dao Physique!
With his current strength, he still could not cut through the flesh with one sword!
There might be a chance if he slashed a few more times!
After a while, Ye Xuan left.
Ye Xuan did not return to the Fifth Dimension but went directly to the Boundless Sacred Land!
Boundless Holy Land!
Ye Xuan had always been wary of this mysterious force.
This time, he wanted to personally investigate this Boundless Sacred Ground.
Just as Ye Xuan stepped into the Saint realm, in the bamboo house at the back of the mountain, the woman who was reading an ancient book suddenly raised her head. She turned her head to look outside the bamboo house, and the corners of her lips curled up. "Interesting!"
As she spoke, she lowered her head and continued to read.
In the starry sky, Ye Xuan did not advance any further.
Because he realized that he seemed to have been discovered!
This feeling was a little absurd!
Ye Xuan looked in the direction of the Boundless Sacred Ground. Moments later, he turned around and left!
He did not take any more risks!
His current strength was not enough for him to take the risk!
After Ye Xuan left, in the bamboo house in the back mountain of the Holy Land, the mysterious woman smiled, "Very smart!"
At this moment, the Holy Master arrived in front of the bamboo house and bowed slightly, "Master, that Ye Xuan just went to the Dao Sect and then came to our Holy Land. He should have left by now!"
The woman said, "Ignore him!"
The Holy Master nodded. "Understood!"
After saying that, he quietly retreated.
In the bamboo house, the woman read the ancient book, and as she read, her eyes gradually became cold.
...
Ye Xuan arrived at Xuan City. As soon as he stepped into Xuan City, a man in black suddenly appeared behind him.
Ye Xuan turned around, and the man in black threw out his right hand.
Fifteen bloody heads appeared in front of Ye Xuan.
The man in black said, "All of them are Dao Sect's Consolidation Realm experts!"
Ye Xuan looked at the black-clothed man. The black-clothed man in front of him was the one who had killed the Taoism powerhouses at the auction!
He did not expect that the other party would dare to kill Dao Sect's experts!
Moreover, he had really killed fifteen Consolidation Realm experts!
At this moment, the man in black suddenly stretched out his right hand.
Ye Xuan flicked his finger, and a scroll appeared in front of the man in black.
It was the ninth Dao Scripture!
The man in black put away the Dao Scripture and turned to leave.
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "There's another deal, do you want to do it?"
The man in black stopped, "What else do you have?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "What do you think I can give you?"
The man in black was silent.
Ye Xuan said again, "Can you really understand the ninth Dao Scripture?"
The man in black opened the scroll, and a moment later, he asked, "Can you understand it?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I've already had people study the ninth Dao Scripture thoroughly!
Do you want it? "
The man in black was silent.
Ye Xuan said again, "The Whirling Sect has had the ninth Dao Scripture for so many years, but they still have not fully understood it. Do you think you're better than the Whirling Sect?"
The man in black said, "What do you want me to do?"
Ye Xuan said, "Follow me!"
The man in black shook his head, "No!
You're too dangerous!
Following you is equivalent to risking my life!
It's not worth it! "
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "What if I give you a satisfactory price?"
The man in black looked at Ye Xuan, "What's the price?"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, then said, "Do you want to go to the Ninth Dimension?"
The Ninth Dimension!
The man in black was stunned.
Ye Xuan looked at the man in black, "I'm serious!"
The man in black said in a deep voice, "Are you really from the Ninth Dimension?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes!"
The man in black was silent for a moment, then said, "How can I believe you?"
Ye Xuan flicked his finger, and the Supreme Sword appeared in front of the man in black, "I brought this out from the Ninth Dimension, take a look!"
The man in black hesitated for a moment, then held the sword. The next moment, he suddenly looked up at Ye Xuan, "This …"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "You've never seen such a strange sword, right?"
The man in black was silent.
Ye Xuan continued, "You're now at the peak of the Consolidation Realm, do you want to reach a higher level?
For example, the Divine Realm? "
The man in black looked at Ye Xuan, "The force behind you is so strong, why do you still need me?"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, then said, "I'm the son of the Ninth Dimension, I came here to gain experience, en, like the emperor of the secular world, do you understand?"
The man in black looked at Ye Xuan, "Why do I feel like you're bluffing?"
Ye Xuan said seriously, "I'm a Swordsman!
And I'm the world's top Swordsman!
Do you think such a powerful Swordsman would lie? "
The man in black was silent.
Ye Xuan continued, "Three years, you follow me for three years, after three years, I'll help you reach the Divine Realm, if not …"
Speaking of this, he looked at the man in black, "What's your surname?"
The man in black said, "Yang!"
Ye Xuan hurriedly said, "If I can't help you reach the Divine Realm, I'll change my surname to yours!"
The man in black was speechless.
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I won't force you. If you don't want to, you can leave."
The black-clothed man shook his head. "Following you is too dangerous!"
With that, he turned to leave.
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan spoke abruptly, "You killed 15 members of the Daoist Sect. They won't let you off!"
The man in black stopped, and Ye Xuan said, "I'm about to summon the Spirit of the Great Dao. Do you really not want to witness the appearance of the Spirit of the Great Dao?
If you follow me, you will.
In order to obtain a detailed explanation of all the Dao scriptures, including the ninth volume.
If you were one of us, believe me, you wouldn't be able to understand this ninth scripture. "
The black-robed man opened the ancient scroll again. After looking at it for a moment, he disappeared.
The corners of Ye Xuan's mouth lifted slightly.
He knew that this person would come looking for him again!
Because he was absolutely unable to understand the ninth scripture!
If not for Nian Nian, even he and Ye Zhiming would not have been able to understand the ninth scripture!
Ye Xuan turned and left. He went to Xuan City and found Lan Ruo.
In a garden somewhere, two people were walking side by side.
Lan Ruo said softly, "I've underestimated you!"
Obviously, she already knew what Ye Xuan had done in the Dao Domain.
To be honest, she was also a little shocked!
Ye Xuan had instantly killed a Consolidation Realm powerhouse, and he had almost killed Dao Lao Er!
If Second Brother Dao didn't have a Dao physique, he would definitely be dead!
One had to know that Ye Xuan had a sword that specifically targeted souls. As long as he became a soul, his combat strength would drop by several levels in front of Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan looked at Lan Ruo and said with a smile, "Miss Lan Ruo, to be honest, I've come to you this time to ask for your help!"
Lan Ruo glanced at Ye Xuan and said, "Speak!"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment and said, "Are there any assassins in Xuan City?"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan and said, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan said, "The mental cultivation methods and martial arts of the Dao Realm from the first to the ninth volume of the Dao scriptures!"
Lan Ruo fell silent.
She was very tempted!
No force would not be tempted by the Dao scriptures, mental cultivation methods, and martial arts of the Dao sects.
However, she was still a little hesitant.
If she agreed to Ye Xuan's request, it would be equivalent to taking a risk with Xuan City.
As if he knew what Lan Ruo was thinking, Ye Xuan asked again, "Does the Dao sects know about these people in Xuan City?"
Lan Ruo shook her head. "They're some of Xuan City's trump cards!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "How about this? Let's say that these people were trained by the force behind me!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan and said, "It's far from enough to deal with the Dao sects!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I know!"
Lan Ruo was silent for a moment before she clapped her hands lightly. The next moment, ten shadows suddenly appeared behind Ye Xuan silently.
Ye Xuan's expression gradually turned solemn.
These ten people had appeared without any warning!
At this moment, he realized that he had underestimated these ancient forces!
The foundations of these forces were extraordinarily deep!
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan and said, "These ten people are very proficient in assassination and tracking. Now, they will listen to your orders!"
Ye Xuan opened his palm and nine scrolls appeared in his hand. He passed the scrolls to Lan Ruo and said, "Nine scrolls of Dao scriptures, mental cultivation methods, and martial arts of the Dao World!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan and said, "You're making a loss!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "We're friends. Why are we being so calculative?"
Lan Ruo hesitated for a moment before she clapped her hands lightly again. At this moment, another ten men in black appeared behind Ye Xuan!
Twenty super experts!
They were all assassins!
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan and said, "They're all yours!"
Ye Xuan said softly, "Thank you!"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "At the end of the day, you're the one who's making a loss!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Miss Lan Ruo, I'm going to do something big. So, we'll meet again!"
With that, he turned around and left with the twenty men!
Lan Ruo suddenly said, "Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan turned to look at Lan Ruo. Lan Ruo smiled and said, "We'll meet again!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Alright!"
With that, he disappeared with the twenty super assassins.
.....








Chapter 1465
Somewhere in the starry sky, Ye Xuan looked at the twenty people in front of him. These twenty people were all at the peak of the Consolidation Realm, and they were extremely good at concealment and assassination!
Twenty people was not a lot, but it would be different if there were twenty assassins!
Ye Xuan turned and looked in the direction of the Dao Domain.
He did not want to sit still and wait for death!
A moment later, Ye Xuan disappeared with the twenty people.
...
Dao Sect.
In a certain hall, Dao Brother Second sat cross-legged on the ground, his body emitting a dark green luster.
Healing!
Although Ye Xuan's sword had not killed him, it had caused considerable damage to his Dao body.
As if thinking of something, he suddenly opened his eyes, "Pass down the order, Ye Xuan already has the strength to easily kill a Consolidation Realm expert, let all Dao Sect disciples be careful."
Outside the hall, a voice sounded, "Yes!"
Inside the hall, Dao Brother Second slowly closed his eyes.
At this moment, he felt more and more uneasy.
Ye Xuan's strength was far beyond his expectations!
Now, Ye Xuan was only at the Dao Attainment Realm, but he already had the strength to hurt him. One had to know that there was a difference of two realms between him and Ye Xuan!
Not to mention the half-step Divine Realm, there was a world of difference between the Dao Attainment Realm and the Consolidation Realm!
And now, Ye Xuan could surpass two realms!
How terrifying was this?
Could this guy really be from the Ninth Dimension?
Naturally, he did not believe the nonsense that Ye Xuan said.
The Ninth Dimension?
If there really was such a place, the Dao Sect's Patriarch would have definitely mentioned it back then, but the Dao Sect's Patriarch had never mentioned this place!
Moreover, Ye Xuan loved to fool people the most, so how could he believe what he said?
At this moment, Dao Brother Fourth walked into the hall. At this moment, his physical body had already recovered.
Dao Brother Fourth said softly, "We can't delay any longer!"
Dao Brother Second was silent.
"Not long ago, Ye Xuan had a hard time killing a Dao Attainment realm cultivator, but now, he can easily kill a Consolidation realm cultivator!
His growth speed is too terrifying. If this continues, it won't be long before he can easily kill a Half-step Divine Stage expert or even a Divine Stage expert! "
The 2nd Dao Brother said, "We must deal with two people right now, the white robed woman and Situ Tingyun!"
The Fourth Elder said in a low voice, "Not only these two, but also Ye Ling and the woman in the plain dress!
Neither of them are simple. "
The Second Elder was silent. A moment later, he opened his eyes and looked at the statue in front of him with a complicated expression. "If Master was still here, who in this world would dare to bully the Taoist Faction?"
The Fourth Daoist fell silent.
Master!
When the Patriarch of the Dao Sect was still around, who dared to disrespect the Dao Sect?
Who dared to disrespect the Dao Sect?
Who in the world would dare to go against the words of the Dao Sect?
But now …
At this time, Fourth Daoist sighed in a low voice, "It's our incompetence!"
The Second Daoist said softly, "Indeed."
The Fourth Daoist said, "Because of what happened to Ye Xuan, many people have the intention to retreat. So, we can't delay any longer.
Didn't the Sacred Ground agree to let them deal with the white robed woman and Situ Tingyun?
If that's the case, then it'll be easy! "
The Second Daoist fell silent.
The Fourth Daoist asked, "Are you still worried about Ye Ling and the woman in the plain dress?"
The Second Daoist nodded, "Not just those two. I'm afraid that there are others behind him!
The strength of these people … "
The Fourth Daoist looked at the Second Daoist, "You're regretting it!"
The Second Daoist said softly, "Indeed!
My intuition tells me that we might be walking on a path of no return! "
The Fourth Daoist chuckled, "Second Senior Brother, have you ever thought about what will happen if Ye Xuan summons the Grand Dao Spirit?
When he summons the Spirit of the Great Dao, will you and I have to bow down to him? "
The Second Daoist fell silent.
The Grand Dao Spirit!
The reason why the Dao Sect still had no master was because the Dao Sect's ancestor had once said that the person who possessed the Grand Dao Spirit would be the next master of the Dao Sect.
Back then, the Dao Sect had internal strife in order to fight for the complete version of the Dao Scripture!
It was also because of the internal strife that the Dao Scripture was divided into nine parts and scattered across the heavens.
It was also because of that internal strife that the Dao Sect's strength had declined greatly.
At this moment, the Fourth Daoist suddenly said, "We have no way out!
We can only kill Ye Xuan at all costs, obtain the Dao Scripture, and then summon the Grand Dao Spirit! "
The Second Daoist nodded, "Indeed, there is no way out!"
Now that they had become enemies with Ye Xuan, it could be said that either Ye Xuan died or the Dao Sect died!
There was no other way!
They could only kill Ye Xuan!
With that thought, the Second Daoist stood up, "Gather everyone!"
The Fourth Daoist stood up and left.
Not long after, all the experts in the Dao Sect rushed toward the starry sky. In less than 15 minutes, there were more than 600 Consolidation Realm experts gathered in the starry sky of the Dao Sect!
Needless to say, this lineup was extremely terrifying!
More than 600 Consolidation Realm experts, it could be said that at least half of the Consolidation Realm experts in the world were here!
Although the Dao Sect was not as strong as it used to be, it still had the ability to rally people.
In the hall, the Second Daoist stood up and left. He came to a starry sky, and not far in front of him was the Holy Leader of the Boundless Sacred Land.
The Second Daoist looked at the Holy Leader, "If those two women appear, can the Sacred Land handle them?"
The Holy Leader smiled, "Yes!"
The Second Daoist nodded, "That's good!"
The Holy Leader suddenly said, "If we kill Ye Xuan, the Sacred Land wants a complete version of the Dao Scripture!"
The Second Daoist smiled, "No problem!"
The Holy Leader said, "Including the mental cultivation method and the Dao Scripture martial arts!"
The Second Daoist looked at the Holy Leader, "No problem!"
The Holy Leader nodded, "Go!
If those two women appear, the Sacred Land will stand up to them! "
With that, he turned and disappeared into the horizon.
In the field, the Second Daoist looked much more relaxed!
With the help of the Sacred Land, he had more confidence in killing Ye Xuan this time!
Soon, the Second Daoist and the Fourth Daoist led all the experts to the Fifth Dimension.
The two of them did not want to wait any longer!
This time, the Dao Sect really came out in full force.
Obviously, the Dao Sect wanted to fight to the death!
Not long after the Second Daoist and the others left the Dao Domain, Ye Xuan suddenly appeared in the Dao Domain.
He had been hiding in the dark for a long time, and only appeared when he saw the Second Daoist and the others leaving the Dao Domain.
He naturally would not fight with the Second Daoist and the others now!
Ye Xuan looked around. He had to say that the Dao Domain was very cold, very cold, because all the top experts of the Dao Sect had gone to the Fifth Dimension.
Ye Xuan walked down, and at this moment, an angry shout suddenly sounded from afar, "Who are you!"
Ye Xuan casually waved his sword, and a head flew hundreds of meters away.
At the same time, 20 black clothed men suddenly appeared silently in the surroundings, and it wasn't long before numerous shrill cries resounded incessantly.
Ye Xuan slowly walked to the front of a large hall, and there was a statue in front of the hall.
The statue of the Dao Sect's ancestor!
Ye Xuan glanced at the statue, and then walked toward the Dao Palace.
The Dao Palace was very cold, and there was not a single person!
Ye Xuan smiled, and he opened his palm, and the nine Dao Scriptures appeared in his hand. He glanced at the nine Dao Scriptures and said with a smile, "Let's see if you guys panic!"
With that, he slowly closed his eyes, and in front of him, the nine Dao Scriptures suddenly trembled!
Fusion!
The moment all the Dao Scriptures trembled, a mysterious aura suddenly rose from the Dao Sect, and went straight into the depths of the starry sky.
Dao Scriptures fusion!
....
On the other side, the Second Daoist and the others were rushing to the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension. At this moment, a voice sounded in his mind …
The Second Daoist frowned.
The Fourth Daoist asked, "Ye Xuan went to our Dao Domain?"
The Second Daoist nodded.
The Fourth Daoist frowned slightly. "Are we going back?"
The Second Daoist shook his head. "No, he will return to the Fifth Dimension by himself!
Because he is more anxious than us! "
The Fourth Daoist nodded.
Everyone continued forward!
Not long after, the Second Daoist stopped again, and a moment later, his pupils suddenly shrank. "He is fusing the Dao Scriptures, and he wants to summon the Great Dao Spirit back to the Dao Domain!"
With that, he directly turned and left.
The Fourth Daoist was stunned, and he immediately turned and left.
Summon the Great Dao Spirit!
Ye Xuan wants to summon the Great Dao Spirit in the Dao Domain?
Seeing the Second Daoist and the Fourth Daoist rush back, many people present were dumbfounded!
Not going to the Fifth Dimension?
A moment later, everyone hurriedly followed.
The Second Daoist and the others rushed back to the Dao Domain at their fastest speed. When they rushed back to the Dao Domain, Ye Xuan suddenly stopped.
The Second Daoist stared fixedly at Ye Xuan, and his face was terrifyingly gloomy!
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I didn't expect that you would really come back!"
The Second Daoist slowly clenched his right hand. At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly smiled and said, "Second Daoist, if you attack, I will immediately fuse the Dao Scriptures and summon the Great Dao Spirit!"
The Second Daoist narrowed his eyes slightly. "Are you threatening me?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Yes, I am!"
The Second Daoist stared fixedly at Ye Xuan, and he slowly clenched his right hand.
Summon the Great Dao Spirit!
If Ye Xuan really summoned the Great Dao Spirit, and the Great Dao Spirit helped Ye Xuan … At that time, they would be in a very awkward situation!
After all, the Patriarch of the Dao Faction had said that the person who obtained the recognition of the Great Dao Spirit would be the Master of the Dao Faction.
If Ye Xuan obtained the recognition of the Great Dao Spirit, then if he continued to kill Ye Xuan, it would be equivalent to going against the will of the Patriarch of the Dao Faction, and many people within the Dao Faction would probably rebel against him!
After all, many people in the Dao Faction respected the words of the Dao Faction's Patriarch like a god.
At this moment, the Fourth Daoist suddenly said, "Ye Xuan, fuse with it!"
The Second Daoist looked at the Fourth Daoist, and the Fourth Daoist smiled and said, "Let him fuse with it!"
The Second Daoist hesitated to speak.
Meanwhile, the Fourth Daoist sent a voice transmission to the Second Daoist, "Will the Great Dao Spirit recognize him after he fuses with it?"
The Second Daoist was stunned.
Right!
Will the Great Dao Spirit recognize Ye Xuan as its master?
Of course not!
Because after the Patriarch of the Dao Faction passed away, the Great Dao Spirit didn't submit to anyone. Otherwise, the Dao Faction wouldn't be without a leader now.
At the thought of this, the Second Daoist looked at Ye Xuan and said, "Ye Xuan, fuse with it!"
Ye Xuan fell silent, and he was slightly afraid.
Would the Great Dao Spirit do him in?
After all, the Great Dao Spirit belongs to the Dao Faction!
If it summoned a father, then it would be a pain in the ass!
....
PS: Give me a monthly ticket, and I will take you to the Ninth Dimension to play!
Those who write books never lie!








Chapter 1466
It was fusing with the Spirit of the Grand Dao!
Actually, he was quite fearful as well.
Because he still remembered what Master Qing had said. The Spirit of the Grand Dao wasn't a benevolent fellow.
He was able to discern that the Dao Sect was very fearful of the Spirit of the Grand Dao. However, if the Spirit of the Grand Dao refused to acknowledge him or even stood on the Dao Sect's side, then it would be a huge pain in the ass!
Meanwhile, Second Brother suddenly laughed coldly, "Ye Xuan, what are you waiting for?"
Ye Xuan gazed at Second Brother and smiled, "As you wish!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he suddenly pressed his palms together, and the Dao Scripture was instantly activated by his strength to fuse the nine scriptures into one!
Bang!
At the instant the nine scriptures fused into one, an invisible force surged out from Ye Xuan, and it instantly caused ripples to arise in the space around him.
The expressions of Fourth Brother and the others gradually became solemn!
The Spirit of the Grand Dao was the spirit of the Dao Scripture, and it was the existence that had followed the ancestor of the Dao Sect for the longest time. Moreover, the status of the Dao Scripture in the Dao Sect was merely inferior to the ancestor!
If the Spirit of the Grand Dao stood on Ye Xuan's side, then it would be extremely disadvantageous to the Dao Sect!
Everyone was looking at Ye Xuan.
The Dao Scripture in Ye Xuan's hand gradually emanated a ray of white light, and then it floated up into the sky.
Ye Xuan gazed at the white light in the sky, and a shadow was gradually condensing within it!
The Spirit of the Grand Dao!
Not far away, the expressions of countless experts from the Dao Sect became excited!
It was the Spirit of the Grand Dao!
After the ancestor of the Dao Sect left, the Spirit of the Grand Dao had become the symbol of the Dao Sect. Unfortunately, internal strife had caused the Dao Scripture to be split into nine, and the Spirit of the Grand Dao had fallen into deep slumber.
Yet now, the Spirit of the Grand Dao was finally about to appear!
Right at this moment, the Dao Scripture in front of Ye Xuan suddenly started burning!
Ye Xuan was stunned!
Everyone in the surroundings was stunned!
What's going on?
Ye Xuan grabbed at the burning Dao Scripture with his right hand. However, a powerful force sent him flying thousands of feet away!
Ye Xuan was shocked. He looked at the Dao Scripture again. At this time, the complete Dao Scripture directly transformed into a flame and disappeared into the end of the starry sky!
Gone!
Everyone in the surroundings was stunned.
That's it?
Fourth Dao Brother and Second Dao Brother looked at each other with a trace of doubt in their eyes!
What was going on?
Ye Xuan was also a little confused at this moment!
That's it?
Where was the Spirit of the Great Dao?
As if he had thought of something, he looked at the Dao Second Brother in the distance. In the next moment, he turned and ran!
His speed was very fast. In the blink of an eye, he disappeared into the horizon of the starry sky!
Seeing that Ye Xuan was running away, Second Elder Dao said fiercely, "Chase him!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he was the first to rush out.
At this moment, he had no time to care about the Dao Scripture. The most important thing was to deal with Ye Xuan first.
In the starry sky, Ye Xuan ran all the way. Behind him, there were nearly seven hundred Consolidation Realm experts!
This time, the Dao Sect was really going to risk their lives with him!
At this moment, Second Dao Brother suddenly stopped. He looked at the sword light at the end of the starry sky in the distance. "Let's go to the Fifth Dimension!"
After saying that, he turned and left.
Chasing after Ye Xuan like this was too much of a waste of time!
If they went directly to the Fifth Dimension, Ye Xuan would definitely return to the Fifth Dimension!
Soon, Second Dao Brother and the others went straight to the Fifth Dimension!
In the distant starry sky, Ye Xuan stopped. He looked in the direction where Second Dao Brother and the others left. It was the direction of the Fifth Dimension.
Ye Xuan opened his palm, and a voice transmission talisman suddenly disappeared. After a moment, the space in front of him gradually trembled, and a voice came out.
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan turned and disappeared into the distance.
...
In the Fifth Dimension.
Inside the Sword Hall.
Knowing Destiny sat cross-legged on the ground. In front of her, there were nine scrolls. They were the nine scrolls of the Dao Scripture!
However, these nine scrolls were all copied and not the real thing.
In front of Ye Zhiming was Nian Nian.
Nian Nian held a fish in her left hand and a stick of tanghulu in her right. She would occasionally lick the fish, and then the tanghulu …
At this moment, Ye Zhiming suddenly looked at Nian Nian. "Nian Nian!"
Nian Nian looked at Ye Zhiming. "Sister Zhiming, what's wrong?"
Ye Zhiming smiled. "Nian Nian, tell me honestly. Have you recovered your memories?"
Nian Nian blinked. "Recovered my memories?"
Ye Zhiming nodded.
Nian Nian shook her head. "No!
I can't remember a lot of things! "
Ye Zhiming was silent.
Nian Nian didn't look like she was lying!
However, her intuition told her that Nian Nian was becoming more and more different.
At this moment, Nian Nian suddenly raised her head. The next moment, she looked at Ye Zhiming and smiled. "Sister Zhiming, I'm going to play!"
After saying that, she got up and left.
In the hall, Ye Zhiming frowned. She chased after her, but Nian Nian was already gone!
Gone!
Ye Zhiming was stunned.
...
In the sky above Dao City, a woman in a dark green dress stood quietly in the clouds. Behind her was the Holy Leader!
At this moment, the woman suddenly turned her head. Not far away, the clouds parted and a woman slowly walked over!
It was Nian Nian!
The woman looked at Nian Nian and smiled.
Nian Nian walked to the woman's side. Neither of them said a word and just stood there quietly.
At this moment, at the end of the starry sky, a powerful aura swept over!
The experts of the Dao Sect had arrived!
Nian Nian licked the candied hawthorn but still did not say a word.
The woman glanced at the candied hawthorn in Nian Nian's hand and smiled. "Candied hawthorn … There's a little white guy who especially likes to eat candied hawthorn. There's also that little girl. Both of them really like to eat candied hawthorn!"
Nian Nian continued to lick the candied hawthorn without saying a word.
The woman smiled. "Are you afraid that I'll attack, so you came to watch me?"
Nian Nian glanced at the woman. "Do you dare to attack?"
The woman shook her head. "I don't dare."
As she said that, she looked at Nian Nian and smiled. "You don't dare either!"
Nian Nian shrugged and continued to lick the candied hawthorn.
The woman did not say anything else. She looked into the distance. At this moment, Second Brother Dao and the others had already entered the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension.
It had to be said that the difference in strength between the Fifth Dimension and the Dao Sect was huge!
Below Dao City, Bai Dizi looked at Second Brother Dao and the others in the sky with a calm expression.
He had already expected this day!
Behind him were Li Shanshui and the others.
They were all super experts from the Whirling World!
Li Shanshui looked at Second Brother Dao and the others in the sky with a calm expression. In fact, he was not panicking at all.
Why?
Those who had not come into contact with the white-robed woman would not know how terrifying she was!
Back then, didn't the Xuanhuan Sect think that they could defeat Ye Xuan just like the current Dao Sect?
But in the end?
Not only was Li Shanshui not panicking, but the experts from the Whirling World were also very calm.
In fact, they were a little uneasy at the beginning because there were too many experts!
But as long as they thought of the two women, they would calm down.
Those were two immortals!
In the sky.
Second Brother Dao looked down. Compared to the Dao Sect, the strength of the Fifth Dimension was indeed very weak, but he did not dare to underestimate them.
At this moment, a man suddenly appeared not far in front of Second Brother Dao and the others.
The person who had come was Ye Xuan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Bai Dizi's expression relaxed slightly. He was not afraid that Ye Xuan would run away, but mainly because he felt more at ease with this guy here.
Second Brother Dao looked at Ye Xuan. "Ye Xuan, where are your people?"
Ye Xuan smiled. He did not answer Second Brother Dao, but turned to look at the Consolidation Realm experts in the field. "Everyone, I know that many of you are not from the Dao Sect, but because you want to get some benefits, you came to kill me, Ye Xuan!
I have no grievances with any of you. If you leave now, nothing will happen to me. "
In the field, the Consolidation Realm experts looked at Ye Xuan without saying a word, and no one left.
Now that the Dao Sect had an overwhelming advantage, and the benefits were at their fingertips, why would they leave?
Seeing that no one left, Ye Xuan smiled, then looked at Second Brother Dao. "Second Brother, do you want to fight one-on-one?"
Second Brother!
The expressions of everyone in the field became a little strange!
Second Brother Dao looked at Ye Xuan. "Ye Xuan, I will not give you any chance!
Since your people will not appear, then you and your Fifth Dimension will die together! "
As his voice fell, he suddenly said, "Attack!"
As soon as the words fell, more than twenty shadows suddenly rushed straight down from the sky.
All of them were experts at the peak of the Consolidation Realm, and their auras were infinitely close to the half-step Divine Realm!
Dao Guards!
These were twenty people carefully cultivated by the Dao Sect, and their strength far exceeded that of ordinary Consolidation Realm experts!
The target of these twenty people was Ye Xuan!
Fourth Brother Dao and Second Brother Dao did not make a move. They were waiting to fight whoever saved Ye Xuan!
Below, Ye Xuan's expression was calm. At this moment, Li Shanshui suddenly appeared in front of Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan looked at Li Shanshui, and Li Shanshui smiled awkwardly. "Young Master Ye, let my Xuanhuan Sect perform!"
Ye Xuan asked, "Are you sure?"
Li Shanshui said seriously, "Of course!"
Ye Xuan nodded and made an inviting gesture.
Li Shanshui raised his head and looked at the twenty people rushing down with a calm expression. He opened his palm, and a black wooden seal suddenly flew out from his palm. "Ancestor Summon!"
Ancestor Summon!
On the side, Ye Xuan's expression became a little strange!
In the past, it was others who summoned their ancestor to beat him, but this was the first time someone summoned their ancestor to protect him …
In fact, Li Shanshui's heart was also a little complicated.
This could be said to be the Xuanhuan Sect's last life-saving trump card. Previously, he wanted to use it on the white-robed woman, but he was not sure at that time. After seeing the miserable state of the Xuanhuan Sect after summoning their ancestor, he was even more glad that he did not summon their ancestor.
The reason why he summoned their ancestor now was to show off. Otherwise, the Xuanhuan Sect would not have a sense of existence in the Fifth Dimension.
As Li Shanshui's voice fell, a black light suddenly shot up from the black wooden seal into the sky.
Boom!
A powerful aura directly forced the twenty people from the Dao Sect to stop in place. Then, a middle-aged man in a black robe appeared in the sky.
The Xuanhuan Sect's Patriarch!
Seeing the Xuanhuan Sect's Patriarch, Second Brother Dao frowned!
It was just a split soul!
However, this middle-aged man was once an expert at the peak of the God State!
At this moment, the current patriarch of the Xiao Clan, Xiao Kuo, suddenly roared, "Ancestor Summon!"
As his voice fell, he directly threw out a black chess piece, which turned into a black light and shot into the sky …
At the same time, the current dean of the Dao Returning Courtyard, Qiu Min, suddenly said, "Ancestor, please …"
As his voice fell, a white light shot up into the sky …
On the other side, Xuanji Sect's Sect Master Gu Wuchao was a little embarrassed.
In the past, the Xuanji Sect had already summoned their ancestor once. Now, they could not summon it!
What should they do?
They could not lose face!
They had to put in some effort, right?
Gu Wuchao seemed to have thought of something. He suddenly pointed at Second Brother Dao and roared, "Second Brother Dao, I'll screw your ancestor!"
Everyone: "…"
.....








Chapter 1467
Hearing Gu Wuchao's words, the corners of Ye Xuan's mouth twitched.
This guy was actually cursing!
In the field, some experts also looked at Gu Wuchao with strange expressions.
After all, this guy was still a Consolidation Realm expert!
How could he curse like this …
At this moment, Gu Wuchao suddenly walked to Ye Xuan's side, bowed slightly, and then respectfully retreated behind Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan: "…"
In the field, everyone looked at Ye Xuan.
Obviously, this was Ye Xuan's instigation!
In the sky, the Second Dao Master's gaze also fell on Ye Xuan. "Ye Xuan, you don't have the demeanor of an expert at all!"
Ye Xuan turned his head and glanced at Gu Wuchao. Gu Wuchao smiled awkwardly. "I live and die with the Five-Dimensional Universe!"
Ye Xuan was speechless. He looked up at the sky. At this time, there were three super experts in the sky. They were the black-robed middle-aged man from the Xuanao Sect, the ancestor of the Xiao Clan, and the ancestor of the Dao Returning Academy.
The ancestor of the Xiao Clan was an old man in a gray robe. His eyes were like knives, giving off a strong sense of oppression.
The ancestor of the Dao Returning Academy wore a brown robe. His long hair draped over his shoulders, and he held a black ancient book in his hand.
The ancestors of three super forces!
When the three appeared, the expressions of the Second Dao Master and the others gradually became solemn!
The Whirling World was not a low-level world. In this world, there were also many amazing experts!
Just these three people in front of them were at least in the God Realm, and they were definitely not ordinary God Realm experts. They were even above the God Realm.
Although this kind of existence could not compare to the ancestor of the Dao Sect, this kind of existence belonged to the top of this world.
They could not be underestimated!
In the sky, the Xuanao Sect's ancestor looked around. Finally, he looked at the Sect Master of the Xuanao Sect, Li Shanshui. Li Shanshui hurriedly bowed respectfully.
The Xuanao Sect's ancestor said, "This is not the Whirling World!"
Li Shanshui said respectfully, "Ancestor, the Xuanao Sect will advance and retreat with Young Master Ye!"
Advance and retreat together!
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect looked at Ye Xuan. "Him?"
Li Shanshui quickly nodded.
The gazes of the Desolate Clan's Ancestor and the Dao Returnance Courtyard's Ancestor descended onto Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan cupped his fists at the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect.
The Old Ancestor of the Xuanao Sect looked at Ye Xuan. Gradually, a hint of surprise flashed through his eyes. "Your bloodline …"
Ye Xuan opened his palm, and the blood in his body began to tremble.
When the power of Ye Xuan's bloodline emerged, the surprise in the eyes of the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect gradually turned into shock!
On the other side, the Patriarch of the Xiao Clan and the Patriarch of the Dao Returning Academy were also shocked!
The same was true for the surrounding Consolidation Realm experts!
In fact, Ye Xuan's bloodline power had always been growing. His current bloodline power was many times stronger than before.
As for why it kept growing, Ye Xuan was not particularly clear. According to his guess, it might have something to do with madness.
The crazier one was, the stronger the bloodline power!
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect looked at Ye Xuan. "He's indeed not simple!"
As he spoke, he looked at Li Shanshui. "You bet the future of the Xuanxuan Sect on him?"
Li Shanshui nodded.
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect asked, "No regrets?"
Li Shanshui shook his head. "No regrets!"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect nodded slightly. Just as he was about to speak, the Second Brother suddenly said, "Sir, we are from the Dao Sect!"
The Dao Sect!
Hearing this, the Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect looked at the Second Brother and said with a smile, "Dao Sect!
Are you threatening me? "
The Second Brother was expressionless. "I just want to remind you that this matter has nothing to do with the Xuanxuan Sect. Why do you want your descendants to be involved in this struggle?
If you let your descendants leave now, the Dao Sect will let bygones be bygones! "
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect shook his head and smiled. "May I ask, are you in charge of the Dao Sect now?"
The Second Brother said, "Yes!"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect shook his head. "The Dao Sect's Patriarch is also a senior I respect, but why is the disciple he chose so stupid?"
The Second Brother looked at the Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect with a calm expression. "It seems that you are determined to make the Xuanxuan Sect an enemy of the Dao Sect!"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect said with a smile, "Just now, my descendant told me that this Young Master Ye has gathered all nine Dao Scriptures, so your Dao Sect wants to kill him, right?"
The Second Brother said calmly, "So what?"
"Idiot!"
The smile on the Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect's face disappeared. "I can tell at a glance that you are an idiot, but I didn't expect you to be this stupid!"
Everyone was speechless.
The Second Brother narrowed his eyes and slowly clenched his right hand.
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect said, "What kind of person is the Dao Sect's Patriarch?
He left behind the Dao Scriptures, but the Great Dao Spirit doesn't recognize you as its master. Have you ever thought about why?
And these nine Dao Scriptures have fallen into the hands of this Young Master Ye. Have you ever thought about why? "
The Second Brother was silent.
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect continued, "This Young Master Ye has the legendary Cause of Misfortune, but he is able to live until now. What does this prove?
It proves that someone is forcibly resisting the Cause of Misfortune for him!
In my opinion, someone who can do this will not lose to your Dao Sect's Patriarch!
And your Dao Sect's nine Dao Scriptures have fallen into the hands of Young Master Ye. Don't you think this may also be an arrangement of your Dao Sect's Patriarch? "
The Second Brother said in a deep voice, "Absolutely impossible!
Master will never choose him! "
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect chuckled. "Could he have chosen you?"
The Second Brother stared at the Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect. "Master will never choose him!"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect smiled. "Second Brother, you are the disciple of the Dao Sect's Patriarch. Why are you so bad?
Look at you now. There is only hatred in your eyes and no reason. You have cultivated to this level. Logically speaking, your temperament should not be bad, but why are you blinded by hatred now? "
The Second Brother was expressionless. "Are you teaching me how to be a person?"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect laughed. "Teach you how to be a person?
Second Brother, to say that you are stupid is an insult to the word 'stupid'.
The reason why I'm talking so much nonsense with you is that what I learned is also derived from the Dao Scriptures. The Dao Sect's Patriarch is someone I respect. I don't want the Dao Sect he established to be destroyed by you!
I just didn't expect your temperament to be so bad.
A person like you leading the Dao Sect is not only the sorrow of the Dao Sect, but also the sorrow of the Dao Sect's Patriarch! "
At this moment, the Fourth Brother of the Dao Sect suddenly laughed. "The reason why you said this is because you think our Dao Sect is inferior to Young Master Ye, right?"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect looked at the Fourth Brother of the Dao Sect and said with a smile, "It seems that you still don't understand what the Cause of Misfortune is … No, I should say that you have become arrogant!
However, it's very sad that you don't have the strength to be arrogant, but you think you have the strength. Why?
Because you think you are the disciples of the Dao Sect's Patriarch, but you have never thought that the reason why the Dao Sect is strong is not because of you, but because of the Dao Sect's Patriarch!
There is a difference between a Dao Sect with the Dao Sect's Patriarch and a Dao Sect without him. Understand? "
The Fourth Taoist smiled and said, "I would like to know if your strength is as sharp as your mouth!"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect roared with laughter, and then he suddenly vanished on the spot.
In the distance, the Fourth Brother's expression changed abruptly, and he suddenly smashed his fist forward!
Rumble!
Along with a shocking explosion, the Fourth Brother of the Dao Sect retreated explosively, and he retreated thousands of meters into the starry sky!
The expressions of everyone here changed!
He's so strong?
Ye Xuan was quite shocked as well. Even though the Patriarch of the Dao Sect was only a wisp of his soul, he was actually so strong!
In the distance, the Second Brother of the Dao Sect stared fixedly at the Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect, and he was quite shocked as well. A wisp of the soul of a Godrank Realm expert was actually so strong!
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect gazed at the Fourth Brother in the distance and said with a smile, "Looks like it's always the fist that's stronger in any era!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he vanished on the spot once more.
The pupils of the Fourth Brother of the Dao Sect suddenly constricted, and he swiftly raised his arms.
A fist seal arrived.
Bang!
The Fourth Brother of the Dao Sect was instantly blasted away, and he flew for thousands of meters. Not only that, but his body even split apart!
His current body wasn't a Dao Physique any longer because his Dao Physique had been shattered by Ye Ling. So, his current body was extremely weak!
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect gazed at the Fourth Brother of the Dao Sect and said with a smile, "I've noticed that you can't reason with some people because if you do, they'll look at you like an idiot!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he vanished on the spot once more!
Right at this moment, the Second Brother of the Dao Sect suddenly vanished on the spot!
Rumble!
The space in the sky suddenly collapsed, and then a figure retreated explosively for over 1km!
It was the Second Brother of the Dao Sect!
After he stopped moving, he gazed at the Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect, "From today onward, the Xuanxuan Sect will cease to exist in this world!"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect roared with laughter, "A little Second Brother of the Dao Sect is laughable!
You're being used as a pawn by others, yet you don't even realize it. How laughable! "
The Second Brother frowned slightly, "What do you mean?"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect blinked, "I'm not telling you!
You idiot!
Haha … "
After saying that, he turned to look at Ye Xuan below, "Young Master Ye, I've sent a wisp of my soul to help you today. I hope that Young Master Ye will treat the Xuanxuan Sect well in the future. The Xuanxuan Sect doesn't seek to be invincible in the world, but to be passed down from generation to generation."
Ye Xuan bowed slightly, "I, Ye Xuan, will forever remember the kindness of the Xuanxuan Sect!"
The Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect smiled and said, "With Young Master Ye's words, I'm relieved!"
After saying that, he glanced at the clouds somewhere. "Young Master Ye, remember, not all of your enemies are as stupid as this Second Brother."
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned and rushed toward the Second Brother of the Dao Sect.
Seeing the Patriarch of the Xuanxuan Sect rushing over, the Second Brother's face became ferocious, "Kill!
If Ye Xuan is destroyed today, you can take anything in the Fifth Dimension and the Whirling World! "
After saying that, he rushed over.
The rest of the Consolidation Realm experts from the Dao Sects also rushed over!
However, some of the Consolidation Realm experts who did not belong to the Dao Sects were a little hesitant … But there were also some who directly rushed over.
Below, the Ancestor of the Xiao clan and the Ancestor of the Dao Returning Academy looked at each other. The Ancestor of the Xiao clan turned to look at Ye Xuan, "What do you think?"
The Ancestor of the Dao Returning Academy smiled and said, "I was hesitating just now. After all, it's the Dao Sects, but now it seems … the person in charge of the Dao Sects is too stupid!
If we help this kind of person, I'm afraid our Dao Returning Academy will be doomed.
So, let's choose this Young Master Ye! "
After saying that, he rushed out.
The Ancestor of the Xiao clan smiled and said, "Why did the Dao Sects choose such an idiot to be in charge?
This IQ is worse than the pigs I raised back then! "
After saying that, he also rushed out.
On the other side, in the clouds, the mysterious woman beside Nian Nian smiled and said, "The Sect Master of the Xuanxuan Sect has discovered us!
Interesting! "
Nian Nian licked the tanghulu and did not speak.
The mysterious woman looked at Nian Nian, "Do you want to kill me?"
Nian Nian nodded.
The mysterious woman gently stroked the hair beside her ear with her jade-like hand and the corners of her mouth curled up slightly, "No one can kill me under three strikes!"
Nian Nian licked the tanghulu. "Can you take one strike from the plain-dressed woman?"
The mysterious woman's smile gradually disappeared. After a moment, she looked at Nian Nian, "If you continue to chat like this, I won't be chatting with you anymore!"
....
PS: After I update the first chapter, I will be disconnected from the Internet when I update the second chapter …








Chapter 1468
In the sky above Dao City, a great battle had begun!
Although the Fifth Dimension was at an absolute disadvantage in terms of numbers, with the addition of the Xuan Yao Sect's Patriarch, the Xiao Clan's Patriarch, and the Dao Return Courtyard's Patriarch, the situation was instantly different!
The Xuan Yao Sect's Patriarch was holding off Dao Lao Er and Dao Lao Si by himself, while the Xiao Clan's Patriarch and the Dao Return Courtyard's Patriarch were directly suppressing nearly two hundred Consolidation Realm experts. Although it was only a wisp of their soul, the difference between these Consolidation Realm experts and them was too great!
However, as they made their moves, their wisps of soul became more and more illusory!
Below, Bai Dizi suddenly said, "Make your move!"
As his voice fell, all the Consolidation Realm experts of the Fifth Dimension soared into the sky. As the experts of the Fifth Dimension made their move, twenty black-clothed men suddenly rushed into the crowd of Dao Sect experts. Then, bloody heads flew into the sky.
Assassins!
These twenty people were the twenty super assassins that Ye Xuan had borrowed from Xuan City!
Ye Xuan did not make a move. His eyes were fixed on Dao Lao Er.
At this time, Dao Lao Er and Dao Lao Si were being suppressed by the Xuan Yao Sect's Patriarch!
Dao Lao Er did not focus all his energy on the Xuan Yao Sect's Patriarch. He had been guarding against Ye Xuan!
He had not forgotten Ye Xuan's sword!
That sword had almost killed him in an instant!
Therefore, until now, he had been distracted by guarding against Ye Xuan to ensure that when Ye Xuan made his move, he would be the first to react!
However, Ye Xuan did not make a move. Instead, he just looked at him, which put a great deal of pressure on him!
At this time, Ye Xuan suddenly laughed. "Second Brother, I'm going to make my move!"
He was going to make his move!
Dao Lao Er, who was fighting with the Xuan Yao Sect's Patriarch, suddenly changed his expression. He glanced at Ye Xuan, who was looking at him with a smile.
Dao Lao Er did not dare to be too distracted. He withdrew his gaze because the Xuan Yao Sect's Patriarch in front of him was very powerful.
Just as Second Brother Dao withdrew his gaze, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Second Brother Dao, I'm really going to make a move!"
Second Elder Dao suddenly turned his head to look at Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan blinked and said, "Don't worry, I'm about to make my move!"
"Ye Xuan!" the second Daoist said fiercely.
Ye Xuan grinned. "Come and hit me!"
Just as the Second Elder was about to speak, a shadow suddenly rushed in front of him.
Second Elder Dao's pupils suddenly shrank, and his arms suddenly moved forward to block.
Boom!
The Second Daoist was sent flying thousands of feet away!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly disappeared. Sensing this, the Second Elder's pupils suddenly shrank. He waved his right hand, and a black round shield appeared in front of him. This black round shield was specially kept for Ye Xuan!
However, he quickly noticed that the target of Ye Xuan's attack wasn't him!
It was Fourth Elder Dao!
When he noticed this, Second Elder Dao suddenly turned his head to look at Fourth Elder Dao, who was not far away. His eyes almost popped out of their sockets. "Little …"
Before his voice died away —
Swoosh!
A ray of sword light suddenly pierced through Fourth Elder Dao's eyebrows!
Without his Taoist Body, Fourth Elder Dao's eyebrows were directly pierced by Ye Xuan's sword. Fourth Elder Dao's body froze in the air. His eyes were wide open and full of disbelief!
He didn't expect that Ye Xuan's target wasn't Fourth Elder Dao, but him. Of course, he didn't expect that the sword would be so fast that he didn't even have time to react!
In front of Fourth Elder Dao, Ye Xuan held the sword in his right hand and pulled it out little by little. Between Fourth Elder Dao's eyebrows, blood spurted out.
Second Elder Dao stared at Ye Xuan. He was about to make a move when the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect appeared in front of him again. Second Elder Dao suddenly turned his head and said fiercely, "Get lost!"
As soon as his voice fell, he suddenly …
He punched out!
Taoist Fist!
A punch with all his strength!
Rumble!
The surrounding starry sky trembled violently. Second Elder Dao retreated hundreds of feet, and the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect also retreated hundreds of feet. After stopping, he didn't make another move because his soul was already very transparent and was about to disappear!
Seeing this, Second Elder Dao was about to take the initiative to attack, but at this time, Ye Xuan suddenly appeared in front of the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect. Second Elder Dao narrowed his eyes and turned to look in the direction of Fourth Elder Dao. At this moment, Fourth Elder Dao's soul had been absorbed by Ye Xuan's sword, leaving only his physical body.
His soul had been destroyed!
Seeing this, Second Elder Dao's face became extremely ferocious. He turned to look at Ye Xuan and said, "Ye Xuan, my Taoist Sect is absolutely irreconcilable with you!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Don't you think it's stupid to say that now?"
Behind Ye Xuan, the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect suddenly said, "Young Friend, this strand of my soul is about to vanish!"
Ye Xuan turned to look at the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect, cupped his fists, and said, "I, Ye Xuan, will remember Senior's help!"
The Patriarch of Xuanao Sect smiled and said, "Just take care of my Xuanao Sect!"
Ye Xuan nodded and said, "Of course!"
The Patriarch of Xuanao Sect turned to look at the clouds again, and then his body gradually became illusory.
Ye Xuan glanced in the direction the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect was looking, but he couldn't see anything!
Ye Xuan thought for a moment and said, "Senior, did you see something?"
The Patriarch of Xuanao Sect was about to speak when he suddenly vanished without a trace!
Ye Xuan's eyes instantly narrowed when he saw this!
Someone had forcefully wiped out the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect!
Who was it?
Ye Xuan turned to look at the clouds, but there was nothing there!
There were actually two women standing above the clouds, but Ye Xuan couldn't see them!
At this moment, Nian Nian suddenly said, "There should be a backup plan."
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "Of course!"
Nian Nian nodded. "I'm looking forward to it!"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "I'm looking forward to it as well!"
In the distance, Ye Xuan retracted his gaze and turned to look around. The Xiao clan's Patriarch and the Dao Returning Monastery's Patriarch were still there. With the two of them working together, they had killed more than fifty Consolidation Realm experts!
Their strength was slightly inferior to the Patriarch of Xuanao Sect!
At this moment, their strands of soul were becoming more and more illusory!
At the sight of this, Ye Xuan knew he could not delay any longer!
Ye Xuan opened his palm, and the Supreme Sword appeared in his hand. In the next moment, he vanished on the spot.
In the distance, the Second Elder's eyes narrowed slightly as he blasted a punch forward!
Bang!
A wisp of sword light was forced to a stop!
In front of the Second Elder, Ye Xuan stomped his right foot, and the Dao Sword in his hand suddenly turned into a technological form. In the next moment, his strength increased explosively!
Rumble!
The Second Elder was knocked back hundreds of feet!
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan didn't attack the Second Elder again. Instead, he turned into a sword light and disappeared into the distance.
Chi!
In the distant crowd, the head of a Dao Sect Consolidation Realm expert flew into the air.
Instant Kill Sword!
Ordinary Consolidation Realm experts had no way of resisting Ye Xuan's Instant Kill Sword!
Massacre!
When Ye Xuan entered the crowd, it was simply a massacre!
Seeing this scene, the Second Elder's expression turned extremely ugly. He was just about to make a move when Ye Xuan suddenly turned around and slashed at him!
The Second Elder didn't dodge and directly punched out!
Dao Fist!
As for Ye Xuan's sword, it was a Dao Sword!
Boom!
With a loud explosion, the two of them retreated rapidly. Ye Xuan retreated a hundred feet, and the Second Elder also retreated nearly a hundred feet!
The two of them were evenly matched!
When Ye Xuan had stopped, he raised his hand and brandished his sword at the right side.
Instant Kill Sword!
Chi!
A hundred feet to the right, the head of a Consolidation Realm expert flew into the air!
Instant kill!
In the field, the Consolidation Realm experts who came to help the Dao Sect were finally afraid!
Because up until now, more than two hundred Consolidation Realm experts had died on the battlefield!
Most of them were killed by the Xiao Clan's Patriarch and the Dao Returning Academy's Patriarch, and some were killed by the twenty super assassins from Xuan City!
As for the elites of the Dao Sect, they had always been restrained by the Dao Returning Academy's Patriarch!
In fact, without these three Patriarchs, the situation in the Fifth Dimension would have become very bad!
These three people were equivalent to hundreds of Consolidation Realm experts!
After all, they were once all-powerful figures. As long as they did not encounter experts like the white-robed woman, even their split souls were not something ordinary people could fight against.
Now, Ye Xuan was also anxious. Because once the Xiao Clan's Patriarch and the Dao Returning Academy's Patriarch disappeared, the situation in the Fifth Dimension would be very disadvantageous.
Therefore, he had to end the battle while the two of them were still around!
The Second Elder also understood this, and what he had to do was to stall them. As long as he could stall until the Xiao Clan's Patriarch and the Dao Returning Academy's Patriarch disappeared, the situation would be reversed!
The Dao Sect still had a chance to win!
At this moment, Ye Xuan looked at the Xiao Clan's Patriarch in the distance. "Senior, can you help me stall the Second Elder?"
In the distance, the Xiao Clan's Patriarch stopped and turned to look at the Second Elder. "Fifteen minutes!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "That's enough!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he disappeared on the spot.
In the distance, the Second Elder was about to attack when the Xiao Clan's Patriarch appeared in front of him. The Second Elder said in a deep voice, "Sir, aren't you afraid that the Xiao Clan will be doomed?"
The Xiao Clan's Patriarch shook his head and smiled. "You're still threatening me now!
You're too stupid! "
After saying that, he disappeared on the spot!
In the distance, the Second Elder threw a punch.
Boom!
The surrounding space shook as if there was an earthquake!
The Xiao Clan's Patriarch was pushed back by the punch. After stopping, the Xiao Clan's Patriarch shook his head. "It's just a split soul after all!"
After saying that, he rushed out.
Fifteen minutes!
He only needed to buy fifteen minutes for Ye Xuan!
After Ye Xuan rushed into the group of people in the distance, rays of sword gleams appeared, and each sword gleam took a life!
Instant Kill!
In addition to his Dao Body, ordinary Consolidation Realm experts would not be able to cause fatal damage to him.
In a short while, Ye Xuan had killed more than ten Consolidation Realm experts. Seeing this, some of the Consolidation Realm experts who came to help the Dao Sect chose to retreat.
They were here to make a fortune, not to risk their lives!
Especially now that the Dao Sect was at a disadvantage!
As those people left, the Dao Sect's situation became worse and worse.
At this moment, Nian Nian, who was in the clouds, suddenly raised her head and looked at the sky. In the next moment, she looked at Ye Xuan's position. There, an afterimage silently appeared.
Ye Xuan suddenly turned around and slashed with his sword!
Boom!
The sword gleam shattered, and Ye Xuan retreated thousands of meters away!
The afterimage waved its right hand, and the split souls of the Xiao Clan's Patriarch and the Dao Returning Courtyard's Patriarch were directly wiped out!
The scene became silent!
.....








Chapter 1469
Everyone was looking at the afterimage, which was gradually becoming more and more solid.
It was a woman in white, holding a jade flute in her hand.
Seeing this woman, Ye Xuan's expression gradually became serious!
His opponent's attack just now had directly shattered his Dao Body!
A Godly State expert!
A true Godly State expert!
In the distance, the Dao Sect experts became excited!
Dao Sect's Third Brother!
Third Miss!
She was once the Dao Sect's Patriarch's proudest disciple. She only liked to cultivate and hunt for novelty, never getting involved in the internal affairs of the Dao Sect!
Back then, she was actually the most likely to become the Dao Sect's leader because she was the Dao Sect's Patriarch's proudest disciple. Most importantly, she was the most talented among the four disciples.
Unfortunately, after the Dao Sect's Patriarch disappeared, she only came back to take a look before leaving. Once she left, she never returned!
Seeing Third Miss, Second Brother also heaved a huge sigh of relief!
She finally came back!
If she didn't come back, even if the Dao Sect won today, it would be a pyrrhic victory!
Moreover, the Dao Sect was very likely to lose!
Because if no one restrained Ye Xuan, with Ye Xuan's strength, he would probably be able to destroy all the Dao Sect's Consolidation Realm experts!
Second Brother walked to Third Miss and stared at Ye Xuan, "Third Junior Sister, I'll hold Ye Xuan back. Leave the rest to me!"
Saying that, he was about to make a move. At this moment, Third Miss suddenly said, "Second Senior Brother, I'm very disappointed!"
Second Brother looked at Third Miss and Third Miss shook her head, "Very disappointed!"
Second Brother said in a deep voice, "What do you mean!"
Third Miss did not answer Second Brother. She turned to look at the Dao Sect experts, "You guys also disappointed me!"
Everyone was silent.
Third Miss looked at Second Brother, "Do you think the Dao Sect can win today?"
Second Brother said in a deep voice, "If Junior Sister is willing to help, can we lose?"
Third Miss shook her head, "Second Senior Brother, you need to calm down. Calm down!"
Second Brother narrowed his eyes, "What do you mean?"
Third Miss looked at Second Brother, "As far as I know, you should have investigated Ye Xuan!
Then you should know that he is someone who has the cause of disaster, right? "
Second Brother said in a deep voice, "Yes!
But so what? "
The Third Young Lady frowned. "So what?
Ask yourself, can you resist this Cause of Disaster? "
The Second Daoist was silent.
The Third Young Lady continued, "Let's not talk about the cause of this disaster. Let's talk about this person's bloodline. Have you ever seen such a powerful bloodline?"
The Second Daoist was silent.
The third young lady continued, "The most important thing is that the white-robed woman has seen the person behind this person before. Let me ask, when the white-robed woman was in the Whirling Sect, she summoned the Xuanji Sect's ancestor, but what was the result?
In the end, the Profound Secrets Sect submitted to Ye Xuan.
Yet, he was injured by a wisp of the Xuanhuan Sect's ancestor's soul. Tell me, can he be compared to her? "
The Second Elder was silent, and his face was gloomy.
The Third Young Lady shook her head. "When Master was still alive, Dao Sect was the number one power in the world. However, Master often said that there is always someone better than you. No one is truly invincible. There is no strongest, only stronger!
Second Senior Brother didn't remember what he said at all! "
The Second Daoist spoke fiercely, "It's impossible for there to be a power stronger than my Dao Sect in this world!"
The Third Young Lady sighed in a low voice. "The reason why the Dao Sect is strong isn't because of us, it's because of Master!
But now, Master is gone!
Understand? "
The Second Daoist was slightly mad. He pointed angrily at Ye Xuan and said, "He's a true expert at the peak of the Godrank Realm. So long as he attacks, then Ye Xuan will definitely die today!
Why didn't he attack!? "
The Third Young Lady gazed at the Second Daoist. After a short moment, she shook her head.
"I gave him the opportunity, but I didn't cherish it!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she opened her palm, and an ink colored ruler suddenly appeared in her hand.
The Daoist Ruler!
The expressions of the experts from the Dao Sect instantly changed when they saw it!
It was a sacred artifact of the Dao Sect that was only inferior to the Dao Scriptures. It was used by the Dao Sect's ancestor to discipline his disciples, and it contained the Dao Laws that the Dao Sect's ancestor had personally set up within it.
The Second Daoist's expression changed as well, and he took a few steps back. All those years ago, he'd been struck by the Daoist Ruler, and it was already traumatized by it!
The Third Young Lady suddenly waved her right hand, and a ruler image flew out ….
Bang!
The Second Daoist was struck by the ruler image, and his skin and flesh split open while blood sprayed!
His invincible Dao Physique was as weak as paper before the Daoist Ruler!
Moreover, a mysterious force had directly restrained the Second Daoist, causing him to be unable to move at all!
Ye Xuan's eyelids twitched when he witnessed this scene. After all, he possessed the Dao Physique as well!
The Daoist Ruler seemed to be able to restrain the Dao Physique!
The Second Daoist Ruler stared fixedly at the Third Young Lady, "Third Young Lady, what are you doing!?"
The Third Young Lady turned around to gaze at an expert from the Dao Sect, "Take him to the Dao Prison, imprison his soul, and seal his body. He can't leave the Dao Prison for 100 years."
100 years!
The old man was stunned.
The Second Daoist Ruler's expression became ferocious, "Third Young Lady, you dare!
You dare! "
The Third Young Lady gazed at the old man, "Do I have to repeat myself?"
The old man hesitated for a moment before he walked towards the Second Daoist Ruler!
The Second Daoist Ruler gazed at the Third Young Lady and roared like a wild beast, "Third Young Lady, what exactly are you afraid of!?
Who in this world can restrain him with his strength?
So long as we make a move, we'll be able to kill Ye Xuan right away and eliminate this great calamity for our Dao Sect! "
The old man who was walking towards the Second Daoist Ruler stopped when he heard this.
The Third Young Lady shook her head, "Go calm down first!"
The Second Daoist Ruler spoke ferociously, "Third Young Lady, are you worthy of Master for treating a fellow disciple like this?
I, the Second Daoist Ruler …. "
Meanwhile, the Third Young Lady suddenly swung her ruler, and a shadow of the ruler smashed against the Second Daoist Ruler.
Bang!
The Second Daoist Ruler's body instantly collapsed!
The Second Daoist Ruler was stunned!
The other experts of the Dao Sect were stunned as well!
That attack was a little too ruthless!
The Dao Physique wasn't something that could be cultivated in a short period of time!
It was destroyed just like that?
The Third Young Lady gazed at the old man, "Take him away."
The old man didn't dare hesitate at all, and he immediately left with the Second Daoist Ruler's soul. Suddenly, a ray of light flashed!
It slashed straight at the Second Daoist Ruler!
It was Ye Xuan who'd attacked!
Moreover, he was using the Soul Suppressing Sword!
However, the Soul Suppressing Sword was directly clamped by two fingers when it was still several hundred feet away from Dao Old Second!
The Third Young Lady made her move!
The Third Young Lady flicked her jade-like fingers and the Soul Suppressing Sword flew back to Ye Xuan.
Third Miss looked at Ye Xuan, "Young Master Ye, my Dao Faction's people will be dealt with by my Dao Faction. There's no need to trouble yourself!"
As she spoke, she raised her head to look at the clouds in the sky. "Both of you, our Dao Gate can't afford to play this game. We'll be leaving. I hope both of you can be magnanimous."
After saying that, she turned around and left with the experts from the Dao Sect.
Ye Xuan turned to look at the clouds. Who was that?
Above the clouds, the mysterious woman beside Nian Nian smiled and said, "Looks like this sect isn't completely useless!"
Nian Nian licked the tanghulu. "Is there still a chance?"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "Of course!"
Nian Nian said softly, "I'm looking forward to it!
Speaking of which, is your goal to make the Dao Sect and Ye Xuan hostile? "
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "Guess.
！”
Nian Nian looked down. "I know that the Dao Sect can't kill him. The reason why I'm doing this is because I want him to destroy the Dao Sect and form a bad relationship with the Dao Sect's ancestor … I understand your intentions!
I want to magnify the Cause of Misfortune on him. "
As she spoke, she turned to look at the mysterious woman. "I want to use the Cause of Misfortune on him to kill him!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "How smart!"
Nian Nian gave the mysterious woman a thumbs up. "Very smart!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "There's nothing we can do about it!"
Nian Nian suddenly said, "I'm a little curious about your identity!"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "In the past, I was a good person …"
As she said that, she looked into the distant horizon. "They should be here soon!"
...
Below, as the Third Miss left with the experts from the Dao Sect, some of the experts who came to help the Dao Sect felt a little awkward!
Because the Dao Sect didn't bring them along!
When they wanted to leave with the Dao Sect, the experts of the Fifth Dimension stopped them, and the Dao Sect didn't make a move!
This was a little awkward!
In fact, they wanted to escape at first, but after seeing the Third Miss, they felt that the Dao Sect was enough!
So they all stayed!
However, what they didn't expect was that the Third Miss would directly leave with the people of the Dao Sect!
They didn't want to fight anymore!
And now, Ye Xuan's people wouldn't let them go …
Ye Xuan glanced at the Consolidation Realm experts. There were still about a hundred of them.
At this time, an old man walked out. The old man hesitated for a moment and then said, "Young Master Ye, we can guarantee that we will no longer be enemies with the Fifth Dimension. I wonder if Young Master Ye can let us go?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "No!"
As his voice fell, the sword in his hand suddenly flew out!
Chi!
The old man's head directly flew out!
Instant Kill!
Seeing Ye Xuan make a move, the expressions of the remaining Consolidation Realm experts changed drastically. One of the middle-aged men suddenly said fiercely, "Since Ye Xuan won't let us live, then we'll die together!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he charged out, and the experts behind him charged out as well!
Ye Xuan's face was expressionless. "Kill!
Leave no one alive! "
Leave no one alive!
As soon as Ye Xuan's voice fell, the experts behind him directly rushed out, as well as the twenty super assassins from Xuan City!
In order to reduce the losses, Ye Xuan also attacked!
Very quickly, bloody heads rained down from the sky …
Massacre!
Without the experts of the Dao Sect, although these Consolidation Realm experts were strong, they were far inferior to the Fifth Dimension in both quantity and quality.
This was especially true for Ye Xuan. Almost none of the Consolidation Realm experts present could withstand his Instant Kill Sword!
Once the sword was drawn, there would be death!
In a short while, all the hundred or so people present were killed, and their souls were absorbed by Ye Xuan's Soul Suppressing Sword …
After absorbing those souls, the Soul Suppressing Sword directly returned to the Prison Pagoda!
It was going to break through!
Just when everyone thought that the matter was about to end, in the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension, a powerful pressure like a mountain crushed over!
Boom!
The entire starry sky of the Fifth Dimension directly trembled …
Below, Ye Xuan suddenly raised his head, and there was a trace of shock in his eyes.
What a powerful aura!
Who is this?
.....
