Chapter 1474
Danger!
Upon hearing the white-dressed woman's words, Nian Nian pulled out the tanghulu in her mouth and said, "I've been targeted by the Cause of Misfortune and can't make a move. If I make a move, it will be exactly what that woman wants, so …"
At this point, she looked at the white-dressed woman. "I'm here to look for you!"
The white-dressed woman fell silent.
Nian Nian asked, "It's not convenient to make a move?"
The white-dressed woman nodded. "It's not convenient!
However, since it's her, I have to make a trip no matter what. "
Nian Nian nodded. "Thank you!"
After saying that, she glanced at the three-dimensional universe below. "No one is allowed to enter this place?"
The white-dressed woman nodded. "Especially someone as powerful as you."
Nian Nian asked with a smile, "Why?"
The white-dressed woman said, "To protect this universe!"
Protect!
Nian Nian nodded. "Understood!"
The white-dressed woman looked at Nian Nian. "Go back first. I will appear when it's time!"
Nian Nian smiled. "Alright!"
After saying that, she turned around and left.
On the spot, the woman was silent for a moment before shaking her head. "Doomed fate!"
After saying that, she turned around and left.
...
Nian Nian did not return to the Fifth Dimension directly. Instead, she went to the Nether Hall in the Fourth Dimension.
The hall was very quiet.
Just as Nian Nian walked into the hall, a voice sounded from within. "He caused trouble again?"
Nian Nian smiled. "Sort of!"
The voice said, "Can't solve it?"
Nian Nian shook her head. "I've already been targeted by the Cause of Misfortune. Once I make a move, the price will be too great."
The voice said softly, "Perhaps, he should be allowed to walk his own path!"
Nian Nian smiled. "I want to too!
However, a mysterious woman has appeared. That woman is not someone he can contend against now. "
The voice said, "What kind of woman?"
Nian Nian described.
A moment later, the voice said softly, "So it's her …"
Nian Nian smiled. "It seems that you all know her!"
The voice said, "I know her, and we used to be a little familiar!"
Nian Nian blinked. "Is it really as she said? She's very close to Ye Xuan?"
The voice said, "Very close, very close."
Nian Nian frowned. "Then why did she do that?"
The voice sighed. "It's complicated."
Nian Nian smiled. "So it's an old acquaintance of yours. What should we do?"
The voice was silent.
Nian Nian licked the candied fruit and said, "She wants to use the cause of disaster to kill him now, but I know that she definitely has a detailed plan. Once this plan succeeds, his life will really be in danger!"
The voice said, "In terms of strength, besides the three swords, no one can kill her!
In terms of intelligence, only Peony could compare to her … Should he look for Miss Ding?
She might have a better idea.
As for us, to tell you the truth, we've also encountered some problems, and it's difficult for us to leave. "
Nian Nian suddenly smiled and said, "There's no need!
Since you're in a difficult position, let me do it! "
With that, she turned around and left.
The voice said, "Young Miss, be careful of her. Since she's only acting against Ye Xuan now, then there's definitely a reason. Moreover, she definitely has a perfect plan once she makes a move!"
Nian Nian nodded. "I know!"
The voice continued, "Don't let Tian Ming interfere in this matter!"
Nian Nian was a little curious. "Why?"
After a moment of silence, the voice said, "Letting Heaven's Will interfere will make things more complicated.
It can cause internal strife here.
Because apart from her brother, Tian Ming doesn't recognize anyone and dares to kill anyone … If it weren't for the green-robed man, she would have even killed Ye Xuan's mother!
She would even kill us … She's unreasonable. Once she's angered, it'll be a disaster for the entire world!
And if she destroys the world again … then the cause of disaster on Ye Xuan will really be unsolvable! "
Nian Nian said softly, "Is the cause of his disaster because of the plain-dressed woman and his father?"
The voice said, "Half of the reason is because of them. The two of them are untainted by all kinds of karma, but it doesn't mean that their closest relatives can do the same.
It can be said that Ye Xuan is now taking the blame for them.
And it's precisely because of this that Tian Ming doesn't dare to kill anymore. Otherwise, before she leaves, she would probably kill everyone who can threaten her. "
As she said that, she paused and said, "Actually, her temper has changed a lot now. It's all because of him!"
Nian Nian was silent.
In fact, she had guessed a long time ago that part of the cause of Ye Xuan's disaster was because of the plain-dressed woman and the green-robed man. It was because these two closest relatives of Ye Xuan were not good people.
After a moment, Nian Nian suddenly said, "I understand!"
After saying that, she turned and left.
The voice said, "I will find a way to contact Miss Ding and see if she has a way to resolve this feud.
Also, Miss Nian, you must be careful when fighting with this woman. She may be more difficult to deal with than you think! "
Nian Nian smiled and said, "I understand!"
After saying that, she disappeared at the end of the horizon.
In the hall, a sigh sounded.
...
Dao Sect.
At the bottom of the abyss, Ye Xuan sat cross-legged on the ground. At that moment, a faint flame was emitting from his body.
That was the dragon flame emitted by the Ancestral Dragon's blood!
After drinking a full bottle of Ancestral Dragon's blood, his body finally changed. Most importantly, he had the third young lady's guidance!
He realized that the third young lady's understanding of the Dao Body far exceeded his.
At the side, the third young lady glanced at him and then turned and left.
Now, Ye Xuan had entered the final stage, and it would not be long before he could break through!
She still felt a little pained because Ye Xuan had absorbed too much Ancestral Dragon's blood!
Every bit he absorbed meant a little less!
The third young lady left the abyss and came to the Dao Prison!
The Dao Prison!
This was the place where the Dao Sect specially imprisoned disciples who had made mistakes!
The third young lady came in front of the Dao Sect's Second Brother, whose soul was currently locked by a flame.
Seeing the third young lady, the Dao Sect's Second Brother slowly closed his eyes. "Are you here to laugh at me?"
The third young lady shook her head. "Second Senior Brother, it seems that you haven't calmed down yet!"
After saying that, she turned and left.
At that moment, the Dao Sect's Second Brother suddenly said, "What are you afraid of?"
The third young lady turned to look at the Dao Sect's Second Brother and said with a smile, "Do you really think that the Immortal Realm is invincible?"
The Dao Sect's Second Brother looked at the third young lady. "I can kill Ye Xuan!"
The third young lady smiled slightly. "Under normal circumstances, I can kill him, but what about after I kill him?
Can the Dao Sect withstand the revenge of the forces behind him?
I know that we can. In our hearts, the Dao Sect has always been invincible. "
The Dao Sect's Second Brother was silent.
The third young lady continued, "Have you ever thought about why we want to kill him?
Just because he has the nine scrolls of the Dao Scripture?
But did he forget what his Master said?
The Dao Scripture is not the Dao Scripture of the Dao Sect, but the Dao Scripture of the world. Anyone can learn his martial arts. What is his greatest wish?
It is to exile the martial arts civilization in the Dao Scripture for all ages so that everyone can learn it.
But what about you?
As soon as he left, you took the Dao Scripture and everything about the Dao Sect for yourself!
Why doesn't the Spirit of the Great Path admit it?
You?
It's very simple. Because your actions have already violated Master's original intentions. "
The Dao Sect's Second Brother's face was gloomy and he did not speak.
The third young lady continued, "Even now, this Ye Xuan still thinks that the Dao Sect can kill him!
Do you know?
If the Dao Sect really touches him, the Dao Sect will be doomed eternally. "
The Dao Sect's Second Brother said in a deep voice, "What force is behind him?"
The third young lady shook her head, "I don't know!
I only know that it is definitely not a force that the Dao Sect can afford to offend. "
Then, she looked at the Dao Sect's Second Brother, "Second Senior Brother, do you know why you can't reach the Immortal State?"
The Dao Sect's Second Brother looked at the third young lady, and the third young lady said softly, "Because you care too much about the Dao Scripture.
Not only do you care about the Dao Scripture, but you also care about power!
You have taken the wrong path! "
After saying that, she turned around and left. When she reached the door, she stopped again, "Imprisoned for a hundred years. If you can wake up within a hundred years, you can reach the Immortal State. If you can't and still live in hatred, then die!"
As she spoke, she had already disappeared.
In the Dao Prison, the Dao Sect's Second Brother was silent.
...
After the third young lady left the Dao Prison, she looked up at the sky. At this moment, a shadow appeared behind her.
The shadow bowed slightly, "Third Young Lady!"
The third young lady said softly, "Have you found out where she came from?"
The shadow said in a deep voice, "I only know that she is from the Holy Ground, but I can't find out her identity!"
The Holy Ground!
The third young lady slowly closed her eyes, "That woman wants to use the Dao Sect as a tool!"
The shadow said in a deep voice, "Third Young Lady, do you want revenge?"
The third young lady shook her head, "We are no match for her!"
The shadow hesitated for a moment, then said, "Is she that strong?"
The third young lady said softly, "She is stronger than we thought!
However, we can't let this matter go just like that!
Doesn't she want to kill Ye Xuan?
Then let's help Ye Xuan and make Ye Xuan stronger!
Let's give her some trouble! "
After saying that, she turned around and left.
At the bottom of the abyss.
Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes. His eyes were filled with flames.
At this moment, the third young lady appeared in front of Ye Xuan. She looked at Ye Xuan, "Congratulations!"
Ye Xuan stood up, clenched his fists, and the surrounding space directly shattered!
Power!
At this moment, Ye Xuan felt endless power!
The power of the Ancestral Dragon's bloodline!
Now, not only had his physical body reached the Consolidation Realm, but his power had also increased by at least ten times!
Most importantly, his physical body had reached the Consolidation Realm!
Now, ordinary Consolidation Realm experts could not do anything to his physical body!
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan looked at the third young lady, "Third young lady, can I practice Life Fist now?"
The third young lady nodded, "Yes!
However, the lethality of this move is too great. Using it once is equivalent to hurting the enemy by a thousand and hurting yourself by eight hundred, or even hurting the enemy by a thousand and hurting yourself by two thousand … So, are you sure you want to learn it? "
Ye Xuan smiled, "Learn it!"
The third young lady nodded, "Follow me!"
After saying that, she turned around and left.
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Third young lady."
The third young lady turned to look at Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan hesitated, then said, "Didn't you say that you would give me the Ancestral Dragon's scale?"
After saying that, he walked to the Ancestral Dragon's side, patted one of the thick scales, and said with a smile, "I think this one is fine!
If you don't mind, I will take it away! "
After saying that, he had already started to take it away.
That was the Ancestral Dragon's reverse scale, the hardest part of the body.
The third young lady was silent.
Damn, how could this man be so shameless?
.....








Chapter 1475
Seeing that Ye Xuan was really going to pull out the dragon scale, Third Miss hurriedly said, "Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan turned to look at Third Miss and blinked. "Third Miss, there's no need to help me. I can do it myself!"
With that, he exerted force and plucked out the dragon scale.
Third Miss was speechless.
Ye Xuan looked at the dragon scale. It wasn't particularly big, but it was abnormally strong. It was at least four to five times stronger than the other dragon scales around it!
Good stuff!
If this thing was made into armor, it would be equivalent to a Dao body!
Ye Xuan was very satisfied!
At this moment, Third Miss suddenly said in a deep voice, "Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan looked at Third Miss and smiled. "Third Miss, I won't take this dragon scale for free."
Third Miss looked at Ye Xuan. "Young Master Ye wants to trade something with me?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "If Third Miss likes anything, as long as I have it, I can give it to you!"
Third Miss asked, "Really?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
He wasn't afraid. He was poorer than the Dao sects anyway!
Third Miss said, "I want some Young Master Ye's blood!"
Ye Xuan was stunned. "My blood?"
Third Miss nodded. "Not much. One gourd is enough!"
Ye Xuan's face darkened. That's not much?
One gourd!
I'm not a dragon!
If I let out a gourd of blood, I'm afraid I'll collapse!
Third Miss said lightly, "Young Master Ye is unwilling?"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment, then said, "Third Miss, why do you want my blood?"
Third Miss smiled. "I have my uses!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
Third Miss smiled. "Young Master Ye is alive, but my Ancestral Dragon is dead. Young Master Ye's blood can be regenerated, but my Ancestral Dragon's blood can't be regenerated. Young Master Ye …"
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Third Miss, one gourd of blood is too much!
You're trying to drain me dry! "
Third Miss blinked. "Then just half a gourd!
This gourd is so small. Half a gourd of blood won't have much effect on Young Master Ye! "
Ye Xuan was speechless. He suddenly realized that the dragon scale was a bit hot!
The Third Young Lady walked up to Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "May I?"
Ye Xuan did not speak. He took out a gourd and started to bleed. Soon, half of the gourd was filled with blood.
Ye Xuan. "Third Miss," said, "Ye Third Miss," Ye Xuan said, "Third Xuan," "
Ye Xuan looked at Third Young Lady, "Third Young Lady, what are you doing with my blood?"
The Third Young Lady smiled and said, "Don't worry, I won't use your blood recklessly. I just want to study it. Moreover, your blood might be helpful to my Taoist Body!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Understood!"
The third girl put away the gourd, "Young master Ye, let's go practice Life Fist!"
With that, she turned around and left.
Ye Xuan glanced at the Third Young Lady and followed her.
On the way, Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Third Young Lady, as far as I know, this Dao scripture martial art is the origin of all the martial arts in the Myriad World. Then, what was this Dao scripture martial art before?
Or could it be that before the Dao scriptures and martial arts, there wasn't any martial arts civilization? "
The Third Young Lady remained silent.
Ye Xuan asked again, "Can't you tell me?
I still don't know.
Dao? "
Third Young Lady said softly, "Of course I know!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Can you tell me about it?"
The Third Young Lady glanced at Ye Xuan and said, "If you want to know about the civilization before the Dao scripture civilization, then you must first understand the history of our universe!
Our universe, conservatively estimated, should have existed for hundreds of trillions of years!
But the Dao scripture martial art civilization is only 360,000 years old! "
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression became solemn.
The Third Young Lady said again, "Compared to this universe, humans are really insignificant. We also know very little about the history of this universe. For example, how it was formed, how humans were born … we know nothing!
Before the Dao scripture martial art civilization, the martial arts civilization of this universe was very, very backward. The people of that era were still in the Body Refining Stage and didn't know how to cultivate Qi. The lifespan of humans was basically less than a hundred years! "
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "So backward?"
The Third Young Lady nodded, "Very backward!
But the Spiritual Qi in that era was very rich, at least a thousand times richer than it is now. Because the people of that era didn't cultivate Qi, Spiritual Qi was basically useless to them.
Master called that era the primitive era. Whether it was the spiritual civilization or the martial arts civilization, they were the most primitive.
After Master appeared, he created a new cultivation method, which was Qi Cultivation!
Absorbing the Spiritual Qi of Heaven and Earth to strengthen oneself, change oneself, break through oneself … It was also from Master's era that people became more and more powerful, so powerful that they could destroy the world … "
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Did the ancestors of the Dao sects teach themselves?"
The Third Young Lady nodded slightly, "Learn and explore by yourself!"
Ye Xuan said softly, "Amazing!"
Creating a new path wasn't something an ordinary person could do!
The Third Young Lady said, "After Master appeared, the cultivation method he created completely changed our universe. However, it also brought a disaster to this universe. Because everyone cultivated, they absorbed Spiritual Qi without restraint, and even plundered the Spiritual Qi of Heaven and Earth, so many worlds were destroyed …"
Saying that, she glanced at Ye Xuan, "The model in the Five-Dimensional Universe is very good. It protects the world, protects the spirit of Heaven and Earth, and forbids the wanton destruction of the strong. In this case, the universe can live longer!"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Third Young Lady, just now you said that the history of this universe is at least a hundred trillion years, and the Dao Scripture Civilization only has a little more than 30 years. Before the Dao Scripture Civilization was the primitive era. What about before the primitive era?"
The Third Young Lady shook her head, "I don't know!
Because the people of that era didn't even create words, so there was no record at all.
However, Master once calculated that more than 10 million years before the primitive era, there might be an extremely powerful civilization in this universe. "
Ye Xuan hurried to ask, "What civilization?"
The Third Young Lady hesitated, then shook her head, "I don't know!"
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan asked, "Why did the Dao Sect's ancestor think that more than 10 million years before the primitive era, there was a powerful civilization in this world?"
The Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "In order to spread Martial Dao, Master once traveled all over the world. He once encountered something unusual in the Northern Wilderness, but I don't know what it was!
I only know that after he came back from there, the Ancestral Dragon that had been accompanying him all along died!
Later, Master personally sealed the Northern Wilderness, and no one was allowed to step into that place. These years, the seal has loosened, and I have entered several times, but I couldn't go deep. That place is indeed not simple …
...”
The Northern Wilderness!
Ye Xuan was silent, and he remembered this place in his heart.
At this time, the Third Young Lady stopped and turned to look at Ye Xuan, "The Dao Scripture Martial Dao Civilization is only the origin of our universe's Martial Dao Civilization, but it is not the only Martial Dao Civilization."
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly, "Third Young Lady, are you trying to tell me that there is a higher dimension world?"
The Third Young Lady asked, "Why not?"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "Don't tell me there is really an eighth or ninth dimension?"
The Third Young Lady shook her head, "Do you think there is any difference between the fourth and fifth dimensions?"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, and shook his head, "There is no difference, just that the Martial Dao Civilization of the fifth dimension is higher than that of the fourth dimension."
Third Young Lady nodded. "Actually, no matter if it's three-dimensional, four-dimensional, or five-dimensional, or even the Saha World, everyone is in the same universe. It's just that someone separated each place and set up a cosmic barrier. That's why there's the so-called four-dimensional and five-dimensional distinction. In the end, everyone belongs to the same universe. It's just that the area is different."
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Now, what is the farthest known place in Dao Sect?"
The Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "The Orc World!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "The Orc World?"
The Third Young Lady nodded, "Another race that has existed since primitive times!
They are actually also humans, but they are a race that is a combination of humans and demons!
They can be said to be the natural enemy of the human race. If it was not for Master's sudden appearance, the human race would have been destroyed by them! "
Ye Xuan was a little surprised, "So strong?"
The Third Young Lady said softly, "Not just strong, they not only have the cultivation talent of the human race, but also the strong physical body of the Orc race, especially in the aspect of physical body. Compared to the human race, they have a unique advantage, and those Orcs who have cultivated their physical body to the extreme are even more terrifying."
She looked at Ye Xuan as she spoke. "Master created the Taoist Physique based on the cultivation method of their threads."
Ye Xuan said, "In other words, the Orcs in the Orc World are more advanced than us humans in terms of physical body?"
The Third Young Lady nodded, "Yes!
Because their physical body has a unique advantage!
Humans may need to cultivate for 20 to 30 years to cultivate a strong physical body, but on the Orcs' side, they may be born with it! "
Ye Xuan said softly, "I understand!"
At this moment, he finally had a rough understanding of this universe.
The universe was very big!
The martial arts civilization did not only consist of the Daoist Scripture civilization. The Daoist Scripture civilization was only the source of the martial arts civilization of this universe, but who knew if there were other universes?
The Third Young Lady said again, "If Young Master Ye wants to know more about the history of this universe, you can go to the Northern Wilderness, but that place is a bit dangerous, Young Master Ye better not go now!
Otherwise, you won't be able to return! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
At this moment, the Third Young Lady stopped in her tracks. She glanced at her surroundings and said, "Young Master Ye, this is the place where I usually cultivate. The space here is unusually firm, so Young Master Ye can cultivate Fate Fist here. However, I have to remind you that cultivating Fate Fist is playing with your life!
Because you have to burn your lifespan in the beginning … "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
....
PS: I found that everyone has been guessing the identity of that woman recently, I also read the book comments, but no one guessed correctly.








Chapter 1476
Burning one's lifespan!
Ye Xuan was speechless!
This Life Fist was really risking one's life!
Third Miss smiled and said, "However, if you succeed in cultivating it, you will feel that burning your lifespan is worth it!
However, in my opinion, Young Master Ye's lifespan is at most a thousand years … that's too little!
I'm afraid it's not enough for Young Master Ye to successfully cultivate this fist!
So … "
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Let's try it first!"
Third Miss glanced at Ye Xuan and nodded, "Then let's try it first!"
Saying that, she sat cross-legged on the ground and said, "Young Master Ye, sit down first. Let me tell you about the origin of this Life Fist and its special characteristics."
Ye Xuan nodded and sat cross-legged opposite to Third Miss.
Third Young Lady said, "This Life Fist was created by Master by chance. Originally, he didn't want to incorporate this fist into the martial arts scripture because this fist was too harmful to the harmony of the heavens and its power was too great. Ordinary people couldn't control it.
However, after seeing me cultivate this fist, he changed his mind! "
Ye Xuan blinked, "Why?"
Third Miss looked at Ye Xuan, "Because I can control this Life Fist!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Third Miss continued, "This Life Fist burns one's lifespan as the price. It can be said to be an unconventional sword, and because of this unconventional sword, the requirements for the cultivator are extremely harsh. First is the body, because its power is too powerful, ordinary people can't bear its power. If an ordinary person cultivates it, once they use it, they may directly explode and die. Therefore, the cultivator must at least have a Dao body of the Consolidation Realm. Only a Dao body of the Consolidation Realm can bear its power. Second is the soul. In the process of cultivating this fist, the cultivator will have to endure unbearable pain. The soul must be strong enough, otherwise, the soul may be destroyed while cultivating!"
Ye Xuan blinked, "The soul will be destroyed?"
The Third Young Lady nodded. "This fist intent surpasses the limits of ordinary people. Moreover, the power obtained from this fist is unconventional. Therefore, there are many drawbacks!"
As she spoke, she looked at Ye Xuan. "Your physical body is strong enough. As for your Divine Soul, it shouldn't be too big of a problem!
The only problem is his lifespan. His lifespan is a little short, but his comprehension isn't bad, so it shouldn't be a big problem! "
Ye Xuan nodded, "Then let's begin!"
Third Young Lady said, "Now, I will teach you some of my experience in practicing Life Fist. It should be helpful!"
With that, she pointed with her fingers, and a white light directly entered the space between Ye Xuan's eyebrows!
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes. Soon, countless pieces of information flowed into his mind.
About an hour later, Ye Xuan began to circulate the ninth volume of Dao Scripture and began to practice the Life Fist!
The moment he activated the ninth manual, a faint flame suddenly appeared around him.
Burning his lifespan!
Needless to say, the price of practicing Life Fist was too high!
Burning his lifespan!
What was the ultimate goal of ordinary people's cultivation?
It was to prolong their lifespan!
But this Life Fist directly burned one's lifespan!
However, Ye Xuan had no choice but to practice!
His top priority now was to do everything possible to improve his strength!
Without great strength, everything else was nonsense!
...
The Sacred Ground.
The Sacred Lord came to the bamboo house in the back of the mountain. In the garden, a woman was slowly watering the plants.
The woman was still wearing that dark green dress!
The Sacred Lord walked to the side of the garden and bowed respectfully, "Master, I received news.
Ye Xuan is practicing in the Dao Sect and has now cultivated his physical body to the Consolidation Realm. Not only that, he is also practicing the Dao Sect's supreme martial art, Life Fist! "
The woman nodded, "Got it!"
The Sacred Lord hesitated, then said, "Aren't we going to stop him?"
The woman smiled, "Why should we stop him?"
The Sacred Lord said in a deep voice, "He is getting stronger and stronger!"
The woman smiled, "I know!"
The Sacred Lord wanted to say something but stopped.
The woman glanced at the Sacred Lord, "Even if his physical body and realm have reached the God Realm, he is not a threat to me!
Do you understand? "
The Sacred Lord shook his head, "No."
The woman smiled, "Whether he lives or not doesn't depend on him. Whether I die or not doesn't depend on him!
This is a game between me and the person behind him. "
The Sacred Lord said softly, "The woman in the plain dress?"
The woman nodded, "The only people who can kill me and dare to kill me are this woman and her father.
It can be said that I only have one chance. If I can't kill him in one strike, I won't have a second chance.
Now, the only thing that can hold them back is the Calamity Cause. Her father is far enough away from here. If I make a move, he will not be able to help.
Of course, the woman in the plain dress is not near here either. However, if I make a move and kill him, I will die too!
A life for a life, that was my idea in the past. Now, I don't want a life for a life because I think it will be too easy for him!
So, I want a life for a few more! "
The Sacred Lord glanced at the woman, his eyes filled with fear.
He knew that the master before him might be doing something crazy.
The woman suddenly stopped and sighed softly, "There's nothing I can do. As long as I want to kill him, no matter what I do, I will definitely die in the end!
However, it doesn't matter. "
The Sacred Lord said in a low voice, "Master … is there no chance of survival?"
The woman shook her head, "There is no chance of survival!"
The Sacred Lord hesitated for a moment and said, "Then why not give up?"
The woman smiled, "There are some things that must be done, even if it means death."
As she spoke, she glanced at the Sacred Lord, "Don't worry too much. I will give you a way out later.
Once Ye Xuan dies, the woman in the plain dress will definitely go mad, and the entire universe will tremble under her sword. Moreover, no one can stop her, not even those two men, because they can't stop a Mandate of Heaven that has lost its mind.
However, there is a place that she will not make a move, and that is the place where her brother died. Only by going there can she survive. "
The Sacred Lord said in a trembling voice, "Master, is that woman really invincible?"
The woman nodded and smiled, "She is!
If it wasn't for the Disaster Cause, I wouldn't have a chance at all!
Even with the Disaster Cause, as long as I touch Ye Xuan, I will definitely die.
However, I am prepared to die! "
The Sacred Lord still wanted to say something, but the woman waved her hand, "You may leave!"
The Sacred Lord did not dare to say anything else. He bowed respectfully and left.
The woman put down the tools in her hand and walked slowly into the bamboo house. There was only a bed, a bamboo table, and a bamboo chair in the bamboo house!
The woman walked to the bamboo table and sat down. She picked up the teapot and poured herself a cup of tea. However, she did not drink it and fell silent.
After a long time, the woman raised the teacup and said softly, "I don't blame him!
However … he must die. "
After saying that, she picked up the teacup and drank it in one gulp. Then, she stood up and left the bamboo house. After walking out of the bamboo house, she gently drew a line with her finger and the space in front of her split open. In the next moment, she entered the split space.
...
The Desolate North.
Very few people knew about the Northern Wilderness because it was a true forbidden area. Even Godly State Experts did not dare to step into this place easily.
There were two reasons why this place was called a forbidden area. First, this place itself was extremely special. Second, there was a restriction set up by the Dao Sect's Patriarch!
Over the years, countless people had entered this place in search of opportunities. However, only a few could come out alive. Even if they did, it was because they did not go deep!
On this day, a woman came to the Northern Wilderness.
It was the mysterious woman from the Sacred Ground!
The mysterious woman slowly walked toward the Northern Wilderness. When she walked to a river, an invisible force suddenly blocked her way!
The mysterious woman waved her lily-white hand and the invisible force instantly disappeared without a trace.
The mysterious woman continued to move forward. Not long after, a mysterious force suddenly enveloped her body.
The mysterious woman smiled slightly. "The Great Path Law …"
As she spoke, she waved her right hand and the mysterious force instantly disappeared without a trace.
The mysterious woman continued to move forward. Soon, she arrived in front of a tall building with 12 floors.
The woman raised her head and looked at the tall building. In the middle of the building, there were three big black words: White Jade Jing!
The woman walked toward the entrance. When she approached the White Jade Jing, a mysterious force suddenly blocked her way. At the same time, a shadow appeared in front of the mysterious woman.
The shadow looked at the woman. "Trespasser: Die!"
The woman suddenly grabbed with her right hand. The next moment, the shadow's throat was directly grabbed by the woman!
He did not even have the strength to fight back!
The woman looked at the shadow and smiled. "I'm not one of those nobodies!"
As she spoke, she clenched her fist.
Boom!
That illusory figure turned into nothingness.
At that moment, the White Jade Jing suddenly trembled.
The mysterious woman smiled slightly and gently stomped her right foot.
Boom!
The entire White Jade Jing shook violently and cracks appeared everywhere. At the same time, the White Jade Jing calmed down.
The mysterious woman looked at the White Jade Jing and shook her head with a smile. "Is this the prehistoric civilization?"
As soon as she spoke, she turned around and left.
At that moment, a voice suddenly sounded from the top floor of the White Jade Jing. "Who is it?"
The mysterious woman stopped in her tracks. The next moment, she turned around and punched.
Boom!
The White Jade Jing suddenly crumbled and turned into fragments that scattered all over the sky.
The moment the White Jade Jing was destroyed, countless souls floated out of it.
The mysterious woman waved her right hand and collected the souls!
At that moment, a ferocious voice suddenly sounded from the sky. "Who is it?
Why don't you dare show your true face? "
From his perspective, he could only see a blurry figure. He could not see the mysterious woman's true face!
The mysterious woman looked up at the sky and smiled. "These souls are very useful to my nephew, Ye Xuan, so I'm taking them with me!
It's an honor for prehistoric people like you to be absorbed by my nephew! "
As soon as she spoke, she turned around and left.
In the sky, the ferocious voice sounded. "Ye Xuan …"
The mysterious woman did not leave. Instead, she continued to go deeper. Along the way, she was unscrupulous and killed everything she passed. However, she did not kill all of them. Instead, she would say, "My nephew, Ye Xuan …"
.....








Chapter 1477
Following the mysterious woman's crazy massacre, the entire Northern Wilderness wailed!
But soon, the mysterious woman escaped!
Because she seemed to be injured!
This made the mysterious forces in the Northern Wilderness heave a sigh of relief. This woman did not seem to be invincible.
However, they still could not do anything to her and could only watch her escape.
Following the mysterious woman's escape, the entire Northern Wilderness returned to peace. But not long after, the Northern Wilderness became lively again as if they were discussing something …
It was worth mentioning that not only did the mysterious woman forcibly take away some of the sleeping souls here, but she also took away countless mysterious treasures … They were all the family properties of those forces …
This was simply robbery!
A blatant robbery!
For a moment, the Northern Wilderness was filled with anger and murderous intent.
...
Dao Sect.
In the cultivation place, Ye Xuan stood quietly with a faint flame burning around him.
Burning his lifespan!
He was now burning his lifespan to obtain great power!
After burning his lifespan, he found that he had indeed obtained a mysterious and powerful power!
The Power of Lifespan!
This power was not cultivated, but burned!
One had to admit that this was indeed an unconventional move!
However, this power was really strong!
Ye Xuan slowly clenched his right hand and the space within tens of thousands of feet around him became illusory. The power in his right hand was still becoming stronger as he burned his lifespan!
The Third Young Lady watched quietly in front of Ye Xuan.
She was actually very curious about Ye Xuan because even if the Dao Sect tried their best, they could not find out Ye Xuan's true identity!
In this universe, there were really not many people that the Dao Sect could not find out.
Most importantly, this guy seemed to have a huge force behind him and the Dao Sect knew nothing about this huge force.
Too mysterious!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes. The clothes on his right arm instantly turned into ashes. Blue veins bulged on his entire right arm, and it was filled with an extremely violent power!
The Power of Lifespan!
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Third Young Lady, I feel that I can't control this power anymore!"
Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan. "You must learn to control it!"
Ye Xuan quickly asked, "How do I control it?"
Third Lady said, "Don't burn your lifespan yet."
Ye Xuan nodded and quickly stopped burning his lifespan. Although he had stopped burning his lifespan, the power in his body was still somewhat difficult to control.
He even felt like his body was about to explode!
Because he was too strong!
Moreover, he felt as if his body was about to collapse.
Not only was his physical body on the verge of collapse, but his soul was also on the verge of collapse.
At this time, the Third Young Lady suddenly said, "Although this power is strong, you must know that it is yours!
It was obtained by burning your lifespan, and your lifespan is also yours, so you can try to communicate with it! "
Ye Xuan blinked. "Communicate?"
The Third Young Lady nodded. "Feel it, fuse with it, and make it a part of your body. Only then will you be able to control it completely."
With that, she paused and continued, "The reason why many people in Taoism cannot cultivate this Life Fist is because they have not found a suitable way to control it!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I will try!"
With that, he slowly closed his eyes and calmed his mind!
Feel that power!
Gradually, Ye Xuan found that although this power was violent and overbearing, it was a little dependent on his body. No, it should be said that it was a little close to his body!
Any power without the support of the body would be like a duckweed without roots!
And this power was created by him, so naturally it was most dependent on him. As long as he used the right method, he could easily control this power.
Ye Xuan began to try to fuse with this power. At first, it was a little difficult, but slowly, he found that this power was not so resistant to him!
Feeling this, Ye Xuan was delighted.
There's hope!
About three days later, Ye Xuan, who was sitting cross-legged on the ground, suddenly stood up. He clenched his right hand, and in an instant, the surrounding space became transparent!
On top of his fist, there was a faint blood-red flame!
Life Fist!
Ye Xuan looked at his fist, his eyes full of excitement.
At this moment, he felt boundless power!
At this time, the Third Young Lady suddenly smiled. "Are you satisfied?"
Ye Xuan looked at the Third Young Lady. The Third Young Lady smiled and said, "Your Life Fist is just a beginner, and its power is not even one-tenth of the real Life Fist!
Not only that, when you burned your lifespan, you only burned 50 years. If you burn for a few hundred years, you will find out what power is! "
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "What if I burn for a thousand years?"
The Third Young Lady smiled and said, "Your current body can't take it. With your current body, you can at most burn 200 years of lifespan, and 200 years of lifespan is enough for you to obtain power far beyond your realm!"
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "How powerful is it exactly?"
He wanted to try, but the price was too high!
200 years of lifespan was not enough to try!
He couldn't afford to try!
The Third Young Lady thought for a moment and said, "If you burn 200 years of lifespan, your power should be able to kill a God State expert easily!
Very, very easily! "
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "What is above the God State?"
The Third Young Lady smiled and said, "That's not for you to worry about!
What you should worry about now is the problem of lifespan!
You have to know that you have less than 800 years of lifespan left!
Don't think it's a lot, if you use Life Fist a few more times, it will be gone!
Moreover, your body and soul are not particularly strong. If you use it a few more times, not only will your lifespan not be able to bear it, even your soul and body will not be able to bear it.
So, you need to find a way to improve your body and soul again. "
Ye Xuan looked at the Third Young Lady and the Third Young Lady quickly said, "Don't look at me!
Your Divine Soul and physical body have already reached your limits. It will be extremely difficult for you to improve any further!
I can't help you! "
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "Third Young Lady, what is your body realm?"
The Third Young Lady said, "God State!"
Ye Xuan quickly asked, "How did you reach God State?"
The Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan and raised a finger, "I spent 100 years to reach God State!"
100 years!
Ye Xuan was petrified on the spot.
The Third Young Lady smiled and said, "You can also reach God State if you take your time!"
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly, "I also want to, but I'm afraid my enemy will not give me 100 years!"
The Third Young Lady spread her hands, "Then I can't help you!"
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan cupped his fists, "No matter what, Third Young Lady, thank you!"
The Third Young Lady nodded, "Are you going back now?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "There are still some things waiting for me to deal with in the Fifth Dimension, I have to go back and see if I can improve my soul and body!"
The Third Young Lady nodded slightly, "Your soul may be able to improve, but your body will not be able to improve in a short period of time!
Unless you have a fortuitous encounter, but it is also very difficult. "
Ye Xuan nodded slightly, his body had just broken through to Consolidation Realm, and if he wanted to break through again, as the Third Young Lady said, without a special fortuitous encounter, it would be basically impossible!
In this world, there was basically no beast blood more powerful than the Ancestral Dragon blood!
Even if there was, he was afraid he would not be able to defeat it!
At this time, the Third Young Lady suddenly said, "I still have something to deal with, I will leave first!
If you need anything, or if there is anything you do not understand, you can also come to my Dao Sect! "
Ye Xuan cupped his fists, "Thank you!"
The Third Young Lady nodded slightly, turned around and left.
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Third Young Lady!"
The Third Young Lady turned to look at Ye Xuan, Ye Xuan smiled, "You said I have a powerful enemy, can you tell me?"
The Third Young Lady thought for a moment, then shook her head, "Young Master Ye, I am sorry, my Dao Sect does not want to get involved in this mess anymore!
Whether it is you or the other party, my Dao Sect cannot afford to offend you, I just want my Dao Sect to develop steadily. "
After saying that, she turned around and left.
In the same place, Ye Xuan was silent.
Who is it that wants to mess with me behind the scenes?
Without thinking much, Ye Xuan turned around and left.
Somewhere, the Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan's departing figure, whispering, "I hope we will meet again!"
After saying that, she turned around and left, but after taking two steps, her eyes suddenly narrowed, her right hand suddenly clenched, and a powerful force condensed in her right hand.
A laugh sounded from behind the Third Young Lady, "Miss, you can't beat me!"
The Third Young Lady said softly, "Your Excellency, can't you let my Dao Sect go?"
The voice laughed, "You know he is the person I want to kill, but you still want to help him. You want him to become stronger, and then cause trouble for me, right?"
The Third Young Lady shook her head, "I just want to settle the grudge between my Dao Sect and him, that's all."
The voice was silent.
The Third Young Lady slowly closed her eyes, and the force in her right hand became stronger and stronger.
The atmosphere became more and more tense.
At this moment, the voice suddenly laughed, "Forget it!
Your Master is a respectable person after all, so I won't be so ruthless in this matter!
Miss, don't play such tricks in the future!
Because you don't have a second chance, understand? "
The Third Young Lady nodded, "Boss is right!
I will remember it! "
The voice laughed, "What a smart girl, you are much smarter than that Dao Sect's Second Young Master.
Take care! "
After saying that, the Third Young Lady in the distance suddenly heaved a sigh of relief. She turned around, but there was no one in front of her.
The other party had left!
The Third Young Lady looked at the horizon, and softly said, "Young Master Ye, I mourn for you!"
....
Somewhere in the starry sky, Ye Xuan was flying on his sword!
Returning to the Fifth Dimension!
It had been a while since he came out. Although the threat of the Dao Sect was gone, there were still many things in the Fifth Dimension that he needed to deal with.
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly stopped. Not far in front of him stood a woman.
The woman wore a dark green dress, on which there were mountains and rivers, and she looked very quiet and elegant.
Ye Xuan's expression became solemn, because the other party appeared without a sound!
The woman smiled, "Don't be nervous, I am a good person!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "That's what bad people usually say!"
The woman laughed, "You are right!"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Who are you?"
The woman thought for a while, then said, "You should call me aunt!"
As she said that, the corner of her mouth slightly raised, "The kissing kind!"
Ye Xuan, "…"
...
PS: I'm late!
Let me tell you slowly!
It was dusk, and I passed by a dark alley. In the alley, there were a few people in revealing clothes … These people waved at me … Out of curiosity, I walked over, and then …








Chapter 1478
Aunty!
Dear!
Ye Xuan was confused.
The woman smiled. "It's normal that you don't know me. This is the first time we've met!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. "Are you really my aunty?"
The woman nodded. "Yes."
Ye Xuan asked. "How do you prove it?"
The woman smiled. "I really don't know!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman in silence.
The woman thought for a while. "But you can ask me some questions. I think I should be able to answer them."
Ye Xuan asked. "Who is Qing 'er?"
The woman smiled. "Her name is Tian Ming!
She comes from the three-dimensional universe!
Moreover, the current woman in a plain dress wasn't her true body. Of course, her current strength had already far surpassed her previous body!
Besides her, there is also that woman in white. Her name is Tu. She used to be the owner of the Executing Heaven Sword. She is also Qing 'er, one of the four doppelgangers. "
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Where are the other two?"
The woman said softly. "The other two were killed by Qing 'er a long time ago!"
Ye Xuan frowned. "Why?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan. "Because the two Qing 'er obstructed her, so she killed them!"
Ye Xuan was curious. "What obstructed Qing 'er?"
The woman smiled. "Because!
Qing 'er wanted to defy the heavens and change her fate. But the prerequisite was to destroy the Dao. So she chose to destroy all living beings. The other two tried to stop her, so she killed them! "
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman gently brushed her hair behind her ear. "What else do you want to ask?"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. "Who is my father?"
The woman smiled. "It's not convenient for me to tell you!
You will know in the future! "
Ye Xuan asked again. "What about my mother?"
The woman smiled, "Mother is not an ordinary person, very extraordinary!
In fact, there's another bloodline in my body, but it hasn't been activated yet! "
Ye Xuan frowned. "There's another bloodline?"
The woman nodded. "Yes!
It was a very powerful bloodline!
However, that ability had yet to be awakened!
Moreover, the current Crazy Demon Bloodline is too overbearing. It directly suppresses that bloodline, so it can't awaken! "
Ye Xuan said solemnly, "I have two bloodlines!"
The woman said with a smile, "Yes!
Moreover, the other bloodline is also very strong. Of course, in terms of power, it can't compare to the Crazy Demon Bloodline. However, the other bloodline is a little special. Its function is not to increase strength! "
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "Is that a support type?"
The woman nodded. "You can say so!"
Ye Xuan asked in a deep voice, "Is it powerful?"
The woman smiled and said, "Definitely powerful!"
Ye Xuan asked, "How do I activate it?"
The woman blinked. "Do you want to activate it?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The woman smiled and said, "I'll help!"
With that, she walked in front of Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan's right hand slowly clenched, his heart secretly on guard!
The woman shook her head and smiled, "Don't be on guard against me. If I want to kill, you can't stop me!
Even if you burn a thousand years of your lifespan to use that Life Fist, you're still not my opponent! "
Ye Xuan looked straight at the woman, "How do you know that I practice Life Fist!"
The woman smiled and said, "Because I've been secretly observing!"
Ye Xuan asked, "Observing me for what?"
The woman blinked, "As an aunt, what's wrong with observing my nephew?"
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman smiled and said, "Do you want to activate your bloodline?"
Ye Xuan was still silent.
The woman shook her head and smiled, "It seems that you still don't believe me!
In that case, you can use your Life Fist to hit me! "
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "Then I won't be polite!"
With that, he suddenly swung his sword!
Instant Kill Sword!
He had cultivated this Instant Kill Sword to the limit. Even if he didn't use the Supreme Sword, its speed and power had reached the limit.
Moreover, he was so close to this woman. Even if this woman was a peak God Realm expert, she would absolutely not be able to block this sword!
However, Ye Xuan was stunned.
Because his sword was clamped by two fingers!
The woman's fingers!
The woman clamped Ye Xuan's sword and said with a smile, "A very fast sword!
Unfortunately, this speed is still not a threat to me. "
With that, she loosened her fingers.
Ye Xuan was silent.
He knew that this woman's strength far exceeded his. Just like what she said, if she wanted to kill him, he couldn't resist at all!
The woman smiled and said, "Now do you believe me?"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "Why are you looking for me?"
The woman blinked her eyes, "Someone asked me to help you because you're too weak now!
So weak, you won't be able to resist the Calamity Cause in the future! "
Ye Xuan was stunned and then said, "Someone asked you to help me?"
The woman nodded, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan asked, "Who is it?"
The woman smiled and said, "Someone I know very well!
As for who it is, I won't tell you!
In any case, I'm here to help! "
Ye Xuan glanced at the woman, "How?"
The woman sized up Ye Xuan and said, "First, I have to help you activate the power of your bloodline and activate the power of another bloodline!
Secondly, your soul is slightly weak, so I can help you improve it and bring it to a new height! "
Ye Xuan was slightly surprised, "You can help me improve my soul?"
The woman nodded, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment and asked, "Really?"
The woman smiled and said, "What's in it for me to lie to you?"
Ye Xuan fell silent.
He didn't know if this woman was his aunt, but an expert like her wouldn't joke with him, right?
Moreover, she knew Qing 'er and the others so well, so she was obviously from the three-dimensional universe!
The woman suddenly said, "I'll activate your bloodline first!
Of course, if you really don't believe me, then you don't have to activate it. I'm busy anyway! "
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "Will the two bloodlines conflict with each other if I activate the other bloodline?"
The woman smiled and said, "Conflict or not, it depends on you!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "Depends on me?"
The woman nodded, "Remember, whether it's the Crazy Demon bloodline or the other bloodline, it's their master, not the other way around. Understand?"
Ye Xuan said solemnly, "I understand!"
The woman smiled and said, "Can we start now?"
Ye Xuan hesitated and said, "Are you really my mother's sister?"
The woman nodded, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan looked straight at the woman, "In other words, you have the same bloodline as me, right?"
The woman smiled slightly, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Can you show me?"
The woman laughed, "Little fellow, you're really cautious, but it's a good thing!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she opened her palm, and in the next moment, an emerald light suddenly appeared around her body. Not only that, but Ye Xuan also noticed that the blood vessels on her right hand had suddenly bulged!
Those were emerald green blood vessels!
Ye Xuan was slightly curious, "What bloodline is this?"
The woman blinked, "Immortal Bloodline!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "Immortal Bloodline?"
The woman smiled and said, "Immortal Bloodline. Once activated, it possesses extremely terrifying self-healing abilities!
If cultivated to the extreme, so long as it's not erased in a single move, then no matter how serious the injury is, it can be healed!
Even if the physical body is shattered, this bloodline can automatically restore the physical body. Not only the physical body, but even if the soul is shattered, it can instantly reform.
Simply put, so long as it's not directly erased by the opponent, then it won't die. "
Ye Xuan was stunned, and then he said, "It's that terrifying?"
The woman nodded and smiled, "It's that terrifying!
It can be said that after this bloodline is activated, there are very, very few people in this world who can kill it besides those true almighty experts. Or perhaps it's even difficult to die! "
Ye Xuan spoke in a low voice, "What kind of almighty experts are you talking about?"
The woman pointed at herself, "For example, my kind!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The woman continued, "There's also the Qing 'er kind!
No bloodline is of any use when she slashes down with her sword!
Because she can sever everything with a single slash of her sword, and she can truly erase a person. "
Ye Xuan nodded, "I understand!"
As he spoke, he looked at the woman, "Help me activate my bloodline!"
The woman smiled and said, "Alright!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she opened her palm and pressed it lightly on Ye Xuan's shoulder.
Bang!
In an instant, Ye Xuan's body trembled violently, and then the blood in his body suddenly started trembling violently!
The Crazy Demonic Bloodline was resisting!
The woman smiled slightly, "I have to suppress the Crazy Demonic Bloodline first. I have to cooperate and don't resist, otherwise, it won't let the other bloodline awaken!"
As she spoke, she gently exerted force with her right hand.
Bang!
In an instant, the Crazy Demonic Bloodline in Ye Xuan's body was directly suppressed by a powerful force!
Sensing this scene, Ye Xuan's expression became solemn!
This woman's strength was so terrifying!
She could actually suppress the Crazy Demonic Bloodline so easily!
At this moment, the woman smiled and gently raised her right hand —
Bang!
Ye Xuan's eyes widened. At this moment, he felt as if something was about to come out of his body!
Gradually, some dark green light appeared around his body!
Immortal Bloodline!
And Ye Xuan found that the blood in his body gradually began to turn emerald green.
His blood was changing!
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes, and at this moment, he felt like he was floating!
Because the power of the bloodline was a little comfortable!
The Crazy Demonic Bloodline was very powerful, but it could not be controlled. Moreover, people would go crazy, and that kind of feeling was really not good!
But this bloodline was different. This bloodline gave him a very comfortable feeling!
Gradually, the blood in Ye Xuan's body slowly transformed.
And during this process, Ye Xuan did not feel any discomfort.
After a long time, Ye Xuan seemed to have thought of something. He looked at the woman, "Just now, you said that you can help me improve my soul?"
The woman nodded, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan was a little curious, "How do you improve it?"
The woman smiled, "Using souls to supplement souls!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "Using souls to supplement souls?"
The woman nodded, "Not long ago, I picked up a batch of powerful souls. After absorbing them, I should be able to break through the limit of my soul!
En, when I leave, I will also leave behind a fortune, enough to help change the entire Five-Dimensional Universe. "
Ye Xuan blinked his eyes, "Fortune!"
The woman smiled, "No matter what, you are my nephew, I will definitely treat you well!"

Chapter 1479
Aunty!
Ye Xuan glanced at the woman. He was now certain that this woman was related to his mother!
Because his new bloodline power was the same as this woman's bloodline power!
Moreover, the other party could know so many things!
Was the other party really here to help him?
His intuition told him that things might not be so simple!
But he couldn't tell what was wrong!
At this time, the mysterious woman smiled slightly, "Don't think too much, feel the bloodline!"
Ye Xuan nodded and slowly closed his eyes.
At this moment, his whole body was warm and very, very comfortable.
He had to admit that he was a little excited at this moment!
If this Immortal Bloodline was really so abnormal, then with his Daoist Physique, who could kill him?
Moreover, he also had the Ancestral Dragon's Scale. Once the scale was forged into a treasured armor, it could be said that his physical body would be extremely tough. Even if he stood there and let a Consolidation Realm expert slash at him, the opponent would not be able to kill him!
Thinking of this, Ye Xuan looked forward to it even more!
With the help of the woman, the Mad Demon Bloodline in his body had been completely suppressed, and the new bloodline was slowly taking over his body. After the bloodline had been dormant for more than 20 years, it was even happier than Ye Xuan himself when it regained its freedom!
About half an hour later, the woman withdrew her hand. She retreated to the side and said with a smile, "It's done!"
Ye Xuan opened his eyes and clenched his fists. In an instant, the blood in his body quickly flowed from his body, and an emerald light appeared around him.
It was very comfortable!
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "My bloodline activation was successful?"
The woman nodded, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment, then asked, "Then what about my Crazy Demon Bloodline?"
The woman said with a smile, "The Crazy Demon Bloodline did not disappear, but it was temporarily suppressed by me. In the future, when you need to use it, it will naturally appear, but under normal circumstances, it won't be used, right?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "That's true!"
The woman continued, "Actually, the two bloodlines can coexist, but I'm afraid it's a little difficult to control right now, so I can only separate them and slowly try to control them in the future!
It will be very interesting if the two bloodlines can coexist because the Undying Bloodline can make up for the flaws of the Mad Demon Bloodline. "

Let me help you improve your Divine Soul! "

A very powerful soul body! "
A soul body!

The woman smiled faintly, "They were all bad people, and I killed them.
En, I've erased all their memories, and now they're a great tonic for you. After absorbing these souls, your Divine Soul should reach a very terrifying level! "

The woman smiled, "Are you worried?"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman.
"These souls are too powerful!"
The woman laughed, "If they're not powerful, it's useless to absorb them!"

Really, I'm in critical condition. If I make a move now, other than my Qing 'er, no one will be able to save him!
You should know that I'm not lying, right? "
Ye Xuan was still silent.

The souls of over 10,000 super experts can not only make my Divine Soul stronger, it can also make my Soul Subduing Sword achieve a qualitative change! "
Ye Xuan smiled, "Yes!"
The woman passed the white jade bottle to Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan took the white jade bottle, but he did not absorb it immediately.
The woman blinked, "If you absorb it now, I can help you improve!"

The woman smiled, "Of course!"
With that, she took out a Spatial Ring and handed it to Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan glanced at the Mustardseed Ring. Soon, his expression turned serious!
The woman smiled, "Moved?"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman and nodded.
The treasures in the Spatial Ring were enough to change the entire Fifth Dimension!
They could make the Fifth Dimension reach an unprecedented level!
The woman looked around, "I should also go!
Take care of yourself! "
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "Where are you going?"
The woman smiled, "A very far place. We'll meet again in the future!"
With that, she turned and left.
Under Ye Xuan's gaze, the woman disappeared into the horizon.
In the same place, Ye Xuan looked at the white jade bottle and the Spatial Ring in his hand.
At this time, Ye Zhiming suddenly said, "You don't believe this woman?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Ye Zhiming was a little confused, "Why?"
Ye Xuan said softly, "One who is unaccountably solicitous is hiding evil intentions.
My soul is not strong enough, and then someone immediately came to give me powerful souls for me to absorb … My Fifth Dimension wants to develop, and then someone came to give me so many treasures that can change the entire Fifth Dimension … Is this a coincidence?
Maybe it is, but I can't be too cautious!
If someone dug a hole for me, wouldn't it be a pain in the ass? "
Ye Zhiming said in a low voice, "Do you think she is Little Aunt?"
Ye Xuan looked at his body, then said, "She has the same bloodline as me, so it should be true. However, her appearance is a little suspicious.
Also … "
As he spoke, he looked at the white jade bottle and Storage Ring in front of him. "I can tell at a glance that these powerful souls are not simple, and with these treasures … I think she might have gone to rob a powerful force … Anyway, I have to be more careful.
When the time comes, I will go to the Nether Palace and ask that Big Aunt if she knows this Little Aunt. If she does, then she is really one of us, that would be for the best. If she doesn't … "
At this point, he did not continue!
Ye Zhiming also fell silent.
Neither of them wanted to think about the worst!
At this time, Ye Xuan said, "I will go to the Nether Palace now!"
With that, he was about to leave, but at this moment, the white jade bottle in his hand suddenly shattered, and the next moment, countless souls rushed into his forehead like a tide.
Boom!
Ye Xuan's body trembled violently, and a powerful soul aura swept out from his body, causing the space around him to tremble like an earthquake!
It's over!
This was the thought in Ye Xuan's mind at this moment.
The other party actually used force!
This was definitely a trap!
Damn it!
Is this woman really my Little Aunt?
....
On the other side, the mysterious woman looked at Ye Xuan in the distance, a faint smile on her face, "What a cautious guy, I actually failed to trick him!
However, this karma, I have to accept it even if I don't want to … "
...
Not far away, Ye Xuan was madly absorbing those souls, not because he wanted to, but because he had to!
If he did not absorb those souls, they would burst his body!
He had to absorb them!
Not only did he have to absorb them himself, but he also had to use the Soul Suppressing Sword to help him!
Because those souls were too powerful!
Just like this, after about four hours, the soul aura around Ye Xuan finally calmed down, and beside him, the Soul Suppressing Sword trembled violently, emitting a powerful soul aura that could really destroy the world!
The Soul Suppressing Sword had broken through and reached an unprecedented level of strength!
Even Ye Xuan did not know what level it had reached!
In any case, there was only one word to describe it: powerful!
And his own Divine Soul was also unprecedentedly strong!
After his Divine Soul became stronger, he realized that with a thought, his divine sense could cover a radius of millions of miles, and he could even clearly sense an ant within millions of miles!
At this moment, he felt that the whole world had become clear!
This feeling was too wonderful!
But soon, Ye Xuan's face darkened!
Why did that woman do this?
Moreover, he had the same bloodline as her, which meant that she might really be his Little Aunt!
Since she was his Little Aunt, why would she do this?
Dig a hole for him?
Ye Xuan was silent.
Although his Divine Soul had greatly improved, he could not feel happy at all!
Because his intuition told him that this was not a good thing!
At this moment, Ye Zhiming suddenly said, "But if that woman really wanted to die, she could have just killed him, why would she dig a hole for him?"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "That's what I'm confused about!"
Ye Zhiming said solemnly, "Do you want to use the treasures in the Storage Ring?"
Ye Xuan looked at the Storage Ring and said softly, "I do!
I've already absorbed these souls anyway!
If there's bad karma, even if I don't use this Storage Ring, I'm afraid it's useless. "
Saying so, he looked at the horizon, "Go back!"
Then, he turned into a sword light and disappeared into the horizon.
In the clouds, the woman looked at Ye Xuan in the distance with a complicated look in her eyes, "So similar …"
.....
PS: Did anyone force me to have a monthly ticket?








Chapter 1480
The Five-Dimensional Universe.
After returning to the Five-Dimensional Universe, Ye Xuan immediately called Bai Dizi.
In the hall, Bai Dizi looked at the storage ring in Ye Xuan's hand with a solemn expression. "These treasures …"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Shocked, right?"
Bai Dizi nodded.
Ye Xuan said softly, "I'm shocked too!"
As he said that, he told them about the mysterious woman!
After listening to Ye Xuan's words, Bai Dizi immediately shook his head. "This woman's purpose is not pure!"
Ye Xuan asked, "Why do you think so?"
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "She may really be related to you, but if it was for your own good, she would never force you to absorb those souls. Moreover, don't you think her appearance is a bit too coincidental?"
Ye Xuan nodded and said in a deep voice, "I think so too!
However, with her strength, it should be easy for her to kill me. If she wanted to deal with me, there is really no need for her to do these fancy things! "
Bai Dizi shook his head. "You can't think like that!"
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi. Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "It's easy to kill you, but what about after killing you?
Can she live? "
As he said that, he shook his head. "After the other party kills you, she definitely can't live. At least she will be retaliated."
Ye Xuan shook his head. He really couldn't figure out the woman's purpose.
Bai Dizi said again, "However, I also don't quite understand the other party's purpose!
Because since the other party knows how powerful the woman in the plain dress is, but still dared to deal with you like this, it is definitely not normal.
In any case, you have to be careful! "
Ye Xuan nodded.
He was most worried about the mysterious enemy that the third young lady mentioned. If the previous aunt was the mysterious enemy that the third young lady mentioned, then it would be a bit of a pain in the ass!
Bai Dizi suddenly said, "Right!
Miss An and Miss Xiao Qi have reached the Consolidation Realm! "
Consolidation Realm!
Ye Xuan was stunned, and then he said, "That fast?"
Bai Dizi smiled and said, "It's mainly because of Xuan City's help. Of course, the main reason is that Miss An and Miss Xiao Qi are too talented."
Ye Xuan nodded.
Xiao Qi and An Lanxiu's talent was definitely not inferior to his.
Bai Dizi continued, "Other than the two of them, Jialou, Aro, and Lady Jiu are also showing signs of breaking through."
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Where are A Mu and the others?"
Bai Dizi said, "You mean High Priest A Mu of the Wu Clan?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Of course, he did not forget this woman. He was her servant.
Bai Dizi said, "The Wu Clan has always been our focus. As for Miss A Mu, she has already reached the Dao Attainment Realm. However, it will be a little difficult for her to reach the Consolidation Realm!
Of course, Miss A Mu's strength is not cultivation talent, but her intelligence. I have formed a cabinet, which is filled with some outstanding people in our Fifth Dimension. Miss A Mu is one of them. Many of the policies were proposed by Miss A Mu! "
Ye Xuan smiled slightly. "I'll go see her!"
Bai Dizi nodded. "Okay!"
Ye Xuan left the hall and went to the hall where Bai Dizi worked, which was the Daoist Temple.
This Daoist Temple was where Bai Dizi usually worked!
At this time, a group of people were busy in the temple. There were men and women, and there were more than fifty people!
They were all people that Bai Dizi had carefully selected!
These people might not be very strong, but their intelligence was top-notch. It could be said that these people were the brains of the Fifth Dimension.
When Ye Xuan walked into the hall, everyone in the hall raised their heads to look at Ye Xuan. When they saw that it was Ye Xuan, they immediately stopped what they were doing and stood up to greet him!
Ye Xuan smiled slightly. "You guys continue with your work!"
As he said this, he looked at a woman in the corner and smiled. "My high priest, shall we go out for a walk?"
A Mu looked at Ye Xuan. After a while, she smiled sweetly. "Okay!"
The two left the hall.
Ye Xuan
(This chapter is not finished, please continue to the next page)
He brought A Mu to the city. At this time, Dao City was very prosperous. The streets were filled with people, and the majority of them were cultivators. Moreover, they were very strong.
This was because there were two attractive places in Dao City. First, there were complete versions of Dao scriptures. Second, the headquarters of the Fifth Dimension Academy was located here.
All the major powers in the universe wanted to send their people to the Fifth Dimension Academy. This included the ancient super powers like the Nanyue family and the Gu family. This was because the temptation of Dao scriptures was too great!
Although they had obtained some of the contents of Dao scriptures, their cultivation methods and martial arts were still in the hands of Ye Xuan.
As for the Whirling School, although they also had it, they didn't dare to spread it. Therefore, if one wanted to learn Dao Scriptures, martial arts, and Dao Scriptures, there were only two places. One was the Fifth Dimension, and the other was the Dao Sect!
However, Dao Gate was not open to the public. Therefore, they could only come to the Fifth Dimension.
At this time, A Mu suddenly said in a soft voice, "I thought you had forgotten about me!"
Ye Xuan collected his thoughts and smiled. "How could I forget about you?
Even if I forget about myself, I will not forget about you! "
A Mu turned her head and looked at Ye Xuan. A moment later, her expression became somewhat complicated. "You have grown so fast!"
Ye Xuan turned his head to look at A Mu and smiled. "No matter how fast I grow, I will always be your witch's servant!"
A Mu stopped and looked at Ye Xuan. "Are you still my witch's servant?"
Ye Xuan looked straight at A Mu. "I will be your witch's servant for a lifetime!
Not only your witch's servant, but also the Wu Clan's witch's servant. "
A Mu looked at Ye Xuan for a long time. After a long time, she suddenly pulled Ye Xuan's hand and smiled. "You must remember what you said!"
Ye Xuan held A Mu's hand. "I never lie to my own people!"
The corner of A Mu's mouth rose. "The witch's servant I found is the strongest in the history of the Wu Clan."
Ye Xuan laughed.
A Mu suddenly said softly, "Meeting you and choosing you is my fortune, and also the Wu Clan's fortune!"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "Meeting you is my fortune!"
A Mu smiled mischievously. "Do you really think so?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "I told you.
I never lie to my own people! "
A Mu blinked. "I'm one of your own people?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes!"
A Mu smiled. "Thank you.
Actually, at first I really thought you had forgotten about me!
I didn't dare to look for you because I was afraid you would really forget about me!
I just didn't expect you to take the initiative to look for me! "
Ye Xuan said softly, "I'm sorry."
A Mu shook her head. "I know you are very busy. Moreover, the enemies are getting stronger and stronger."
As she said that, she looked at Ye Xuan. "Do we still have powerful enemies?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes!"
A Mu sighed softly. "When will it end?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "It's fine. I'll carry it!"
As he said that, he pulled A Mu to the noodle shop. He looked at the owner of the noodle shop and said with a smile, "Boss, two bowls of noodles!"
The owner laughed. "Sir, please wait a moment!
I'll be right there! "
As Ye Xuan and A Mu took their seats, many people around them looked over, mainly at A Mu!
A Mu was a great beauty. Coupled with her gentle personality, she gave people a very comfortable feeling.
Soon, two bowls of noodles were served.
Ye Xuan looked at A Mu and said with a smile, "I especially like eating noodles!"
A Mu blinked. "Were you poor when you were young?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "You investigated me?"
A Mu nodded.
Ye Xuan looked at the noodles in front of him. At that moment, he thought of Ye Ling again!
He did not know how that little girl was doing now!
However, with that mysterious senior around, Ye Ling's safety would definitely not be a problem.
At that moment, laughter suddenly came from the side. "What a beautiful woman!"
Hearing that, Ye Xuan frowned slightly. He turned his head and saw a young man walking over slowly from afar.
The man was wearing a purple brocade robe.
(If this chapter is not finished, please continue to the next page.)
There was a piece of green jade tied to his waist. The jade was the size of a palm and emitted a dark green glow. It was obvious that it was no ordinary item.
And in his right hand, he held a long sword.
The man was handsome and dressed luxuriously. The moment he appeared, he attracted the attention of many people, especially women.
Many women around looked at the man with smiles on their faces and covered their mouths as they whispered.
Actually, the man's looks were secondary. The most important thing was that the man was carrying a sword!
One look and you could tell that he was a Swordsman!
It should be known that the most popular person in the entire Fifth Dimension was a Swordsman!
This was because the Master of the Fifth Dimension, who was also the dean of the Fifth Dimension Academy, Ye Xuan, was a Swordsman.
Behind the young man, there was an old man. The old man carried a sword and his eyes were as sharp as an eagle's. One look and you could tell that he was an expert!
The man slowly walked to the side of Ye Xuan and A Mu. He looked at A Mu and smiled. "Miss, there is still an empty seat here. May I sit here?"
A Mu looked at a certain badge on the man's chest. She smiled and shook her head. "It's not convenient!"
The man was not angry. He smiled and said, "Miss, let me introduce myself. I am Nanmu Chuan!"
"Nanmu Chuan!"
As soon as the man's voice fell, there was a cry of surprise!
"Oh my god!
He's that Nanmu Chuan! "
"It's really him!
He's Nanmu Chuan from the number one family in the South, the Nanmu family! "
"The number one swordsman of the South, Nanmu Chuan …"
"I heard that his overall score reached nine stars!"
"Nine stars … So he's here to join the Fifth Dimension Academy's headquarters?"
"That's for sure …"
Fifth Dimension Academy!
In front of A Mu, Ye Xuan blinked his eyes and looked at Nanmu Chuan. "You're from the Fifth Dimension Academy?"
Nanmu Chuan looked at Ye Xuan. "Let me correct you. I'm currently from the Fifth Dimension Academy's headquarters!"
Ye Xuan pointed at himself. He was a little puzzled. "You don't know me?"
Nanmu Chuan smiled. "Should I know you?"
Ye Xuan turned to look at A Mu. A Mu covered her mouth and chuckled. She used her mystical qi to transmit her voice. "Every academy has a statue of you and Miss Nian Nian. However, that statue is a little exaggerated. In addition, you're wearing too ordinary clothes. Moreover, your aura is restrained and you don't have the aura of a ruler. Therefore, it's normal that he doesn't know you!
In fact, it's not just them. Many people in the city don't really know you. Because you spend very little time in the city, people rarely come into contact with you. Even if they see you, they won't think of you immediately. "
Ye Xuan was speechless. He was too low-key!
At this time, Nanmu Chuan looked at A Mu. "How should I address you, miss?"
A Mu smiled. She pointed at Ye Xuan. "Do you know who he is?"
Nanmu Chuan glanced at Ye Xuan. He smiled. "I don't know!
I don't want to know either. "
A Mu was a little curious. "Why?"
Nanmu Chuan smiled. "Miss, forgive me for being blunt. He's not worthy of you!"
Ye Xuan lowered his head and ate his noodles. He didn't say anything.
This was too tragic!
His position as the master of the Fifth Dimension was really too tragic!
It was fine if outsiders didn't know him!
But no one in the city had noticed him!
When he got back, he had to have a good talk with Bai Dizi.
Nanmu Chuan looked at A Mu. "Miss, do you really not want to get to know me?
I feel that if you don't get to know me, first of all, I will feel very regretful. Second, I feel that this is a loss for you. "
A Mu gently kicked Ye Xuan. She was a little dissatisfied. "My Witch's Servant, stop eating!"
Ye Xuan wiped his mouth and looked at Nanmu Chuan. "She's my High Priestess, and I'm her Witch's Servant. She won't get to know another man."
Nanmu Chuan shook his head and smiled. He took out a storage ring and placed it in front of Ye Xuan. "There are a hundred Fortune Divine Crystals inside. There's also a scroll of my Sword Dao mental cultivation method and insights. It's enough to change your fate. Leave her, and these are all yours!"
Ye Xuan: "…"
...
(End of this chapter)








Chapter 1481
One hundred Fortune Divine Crystals!
Ye Xuan was speechless.
'Dammit, I still have a few hundred million in my storage ring!'
A Mu covered her mouth and snickered. At this moment, she did not look like a High Priestess. Instead, she looked like a young girl in love.
When Nanmu Chuan saw that Ye Xuan did not speak, he took out another storage ring. "Two hundred Fortune Divine Crystals!"
Two hundred!
Ye Xuan was about to speak when Nanmu Chuan threw out another storage ring. "One thousand Fortune Divine Crystals!"
One thousand!
Someone exclaimed in surprise!
One thousand Fortune Divine Crystals was not a small amount!
One should know that the most common crystals in the market were ordinary crystals. Only some of the major forces had Fortune Divine Crystals!
