There was another reason why many people racked their brains to enter the Fifth Dimensions Academy. The academy would provide them with Fortune Divine Crystals!
For an ordinary person, one thousand Fortune Divine Crystals was enough to change their fate!
Ye Xuan looked at Nanmu Chuan and smiled. "So what if you're rich?"
Nanmu Chuan smiled. "Being rich isn't necessarily a big deal. But without money, one must be a coward. What do you think?"
Ye Xuan shook his head and smiled. "You're right. Without money, one must be a coward.
But I don't understand. Didn't your academy teach you how to behave?
First of all, it's rude of you to interrupt us while we're eating noodles. Secondly, you insulted me with money. That's very tasteless.
I remember there's a rule in the academy. Disciples are not allowed to bully the weak or … "
Nanmu Chuan suddenly interrupted Ye Xuan. "I'm sorry. There's no such rule in the academy!"
Ye Xuan looked at Nanmu Chuan. "Then there's one now!
I said it! "
Nanmu Chuan narrowed his eyes. He had already noticed that something was wrong.
A Mu was also silent.
She knew that Ye Xuan was a little angry.
Bullying the weak was what Ye Xuan hated the most. Simply put, bullying the weak and fearing the strong.
Nanmu Chuan looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Looks like you're not an ordinary person!
However, aren't you a little too arrogant? Do you think you can change the academy's rules just because you say so? "
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I think we should give people a chance to turn over a new leaf!
Now, apologize, apologize to both of us, sincerely apologize, and we will forgive you!
What do you think? "
Nanmu Chuan laughed. "Sir, you think too highly of yourself."
Ye Xuan faintly smiled. "Then I will now announce that you are disqualified from entering the Fifth Dimensions Academy!"
Nanmu Chuan looked at Ye Xuan and the smile on his face gradually disappeared. "Who the hell are you?!"
He was not stupid. At this moment, he already felt that something was wrong.
Just as Ye Xuan was about to speak, a voice sounded out from the side. "Brother Nanmu, this person sure is arrogant."
Ye Xuan turned his head and saw a man striding over from afar!
Nanmu Chuan was slightly surprised when he saw this person. Then, he smiled and said, "Oh, it's Brother Fang Jin!"
"Fang Jin!"
Someone in the crowd exclaimed, "He's also Fang Jin who passed the Nine Stars Academy!"
This time, there were only two people from the South who were admitted into the Fifth Dimensions Academy. One of them was Nanmu Chuan, and the other was Fang Jin. These two people belonged to the same academy in the South!
Fang Jin cupped his fists at Nanmu Chuan and then looked at Ye Xuan. He smiled and said, "Did you just say that you want to disqualify Nanmu Chuan?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Yes!"
Fang Jin shook his head and smiled. "Don't you think it's ridiculous for you to say that?"
Ye Xuan blinked his eyes. "Is it ridiculous?"
Fang Jin laughed. "It's not just ridiculous!
As far as I know, there are only two people who can disqualify someone from the academy. One of them is Vice-Dean Bai Dizi, and the other is Ye Xuan. You … "
At this point, he seemed to have thought of something. His pupils suddenly shrank and he took a few steps back. "You …"
Ye Xuan smiled. "What about me?"
Fang Jin stared at Ye Xuan. After a while, he said in a trembling voice, "Ye … Dean …"
Dean Ye!
As soon as he said this, the crowd was in an uproar!
At this time, someone exclaimed, "He … He's City Lord Ye!
It's really him … He used to kill a fish seller here … "
Green City, Ye Family, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent and no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as the Crown Prince will be replaced by Ye Lang."
The person who spoke was an old man in a black robe.
Not far behind the old man stood a young man. The young man had a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
Beside him were the elders of the Ye Family.
"Why!"
At this moment, a timid voice suddenly rang out in the ancestral hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
The little girl was called Ye Ling. She was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the family wanted to disqualify Ye Xuan, she rushed over despite her illness.
The old man frowned. "Ye Ling, what are you doing!"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the ancestral hall and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is the Crown Prince. Why did you disqualify him?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly. "This is a family matter. Why are you interrupting?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was clearly a little fearful. She did not dare to look the Great Elder in the eye, but she did not leave. Instead, she mustered up her courage and walked into the ancestral hall. She bowed to the elders on both sides of the hall and said, "Elders, my brother is currently fighting with the Li family for the mining rights of the mine in Nanshan. He is now fighting for the family, and it is unknown whether he is alive or dead. However, the family has used a groundless excuse to remove his position as the Crown Prince.
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged. "It's not up to a little girl like you to decide whether to disqualify him or not.
Men, drag her away. "
At this time, the new Crown Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged 30 times as a warning!"
The Great Elder replied coldly, "Then flog him 30 times!"
Very quickly, two guards of the Ye Family rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists and said angrily, "This is unfair. My brother has risked his life for the family for so many years. Even now, he is fighting for the family. The family is unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Crown Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that this was his chance to shine.
The guard smiled coldly. "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the title of Crown Prince. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded. Ye Ling's right cheek instantly turned red and swollen. However, she did not cry. She just covered her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard and smiled. "What's your name?"
The guard quickly bowed. "Subordinate Zhang Mu greets the Crown Prince."
Ye Lang nodded. "You're not bad. After I become the Crown Prince, I will need ten guards. You can be my guard from now on."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed. He quickly bowed deeply. "I will go through fire and water for the Crown Prince. I will do anything for you!"
Ye Lang nodded. "Drag him away. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall. Don't hold back. Understood?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang. When he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu suddenly stopped as if he had seen something.
In the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man wore a tight-fitting robe. The robe was tattered and covered in blood.
The young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's mouth curled into a cold smile.
In the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes. His face was dark and gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage. "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He looked at Ye Lang and was about to speak. At this time, Ye Xuan leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt dizzy, and he stumbled and fell.
Ye Lang did not stop there. He charged at Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man. How dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly. Ye Xuan lifted his head to look at him, asking savagely, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stomped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan ignored Zhang Mu, walking up to Ye Ling. Seeing Ye Ling's state, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced apart. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as Prince shall be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in black robes.
Not far behind the old man, there was a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides, there were the Ye Clan Elders.
"Why!?"
At this time, a timid voice rang out in the Ancestral Hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she disregarded her illness and rushed over.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!?"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to everyone in the Ancestral Hall, and asked timidly, "Great Elder, my brother, Ye Xuan, is the Prince. Why did you cripple him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a matter of the clan, what are you interrupting for?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was clearly a little fearful. She did not dare to look the Great Elder in the eye, but she did not leave. Instead, she mustered up her courage and walked into the ancestral hall. She bowed to the elders on both sides of the hall and said, "Elders, my brother is currently fighting with the Li family for the mining rights of the mine in Nanshan. He is now fighting for the family, and it is unknown whether he is alive or dead. However, the family has used a groundless excuse to remove his position as the Crown Prince.
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Whether he's crippled or not, it's not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away! "
At this time, the new Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "He should be flogged 30 times, as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder replied coldly, "Then flog him 30 times!"
Very quickly, two Ye Clan guards rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists, and said angrily, "This is unfair! My brother has risked his life for the clan for so many years, and even now, he's fighting for the clan. The clan is unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that this was his chance to shine.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the Prince's position. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly swelled up. However, she did not cry, and only held her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard, and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard quickly bowed, "This subordinate, Zhang Mu, greets the Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Prince, I'll need ten guards. From now on, you'll be my guard."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed, and quickly bowed deeply, "This subordinate is willing to go through fire and water for the Prince, even if it means death!"
Ye Lang nodded, "Drag him away. This person is causing trouble in the ancestral hall. Don't hold back, understand?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang, and when he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu seemed to have seen something, and he suddenly stopped.
Inside the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside the hall.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe, and his robe was tattered, and there was blood everywhere.
The young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's mouth curled into a cold smile.
In the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, and his face was dark. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage, "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He quickly looked at Ye Lang, and was about to speak. At this moment, Ye Xuan leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Bang!
Zhang Mu's head spun, and he stumbled and fell.
Ye Lang did not stop there, and charged towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man, how dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly, while Ye Xuan lifted his head to look at him, asking savagely, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stomped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's state, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu, and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!








Chapter 1482
Kill him!
There was complete silence.
Around them, some people secretly shook their heads.
Was there something wrong with Nanmu Chuan's brain?
Facing Ye Xuan, not only did he refuse to admit defeat, he even said such ruthless words. Did he really think that Ye Xuan was a good-tempered person?
Overturn the Fifth Dimension Academy?
How stupid would he have to be to say such words!
Ye Xuan shook his head. He turned to look at A Mu and smiled. "Let's go!"
A Mu nodded.
The two of them left.
On the way, A Mu said softly, "It's our fault. When we go back, I will strengthen the management of the various academies, especially the education on how to behave."
Ye Xuan shook his head. "It's my problem!"
A Mu looked at Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan smiled. "I seemed too easy to talk to at the beginning!
He felt that I was weak.
This world is like this. Some people have a good temper, but in the eyes of others, a good temper means that they are easy to bully. However, a good temper does not mean that they have no temper. "
As he said that, he shook his head. "There are many people!
They like to bully the weak and fear the strong. They like to bully the kind and honest because the kind and honest are easy to bully.
There are also some people who like to use moral coercion. Just look at Nanmu Chuan. He actually said that I am the headmaster and cannot kill him. Killing him would be breaking the law … It really amused me!
This is like a mother of a naughty child. Her child has made a mistake.
However, she does not educate her child. Instead, she educates you and questions you. He is still a child!
How can you be so calculative with a child? "
A Mu shook her head and smiled. "Your analogy …"
Ye Xuan smiled. "It's not particularly appropriate!
But you should understand what I mean! "
A Mu nodded. She seemed to have thought of something. She hesitated and then said, "But you are the headmaster. This matter should not be handled personally. I am afraid that someone will use it …"
Ye Xuan suddenly smiled. "Who dares?"
A Mu was silent.
In the Fifth Dimension, no one dared to stab Ye Xuan in the back.
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "A Mu, what do you think they came to the headquarters for?"
A Mu said, "Learn!"
Ye Xuan asked, "What else?"
A Mu was silent.
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "They are not only here to learn, but also to protect the Five-Dimensional Universe.
The Fifth Dimension. Was it Sister Nian's Fifth Dimension?
Is this my, Ye Xuan's, Five-Dimensional Universe?
No, the Fifth Dimension is everyone's Fifth Dimension. Anyone who lives in the Fifth Dimension has the obligation to protect our Fifth Dimension.
The Academy is not a safe place for them to enjoy. I, Ye Xuan, will not spend money to feed a bunch of conceited people. "
As he spoke, he looked at A Mu. "Remember, we're not doing charity.
For some people, if you help them once, they will shed tears of gratitude. But if you help them ten times, they will feel that it's only right. And if you don't help them anymore!
They might even see you as an enemy.
I'm telling you this because I realized that our Academy lacks a core purpose.
What is the purpose of entering the school?
There's nothing wrong with learning!
But what else?
I don't ask them to serve me, Ye Xuan, but they must serve this universe. Do you understand? "
A Mu nodded. "I understand!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "You can talk to Bai Dizi about this. He will handle it."
Ah Mu smiled and said, "Old Bai is very busy. Let me handle this matter!
I will come up with a plan first, then I will submit it to you. You can make the final decision! "
Ye Xuan nodded. "Okay!"
A Mu smiled. "Come back for noodles next time!"
Ye Xuan laughed. "Okay!"
After chatting for a while, they parted ways. Ye Xuan did not return to the Sword Hall directly. Instead, he went to the Boundless Dungeon.
Tendo Pawnshop!
When Ye Xuan came to the Tendo Pawnshop, the door was open.
There was a woman standing behind the counter inside the door!
It was Xiao Dao!
As if sensing something, Xiao Dao suddenly looked up. When she saw Ye Xuan, she was slightly stunned.
Ye Xuan walked into the pawnshop and smiled. "They told me that you've been living here?"
Xiao Dao nodded. "Yes."
Ye Xuan looked around and said softly, "I haven't been here for a long time!"
Xiao Dao looked at Ye Xuan. "You're very busy now!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "I'm a little busy!"
Xiao Dao said softly, "When will Nian Nian regain her memory?"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "I don't know!"
Xiao Dao was silent.
Ye Xuan was about to speak. At this moment, the space in front of him trembled slightly. Ye Xuan frowned.
Xiao Dao asked, "What's wrong?"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Nian Nian is gone!"
Gone!
The Little Daoist was stunned for a moment before saying, "It disappeared?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I'm going back!"
After saying that, he disappeared.
In the pawnshop, Xiao Dao was silent for a while before disappearing.
...
Sword Hall.
When Ye Xuan returned to the Sword Hall, Bai Dizi had been waiting there for a long time.
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "You said that Nian Nian is gone?"
Bai Dizi nodded. "Not long ago, she was wandering around the city, so I didn't pay much attention. But not long after, she disappeared!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "Has she regained her memory?"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "I don't know!"
Bai Dizi was silent.
Ye Xuan said softly, "Have you sent anyone to look for her?"
Bai Dizi nodded. "But there's no news at all. Also, we don't know how she disappeared!"
Ye Xuan was silent for a moment, then said softly, "There's no need to look for her!"
Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan smiled. "I believe that she will come back!"
With that, he looked at Bai Dizi. "As long as Sister Nian doesn't want anything to happen to her, she won't be in danger!"
Bai Dizi smiled. "That's true!"
Then, he looked at Ye Xuan. "Today is the first day of school. As the dean, you should go."
Ye Xuan shook his head. "I don't really want to go!"
Bai Dizi said, "Is it because of Nanmu Chuan?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "You know about it too?"
Bai Dizi said, "As the most outstanding Swordsman of the younger generation in the South, it's normal for him to be arrogant."
Ye Xuan smiled. "Do you think I did something wrong?"
Bai Dizi shook his head. "No!
Through this matter, I discovered a problem. Many people in the Fifth Dimension respect you, but they don't fear you. If I were the one who appeared, that guy definitely wouldn't have threatened you. On the contrary, he would have immediately admitted his mistake and begged for mercy! "
Ye Xuan smiled. "What's the problem?"
Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan. "The reason is that you're too young!
Youngsters generally don't respect other youngsters!
The students in the Academy know you're strong, but no one knows how strong you are!
Therefore, many people don't fear you. Since they don't fear you, they naturally dare to provoke you. After all, they're proud sons of heaven, and these kinds of people usually don't submit to people of the same age!
Therefore, it is necessary for you to attend the Start-of-Term Ceremony.
At the same time, I also hope that you can tell them that in this world, there are youngsters who are more outstanding than them. Let them know that there's always someone better than you! "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Looks like I have to go!"
Bai Dizi nodded. "As the dean, you should go no matter what!
Moreover, you should also show your strength.
Let those guys know that you, the dean, aren't some kind of trash! "
Ye Xuan laughed. "Then let's go!"
Bai Dizi nodded and the two of them left.
With regards to Nian Nian, Ye Xuan wasn't really worried because he knew how terrifying Nian Nian was.
...
Fifth Dimensions Academy.
Dao City was unusually lively today because today was the day students from all over the universe would come to Dao City to enroll.
It was also the first time the Dao City's headquarters was recruiting students!
And this time, those who came could be said to be monsters among monsters, geniuses among geniuses.
It could be said that this time, all the monsters and geniuses of the Fifth Dimension would be gathered here, including some geniuses from ancient powers. For example, Nanyue Xiu and Nanyue Qi of the Nanyue Clan. Not only the Nanyue Clan, but there were also geniuses from the Gu Clan and Xuan City.
Fifth Dimensions Academy.
The Fifth Dimensions Academy was built on a large scale. There were more than sixty different learning halls. In addition, there were also formations arranged by the Xuanji Sect. There were all kinds of formations, more than a hundred of them.
As for the lineup of teachers, it was also very luxurious. Aro, An Lanxiu, and Li Shanshui of the Whirling Sect were all teachers of the academy. They were all super experts at the peak of the Fifth Dimension.
At the entrance of the academy, there were two huge statues.
One was of Nian Nian, and the other was of Ye Xuan.
Nian Nian was the Tendo of the Fifth Dimension, the soul of the entire Fifth Dimension, while Ye Xuan was the protector of the entire Fifth Dimension.
As the entrance of the Fifth Dimensions Academy opened, students entered the academy one after another.
Somewhere in the darkness, Bai Dizi smiled and said, "Dao Master, what do you think of these students?"
Ye Xuan looked at the students in the distance and said softly, "Very outstanding!"
Bai Dizi nodded, "This world doesn't lack monsters and geniuses. What it lacks is people who discover them!
This time, even I was shocked by the establishment of the academy!
It turns out that there are so many monsters and geniuses in our cosmos!
Originally, the academy only accepted thirty people every year, but I felt that it wasn't enough, so I expanded it to forty. "
Ye Xuan said softly, "These people are the future of the Fifth Dimension!"
Bai Dizi nodded.
The Fifth Dimension couldn't always be carried by Ye Xuan. His intuition told him that in the future, Ye Xuan would definitely go to a broader stage!
At this time, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "We need to let these guys have a sense of belonging to the Fifth Dimension."
Bai Dizi said with a smile, "That's natural!
Actually, everyone already has a sense of belonging to the Fifth Dimension. Let's not talk about other things, many people in my Dao Sect have already regarded themselves as members of the Fifth Dimension! "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "That's a good thing!"
Bai Dizi looked at the students in the distance and said with a smile, "Some of the branch vice-deans told me to pay attention."
Pay attention to what? "Ye Xuan was curious.
Bai Dizi said with a smile, "There are many thorns in this batch of students!"
At this time, a man suddenly rushed in from the distance. He was tall and sturdy, and with every step he took, the ground would tremble violently. Not only the ground, but the space he ran through would also tremble.
Ye Xuan looked at this man, and there was some surprise in his eyes. "Not bad!"
Bai Dizi nodded. "This guy is called Man Zi. He is a body cultivator, and he is the strongest among the body cultivators. Moreover, his overall score has reached ten stars."
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "What's the highest score?"
Bai Dizi said, "Twelve stars. This time, among all the students, only one person has reached twelve stars, and among them, there are only six 11-star students."
Ye Xuan was about to speak, but at this time, Man Zi suddenly rushed in front of Ye Xuan's statue. He looked straight at Ye Xuan's statue and roared, "Man Zi of the Great Wilderness, I challenge Dean Ye!
I seek a hammer! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
..








Chapter 1483
Begging for a hammer!
Ye Xuan's expression was a little strange.
Next to Ye Xuan, Bai Dizi smiled and said, "Look, they are not very convinced by you. However, you have to understand. After all, they are all geniuses. It is normal for them to have drive."
Ye Xuan nodded, "Of course!"
Bai Dizi looked at Man Zi in the distance, "Everyone is waiting for you to appear!"
Ye Xuan laughed, and the next moment, he appeared directly in front of Man Zi.
Seeing Ye Xuan, there was an uproar in the field.
Ye Xuan appeared!
The eyes of all the students around fell on Ye Xuan. There was respect, curiosity, excitement, and provocation …
Dean!
Although Ye Xuan was the Dean, Ye Xuan was the same age as them. In addition, Ye Xuan's strength was mostly legendary. For example, Ye Xuan had killed a Consolidation Realm expert and so on … Therefore, many people had always been skeptical about Ye Xuan's strength.
In other words, many people wanted to know how strong Ye Xuan was!
Seeing Ye Xuan, the barbarian chuckled. "You're the dean?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes!"
Man Zi glanced at Ye Xuan, "Do you dare to accept my challenge?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I dare!"
Man Zi grinned and said, "Let me tell you, my fist has no eyes. If I hurt you later, don't blame me, and don't make things difficult for me!"
Ye Xuan was directly amused by this guy!
It turned out that this guy was afraid that he would make things difficult for him!
Man Zi asked again, "Is there a problem?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Don't worry, I will definitely not make things difficult for you."
Man Zi grinned, "Then I won't be polite!"
As his voice fell, he suddenly rushed forward. With this rush, the space in front of Ye Xuan directly turned into a groove!
His physical strength was too strong!
When he arrived in front of Ye Xuan, the barbarian directly threw a punch at Ye Xuan's head.
It was a simple punch!
However, this punch contained a powerful and overbearing force!
With a single punch, the space around Ye Xuan directly cracked!
Needless to say, Ye Xuan was still a little shocked. This punch was definitely not something an average Dao Accomplished Realm powerhouse could resist!
And how old was this barbarian?
To have such great power at such a young age, one had to say that it was very terrifying!
Without any hesitation, Ye Xuan punched out.
Boom!
Under everyone's gazes, the barbarian was sent flying out of the academy before crashing heavily onto the ground.
Bang!
The ground collapsed, and the barbarian's body trembled.
The surroundings fell silent!
One punch!
Many of the students present turned solemn.
Right at this moment, the barbarian slowly crawled up from the ground, and his entire body had cracked apart!
Ye Xuan walked over to him, and the barbarian hurriedly said, "No! No more!
I can't! "
Ye Xuan smiled, "I'm not going to hit you!"
As he spoke, he withdrew a medicinal pill and passed it to Man 'zi. "It's for healing!"
Man 'zi glanced at Ye Xuan, hesitated for a moment, and then took the medicinal pill and consumed it. As soon as the medicinal pill entered his body, a strand of pure energy swept out from within him, and it didn't take long for his injuries to heal at a visible speed.
Man 'zi was slightly shocked. "This …."
Ye Xuan smiled, "Your physical body isn't bad, and your strength isn't bad as well. However, there's still a lot of room for growth!"
Man 'zi hurriedly stood up and bowed respectfully.
Pine City, the Ye Clan's Ancestral Shrine.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan is lacking in talent and virtue …. From this moment onward, Ye Xuan is removed from the position of Heir and will be succeeded by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in a black robe.
Not far behind the old man stood a youth with a faint smile hanging on the corners of his mouth.
This person was Ye Lang.
And on both sides were the Ye Clan's Elders.
"Why!"
At this moment, a somewhat timid voice suddenly resounded in the Ancestral Shrine.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
The little girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the Clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she disregarded her illness and rushed over.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the Ancestral Shrine, and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is a Heir, why did you remove him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a Clan matter, why are you interrupting?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was obviously afraid, and did not dare to look directly at the Great Elder, but she did not leave. Instead, she summoned her courage and walked into the Ancestral Shrine. She bowed again to the Elders on both sides, "Dear Elders, my brother is fighting with the Li Clan over the mining rights at Nanshan. He is fighting for the Clan, and his life is uncertain. But the Clan is using a groundless excuse to remove him from the position of Heir. This is really unfair."
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly said angrily, "Whether he is removed or not, it is not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away for me. "
At this time, the new Heir Ye Lang suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged thirty times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder coldly said, "Then flog thirty times!"
Soon, two guards of the Ye Clan rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists, and said angrily, "This is unfair. My brother has risked his life for the Clan for so many years, and even now he is fighting for the Clan. The Clan is so unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Heir Ye Lang, and he knew that his chance to shine had come.
The guard smiled coldly, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the position of Heir, and it is everyone's wish. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly swelled up. But she did not cry, and only held her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard, and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed, "Subordinate Zhang Mu greets the Heir."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Heir, I will need ten guards. You will be my guard from now on."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed, and quickly bowed deeply, "This subordinate will go through fire and water for the Heir, and I will risk my life for him!"
Ye Lang nodded, "Drag him out. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall, don't show mercy, understand?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang, and when he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu seemed to see something, and suddenly stopped.
In the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe, and the robe was tattered, and there was blood everywhere.
The young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's lips curled into a sinister smile.
Inside the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, and his expression was frighteningly gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his expression turned savage, "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his expression changed. He quickly looked at Ye Lang, and was about to speak, when Ye Xuan suddenly leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
However, Ye Ling did not stop there. He charged towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man, how dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's expression turned ugly. Ye Xuan looked up at him, and snarled, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stepped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's appearance, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed out, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu, and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as Prince shall be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in black robes.
Not far behind the old man, there was a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides, there were the Ye Clan Elders.
"Why!?"
At this time, a timid voice rang out in the ancestral hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she disregarded her illness and rushed over.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!?"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the ancestral hall, and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is a Prince, why did you discard him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a matter of the clan, why are you interrupting?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was obviously afraid, not daring to look at the Great Elder, but she did not leave. Instead, she plucked up her courage and walked into the ancestral hall. She bowed to the Elders on both sides, "Elders, my brother is fighting with the Li Clan over the mining rights at Nanshan. He is fighting for the clan, and we don't know if he's dead or alive. Yet, the clan is using a groundless excuse to discard his position. This is unfair."
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Whether he discards his position or not, it's not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away. "
At this time, the new Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged 30 times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder replied coldly, "Then flog her 30 times!"
Soon, two guards of the Ye Clan rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists and said angrily, "This is unfair. My brother has risked his life for the clan for so many years. Even now, he is risking his life for the clan. The clan is so unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that this was his chance to shine.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the position of Prince. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly swelled up. However, she did not cry. She only covered her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed. "Subordinate Zhang Mu greets the Crown Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Prince, I will need 10 guards. You can be my guard from now on."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed. He quickly bowed deeply, "This subordinate is willing to go through fire and water for the Prince!"
Ye Lang nodded, "Drag him away. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall. Don't hold back. Do you understand?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang. When he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu suddenly stopped as if he had seen something.
Inside the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside the hall.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe. The robe was tattered and covered in blood.
The young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's lips curled into a sinister smile.
Inside the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, his face dark and gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage. "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He quickly looked at Ye Lang and was about to speak. At this time, Ye Xuan leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
However, Ye Ling did not stop there. He charged at Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man! How dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly. Ye Xuan looked up at him and said, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stepped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked up to Ye Ling. Seeing Ye Ling's state, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced apart. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!








Chapter 1484
Who was that mysterious person just now?
Ye Xuan was puzzled.
As if he thought of something, Ye Xuan got up and left. After a while, he arrived at the Dao Gate.
He was looking for Third Miss!
Dao Gate.
As soon as Ye Xuan arrived, an old man appeared in front of him. The old man glanced at Ye Xuan and cupped his fists. "Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "I'm looking for Third Miss. Please inform her!"
The old man smiled bitterly. "Young Master Ye came at a bad time. Third Miss has just left!"
Ye Xuan frowned. "Left?"
The old man nodded.
Ye Xuan asked, "Where did she go?"
The old man shook his head. "She didn't say!"
Ye Xuan fell silent.
The old man said, "Young Master Ye, do you want to go in and have a seat?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Thank you!
But there's no need!
I still have something to deal with. Goodbye! "
With that said, he turned and left.
After a moment of silence, the old man turned and left. It didn't take long for him to arrive in front of a large hall, within which sat a woman.
It was Third Miss!
The old man bowed slightly. "Third Master, Young Master Ye has left!"
Third Miss nodded slightly. "Got it!"
The old man was puzzled. "Third Master, why didn't you see Young Master Ye?"
Third Miss felt helpless. "Because I'm afraid of death!"
The old man was speechless.
Third Miss got up and walked to the entrance of the hall. She looked up at the sky and said softly, "I'm afraid that Young Master Ye is in big trouble!"
...
After Ye Xuan left the Taoist Gate, his face became more and more serious.
His intuition told him that Third Miss did not want to see him!
But why did she not want to see him?
It was simple!
His enemy made Third Miss fearful, extremely fearful!
Who was that enemy?
Could it be that aunt?
A moment later, Ye Xuan turned and left.
He arrived at Xuan City.
In a certain hall, Lan Ruo shook his head. "I didn't see them, so I don't know which faction they are from!"
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan stood up and said with a smile, "Miss Lanruo, I'll take my leave first!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "Young Master Ye, take care!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "You too."
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned around and transformed into a streak of sword light that vanished into the horizon.
Inside the hall, Lan Ruo looked at the horizon in silence.
Although Ye Xuan no longer had his archenemy, Dao Sect, she realized that Ye Xuan seemed to be in more danger!
There seemed to be an invisible hand secretly targeting Ye Xuan!
As for who it was, she didn't know either. However, she knew that it wasn't an ordinary mastermind!
After a short moment, Lan Ruo sighed softly, turned around, and left.
...
After leaving the Profound City, Ye Xuan came to a starry sky and slowly closed his eyes.
He was sure that he had a hidden enemy, and this enemy was very, very powerful!
The Sacred Land!
Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes. At this moment, he thought of the Sacred Land!
Dao Sect was no longer his enemy, so there was only one place left — the Sacred Land, a mysterious force that even Profound City couldn't infiltrate!
As he thought of this, Ye Xuan suddenly transformed into a streak of sword light and disappeared into the horizon.
Not long after, Ye Xuan arrived at the Sacred Land.
As soon as he entered the Sacred Land, the Sacred Leader of the Sacred Land appeared in front of Ye Xuan.
Seeing the Sacred Leader, Ye Xuan's face darkened.
He didn't come openly, he came sneakily. Of course, he didn't come openly.
Green City, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent and no virtue … From this moment onwards, Ye Xuan's position as Crown Prince shall be removed and Ye Lang shall take over."
The one who spoke was an old man dressed in a black robe.
Not far behind the old man stood a young man with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides were the Ye Clan's elders.
"Why?!"
At this moment, a timid voice suddenly rang out in the ancestral hall.
Everyone looked over and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her two little hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face was sickly pale, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of timidity in her eyes.
This little girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she rushed over despite her illness.
The black-robed old man frowned. "Ye Ling, what are you doing!"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed slightly to the people in the ancestral hall and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother, Ye Xuan, is the Crown Prince. Why did you cripple him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked coldly at Ye Ling. "This is a family matter. Why are you interrupting?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was clearly a little fearful. She did not dare to look the Great Elder in the eye, but she did not leave. Instead, she mustered up her courage and walked into the ancestral hall. She bowed to the elders on both sides of the hall and said, "Elders, my brother is currently fighting with the Li family for the mining rights of the mine in Nanshan. He is now fighting for the family, and it is unknown whether he is alive or dead. However, the family has used a groundless excuse to remove his position as the Crown Prince. This is truly unfair.
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Whether he's stripped or not, it's not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away. "
At this time, the new Crown Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged 30 times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder coldly replied, "Then do it 30 times!"
Very quickly, two Ye Clan's guards rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists, and said angrily, "This is unfair. My brother has risked his life for the clan for so many years. Even now, he's fighting for the clan. The clan is unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Crown Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that this was his chance to shine.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the Crown Prince position. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly turned red and swollen. However, she did not cry, and only held her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard quickly bowed, "Subordinate Zhang Mu greets the Crown Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Crown Prince, I'll need ten guards. From now on, you'll be my guard."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed, and quickly bowed deeply, "I'll go through fire and water for the Crown Prince, and I'll risk my life for you!"
Ye Lang nodded, "Drag him away. This person is causing trouble in the Ancestral Hall, do not hold back. Understood?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang, and when he saw the killing intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this time, Zhang Mu seemed to have seen something, and he suddenly stopped.
Within the Ancestral Hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the Ancestral Hall, a young man was walking towards the Ancestral Hall. He was wearing a tight-fitting robe that was tattered and covered in blood.
This person was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from the Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's lips curled into a cold smile.
Inside the Ancestral Hall, all the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, and his face was dark. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage, "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He quickly looked at Ye Lang and was about to speak. At this time, Ye Xuan was like a ferocious tiger leaping in front of him. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
Ye Lang did not stop there, and charged towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man, how dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly, while Ye Xuan lifted his head to look at him, asking savagely, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stomped down on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's state, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as Prince shall be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in black robes.
Not far behind the old man, there was a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides, there were the Ye Clan Elders.
"Why!?"
Right at this moment, a slightly timid voice suddenly resounded within the ancestral hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she disregarded her illness and rushed over.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!?"
The girl called Ye Ling bowed to everyone in the hall, as she asked timidly, "Great Elder, my brother, Ye Xuan, is the Prince. Why did you cripple him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a matter of the clan, what are you interrupting for?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was clearly a little fearful. She did not dare to look the Great Elder in the eye, but she did not leave. Instead, she mustered up her courage and walked into the ancestral hall. She bowed to the elders on both sides of the hall and said, "Elders, my brother is currently fighting with the Li family for the mining rights of the mine in Nanshan. He is now fighting for the family, and it is unknown whether he is alive or dead. However, the family has used a groundless excuse to remove his position as the Crown Prince.
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Whether or not he is crippled, it is not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away! "
At this time, the new Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged 30 times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder replied coldly, "Then do it 30 times!"
Very quickly, two Ye Clan guards rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists, and said angrily, "This is unfair! My brother has risked his life for the clan for so many years, and even now, he is fighting for the clan. The clan is unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that this was his chance to shine.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the position of Prince. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly turned red and swollen. However, she did not cry, and only held her cheek tightly.
Ye Long sized up the guard and asked with a smile, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed, "Subordinate Zhang Mu greets the Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You are very good. After I become the Prince, I will need ten guards. From now on, you will be my guard."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed, and hurriedly bowed deeply, "Subordinate will go through fire and water for the Prince, and I will risk my life for you!"
Ye Lang nodded slightly, "Drag him away. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall. Do not show mercy, understood?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang, and when he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu seemed to have seen something, and suddenly stopped.
In the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe, and the robe was tattered, and there was blood everywhere.
The young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's mouth curled into a cold smile.
In the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, and his expression was frighteningly gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his expression turned savage, "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his expression changed. He hurriedly looked at Ye Lang, and was about to speak, when Ye Xuan suddenly leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
Ye Lang did not stop there, and he rushed towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man, how dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's expression turned ugly, while Ye Xuan lifted his head to look at him, asking savagely, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stepped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's entire face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, who was crying for help, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's state, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!








Chapter 1485
He ran away!
The Sacred Lord's expression was somewhat unsightly. He had thought that Ye Xuan would go down and fight!
He did not expect Ye Xuan to turn around and run.
A moment later, the Sacred Lord turned and left. He came to the bamboo house.
The Sacred Lord bowed slightly to the bamboo house. "Master, Ye Xuan's growth is too fast."
Inside the bamboo house, the woman put down the teacup and picked up an ancient book. She opened it and smiled. "There's nothing bad about it!"
Nothing bad about it?
The Sacred Lord was somewhat dumbfounded.
The woman chuckled. "He will become even stronger!"
The Sacred Lord hesitated and said, "Master, aren't you worried?"
The woman turned and looked outside the bamboo house. She smiled. "I told you!
Whether he lives or not doesn't depend on him. Whether I die or not also doesn't depend on him!
At least for the next 30 years! "
The Sacred Lord was silent.
The woman put down the ancient book and walked out of the bamboo house. The Sacred Lord hurriedly bowed.
The woman stretched and smiled. "Miss Nian Nian, I haven't seen her for a long time!
She must have gone to find help!
Who would she call?
Let me think … Miss An has been following him. She probably won't come!
Nether Hall?
They are quite troublesome now. They probably won't come either.
Then who else could it be?
Tu?
Situ Tingyun?
Probably not either!
Both of them have been targeted by the Calamity Cause … Tianxiu?
Probably not. After all, her main body isn't here … Oh, the three-dimensional universe … Princess … should be her!
After all, she's the only one who can fight! "
Saying this, she seemed to have thought of something. The smile on her face gradually disappeared. "Don't tell me she called that Miss Ding?
If that's the case, then it'll be troublesome! "
At the side, the Sacred Lord bowed. He was puzzled. Why didn't he know any of the people his master mentioned?
At this moment, the woman suddenly smiled and said, "I'll go out and see if I can make more enemies for him. I'll also look for the Great Dao Spirit … During this period of time, don't provoke Lord Ye. It won't be long before someone comes to deal with him."
After saying this, she walked into the distance. Soon, she completely disappeared into the horizon.
...
Ye Xuan returned to the Fifth Dimension.
In the hall, Ye Xuan sat on the ground with his legs crossed. At this moment, his expression was extremely solemn.
Back in the sacred ground, when that divine sense locked onto him, he knew that he was no match for the owner of that divine sense!
Who was this person?
There was no answer!
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes. At this moment, he felt a little uneasy.
The enemy of the Holy Land was different from the Dao Sect because he could not figure out their intentions.
For the Dao scripture?
However, the Dao Scripture was no longer in his hands, and the Spirit of the Great Dao had already escaped. The other party had no reason to look for him!
But if it wasn't for the Taoist scripture, then what was it for?
Ye Xuan couldn't figure it out!
At this moment, a little girl walked in!
Ye Xuan was stunned when he saw the little girl. The person who had come was none other than Nian Nian.
Nian Nian held a stick of tanghulu in her right hand and a struggling small fish in her left.
Nian Nian walked in front of Ye Xuan and giggled. "Grilled fish!"
Ye Xuan looked at Nian Nian. "Nian Nian, where did you go before this?"
Nian Nian blinked. "I've been playing outside all this time!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. "Playing outside?"
Nian Nian nodded. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan fell silent.
Nian Nian didn't seem to be lying.
Nian Nian suddenly asked softly, "What's wrong?"
Ye Xuan retracted his thoughts and shook his head. He smiled and said, "It's nothing. I'll grill fish for you!"
Nian Nian grinned. "Okay!"
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, a woman was walking slowly.
This person was none other than Ye Ling!
Ye Ling looked into the depths of the starry sky in the distance. "We're almost there!"
As soon as she said that, her speed suddenly increased.
Soon, Ye Ling arrived at a small village. This village was a little strange because it was in the starry sky.
Ye Ling walked into the village.
The village was very deserted. The surrounding light was dim, and it looked a little like a ghost village.
At that moment, an old man walked out. When he saw Ye Ling, the old man frowned slightly. "You are?"
Ye Ling opened her palm, and a faint light flickered in her palm.
Seeing this, the old man was slightly taken aback. The next moment, he knelt down and said in a trembling voice, "Clan … Clan Leader …"
Ye Ling nodded. "Did he store my body here?"
The old man hurriedly nodded. "Yes!"
After a long silence, Ye Ling said, "Take me there!"
The old man hurriedly stood up and said in a trembling voice, "Clan Leader, follow me!"
With that, he turned and left.
At that moment, the old man's face was already covered in tears. He was happy.
They had waited for countless years, and the clan leader had finally arrived …
Ye Ling followed the old man.
On the way, Ye Ling suddenly asked, "How many clansmen are left?"
The old man shook his head. "Not many!
If it weren't for Young Master Yang's care back then, I'm afraid … "
Ye Ling was silent.
The Void Spirit Clan had become history!
Soon, the two disappeared into the distance.
...
Ultimate Martial Realm.
Wu Li sat cross-legged on a mountain peak. He formed a seal with his hands and exuded a powerful aura. This aura was getting stronger and stronger, and it was no longer the aura that a Godly State expert should have!
....
Northern Wilderness.
In the deepest part of Northern Wilderness, there was a huge stone tablet that was over a hundred feet tall. The stone tablet stood in a deep pit.
A few hundred feet away, a middle-aged man was walking toward the stone tablet. When he was about a hundred feet away from the stone tablet, he suddenly knelt down, put his palms together, and bowed to the stone tablet. He was even chanting something piously.
After a while, the middle-aged man stood up and continued walking toward the stone tablet. After about ten steps, he knelt down again …
Just like that, the middle-aged man slowly approached the stone tablet, kneeling and bowing every ten steps.
After a long time, the middle-aged man came before the stone tablet. He knelt down in front of the stone tablet, put his palms together, and said in a trembling voice, "Exalted Goddess, Ye Xuan has gone too far. Not only did he absorb the souls of our clansmen, but he also took away all our treasures. Please help us, Exalted Goddess."
The stone tablet did not respond.
The middle-aged man bowed again. Just as he was about to speak, a woman suddenly appeared behind him.
The middle-aged man turned around. When he saw the woman, his expression changed drastically. "You …"
This woman was the mysterious woman who had robbed Northern Wilderness!
The woman smiled. "You don't seem to want to see me!"
The middle-aged man quickly retreated behind the stone tablet. He stared at the mysterious woman. "What are you trying to do!"
The mysterious woman blinked. "He said that he's afraid that you'll take revenge, so he wants me to kill all of you!"
The middle-aged man roared. "You've gone too far!"
The mysterious woman waved her right hand.
Boom!
The middle-aged man was sent flying a few hundred feet away. However, he did not die. It was obvious that the woman had shown mercy.
After sending the middle-aged man flying, the mysterious woman looked at the stone tablet and slammed her fist forward!
The middle-aged man's eyes almost popped out of their sockets at the sight of this. "No!"
The stone tablet was their faith, their supreme faith. It was the most sacred existence of their era.
When the mysterious woman's power blasted against the stone tablet, it shook violently. However, it did not shatter. Moreover, the mysterious woman's powerful force had vanished without a trace.
A trace of surprise flashed through the mysterious woman's eyes. "Not bad!"
At this moment, an extremely powerful aura suddenly appeared from the stone tablet. The mysterious woman blinked and said, "Farewell!"
With that, she turned around and disappeared. As she left, she took away many more treasures …
The middle-aged man was speechless.
The stone tablet gradually trembled. After a long time, an ancient voice sounded out from within it. "You've gone too far!"
The middle-aged man hurriedly nodded. This woman isn't just an ordinary kind of bully. She comes here every few days to bully others!
She's not human!
At this moment, a voice suddenly sounded out from within the stone tablet. "Ge Yao, awaken the clansmen."
With that, a black token suddenly floated out from the stone tablet.
The middle-aged man called Ge Yao instantly became excited at the sight of the black token. He hurriedly caught the black token. "As you command, Exalted God."
With that, he turned around and left.
Before long, countless powerful auras shot into the sky throughout the entire Northern Wilderness … and the seals left behind by the Dao Ancestor were directly destroyed by a mysterious force.
...
Taoism.
The Third Young Lady, who was sitting cross-legged in the main hall, suddenly opened her eyes. After a long time, she slowly closed her eyes. "This crazy woman …"
....
In a small bar in the Divine City, the shopkeeper behind the counter suddenly looked in the direction of the Northern Wilderness. In the next moment, he turned around and came to a small courtyard. He bowed slightly towards the room in front of him. "Master, there's something strange in the Northern Wilderness!"
After a long time, a voice sounded out from the room. "I know!"
The shopkeeper hesitated for a moment and then said, "Do you want me to go investigate?"
In the bar, the voice said, "No need!
This isn't something you can interfere with. "
The shopkeeper bowed slightly and then left.
....
Soon, many powerful auras rushed out of the Northern Desolate Land. These mysterious experts were all above the Immortal Realm. After they left the Northern Desolate Land, they went straight to the Fifth Dimension …
...
Orc World.
In the starry sky, a middle-aged man stood quietly. His hands were behind his back and his eyes were closed.
This person was the Beast King of the Beastmen Tribe!
At this moment, a Beastman suddenly appeared in front of the Beast King. The Beastman bowed slightly to the Beast King, "King, there's a strange movement in the Northern Wilderness. They seem to want to make a move on that human Young Master Ye."
The Beast King frowned. "Has the Northern Wilderness gone mad?"
The beastman shook his head. "I don't know. I only know that the Northern Wilderness is furious!
They are all super experts above the God Realm! "
Above the Divine Realm!
The Beast King was silent, his face somewhat gloomy.
The Orc said in a deep voice, "I'm afraid that Young Master Ye is no match for this Northern Wilderness …"
After a moment of silence, the Beast King sighed in a low voice. "Call people to the Fifth Dimension!"
The orc was stunned. "King, are we going to be enemies with the Northern Wilderness?
That is … "
The Beast King's face was somewhat ugly. "Do you think I want to interfere?
Didn't you hear what that woman said?
Her brother is dead!
She wants us to be buried with him!
Buried with him!
Damn, she really doesn't listen to reason at all!
Based on what!
Based on what!
I refuse to accept this! "
The Beast King: "…"
The Beast King waved his hand. "Go and call people!"
The orc nodded and was about to leave. At this moment, a voice suddenly sounded from the side. "Call people?
There's no need to call! "
The Beast King turned his head and looked. Not far away, a woman was slowly walking over.
It was the mysterious woman from the Holy Land!
The mysterious woman looked at the Beast King and smiled. "From now on, the Beastmen are not allowed to take half a step out of the Beast World!"
The Beast King narrowed his eyes. "Who do you think you are?"
After saying that, he punched out.
The mysterious woman flicked her sleeves.
Boom!
The Beast King retreated tens of thousands of feet away. Not only that, the entire starry sky became illusory. The Beast King's right arm that punched out was shattered by a powerful force!
The Beast King was somewhat dumbfounded.
The mysterious woman looked at the Beast King and smiled. "If the Beastmen dare to take a step out of the Beast World, I will destroy your Beastmen Race!"
The Beast King stared at the mysterious woman. He was extremely shocked. "Who are you?"
The mysterious woman blinked. "I am Ye Xuan's aunt!
This is our family matter. Outsiders should not interfere, understand? "
The Beast King: "…"
....
