In the Five Dimensional Universe.
Ye Xuan didn't pay attention to the outside world, and every day, he only focused on cultivating.
The current him had perfectly fused the Sword Domain and the power of faith!
The power of faith supported the Sword Domain, and the Sword Domain supported the Way of the Sword. With the perfect combination of the two powers, it could be said that his current Sword Domain was completely different from before!
Apart from that, he had also developed the Blood Domain!
The combination of bloodline power and the Blood Domain!
He found that his bloodline power could greatly increase his Blood Domain, and it could make his blood reach a qualitative change!
The most important thing in the Blood Domain was blood!
Before this, he had actually neglected this problem!
The Blood Domain, of course, needed blood!
The only pity was that he couldn't activate the Crazy Demon Bloodline, because the Crazy Demon Bloodline's destructive power was stronger than the Immortal Bloodline. If the Crazy Demon Bloodline was combined with the Blood Domain, the power of the Blood Domain would become even stronger!
Apart from that, he found that when he used the Blood Domain, the more blood there was, the stronger the Blood Domain would become!
In addition, the Death Domain needed Death Qi. A Death Domain with Death Qi and a Death Domain without Death Qi were two completely different domains. However, the power of the Death Domain couldn't be compared to the Blood Domain and the Sword Domain, because he didn't have too much Death Qi. Unless he killed too many people and used millions of yin spirits and Death Qi to stabilize the domain … However, this situation was very rare!
As for the Dark Domain, he found that the power of the Dark Domain would be greatly enhanced in the shattered space. He could use all kinds of dark matter to strengthen the Dark Domain. It should be said that when he used the Dark Domain, he could use the Dark Domain to forcibly absorb all the dark matter energy in the surroundings!
How much dark matter energy was there between heaven and earth?
Especially in the starry sky, the dark matter energy could be said to be endless!
In short, in the past month or so, Ye Xuan had gained a lot, especially in the use of the four Domains. In this aspect, he had improved a lot. Now, the four Domains were no longer useless to him, but a great killer move.
Inside the hall, Ye Xuan and An Lanxiu sat facing each other. During this period of time, An Lanxiu had always been with him, and the two of them were discussing. Moreover, he had already imparted Life Fist to An Lanxiu!
What made him a little dumbfounded was that even if An Lanxiu didn't have a powerful body, she could still cultivate the Life Fist. However, her Life Fist was different from his. Moreover, she didn't burn her lifespan!
Rather than saying that she cultivated the Life Fist, it would be better to say that she was drawing on the Life Fist.
In this aspect of the Martial Dao, An Lanxiu's talent was really too terrifying.
An Lanxiu looked at Ye Xuan, "You want to change the Life Fist into the Life Sword?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes.
I had this idea a long time ago!
The Life Fist's power is extremely strong. If it can be fused with my Instant Kill Sword, then its power will definitely reach a very terrifying level! "
An Lanxiu said in a deep voice, "Difficult!"
An Lanxiu said in a deep voice, "Difficult!"
Ye Xuan smiled, "I know!"
What was the Instant Kill Sword particular about?
It was speed and that instant of explosive force!
The Life Fist was also particular about explosive force. If these two types of explosive force could be fused together, then the might would absolutely be able to destroy the heavens and the earth.
However, this was extremely difficult because the might of the Life Fist was too great, and the speed and strength of the Instant Kill Sword had reached a limit. This wasn't a combination of strength and softness, but a fusion of strength and strength. So, the difficulty wasn't ordinary.
An Lanxiu suddenly said, "However, it isn't impossible!"
Ye Xuan looked at An Lanxiu, "What do you mean?"
An Lanxiu looked at Ye Xuan, "Domain!"
Ye Xuan was stunned when he heard this, and then he suddenly came to his senses, "Right!
I can use my Domain to suppress these two forces and prevent them from going out of control! "
An Lanxiu nodded, "Your Faith Energy combined with your Sword Domain should be able to suppress the formidable strength of these two martial techniques. Moreover, your body is sufficiently strong to be able to support these two forces!
However, you have to pay attention to the problem after executing this sword strike. If you're directly paralyzed after executing this sword strike, then I feel that such a fusion wouldn't have much meaning!
Moreover, after the fusion, if the speed of execution is unable to attain the speed of the Instant Kill Sword, then it would be meaningless as well. "
Ye Xuan fell silent.
He knew what An Lanxiu meant. No matter if it was researching Domains or sword techniques, their imaginary enemy was that mysterious woman!
Simply speaking, if he were to face the mysterious woman, then he only had the chance to execute a single sword strike, and this sword strike didn't just have to be swift, it had to be strong as well!
In other words, the current speed of the Instant Kill Sword wasn't sufficient. Not only was its speed insufficient, its strength was far from sufficient. Moreover, if he were to fuse the Life Fist with the Instant Kill Sword, then even if his strength was sufficient, it would be useless if his speed wasn't sufficient!
Because he might be killed by the mysterious woman at the instant he executed his sword strike!
That woman wasn't stupid, and if she sensed danger, then she would absolutely not give him the chance to execute his sword strike!
An Lanxiu said, "You can give it a try now!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Enter the pagoda!"
As he spoke, he and An Lanxiu entered the World Prison Pagoda.
Only by cultivating in the pagoda would he be able to satisfy that mysterious woman.
Within the World Prison Pagoda, Ye Xuan stood silently, his right hand grasping the Unparalleled Sword. His lifespan began to burn, and at the instant he did so, a powerful force suddenly condensed in his right arm …
The energy of lifespan!
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes, continuing to burn his lifespan. In just a moment, he had burned nearly 50 years of his lifespan, and at this moment, the sword in his hand began to tremble violently. Although he was constantly using the Sword Domain and Faith Energy to suppress it, this force was truly too strong, and he found it difficult to control.
After a long time, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes and looked at An Lanxiu, "I can't use my sword!"
An Lanxiu frowned, "You can't use your sword?"
Ye Xuan nodded, his expression solemn, "The force is too strong, it has already surpassed my control."
An Lanxiu fell silent.
Ye Xuan sighed softly, feeling slightly regretful, but he didn't intend to give up. If it was so easy to fuse, then it would be too much of a joke.
Ye Xuan began to slowly release the force. He decided to make it simpler and not burn so much of his lifespan. He would do it bit by bit. Although this would consume a little of his lifespan, if he could fuse it, then it would absolutely be worth it.
While Ye Xuan was cultivating, the space on the 9th floor suddenly trembled. Ye Xuan and An Lanxiu who were cultivating suddenly raised their heads to look at the 9th floor. In the next moment, the two of them appeared on the 9th floor, and in the 9th floor, space suddenly split open and a black object floated out. When they saw this object, Ye Xuan and An Lanxiu were stunned.

Northern Wilderness.

Chapter 1494
Let's talk!

Picked it up?

Then, she turned and left.

The Saint fell silent.
The Black Heaven and Earth Temple!
The number one treasure of the prehistoric era!
The true number one treasure came from before the birth of this universe. It was an artifact but not an artifact. It existed forever and was indestructible.
There were six ancient characters inside: Dao, Life, Death, Kindness, Evil, and Calamity.
Apart from that, the number one treasure of the Northern Wilderness Tribe, the Northern Wilderness Martial Scripture, came from the Black Heaven and Earth Temple.
There were countless secrets in the Black Heaven and Earth Temple!
The Black Heaven and Earth Temple might contain an unknown era's inheritance, civilization, and treasures.
The Black Heaven and Earth Temple used to be in the hands of the Northern Wilderness Tribe. But then, the prehistoric era changed and the item disappeared.
But now, it had appeared again!

The Supreme Goddess said, "I don't know.

The Saint Envoy said in a low voice, "Exalted Deity, it's not normal for this woman to have this item.
Moreover, that young man, Ye Xuan, has a special background. If our clan becomes enemies with him, then I'm afraid we'll be tainted with some bad karma, and it might even bring about a calamity to our clan. "
The supreme deity in the stone tablet was silent.

Inside the stone tablet, the Great Deity suddenly said, "I want to see this person!"
The Divine Envoy said, "Should I invite him?"
The Exalted Deity said, "There's no need, I'll meet him personally!"
The Divine Envoy was stunned for a moment before nodding. "Alright!"
...
Sacred Ground, inside the bamboo house.
After the mysterious woman returned to the bamboo house, she placed the black box on the bamboo table.
In front of the mysterious woman was Tree Boundless.
Tree Boundless looked at the black box. "Does the Northern Wilderness care about this box?"
The mysterious woman smiled. "They care about the item inside the box!"
Tree Boundless asked, "What is it?"
The mysterious woman smiled. "A very ancient item!"
Tree Boundless looked at the mysterious woman. "You're not interested?"
The mysterious woman shook her head. "At my level, other treasures or martial arts inheritances are no longer attractive to me."
Tree Boundless looked at the black box curiously. "How did you get this item?"
The mysterious woman smiled. "That little white guy touched it and I traded it for two candied haws!"
Hearing that, Tree Boundless' expression turned strange.
That little white guy!
Of course, she knew who the mysterious woman was talking about!
She knew that the little white guy was playful and gluttonous, but she did not expect that he would sell such a precious item for two candied haws!
What a wastrel!
Tree Boundless shook his head.
Suddenly, the mysterious woman said, "I'm going out for a while!"
Tree Boundless looked at the mysterious woman. "Are you going to make a move?"
The mysterious woman shook her head. "Wait until that woman is far away!"
Tree Boundless nodded. "That's true!"
If that woman came back, everything they had done would be for naught!
No one could stop that woman head-on!
As if thinking of something, Tree Boundless suddenly asked, "Ye Xuan seems to be cultivating!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "Let him cultivate!
After all, we don't have much time left. "
She put away the black box and left.
Tree Boundless suddenly asked, "Do you look down on him that much?"
The mysterious woman stopped and shook her head. "It's not that I look down on him. On the contrary, I admire him. Among my peers, there are not many who can compare to him.
But we are from the same generation as his father. If we can't even beat him, then we have lived all these years in vain. "
Having said that, she opened the bamboo door and walked out.
Inside the hall, Tree Boundless was silent.
That era!
At that moment, she thought of that woman again!
That woman in a plain dress!
That woman who had suppressed countless eras. In front of that woman, countless giants of the past paled in fear!
...
In the Five-Dimensional Universe.
Inside the World Prison Pagoda, Ye Xuan sat on the ninth floor. His eyes were closed, and his sword domain enveloped the entire World Prison Pagoda. In front of him was the Unparalleled Sword!
After an unknown amount of time, Ye Xuan once again grasped the Unparalleled Sword.
Bang!
A powerful force suddenly shook the pagoda, causing the surrounding walls to tremble.
Ye Xuan tightly gripped the Unparalleled Sword. Within his right hand was an endless amount of lifespan.
This time, he burned 50 years of his lifespan!
Ye Xuan stared at the Unparalleled Sword in his hand. Although the sword domain was suppressing him, the power contained within the sword was too great. At this moment, the ninth floor was shaking violently. If not for the dao laws suppressing him, this pagoda would not have been able to withstand his current strength.
His current strength was already a bit abnormal.
On the side, An Lanxiu looked at Ye Xuan, "Can you use the sword?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "I can now!"
As he spoke, he slowly raised the Unparalleled Sword. This sword, he could swing it!
However, the speed was not enough!
The power of this sword far exceeded the power of the Instant Death Sword. It could be said to be several times more powerful. However, the speed was definitely not as fast as the Instant Death Sword!
At this moment …
An Lanxiu suddenly said, "There are pros and cons!"
Ye Xuan nodded. The power and speed of the Instant Death Sword had actually reached the limit of his physical body. If the Instant Death Sword fused with his Life Fist, unless his physical body reached the God Realm, it would be very difficult for him to increase his speed!
Ye Xuan sighed softly and began to slowly release the power within the sword.
During this period of time, in order to fuse the Life Fist with the Instant Death Sword, he had burned more than 200 years of his lifespan. However, he still could not achieve his ideal state!
This was because the Unparalleled Sword could no longer increase his speed. This meant that he had truly reached his own limit.
On the other hand, without that speed, this sword of his would absolutely not be able to pose any threat to that woman!
She wouldn't just stand there and let him slash her!
Meanwhile, An Lanxiu spoke in a light voice, "Just do your best!"
Ye Xuan gazed at An Lanxiu and smiled, "Right!
Just do your best!
If you really can't defeat her, then it can't be helped. "
An Lanxiu nodded. "This sword of yours has no chance of winning against that woman. However, there aren't many in this world that can withstand this sword of yours."
The might of the Life Fist combined with the Instant Death Sword was extraordinarily terrifying when two explosive martial techniques were fused.
Ye Xuan nodded. He glanced at the Unparalleled Sword in his hand and said, "This new sword technique shall be called the Life Sword!"
The Life Sword!
A sword strike that burned one's lifespan!
Ye Xuan put the Unparalleled Sword away, and then he withdrew the ancient scroll that Xiao Ta had given him.
The Sword Drawing Technique!
Ye Xuan flipped open the scroll, and he gazed at it for a long time before he spoke in a light voice, "What an amazing Sword Drawing Technique!"
An Lanxiu walked over to Ye Xuan, glanced at it, and said softly, "It really is extraordinary!"
Ye Xuan shook his head and laughed bitterly. "I think I need to consolidate my strength for a while!
I've been busy dealing with those enemies every single day, and I've neglected my own Sword Dao! "
His Sword Dao hadn't improved in a very, very long time!
His improvement was mainly in the aspect of his body, and he'd relied on external forces to improve his body. As for his Sword Dao, it had stagnated for a very long time.
Moreover, no one could help him in his future path of the Sword Dao. Because he'd already walked his own path, and what he had to do now was continue walking down it and not stay where he was!
At this moment, he recalled what the white robed Qing 'er had said!
The Unrestrained Sword Heart!
Actually, he'd always been unable to truly attain the Unrestrained Sword Heart because there were truly too many restraints in his heart!
In the beginning, it was only Ling 'er, then it was Big Sister Nian, and now it was the entire Fifth Dimension!
There were more and more restraints, and they were the kind that couldn't be cut off.
As for the Swordsman's sword, the fewer restraints there were, the faster and sharper his sword would be!
As he thought of this, Ye Xuan's brows suddenly furrowed.
Was this really the case?
A person must have faith in life.
What was his faith?
It was to protect the people by his side!
Responsibility!
If a man couldn't shoulder his responsibilities, could he still be considered a man?
Restraints?
To him, the entire Fifth Dimension was indeed a restraint, but it was also Ye Xuan's responsibility.
Since it was his responsibility, how could he talk about restraints?
Being heartless and giving up everything, could he really attain the Unrestrained Sword Heart?
Perhaps he could, but for Ye Xuan, it was impossible!
It was like a person abandoning his parents, wife, and children. This kind of person was indeed very free, because he didn't have any burdens. He was alone and free.
However, this kind of freedom wasn't what Ye Xuan wanted.
To him, what was the use of a sword?
It wasn't to seek invincibility!
Instead, it was to protect!
As he thought of this, many people suddenly appeared in Ye Xuan's mind. Ye Ling, An Lanxiu, Lian Wanli, Tuoba Yan, Xiao Qi, Xiao Dao, Aro, Mo Yunqi, Xiao Qi, everything in the Fifth Dimension … and Sister Nian …
Scenes of the past flashed through Ye Xuan's mind like lightning.
There were all kinds of ups and downs!
After a long time, Ye Xuan suddenly looked at the sword in his hand and smiled. "Qing'Er, I understand what you mean by the Unrestrained Sword Heart.
The Unrestrained Sword Heart doesn't mean abandoning everything, it doesn't mean being heartless or selfish … The Unrestrained Sword Heart means doing things with a clear conscience, being a person with a clear conscience, and being free with a clear conscience … "
As he thought of this, the Unparalleled Sword in his hand suddenly trembled, and the sword's cry never stopped.
Not only that, at this moment, all the swords in Ye Xuan's body trembled, even the sword at the top of the pagoda trembled slightly, as if responding …
...
PS: Give me a ticket if you have one!
One monthly ticket isn't much, you can't go to Singapore, one monthly ticket is nothing, anyone can afford it …








Chapter 1495
Inside the pagoda, Ye Xuan's eyes were closed.
At that moment, he had entered a very strange state.
Relaxed!
He suddenly felt extremely relaxed. This was a feeling that he had never felt before!
In the past, it was as if he had been imprisoned by shackles. There were shackles on his heart and thoughts, but now, those two shackles were gone.
His thoughts were clear, and he felt unprecedentedly relaxed!
At that moment, An Lanxiu suddenly asked, "Did you break through?"
Ye Xuan opened his eyes and smiled. "No, but I understand what true freedom is!"
As he said that, he looked at the Supreme Sword in his hand and chuckled. "Previously, I was always shackled by myself, and my sword was also shackled by me … But it won't happen in the future!"
The Supreme Sword in Ye Xuan's hand was still trembling as if it was responding.
This sword originally did not have a spirit, and it was just a sword. Of course, this sword was very special. After all, it came from the Milky Way Realm.
But now, this sword had a spirit of its own!
Ye Xuan had bestowed it with a spirit of its own!
The sword was extraordinary because of its master!
The current Ye Xuan already had the ability to change the sword.
The breakthrough in his state of mind made Ye Xuan look different. Previously, he was like a sword shackled by a scabbard. Although he was reserved, his hands and feet were tied, and he did not have the kind of momentum that could destroy thousands of enemies with one sword.
But now, he was like an unsheathed sword. Not only did he show off his sharpness, but he also had a domineering sword aura that made people feel intimidated.
At that moment, An Lanxiu felt that Ye Xuan was a Swordsman!
In fact, although Ye Xuan was a Swordsman, his combat strength was previously dependent on the power of his bloodline, his physical body, and the power of faith. It could be said that the reason why his combat strength was so strong was not because of his Sword Dao.
Apart from these few things, his combat strength was really not that great. Especially when he did not have a Dao Body, his combat strength could be said to be greatly reduced.
Could he easily kill a Godly State powerhouse by relying on Sword Dao alone?
Of course not!
Moreover, without the Dao Physique, he could at most fight one or two God State experts, but if he had the Dao Physique, even 10 God State experts wouldn't be able to do anything to him!
Rather than a Swordsman, it would be more accurate to say that he was a Physique Cultivator.
Moreover, even though he'd taken a new path in the Dao of the Sword, he hadn't taken it well. Because he hadn't gone far on this new path, and he'd remained stagnant.
Now that he was enlightened, he was finally like a real Swordsman!
Confidence in the way of the sword!
Of course, this was only the beginning!
Ye Xuan looked at the supreme sword in his hand and said with a smile, "This feeling is very wonderful!
It's like the feeling when I first learned the sword! "
An Lanxiu suddenly said, "Congratulations!"
Ye Xuan shook his head and smiled. "My path of the Sword Dao is still very long!"
Although his mental state had broken through, he couldn't be arrogant at all!
Why?
Because there were too many formidable Swordsman by his side!
Not to mention Qing 'er and the green clothed man, he couldn't even compare to Ting Yun now. There was also Big Sister Nian, and Big Sister Nian was a formidable Swordsman as well!
An Lanxiu suddenly said, "Try executing the Instakill Sword now!"
Ye Xuan looked at An Lanxiu. "Let's go somewhere else!"
An Lanxiu nodded.
Both of them directly vanished within the pagoda, and it wasn't long before they arrived in a deathly silent starry sky.
The two of them were 300m apart!
Ye Xuan looked at An Lanxiu. "Watch out!"
At the instant he finished speaking, a strand of sword light suddenly arrived between An Lanxiu's brows.
However, a spear had suddenly been pressed against Ye Xuan's chest.
In the distance, An Lanxiu shook her head. "I've lost!"
She was unable to resist this strike of Ye Xuan's. Even though her spear was extremely swift, but Ye Xuan had an advantage over her.
Xuan had an advantage over her, and that was her Daoist physique.
Ye Xuan's sword was able to kill her, but her spear was unable to kill Ye Xuan.
Compared to before, Ye Xuan's sword had already undergone a tremendous change. If he utilized external forces like the energy of faith, then she would be even more unable to fight him.
Ye Xuan looked at the sword in his hand. His current Instakill Sword was too much faster than before. Most importantly, its might was much stronger than before as well!
The breakthrough in his mental state this time had brought about a tremendous change to his Sword Dao.
At this moment, he finally felt that he was a Swordsman and not a body refiner.
As if he'd thought of something, Ye Xuan suddenly looked at An Lanxiu. "I'll defend if you attack me!"
As he spoke, he took out a sword sheath and placed the Supreme Sword into it.
An Lanxiu understood what Ye Xuan meant, and she immediately nodded. "Alright!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she suddenly vanished on the spot, and a speck of cold light appeared in front of Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan suddenly drew his sword and slashed!
Sword Drawing Technique!
An expanse of sword light suddenly erupted in front of Ye Xuan, and that speck of cold light was instantly drowned out by this expanse of sword light. But in the next moment, that expanse of sword light was directly shattered.
Bang!
Ye Xuan directly retreated explosively by 300m!
After he stopped, Ye Xuan looked at An Lanxiu. His Sword Drawing Technique utilized a single point to break through, whereas, An Lanxiu's spear strike utilized a single point to break through, and he hadn't gone all out!
Ye Xuan looked at An Lanxiu. "Again!"
An Lanxiu nodded, and then she tapped the tip of her foot lightly. In the next moment, an afterimage flashed to arrive before Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan held the hilt of his sword with his right hand, and then he suddenly drew it.
Om!
A sword howl shook the heavens and the earth!
His sword descended!
Rumble!
Along with an explosion, Ye Xuan's sword light was directly shattered. This time, Ye Xuan retreated by over 1km.
After he stopped, Ye Xuan gazed at the sword in his hand and went silent.
An Lanxiu didn't attack again.
After a long time, Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "I know what the problem is!
Imposing aura! "
As he spoke, his eyes slowly closed.
Imposing aura!
A person's imposing aura was extremely important, and his Sword Drawing Technique lacked precisely such an imposing aura.
In the past, he'd seen the green clothed man execute this sword technique, and that time was in the world below.
When the green clothed man executed this sword technique, that strike seemed as if it intended to slash the heavens apart.
When he thought of imposing aura, he thought of Qing 'er's Life and Death Decided with a Single Strike!
Death is inevitable with this strike of mine!
This sort of imposing aura was what he lacked the most.
When he thought up to here, Ye Xuan looked at An Lanxiu. But in next to no time, he became slightly helpless!
He wanted to be more ruthless, but how could he be ruthless towards An Lanxiu?
Should I slash him to death with this strike of mine?
Towards An Lanxiu, he seriously couldn't do it!
Actually, An Lanxiu didn't have that sort of killing aura when she attacked him with her spear either. On the contrary, she still held back strength and didn't dare to use her full strength!
Two people sparring had advantages and disadvantages!
Seeming to have thought of something, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Come, I'll bring you to find someone!"
Finished talking, he directly brought An Lanxiu along and vanished in the starry sky.
Before long, the two people arrived at the Dao Door again.
The person who received Ye Xuan and An Lanxiu was an old man. When he saw Ye Xuan, that old man had a slight headache because the person who received Ye Xuan the last time was him.
Ye Xuan looked at the old man and said with a smile, "Please inform Third Miss that I have something to look for her about!"
The old man hesitated and was just about to speak when Ye Xuan suddenly said, "You want to say that Third Miss isn't here, right?"
The old man was speechless.
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Go tell Third Miss that I'm here.
Ye Xuan won't make it difficult for her! "
The old man was still hesitant. Right at this moment, a woman suddenly appeared in front of Ye Xuan and An Lanxiu.
It was the Third Miss!
The Third Miss looked at Ye Xuan, "How annoying!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Third Miss, I trust you've been well since we last met!"
The Third Miss said indifferently, "Is something the matter?"
Ye Xuan cupped his fists and said, "I hope Third Miss can help me with something!"
The Third Miss said, "What is it?"
Ye Xuan said, "Hit me!"
An Lanxiu was very strong, but she couldn't bring herself to be ruthless, and he similarly couldn't bring himself to be ruthless towards An Lanxiu. Moreover, if both of them showed mercy during sparring, then what was the point of sparring?
So he wanted to find someone who could beat him up. Only in this way would he be able to find out where he was lacking.
The Third Miss looked at Ye Xuan, "You want to spar with me?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes."
The Third Miss was silent.
Ye Xuan asked, "Can I?"
The Third Miss glanced at Ye Xuan, "Why do you suddenly want to spar with me?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I just want to improve myself."
The Third Miss nodded, "Okay!"
Ye Xuan blinked, "You agree?"
The Third Miss said, "Spar with me!
Come with me! "
Saying that, she turned and left.
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment, then followed the Third Miss.
Soon, the Third Miss brought Ye Xuan to an empty square. Around this square, there were all kinds of array formations stabilizing the space.
The Third Miss looked at Ye Xuan, "How do you want to spar?"
Ye Xuan said, "Hit me!
I … "
Before he could finish his words, the distant Third Young Lady suddenly disappeared.
Before Ye Xuan could react, he felt a sharp pain in his abdomen. Then, his whole body flew backward and finally hit the space barrier. The entire trial square suddenly shook violently.
An Lanxiu, "…"
In the distance, Ye Xuan looked a little pained because he felt like his body was falling apart!
When did his Dao body become so weak?
At this moment, the Third Miss suddenly appeared in front of him. Ye Xuan was stunned. He was about to speak when the Third Miss suddenly punched his head.
Bang!
Ye Xuan's whole body directly hit the ground and slid hundreds of feet away. The moment he stopped, he felt dizzy as if he was going to faint.
At this moment, the Third Miss suddenly appeared in front of him again. Before he could react, the Third Miss directly grabbed one of his legs and lifted him up. Then, she slammed him into the ground.
Boom!
The ground directly collapsed, turning into a huge pit.
But it was not over yet. The Third Miss suddenly kicked Ye Xuan's abdomen.
Bang!
Ye Xuan instantly flew more than 100 feet away. Before he landed, the Third Miss appeared in front of him again and then flew up and kicked him in the abdomen.
Bang!
Ye Xuan directly flew out and hit the space barrier in the distance.
Boom!
The surrounding space barrier directly cracked …
As soon as Ye Xuan stopped, the Third Miss appeared in front of him again. Then, she directly grabbed one of Ye Xuan's legs and slammed it on the ground …
Bang bang bang bang!
Deep pits directly appeared in the surrounding ground …
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly wailed, "Stop … Stop …"
The Third Miss said while hitting him, "What?
Don't stop?
Use force?
Okay, I will use force! "
Bang bang bang bang …
Ye Xuan, "…"
..








Chapter 1496
Just like that, Ye Xuan was beaten for nearly half an hour before he stopped!
During this period, Ye Xuan tried to resist!
But it was useless!
The more he resisted, the worse he was beaten!
Every time he wanted to use his sword, it was useless, because as soon as the sword appeared, he would be beaten even worse.
The main reason was that he was beaten silly from the beginning!
And his dao body seemed to be useless in front of the third young lady.
After the third young lady stopped, she walked to the side, the corners of her mouth slightly raised, it was really comfortable!
In fact, she had wanted to beat this guy for a long time!
But there was no chance!
But she didn't expect that this guy would come to her and ask her to beat him …
How could she refuse such a good thing?
In the distance, Ye Xuan climbed up and looked at the third young lady in the distance. The third young lady turned to look at Ye Xuan and said seriously, "How do you feel?"
Ye Xuan's face was full of black lines, "Third young lady, did you just want to beat me?"
The third young lady sneered, "You actually thought that I just wanted to beat you!"
Ye Xuan glanced at the third young lady, "Isn't that the case?"
The third young lady walked in front of Ye Xuan, "Of course not, the reason why I beat you was to let you understand your current shortcomings!
Moreover, you asked me to beat you, you asked me to! "
Saying that, she pointed to the distant An Lanxiu, "She can testify!"
An Lanxiu, "…"
Ye Xuan shook his head, he had fallen for this woman's trick!
The third young lady suddenly said, "What do you think now?"
Ye Xuan said lightly, "My thought is to be careful of women!"
The third young lady, "…"
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Third young lady, why is my dao body so vulnerable in front of you?"
The third young lady smiled, "Because I also cultivate dao body!
And let me tell you, dao body doesn't mean invincible, when a person is too strong, they can directly destroy your body.
Of course, your physical body is a little special because you have a powerful bloodline. The recovery ability of your bloodline is too abnormal! "
Although Ye Xuan had just been beaten up, his body had more or less recovered, which made her rather depressed!
"Third Young Lady, how strong are you?" Ye Xuan asked in a deep voice.
He suddenly realized that the woman in front of him was much, much stronger than he had imagined.
Even though he hadn't truly fought with his life on the line just now, and he would still be able to fight back if he utilized the Sword Domain and Faith Energy. However, he noticed that the three of them hadn't attacked him with the intent to kill. Moreover, he wanted to see if he could resist them without utilizing external forces. The outcome was that he couldn't.
The Third Young Lady laughed, "I'm not that strong. I just started cultivating earlier than you."
Ye Xuan shook his head. "You're too humble."
The Third Young Lady smiled, "Unless you have invincible strength, you have to be humble. Being humble will help you live longer!"
Ye Xuan said solemnly, "Sister Nian said the same thing!"
The Third Young Lady laughed, "Fifth Dimension Tendo?"
Ye Xuan nodded his head.
The Third Young Lady whispered, "She is an amazing person!"
Ye Xuan smiled, "You know Sister Nian?"
The Third Young Lady nodded, "I have investigated her!
She is a person of faith!
And she was willing to seal her strength for your Fifth Dimension … She is worthy of respect!
Of course, you are also not bad. At least she didn't misjudge you. "
Ye Xuan smiled and then said, "Third Young Lady, to be honest, there is one thing that I don't understand. You, Dao Laoer, and Dao Laoer are all disciples of the Taoist Sect's Grand Ancestor. So why is there such a big gap between you?"
He discovered that.
The difference in IQ between Second Young Dao and the Third Young Lady was like heaven and earth.
The Third Young Lady shook her head, "Second Senior Brother was also very outstanding. He was able to use Master's Dao Scripture to create the Dark Scripture, which proved his talent.
It was power that harmed him!
After Master left, the Dao Faction was like a group of dragons without a leader. At that time, the Dao Faction was the number one force in the universe. Second Senior Brother and Eldest Senior Brother were fighting for the position of Dao Faction's Master. Therefore, the two of them directly fought for this position and the Great Dao Spirit.
Unfortunately, the Great Dao Spirit did not choose either of them … "
At this point, she sighed, "At that time, I should have stood up. If I had fought, they would not have been able to compete with me. But I really have no interest in the position of Dao Faction's Master!"
Ye Xuan shook his head and smiled, "Third Young Lady, you have no interest in the position of Dao Faction's Master, but in the end, you became the Dao Faction's Master. This life …"
The Third Young Lady laughed, "Young Master Ye, you also don't seem to have any interest in the Master of the Fifth Dimension!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "However, I will not let go of the Fifth Dimension."
The Third Young Lady chuckled, "This is where I am inferior to you!
I was a little selfish at that time!
I only wanted to live according to my own ideas. Although this is not wrong, I should not let go of the responsibility that I should bear. "
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Do you have an Eldest Senior Brother?"
The Third Young Lady nodded, "I contacted him. He is no longer interested in the position of Dao Faction's Master!"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Third Young Lady, you are so strong, but you still can't beat that woman?"
The Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "You know?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "I know!"
The Third Young Lady chuckled, "The reason why you think I am strong now is because you are still a little weak!
Remember, in this world, there is no strongest, only stronger! "
Ye Xuan said, "I want to kill her!"
The Third Young Lady stared at Ye Xuan, "Are you serious?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The Third Young Lady fell into silence.
Ye Xuan said, "Do you think it's impossible?"
The Third Young Lady said softly, "Young Master Ye, you are a genius. Among the younger generation, there are very few who are better than you.
But do you know who you are going to face?
She is not from the same generation as you!
She has cultivated for tens of thousands of years more than you!
Do you know how difficult it is to jump levels and challenge her? "
Ye Xuan smiled, "But I can't just wait for death, right?"
The Third Young Lady nodded, "Indeed."
Saying that, she sighed softly, "Forget it!
I don't need to worry about the matters between you two.
Since you came to me to spar, let's start now! "
Ye Xuan cupped his fists, "Thank you!"
The Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "Make your move against me!"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Third Young Lady, I will do my best!"
The Third Young Lady smiled, "Come on!
Don't worry, I won't be careless. "
Ye Xuan nodded. The next moment, he suddenly struck with his sword.
Instant Kill!
This sword was fast to the extreme, but it was still caught by two fingers!
The Third Young Lady held onto Ye Xuan's sword and smiled, "Your swordsmanship realm has broken through!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "But it doesn't seem to work!"
The Third Young Lady shook her head, "No!"
As she spoke, she loosened two of her fingers. On her two fingers, there were two traces of blood!
The Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "If it was before, this sword of yours would not be a threat to me at all!
But now, your sword can hurt me!
You should know that I have a God State Daoist body!
If it was someone else, this sword of yours would be enough to kill them. "
Ye Xuan was relieved. He almost forgot that the Third Young Lady had a God State Daoist body!
He also had a Daoist body, so he knew how terrifying it was!
The Third Young Lady suddenly said, "You are more like a Swordsman now!
You!
Now, your sword does not have so many external enhancements, so it is more pure. This is a good thing. "
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "How can this sword of mine be a threat to you?"
The Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "Your speed must be at least five times faster, and your strength must be at least ten times stronger. Only then can you kill me with one strike. You cannot do without either!
You have the speed, but not the strength. My Daoist body can defend against this sword of yours. You have the strength, but not the speed. I can escape before you strike, or I can strike first. "
Ye Xuan said softly, "I understand!"
The Third Young Lady said, "Now, you can use your external strength to enhance your swordsmanship."
Ye Xuan shook his head, "No need!"
Saying that, he suddenly took a step forward, and the Sword Domain enveloped the Third Young Lady. The next moment, a ray of sword light flashed through the Sword Domain.
The Third Young Lady suddenly punched!
Boom!
As soon as she punched, the ray of sword light was stopped by her punch!
Inside the ray of sword light was Ye Xuan's sword!
However, Ye Xuan's sword stabbed into the Third Young Lady's fist by half an inch!
The Third Young Lady suddenly withdrew her fist, but in the next moment, she punched again.
Boom!
The ray of sword light shattered, and the moment it shattered, a sword silently arrived between the Third Young Lady's eyebrows. However, the sword stopped half an inch away from her eyebrows!
Because the Third Young Lady had unknowingly grabbed the sword in the ray of sword light!
At this moment, in the distance, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his palm. In an instant, countless rays of sword light crisscrossed and tore through the Sword Domain.
Chi chi chi chi!
Tearing sounds resounded, and it made one's scalp go numb!
The Third Young Lady slowly closed her eyes. When the sword qi arrived in front of her, she suddenly clenched her right hand, and a powerful fist force suddenly swept out from her body.
Life Fist!
Without burning one's lifespan, it was just the fist force of Life Fist. However, this fist force directly crushed all of Ye Xuan's sword qi. Not only that, but the Sword Domain was also trembling, and it was almost unable to withstand this force.
However, there were several sword wounds all over her body.
Ye Xuan's sword could already break through her defense, but it was not enough because it was not fatal!
The Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan, slowly loosened her right hand, and then said, "Continue!"
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his palm, and the Supreme Sword appeared in his hand. In the next moment, he directly appeared in front of the Third Young Lady, and suddenly pulled out the sword and slashed down!
Sword-Drawing Technique!
As the sword slashed out, a powerful force swept down from the top of the Third Young Lady's head …
The Third Young Lady suddenly clenched her right hand, and a powerful fist force surged out from her right hand.
Boom!
Ye Xuan was directly shaken back!
However, in the next moment, Ye Xuan rushed out again.
In this way, in the following time, Ye Xuan madly sparred with the Third Young Lady every day, practicing the Instant Kill Sword and the Sword-Drawing Technique.
As for Life Fist, he could not practice it because to obtain the power of life, he had to burn his lifespan, and he really could not afford to practice it!
Under the crazy practice, the power of Ye Xuan's Instant Kill Sword and the Sword-Drawing Technique also became stronger and stronger …
This also made Ye Xuan understand that there was no limit, only a higher limit!
...
As for An Lanxiu, she was no longer in the Dao Sect, and she had come to an unknown starry sky.
In her hand was the map that Ye Xuan gave her!
Looking for Miss Ding!
Ye Xuan knew that if he went to look for her, the mysterious woman would definitely know. Therefore, he cultivated hard in the Dao Sect to attract attention, and secretly asked An Lanxiu to look for Miss Ding …
....








Chapter 1497
An Lanxiu was flying through the starry sky.
She knew a little about that mysterious woman from the Hallowed Grounds, Dao Yi, and she was absolutely the strongest enemy Ye Xuan had encountered so far.
Just as the Third Young Miss had said, the current Ye Xuan couldn't resist that mysterious woman at all!
She and Ye Xuan weren't from the same generation at all!
Moreover, Ye Xuan's only bloodline that could pose a slight threat to her had been sealed and suppressed by her. Most importantly, that woman wasn't alone!
She was even forming alliances!
What the hell was she doing!?
Ye Xuan naturally wouldn't resign himself to death.
That woman didn't stop him from cultivating, but she stopped him from looking for Miss Ding. Obviously, that woman was rather afraid of Miss Ding.
This time, An Lanxiu wasn't going alone. Instead, she was bringing Xiao Ta and the Sword Spirit along.
Because Xiao Ta was able to conceal An Lanxiu's aura, and the Sword Spirit was naturally there to restrain the gaudy Xiao Ta. Without the Sword Spirit, Xiao Ta would ascend to the heavens!
An Lanxiu suddenly stopped and opened the map that Ye Xuan had given her. After a long time, she transformed into a ray of light and vanished into the starry sky.
...
After the mysterious woman left the Hallowed Grounds, she arrived in the starry sky, and then she waved her fair hand lightly. The starry sky in front of her was directly torn open, and she walked into the spatial rift. In the next moment, she appeared in an unknown starry sky.
She didn't stop, and she continued tearing open the starry sky and leaping through space.
Just like that, she stopped after around four hours. At this moment, she was in a deathly silent starry sky.
There wasn't any aura of life in this starry sky. Moreover, there was a putrid smell everywhere, and it was nauseating.
The mysterious woman casually waved her hand, and the putrid smell in the surroundings vanished without a trace. She glanced at the surroundings, and then she transformed into a ray of light and entered a deathly silent starry sky!
When she entered the planet, she frowned slightly because this planet was filled with an aura of death and decay. Not only that, but there were also rotting corpses everywhere she looked.
The woman in the plain dress floated into the distance. Not long after, she arrived before an ancient city. When she approached the ancient city, a nauseating smell of decay rushed towards her like a tidal wave. There was also the smell of blood mixed in this rotten smell.
The mysterious woman looked at the city. The city was filled with densely packed corpses. These corpses had been dead for a long time, but they were all soaked in blood. The blood contained a mysterious power, and it was this mysterious power that allowed these corpses to be preserved.
There were at least several million corpses in the entire city!
This place was simply a living hell.
The mysterious woman spoke softly, "The stronger some people are, the lower their limits are!"
As she spoke, she pressed her fingers together and gestured lightly. A black coffin floated up slowly from within the city. At the very least, the coffin was covered in countless blood red talismans, and it seemed rather strange.
Right at this moment, the coffin suddenly started trembling. A moment later, a savage voice resounded from within it, "Who dares to disturb my cultivation? Are you tired of living?"
As soon as the voice resounded, a ray of blood red light suddenly surged out from within the coffin, and then it shot violently towards the mysterious woman.
The mysterious woman waved her hand.
Bang!
The ray of blood red light was instantly blasted apart!
At the same time, a mysterious force blasted against the coffin.
Bang!
The coffin instantly shattered apart, and then a man appeared in midair. The man's hair was disheveled, his body was emaciated, and his entire body emanated an extremely unpleasant and rotten smell.
The man stared fixedly at the mysterious woman, "Who are you!?"
The mysterious woman had an emotionless expression on her face, "I'll give you a fortune. Do you want it?"
The man laughed coldly, "Give me a fortune?
How arrogant of you! "
The mysterious woman suddenly spread open her right hand, and then she stretched it forward and pressed it down.
Bang!
In the distance, the man directly smashed down from the sky, and a huge crater appeared on the ground!
On the ground, the man looked at the mysterious woman in the distance. At this moment, his eyes became slightly solemn, "Who the hell are you!?"
The mysterious woman's face was expressionless, "You're the Immortal Emperor, right?"
The man stood up slowly and stared at the mysterious woman, "Who the hell are you!?"
The mysterious woman smiled, "You slaughtered all the living beings here to make use of the aura of death within their bodies to strengthen yourself, so that you can reach the Godly State and control the boundless aura of death, right?"
The man clenched his right hand slowly, "So what if I am?"
The mysterious woman looked at the man, "Now, I'll give you a chance to help you reach the Godly State!"
The man narrowed his eyes slightly, "Help me reach the Godly State?"
The mysterious woman smiled, "Yes."
The man sneered, "Do you have the ability to do that?"
The mysterious woman suddenly slapped him.
The man's pupils constricted, and he threw a punch forward.
Bang!
With a punch, the man was sent flying. When he slammed into the city wall behind him, the ancient city instantly turned into nothingness, and the man's body split open, revealing his internal organs!
The man gulped, and he raised his head to look at the mysterious woman in the distance. At this moment, his eyes were no longer solemn, but fearful!
He knew that the woman's strength was far beyond his!
The mysterious woman said, "Do you believe me now?"
The man said in a deep voice, "Who the hell are you!?"
The mysterious woman shook her head, "Don't ask these meaningless questions. You should ask what I want you to do!"
The man looked at the mysterious woman, "What do you want me to do!?"
The mysterious woman smiled, "You're too weak now!
You can't do anything! "
As she spoke, she opened her palm, and an ancient scroll appeared in front of the man, "This can help you reach the Godly State, and there's a map in it. Once you reach the Godly State, look for me immediately!
I'll give you ten days, it should be enough! "
The man opened the scroll and glanced at it. Gradually, his expression became extremely solemn.
After a while, the man looked at the mysterious woman, "S-Senior, what do you want me to do!?"
The mysterious woman smiled, "When the time comes, I'll let you do something to restrain some people. Of course, you might have to pay with your life, or you might not have to do anything.
So, you can choose now. If you're not willing, I won't force you. If you're willing, I'll help you reach the Godly State! "
The man said, "I'm willing!"
The mysterious woman smiled, "Won't you consider it?"
The Undying Emperor looked at the woman, "There's no need to consider it!
If I don't break through, I won't be able to live for long! "
The mysterious woman looked at the Undying Emperor and smiled, "Indeed!"
As she spoke, she looked around, "I don't like this place, I'm leaving!"
Then, she turned around and left.
The Undying Emperor suddenly said, "Aren't you afraid that I won't look for you after I reach the Godly State?"
The mysterious woman didn't even turn her head, "You can try!"
As she spoke, she disappeared into the horizon.
The Undying Emperor remained silent, no one knew what he was thinking.
...
Taoism.
In the training field, Ye Xuan sat with his legs crossed, recalling the scene of him sparring with the Third Lady.
He was thinking about his own shortcomings!
He had to admit that he had learned a lot from sparring with the Third Lady. Not only had his Instakill Sword Technique and Sword-Drawing Technique improved greatly, he had also gained new insights into his Life Fist.
Not far away, the Third Lady glanced at Ye Xuan. In fact, she was a little shocked. Not long ago, Ye Xuan was not a threat to her, but now, Ye Xuan was a threat to her!
If she hadn't cultivated her Dao Body to the Godly State, it would be hard to say who would win between her and Ye Xuan.
In other words, if an ordinary Godly State expert were to fight against Ye Xuan, they would be instantly killed by Ye Xuan!
Because his sword was truly fast enough!
The reason why she could suppress Ye Xuan was because of her physical body. Her physical body was stronger than Ye Xuan's!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly stood up. He opened his palm and the Supreme Sword appeared in his hand. He looked at the Third Lady in the distance and said, "Let's continue!"
As he spoke, he was about to draw his sword. At this moment, the Third Lady shook her head and said, "You have a guest!"
Ye Xuan frowned and said, "That woman?"
The Third Lady shook her head and said, "No!"
As she spoke, she looked to the right and said, "You guys talk!"
After saying that, she turned and left.
Ye Xuan looked at where the Third Lady was looking. There, the space suddenly split and a shadow floated out. The shadow was blurry and he couldn't tell whether it was a man or a woman.
Ye Xuan looked at the shadow and asked, "You are?"
The shadow said, "The Northern Wilderness!"
The voice was blurry and he couldn't tell whether it was a man or a woman.
The Northern Wilderness!
Ye Xuan was stunned and said, "What's the matter?"
The shadow said, "It's nothing, I just came to see you!"
See me!
Ye Xuan's expression became slightly strange. He glanced at the shadow and said, "I think you should know the truth of the matter.
Am I right? "
The shadow said, "That woman wants the Northern Wilderness to deal with you. What do you think about this?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "If I'm not wrong, she must have given you a treasure or condition that you can't refuse, right?"
The shadow said, "Yes."
Ye Xuan thought for a moment and said, "What do you think?"
The shadow said, "I want to hear what you think!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "My idea is very simple. I will sit on top of the mountain and watch the tigers fight!"
The shadow didn't say anything.
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Sit on top of the mountain and watch the tigers fight. You will always be in an invincible position. What do you think?"
The shadow said softly, "But the thing she gave me is very tempting."
Ye Xuan asked, "How tempting?"
The shadow said, "It can change the fate of the entire Northern Wilderness!"
Ye Xuan said, "Only when you are alive can you have a fate."
The shadow said softly, "But you are very weak!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Can you see through that mysterious woman?"
The shadow said, "I can't!"
Ye Xuan shrugged and said, "She is my aunt, the blood kind!"
The shadow was silent.
Ye Xuan said again, "Sir, to tell you the truth, I have a dozen other aunts like her … In the end, this is our family's business … it's not good for you to get involved!
Also, what if one day my aunt thinks it through!
She won't hit me anymore!
At that time, what will you do?
At that time, it will be the two of us who will hit you.
What do you think? "
Then he paused and said, "Although my aunt has always been against me because of some things, I don't hate her at all. Because I know that there are no misunderstandings that can't be solved in a family. After all, she is my aunt!
My blood!
Blood is thicker than water! "
The shadow: "…"
.....
PS: Some readers told me to slow down the pace and write in more detail.
However, when I slowed down the pace, I was scolded!
Brothers, reading a book is like making a big sword, you can't just start with the climax of the plot!
Everything needs to be foreshadowed, which is a process. Just like in a relationship, don't you have to eat first, then watch a movie, and finally … How can you just get straight to the point!
Although this process is a bit boring, it must be done!
Without this process, how could there be such a thing … Don't you guys think that makes sense?!
Sorry, I went a bit off topic.
In the end, everyone could see that the woman in the plain dress had left and the plot had sped up.
Next, watch me, Luan, show off!
One more small request, when you scold me, can you be a bit more reserved?
My mental endurance is a bit low …








Chapter 1498
Blood is thicker than water!
The phantom was silent.
Although this Ye Xuan was bluffing, but it had to be said that what he said was reasonable!
This was other people's family matter!
If one day this pair of nephew and aunt suddenly stopped fighting and reconciled, at that time, wouldn't they really be in a bad situation?
Ye Xuan looked at the phantom, "Your Excellency, if I were you, I would choose to wait and see, not help anyone, wait until both of us are injured, then you come out to clean up the mess, isn't that perfect?"
The phantom said softly, "What you said is reasonable."
Saying that, his body gradually became illusory, obviously, he was about to leave.
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Wait, wait!"
The phantom said, "What's the matter?"
Ye Xuan hesitated, and then said, "I heard that you are from a prehistoric civilization?"
The phantom nodded, "Yes."
Ye Xuan said, "Can I understand you?"
The phantom said, "Understand us?"
And some nodded quickly, "I heard that your cultivation method is somewhat different from ours, is that right?"
The phantom said, "It is indeed not the same, but the essence is not too different, we all obtain great strength through cultivation!"
Ye Xuan quickly asked, "Do you have a physical cultivation method?"
The phantom said, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan blinked, "Look at me, look at my physical body, do you think my physical body can still break through?"
The phantom looked at Ye Xuan, and said softly, "Your physical body is very strong, but there is still a lot of room for improvement!"
Ye Xuan quickly asked, "Do you have a way to improve my physical body again?"
The phantom nodded, "There is, but why should we help you?"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, and then said, "What do you think of me?"
The phantom asked, "What do you mean in which aspect?"
Ye Xuan said, "All aspects."
The phantom said, "Glib, flowery, not what you mean …"
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Stop, stop, just say something good!"
The phantom remained silent.
Ye Xuan frowned. "I don't have any merits in your heart?"
The phantom said, "He has many backers!"
Ye Xuan's face immediately darkened, and he almost went berserk.
Ye Xuan took a deep breath and pointed to himself. "Sir, don't you think I'm very outstanding?
It's not an exaggeration to say that an outstanding young man like me should be the very, very, very, very, very rare kind of person in your prehistoric era, right? "
The figure shook his head.
Ye Xuan was puzzled. "Why are you shaking your head?"
The figure said, "I've existed for hundreds of thousands of years, and in these endless years, I've seen all kinds of people, but I've never seen someone with such thick skin!
Or is it that modern humans are all so thick-skinned? "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The mysterious man continued, "You've said so much because you want us to help you improve your physical body, right?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "That's right."
The phantom said, "Why should I help you improve your physical body?
Can you give me a reason? "
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, then said, "Why don't you state your conditions!"
After a moment of silence, the phantom said, "You don't have anything that we want."
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "A favor!"
The phantom looked at Ye Xuan. "A favor?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Yes.
Help me, and I'll owe you a favor. "
The phantom said softly, "You're trying to get something for nothing!"
Ye Xuan: "…"
The phantom suddenly said, "Okay!"
Ye Xuan was stunned, then said, "You agree?"
The phantom nodded. "I agree!
Come with me to the Northern Desolate! "
Ye Xuan hesitated, then said, "The Northern Desolate?"
The phantom said, "Afraid?"
Ye Xuan hurriedly shook his head. "With your strength, if you want to kill me, isn't it a piece of cake?
Why do you have to trick me to the Northern Desolate? "
The phantom said, "Let's go!"
After that, the space in front of Ye Xuan suddenly cracked.
Ye Xuan hesitated, then looked to the right, and cupped his fists. "Third Young Lady, thank you for all this time!"
After that, he walked into the space crack.
The phantom also disappeared.
On the other side, the Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan disappearing in the distance, silent.
...
The Northern Desolate.
When Ye Xuan came out of the teleportation array, he directly appeared in front of a huge stone tablet!
Ye Xuan glanced around. This is the Northern Desolate!
And not far from him stood a woman, the woman's fingertips flashed with knife light.
Saint!
And behind the Saint were Ge Yao and the others.
When Ye Xuan saw Ge Yao and the others, his expression changed.
Behind Ge Yao, there were more than two hundred people, these people at least above the Immortal State, judging from their aura.
And the woman at the head of the group, her strength was unfathomable.
This Northern Desolate is so strong!
Ge Yao looked at Ye Xuan, not particularly friendly.
Glancing at them, Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Hello, everyone!"
The Saint looked at Ye Xuan. "Young Master Ye, you want to strengthen your body?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes."
Then, he looked at the Saint. "How should I address you, young lady?"
The Saint smiled. "Mu Xi!"
Ye Xuan said, "Miss Mu Xi, where is the senior who brought me here?"
Mu Xi smiled. "Young Master Ye, please wait for a moment. The Exalted God will appear soon."
Ye Xuan nodded. "Okay!"
Then, he looked around. It was surrounded by clouds and he could not see far.
Mu Xi smiled. "Young Master Ye seems to be a bit curious about the Northern Desolate Region!"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Indeed!
Miss Mu Xi, there is one thing I am very curious about. That is, how are your realms divided? "
Then, he pointed at Ge Yao. "For example, he should be in the Immortal State in our era. What about in your era?"
Mu Xi smiled. "The Immortal State you speak of is in the Dao Scripture System, right?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes."
Mu Xi said, "In our era, he is called the Dao Defiant State."
Ye Xuan frowned. "Dao Defiant?"
Mu Xi nodded. "At his level, he can reverse the Death Qi in his body and gradually turn it into Life Qi … This action is equivalent to going against the heavens. Therefore, in our era, he is called the Dao Defiant State.
He has the ability to reverse the Dao and reverse life and death! "
Ye Xuan asked again, "What about above the Dao Defiant State?"
Mu Xi smiled. "Eternal!"
Ye Xuan blinked. "Eternal Realm?"
Mu Xi nodded. "At this level, the body is eternal, the soul is eternal, and the spirit is eternal!
Of course, the lifespan will still disappear. However, it is possible for an expert of this level to live for hundreds of thousands of years. Of course, the premise is that they are not killed by others or seek their own death. "
Ye Xuan said softly, "Is there anyone who can live forever?"
Mu Xi looked at Ye Xuan. "No!"
Ye Xuan looked at Mu Xi. "In your era, no one can live forever?"
Mu Xi shook her head. "I can tell you that a person, through cultivation, can live for a very, very long time, even millions of years. But up until now, in our recorded history, no one has been able to live forever.
Even the Gods are limited by their lifespan and are unable to achieve true eternal life. "
Ye Xuan was a little puzzled. "Why can't true eternal life be achieved?"
Mu Xi smiled. "If someone can achieve true eternal life, then there is only one possibility. That is, the current laws of the universe have completely collapsed!"
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "The laws of the universe?"
Mu Xi nodded. "According to what we know, there are currently nine laws of the universe. One of them is the Life Law. Everyone's lifespan is limited by the Life Law. No one can live forever. No life can achieve eternal existence.
Because once someone lives forever, the universe will be in chaos.
Think about it, if a person can't die, wouldn't that be terrifying? "
Ye Xuan nodded. "That's true!"
Mu Xi continued. "Some people can go against the Dao. However, no one can go against the laws of the universe. That's not right. At least no one can go against the first five laws of the universe.
If someone can go against the Eternal Law, perhaps they can really live forever. However, it is basically impossible! "
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "Why is it impossible?"
Mu Xi smiled slightly. "The laws of the universe are existences of a higher level. We're only in contact with the Dao now, but the laws of the universe are existences that surpass the Dao."
When she spoke up to here, she glanced at Ye Xuan and said, "Your Adversity Constitution belongs to a different kind of existence, an extremely different kind of existence!"
Ye Xuan asked, "A different kind of existence?
Does it belong to the laws of the universe? "
Mu Xi shook her head. "I'm unable to answer that. Because I only know that there are nine laws of the universe. However, I don't know exactly which nine laws they are.
So, I can't be sure if your Adversity Constitution is related to the laws of the universe. "
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment, and then he asked, "What if my Adversity Constitution is really the work of the laws of the universe?"
Mu Xi thought for a long time, and then she said, "Be a good person in your next life!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Right at this moment, the stone stele behind Ye Xuan suddenly trembled, and a voice resounded from within it.
Mu Xi looked at Ye Xuan. "Follow me!"
Ye Xuan glanced at the stone stele, and then he said, "What are you Exalted Goddess doing inside?"
Mu Xi said, "It's a secret!"
A secret!
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Mu Xi suddenly said, "Young Master Ye, I heard that the woman who wanted to beat you up is your aunt?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes, she said she's my aunt!"
Mu Xi said, "Since there's an aunt, there must be a grandfather. Why don't you go look for your grandfather?"
Ye Xuan shrugged. "I think it's said that my grandfather was killed by my cheapskate father!"
Mu Xi stopped in her tracks and turned to look at Ye Xuan. "Killed by your father?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "That's what they said!"
Mu Xi frowned slightly. "Your father killed your father-in-law?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Actually, it's hard for me to understand too. However, I heard that my grandfather isn't a good person either!"
Mu Xi said softly, "Your family … is really amazing!"
Ye Xuan was curious. "Miss Muxi, can your Exalted Deity defeat that woman?"
Mu Xi shook her head, "I don't know!
We'll only know after we fight! "
Ye Xuan said, "Do you have any good suggestions for my current situation?"
Mu Xi thought for a moment, and then she said, "You can ask your aunt if we can spare their lives if they surrender!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
..
!!








Chapter 1499
Ye Xuan glanced at Mu Xi. This woman's words were quite amusing!
Could he not be killed if he surrendered?
However, he could ask her when the time came.
Before long, Mu Xi brought Ye Xuan to a cloud. Not far from the two of them, there were countless flashes of lightning.
It was a pool of lightning!
Ye Xuan looked at Mu Xi. "Miss Mu Xi, are you going to use the heavenly lightning to temper my body?"
Mu Xi shook her head. "Not for you!"
Ye Xuan was a little puzzled. "Then?"
Mu Xi looked at Ye Xuan. "Absorb!"
Ye Xuan was stunned. "Absorb the lightning?"
Mu Xi nodded. She looked at the pool of lightning in the distance. "This pool of lightning is the heavenly tribulation lightning of our era. It contains extremely pure lightning power. If you can absorb the lightning elements, your body should be able to break through again."
Ye Xuan looked at the pool of lightning. Within it, lightning flashed, and the might of the heavens was oppressive.
Mu Xi suddenly said, "Go!"
Ye Xuan hesitated. "Is it dangerous?"
Mu Xi nodded. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan blinked. "What danger?"
Mu Xi said, "It might electrocute you to death!"
Ye Xuan, "…"
After a while, Ye Xuan didn't ask anymore. He walked towards the pool of lightning. The closer he got to the pool of lightning, the stronger the might of the heavenly lightning.
Ye Xuan stopped and turned to look at Mu Xi. "Miss Mu Xi, are you going to absorb it forcefully?"
Mu Xi looked at Ye Xuan. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Alright!"
With that, he transformed into a sword light and entered the pool of lightning.
Boom!
As soon as he entered the pool of lightning, countless bolts of lightning struck Ye Xuan. In an instant, Ye Xuan became a man of lightning.
Was it painful?
Ye Xuan didn't feel much pain, just a little numb.
Meanwhile, Mu Xi suddenly pointed with her finger, and a ray of white light entered the space between Ye Xuan's brows. At the same time, Mu Xi's voice resounded in Ye Xuan's mind. "This is a mental cultivation technique. Follow it and you'll be able to absorb the Heavenly Lightning Tribulation in the surroundings into your body, and then convert it into lightning energy to strengthen your body!"
Ye Xuan nodded. A moment later, he began to circulate the mental cultivation method. Gradually, the lightning in his surroundings began to be absorbed by his body. At this moment, he felt warm and comfortable.
Ye Xuan grinned. This was the first time he felt so comfortable cultivating his physical body. In the past, when he cultivated his physical body, he was in so much pain that he wanted to die!
Actually, the main reason was that his physical body was strong enough, which was why he could do it so easily!
A moment later, Ye Xuan calmed himself down and concentrated on absorbing the tribulation lightning.
Mu Xi turned around and left.
Mu Xi arrived in front of the stone tablet, and a phantom image appeared on the stone tablet.
It was the mysterious Exalted Deity.
Mu Xi said softly, "Exalted Deity still chose him!"
Exalted Deity said, "It's not that I chose him, but that we had no choice but to form a good relationship with him!"
Mu Xi said, "Isn't there still that mysterious woman?"
Exalted Deity said softly, "Choosing that woman will lead to eternal damnation!"
Mu Xi said in a low voice, "Exalted Deity, did you discover something?"
Exalted Deity said, "The Body of Adversity is scarier than I imagined!
The fact that that young man could survive until now means that there must be a powerful expert protecting him. Otherwise, he would not have been able to survive until now.
And the person who can resist the Body of Adversity … "
At this point, she didn't say anything else.
Mu Xi said, "That mysterious woman must know how powerful the person behind him is, but she still did it. Why?"
Exalted Deity said, "I don't know.
But from the looks of it, this woman is a little crazy.
What my clan needs to do is to form a good relationship with that young man, and then wait and see what happens.
If the mysterious woman wins, we just won't be able to obtain the Mysterious Temple of Heaven and Earth, but our clan can continue to pass on.
If that Ye Xuan wins, our clan will benefit greatly. "
Mu Xi nodded. "I understand!
But what if that woman wants us to choose a side? "
Exalted Deity said softly, "Then we will choose Ye Xuan!"
Mu Xi was curious. "Why?"
Exalted Deity said, "Do you believe in justice?"
Mu Xi shook her head. "Not really. Since ancient times, whoever wins is justice."
Exalted Deity said softly, "Then you can believe it!"
Mu Xi was a little curious. "Ye Xuan is justice?"
Exalted Deity said, "Have you seen the Five Dimensional Universe?"
Mu Xi was slightly stunned, then she said softly, "I understand!"
As she said this, she seemed to have thought of something and frowned. "Something is not right. Ye Xuan has the Body of Adversity, and shouldn't he be punished by heaven?
But he is like a fish in water in the Five Dimensional Universe. Not only is he not punished by heaven, but he also has a good relationship with the Tendo of the Five Dimensional Universe. Most importantly, there are countless Heaven and Earth Spirits in the Five Dimensional Universe … These Heaven and Earth Spirits actually do not reject him … This is really strange!
Not only do they not reject him, I can feel that those Heaven and Earth Spirits and people in the Five Dimensional Universe respect him like a god … He does not want to be someone with the Body of Adversity, but someone with the Body of Kindness! "
Exalted Deity said, "There are two reasons. First, someone is helping him to resist the karma of the Body of Adversity. Second, he is slowly changing his own fate!
Nothing is absolute in this world, even the Body of Adversity. "
Mu Xi said in a low voice, "Can this Body of Adversity really be reversed?"
Exalted Deity said, "Everything is possible!"
Mu Xi shook her head. "I am still a little worried about that woman!
If we help Ye Xuan, I am afraid that she will target us! "
Exalted Deity said after a moment of silence, "If she dares to target my clan, my clan will move to the Five Dimensional Universe and live and die with Ye Xuan."
Mu Xi looked at Exalted Deity. "Are you serious?"
Exalted Deity said, "This woman wants to lead my clan by the nose, how can we let her do as she pleases?
If she bullies us too much, then we will all perish together.
The reason why my clan has survived until now is not because we are weak.
Moreover, it is better to die tragically than to live in humiliation.
No matter what era it is, we still need our pride and dignity. If we don't have pride and dignity, what is the point of living? "
Mu Xi smiled slightly. "I understand.
If that woman dares to bully my clan again, we will beat her to death. Even if we cannot defeat her, we will still beat her. "
Exalted Deity said, "Go and awaken more people!
To deal with everything! "
Mu Xi nodded. "Understood!"
After saying that, she turned and left.
...
Holy Region.
Inside the bamboo house, the mysterious woman was reading an ancient book in her hands. She would smile from time to time.
At this moment, Holy Leader suddenly appeared outside the bamboo house. Holy Leader bowed respectfully to the bamboo house. "Master, the Third Lady is here!"
The mysterious woman put down the ancient book and smiled. "Please!"
Outside the bamboo house, the Third Lady turned and left. After a while, the Third Lady walked into the bamboo house. She looked around and said softly, "So simple!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "Third Lady, please take a seat!"
The Third Lady looked at the seat opposite the mysterious woman. There was a teacup on the table.
The Third Lady smiled. "Looks like you had a guest before!"
The mysterious woman nodded. "She just left!"
The Third Lady sat in front of the mysterious woman. She looked at the ancient book in the mysterious woman's hands. "What book is this?"
The mysterious woman smiled. "Refreshing literature!"
The Third Lady blinked. "Refreshing literature?"
The mysterious woman nodded and smiled. "It's something that makes people feel relaxed and happy. However, this kind of literature has many flaws. For example, the style of writing is worrisome, lacking in content, often digging holes, repeating the same routine, and even contradictory …"
The Third Lady asked, "Just pure refreshing?"
The mysterious woman nodded. "Yes!
Refreshing to the end! "
The Third Lady looked at the mysterious woman. "You actually know how to read this!"
The mysterious woman placed the ancient book in front of her. She smiled. "I'm just a layman. Those literary works are too profound. I can't understand them.
Moreover, life is stressful. Reading refreshing literature to relieve boredom is not bad! "
The Third Lady smiled. "You have a stressful life?"
The mysterious woman blinked. "My enemies are very powerful. For example, that plain-dressed woman!
She can kill me with one sword strike. Don't you think I'm stressful? "
The Third Lady was speechless.
You know that she can kill you with one sword strike. Yet you still target her brother!
At this time, the mysterious woman handed the ancient book to the Third Lady. "Do you want to take a look?
Maybe it can relieve your worries! "
The Third Lady took the ancient book. She opened it and looked at it. After a long time, she frowned and closed the book. "The intelligence of the villain in this book is too low!"
The mysterious woman laughed. "It seems that this book is not suitable for you!"
The Third Lady thought for a moment and continued to read. After about a quarter of an hour, she shook her head again. "It's really hard to understand!"
The mysterious woman laughed. "Actually, I've read quite a lot of refreshing novels. Most of them are the same. For example: leveling up, killing monsters and picking up treasures. Cave Academy's auction. Completing a mission and entering a mystic realm. Changing planes in the Immortal World and God World. Excellent talent. Cultivating for a year is equivalent to ten years. There's an old man in the ring … Haha …"
The Third Lady was speechless.
The mysterious woman picked up the teacup and took a sip of tea. Then she smiled. "Alright, alright!
Let's get down to business!
Is there something you need from me? "
The Third Lady nodded. "I just wanted to tell you that Young Master Ye came to my Dao Sect before!"
The mysterious woman said, "About you sparring with him?"
The Third Lady nodded. "Yes.
You're not angry, right? "
The mysterious woman smiled. "You came and told me!
I'm not angry! "
The Third Lady smiled. "Thank you!
To be honest, it's hard to survive in the middle of all of you.
But I've decided to seal my Dao Sect. I won't interfere with anything in the world anymore! "
The mysterious woman shook her head. "That's not necessary!
I'm not a heinous person. I won't kill the innocent.
I can understand that you want to form a good relationship with him. "
The Third Lady looked at the mysterious woman. "You don't look like a bad person!
If I'm not wrong, you're targeting Ye Xuan. No matter if Ye Xuan is dead or alive, you'll definitely die, right? "
The mysterious woman smiled. "You're very smart, just like that Miss Nian Nian."
The Third Lady shook her head. "It's hard to understand why you're doing this!"
The mysterious woman smiled. She didn't say anything.
At this moment, the Sacred Leader appeared outside the bamboo house. "Master, Ye Xuan is in the Northern Wilderness. The Northern Wilderness is helping him!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "I've underestimated the Northern Wilderness!
I can't entertain you anymore!
I'm going to the Northern Wilderness. "
With that, she stood up and left.
The Third Lady suddenly said. "Perhaps the Northern Wilderness is the same as me. They just want to form a good relationship with him!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "Let's make a bet. How hard do you think the Northern Wilderness will be?"
Third Young Mistress said in a low voice, "What if they insist?"
The mysterious woman blinked. "Do you really think my goal is to win over the Beihuang Region?"
Third Young Lady was speechless.
